description: ['Unsere Manufacturing Division ist ein Team von engagierten, energiegeladenen Personen, die sich dazu verpflichtet haben, weltweit der vertrauenswürdigste Anbieter von Arzneimitteln und Gesundheitsprodukten zu sein. Unsere Einrichtungen, zusammen mit unseren externen Auftragnehmern, Lieferanten und Partnern, umfassen ein voneinander abhängiges globales Fertigungsnetzwerk, das sich zu einer konformen, zuverlässigen Versorgung von Kunden und Patienten pünktlich und jederzeit auf der ganzen Welt verpflichtet hat.', 'Für unsere neue Produktionsstätte in Krems suchen wir Automatisierungsingenieure (m/w) mit mehrjähriger Berufserfahrung im Bereich der Automatisierung von Produktionsanlagen in der Chemischen Industrie oder der Pharmaindustrie. Sie haben die Gelegenheit, Teil eines sich neu formierenden Teams zu werden. In den nächsten 4 – 5 Jahren installieren wir an diesem Standort eine moderne “State-of-the-Art” Produktionsanlage zur Herstellung von Vakzinen und Impfstoffen für die Tiergesundheit.', 'Automatisierungsingenieur (m/w)', 'Vollzeit, ab sofort', 'Zu Ihrem Aufgaben- und Verantwortungsbereich in dieser Position zählen:', 'Erarbeitung von Automatisierungslösungen für den Produktionsstandort basierend auf den Anforderungen der Anlagenbetreiber (Produktion) in Zusammenarbeit mit den jeweiligen Liefer- und Planungsfirmen und in Übereinstimmung mit den Unternehmensrichtlinien', 'Leitung von Projektteams für die Erstellung und Implementierung von Automatisierungslösungen am Standort', 'Mitarbeit bei der Erstellung von User Requirements in Kooperation mit den Anlagenbetreibern', 'Mitwirkung bei der Planung und Ausführung der neuen automatisierungstechnischen Einrichtungen (Prozessleitsystem PCS7, sowie Simatic S7 und WinCC-Systeme) für die Produktionsanlagen, gemeinsam mit den ausführenden Unternehmen', 'Teilnahme an Planungsworkshops und Review von Ausführungsdokumenten', 'Abnahme und Überprüfung der Automatisierungsanlagen im Herstellerwerk (FAT) und in der Betriebsstätte (SAT)', 'Mitarbeit bei der Inbetriebnahme und Startup der Produktionsanlagen', 'Mitwirkung bei der Qualifizierung und Validierung der Automatisierungstechnik für die Produktionsanlagen im GMP-Umfeld', 'Schulung der Anlagennutzer sowie Unterstützung bei Betrieb und Wartung automatisierungstechnischer Einrichtungen sowie Unterhalt der übergeordneten Automatisierungsebenen', 'Qualifications', 'Für diese Tätigkeit bringen Sie folgende Voraussetzungen mit:', 'Abgeschlossenes Studium der Fachrichtung Automatisierungs- oder Elektrotechnik oder vergleichbarer Fachrichtungen (abgeschlossene HTL, FH oder Universität)', 'Mehrjährige Berufserfahrung in Projektierung, Programmierung und Inbetriebsetzung von Prozessleitsystemen (vorzugsweise Simatic PCS7), idealerweise in der chemischen oder pharmazeutischen', 'Industrie', 'Gute Kenntnisse im Bereich von SPS und SCADA-Systemen (vorzugsweise Simatic S7 TIA-Portal)', 'Gute Kenntnisse im Bereich Sensorik und Aktorik sowie Antriebstechnik', 'Idealerweise IT-Kenntnisse im Bereich der Virtualisierung und Netzwerktechnik', 'Berufserfahrung im pharmazeutischen und GMP-Umfeld von Vorteil', 'Flexibilität, Lernbereitschaft und Bereitschaft zu Rufbereitschaft', 'Gute MS-Office-Kenntnisse', 'Gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift', 'Wir bieten Ihnen:', 'Spannendes und herausforderndes Arbeitsfeld mit modernen „State- of-the-Art“ Technologien in einer neuen, wachsenden Organisation', 'Abwechslungsreiche Tätigkeit in einem international agierenden Unternehmen', 'Gute Aus- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten', 'Mitarbeit in einem professionellen, ambitionierten und hoch motivierten Team und einer wertschätzenden positiven Arbeitsumgebung', 'Das Mindestgehalt beträgt Euro 38.814,44 brutto/Jahr, die Bereitschaft zu Überzahlung abhängig von Qualifikationsprofil und Berufserfahrung ist gegeben.', 'Sie sind kompetent, belastbar, zuverlässig, initiativ und wollen unseren Standort in dieser intensiven Start-Up Phase der Entwicklung einer großen Produktionsstätte aktiv unterstützen? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre aussagekräftige Bewerbung über unser Bewerbungsportal!', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen:', 'MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 10 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BIOTECH, DUBLIN', 'The latest addition to the MSD Ireland family is MSD Biotech, Dublin. The site will play a pivotal role in the manufacture of MSD’s biologics-based medicines, including in the area of immuno-oncology, and will expand MSD’s current internal network of biologics drug substance manufacturing plants when full manufacturing operations begin in 2021.', 'MSD Biotech Dublin, will be MSD’s first ever Large-Scale Mammalian-Based Drug Substance Facility, with the mission and ambition to manufacture breakthrough medicines from Ireland for patients around the world.', 'This facility will be a significant supplier of drug substances for one of MSD’s key treatments and will also be critical in the future supply of new biotechnology products to its global network.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'THE ROLE', 'Reporting to the site manufacturing and technology head and based at the MSD Biotech Dublin site, the Process Sciences leader responsibilities include, but are not limited to the following:', 'Provide oversight of the design, construction and qualification of the new Process Sciences laboratories at MSD Biotech Dublin by:', 'o Serving as biologics drug substance (inclusive of upstream cell culture and downstream purification) process subject matter expert, providing technical oversight to teams, and coaching to associate staff. Provide technical leadership for:', '\uf0a7 Experimental design, execution, data analysis and interpretation.', '\uf0a7 Execution of satellite runs.', '\uf0a7 Interpretation of trends observed in commercial process monitoring (e.g., proactive process analysis (PPA), continued process verification (CPV), statistical process control (SPC) multivariate analyses (MVDA)), and for further technical investigations and process changes that seek to drive improvements to yield and/or robustness.', '\uf0a7 Deviation management.', 'o Authoring and reviewing standard operating procedures and technical reports. Supporting global regulatory submissions as needed.', 'o Supporting multidisciplinary teams (manufacturing science and technology, quality, analytics, regulatory) for process improvement and troubleshooting with end-to-end product focus.', 'o Serving as data & digitization steward supporting the industry 4.0 initiative.', '\uf0a7 Navigate operations in a digital environment (Industry 4.0)', '\uf0a7 Exemplify and fosters a culture of data driven decision making', '\uf0a7 Champion innovation; drive the need to collaborate and be creative to support continuous improvement', '\uf0a7 Serve as a change agent and accepts calculated risks', '\uf0a7 Translate knowledge and business value from data insights', 'o Assuring effective application of LeanSixSigma and Change Management tools in the Process Sciences group by:', '\uf0a7 Securing continuity of an appropriate LSS/CEM level of knowledge.', '\uf0a7 Leading by example in achieving results by using high performing organization (HPO) tools and processes', '\uf0a7 Facilitate problem solving & risk assessment (FMEA) projects/meeting.', '\uf0a7 Make problems visible and strive for continuous improvement.', 'o Serving as a key member during internal audits and external inspections/audits.', 'o Supporting alignment and knowledge exchange with development organizations, other commercial nodes and external manufacturing partners.', 'o Supporting authoring and maintainenance of the master validation plan.', 'Manage and coach a staff of 4-6 engineers.', 'Lead and support various organizational initiatives as needed (examples include safety, financial forecasting, work standardization, etc).', 'Represent the organization and company in external collaborations (BPOG, NIIMBL, etc) and present technical and strategic outcomes at scientific and professional forums.', 'Keep up to date with scientific and technical developments.', 'Support creation of departmental budget and surveil actual performance against the forecast.', 'Maintain continuous focus on quality and safety compliance and unflinching focus on the customer.', 'Qualifications', 'General', 'This role requires an experienced individual with a minimum of 8 years’ (for PhD), 12 years’ (for MSc) or 14 years’ (for BSc) directly related experience in academia, pharmaceutical or biotechnology company – along with a working knowledge of current regulatory requirements and current Good Manufacturing Practices.', 'A self-starter and results-focussed, the successful candidate will have strong contemporary knowledge, and the ability to work independently and on multidisciplinary teams. The successful candidate will also have demonstrated the ability to deliver what is needed on-time, holding self and team accountable for commitments, decisions, actions and behaviours.', 'S/he will also have excellent oral and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively articulate understanding of process science, in order to drive decision making, impact assessments, design of studies, etc., in a multi-disciplinary team environment.', 'Technical', 'Experience with upstream cell culture and downstream purification of biological molecules. Experience with technology transfer, regulatory filing, and commercial drug substance manufacturing of biologics is a plus.', 'Prior experience in drug substance process development, process characterisation studies, process performance qualification and validation, site readiness, batch record reviews, authoring regulatory CTD sections and/or working with external contract organisation for development and/or manufacturing.', 'Working knowledge of statistical methods for DOE design and data analysis (e.g., JMP or Design Expert software)', 'Working knowledge of statistical process control (SPC), multivariate analysis (MVDA), and/or process analytical technologies (PAT) techniques for biologics processes', 'Education', 'With a Bachelor’s degree (or higher) in Biological Sciences/Chemical Engineering/Biological Engineering/Chemistry, the successful candidate will also ideally have a proven track record in delivering excellence. The candidate will also show ambition and drive to develop and advance their career within MSD.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 20 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Mit seinen verschreibungspflichtigen Arzneimitteln, Impfstoffen, Biologika, Präparaten zur Selbstmedikation und für die Tiergesundheit in verschiedenen Therapiebereichen bietet MSD in mehr als 140 Ländern umfassende und innovative Lösungen für Gesundheit. Ein besonderes Anliegen von MSD ist darüber hinaus die Verbesserung der weltweiten Gesundheitsversorgung und der verbesserte Zugang zu Medikamenten. Dafür engagiert sich MSD in weitreichenden Gesundheitsprogrammen und Partnerschaften. Zur Verstärkung unseres Teams suchen wir für unseren Produktionsstandort in 1210 Wien eine/n:', 'Facility Manager (m/w)', 'Aufgabenbereich', 'Verantwortung über das Facility Management am gesamten Standort inklusive Medienversorgung, elektrische Energieversorgung und Infrastruktur-Dienstleistungen', 'Planung, Koordination und Kontrolle von Instandhaltung und Reparaturen', 'Aktives managen der Wartungsstillstandsplanung sowie Stör- und Ausfallszenarien', 'Enge Zusammenarbeit und Führung des internen Facility Teams und Abstimmung mit der EHS Schnittstelle', 'Sicherstellung von internen Sicherheits- und Umweltstandards sowie gesetzliche Vorschriften', 'Identifizieren der Optimierungspotentiale in Bezug auf Versorgungssicherheit, Energieeinsparung und Kosteneinsparung und deren Umsetzung forcieren', 'Qualifications', 'Abgeschlossene technische Ausbildung (Werkmeister, HTL) im Bereich Elektrotechnik, HKLS oder Maschinenbau und einschlägige Berufserfahrung (bevorzugt in einem GMP-Umfeld)', 'Mind. 2 Jahre Berufserfahrung im Facility Management', 'Hohe Eigenverantwortung und Teamplayer, zeitliche Flexibilität im Störungsfall bzw. bei Wartungsstillständen', 'Management- und Führungskompetenz, um Mitarbeiter mit hoher Fachqualifikation zu führen und idealerweise Führungserfahrung in einem Servicebereich', 'Ausgeprägtes Kosten-, Qualitäts- und Servicebewusstsein', 'Englisch und Projektmanagement', 'Es erwartet Sie ein angenehmes Arbeitsklima sowie ein hochinteressantes Aufgabengebiet. Wir bieten Ihnen eine verantwortungsvolle und langfristige Spezialisten-Position mit attraktiven Rahmenbedingungen und Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten innerhalb des Unternehmens.  Für diese Position ist ein Jahresbruttogehalt von mindestens EUR  50,200.00,- vorgesehen. Je nach Erfahrung und Qualifikation ist eine Überbezahlung jedenfalls möglich. Bei Interesse freuen wir uns auf Ihre Online-Bewerbung.', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen: MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. Bitte keine Anrufe oder E-Mails. Alle Lebensläufe, die von Personalberatungen per E-Mail, im Internet oder in irgendeiner Form und/oder Methode an einen Mitarbeiter von MSD gesendet werden, ohne dass eine gültige schriftliche Vermittlungsvereinbarung für diese Position besteht, gelten als alleiniges Eigentum von MSD. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD Manufacturing Division, MMD, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', 'An exceptional opportunity for an experienced Safety & Environment Specialist to join the Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) team; where they will play an integral role in developing, maintaining and continually improving the EHS systems at our vaccines and biologics facility in Brinny.', "He/she will provide technical guidance to the organisation to ensure compliance with legal requirements related to EHS as well as MSD's corporate standards, policies, procedures and guidelines related to EHS and industry best practices.", 'He/she will ensure, in conjunction with the EHS team, that all EHS regulatory requirements on the site are upheld to the highest standard.', 'DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES', "develop and implement EHS programmes to ensure compliance with local legislation, MSD's standards and industry best practices including programmes such as: risk assessments; contractor management; incident investigation; chemical management; ergonomics; biorisk; equipment & machine safety; industrial hygiene; high risk work – e.g. hot work, confined space entry, work at height, etc.", 'demonstrate leadership and a strong desire to protect employees, our community and the environment – leading with a ’safety first’ mindset.', 'prepare reports to site, divisional and/or corporate management and regulatory agencies.', 'evaluate all EHS applicable requirements for any new projects and processes (along with other site departments where necessary) as well as changes in the existing processes and installation.', 'conduct annual site self-assessments, and more frequent operating unit assessments, tracking and directing follow-up activities to correct any non-conformity.', 'Interpersonal', 'Team player, capable of working within a multi functionary team environment; and to periodically lead teams.', 'Enthusiastic with a strong drive for results.', 'Self-directed, capable of using own initiative to make EHS improvements.', 'Dedicated to maintaining high standards, with the courage and candour to ensure things are done properly onsite – ‘right first time.’', 'Desire to protect employees and environment.', 'Why is this a compelling position for a dynamic and ambitious EHS professional to consider?', 'Excellent opportunity to play a key role in the future development and maintenance of all EHS functions in our Brinny facility.', 'Superb opportunity to join the existing EHS team in Brinny and become a part of the broader MSD EHS community which presents opportunities to be exposed to the network of sites across MSD worldwide whilst developing and expanding your career.', 'Our employees are the key to our company’s success. We demonstrate our commitment to our employees by offering a competitive and valuable rewards program. Our Company’s benefits are designed to support the wide range of goals, needs and lifestyles of our employees, and the people that matter the most in their lives.', '*featured', 'Qualifications', 'Experience', '3+ years’ EHS experience in Pharmaceutical, or other highly regulated industry.', 'Proven track record of success in the EHS sector.', 'Experience on supporting multiple activities/projects.', 'Industrial Hygiene experience an advantage', 'Skills', 'Ability to influence others.', 'Innovative & Compliance-minded, with the drive to go seek out necessary information.', '‘Safety First’ mind-set.', 'Qualifications:', 'Primary Bachelor’s Degree in EHS or Technical Primary Bachelor’s Degree with a post-grad EHS qualification is required.', 'Technically strong; with understanding of a variety of EHS topics.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. description: ['De afdeling', 'Voor het Center of Excellence (CoE) Facility & Engineering, binnen Pharmaceutical Operations (PO) bij MSD in Oss, zijn we op zoek naar een kandidaat voor de functie van Manufacturing Automation Engineer – CSV Engineer.', 'Facility & Engineering (F&E;) is een Center of excellence (CoE) binnen Pharmaceutical Operations (PO). Deze afdeling werkt nauw samen met een ander CoE Technical Operations (TO). Deze 2 afdelingen bestaan uit verschillende secties', 'die technische en technologische ondersteuning geven aan de pharmaceutische operatie van MSD in Oss. Het gaat hierbij om de product secties Solids, Steriles, Polymerics en Verpakking die product en process ondersteuning geven aan de operatie. Daarnaast zijn er niet product specifieke secties die ondersteuning geven aan PO op het gebied van CAPEX, Facility management en Maintenance & Calibration. De functie voor Manufacturing Automation Engineer valt binnen de CAPEX sectie en rapporteert aan het hoofd van de sectie. Iedere sectie bestaat uit circa 10-20 medewerkers.', 'De positie', 'Als Manufacturing Automation Engineer bij Facility & Engineering draag je bij aan een aantal veelzijdige en uitdagende upgrade en nieuwbouw projecten binnen diverse productieafdelingen. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor en schrijver van validatie documenten zoals Quality Assurance Plannen & Reports, Requirements Specs, Testprotocollen, Testreports, etc. Je bent de intermediar tussen de automation Subject Matter Expert (SME) en IT-Quality.', 'Qualifications', 'Benodigde kwalificaties & ervaring', 'Een afgeronde Technische HBO opleiding (bijv.', 'Industriële Automatisering).', '5 jaar werkervaring in de Automatisering als Software/PLC/SCADA Engineer.', 'Kennis van systemen zoals Siemens (S5/7), SCADA,', 'Vision, Visual Basic, SQL of vergelijkbare', 'pakketten.', 'Ervaring met XP, Windows 7, 10 en (Industriële) netwerken.', 'Ervaring in de Life Science Industry (o.a. cGMP, Safety, Validatie).', 'Ervaring in het werken met GAMP5.', 'Kennis van Data Integrity requirements.', 'Je sociale en communicatieve vaardigheden zijn goed ontwikkeld', 'Je toont overtuigingskracht en proactiviteit.', 'Service/ klantgericht optreden en een “go-see” houding.', 'Kwaliteits- en veiligheidsbewust.', 'Goede mondelinge en schriftelijke communicatieve vaardigheden in Nederlands en Engels;', 'Self propelled, zelfstandig, in staat prioriteiten te bepalen.', 'Kennis en ervaring met de MSD systemen (SDLC methodiek, een afgeleide van GAMP5) en Organisatie is een pré.', 'Over MSD', 'Het MSD van vandaag is wereldleider op het gebied van gezondheidszorg en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze geneesmiddelen, vaccins, biologische therapieën en ondersteunende diensten bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We zijn actief betrokken bij een betere toegang tot de gezondheidszorg. Dat doen we met uitgebreid beleid, programma’s en samenwerkingsverbanden. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4500 medewerkers op drie verschillende hoofdlocaties.', 'Voor meer informatie ga naar msd.nl/werkenbijmsd/', 'MSD als werkgever', 'Keer op keer nieuwe uitdagingen aangaan, dat is wel iets wat je leuk moet vinden als je bij MSD aan de slag wilt. Want continu verbeteren is een van onze drijfveren. Dat geldt zowel voor werkprocessen als voor medewerkers. Gedrevenheid, teamwork en eigen initiatief zijn van groot belang. Bij MSD kun je je op allerlei manieren ontwikkelen. In de diepte, door je te specialiseren in je vak. Maar ook door jezelf te verbreden en door te groeien naar een leidinggevende functie. Internationaal of juist heel lokaal, er zijn talloze andere mogelijkheden om stappen te zetten in je loopbaan, te rouleren in functies of te groeien in je functie. description: ['You develop medical strategies and execute tactics to demonstrate the medical value of our medicines - and ensure their correct use. Patients are at the centre of all what we do.', 'Do you want to make a difference for patients and physicians – while unleashing your own full potential? Do you relish the chance of mastering the Oncology field and contribute to launching new indications? As we are expanding our dedicated Nordic/Baltics Oncology Medical Affairs team, you could be a part of it becoming our new Medical Advisor Oncology for MSD’s activities in Denmark.', 'You are our scientific ambassador to the medical community', 'As our new Associate Director/Medical Advisor for Oncology, you develop and extend our network among national scientific leaders and medical professionals in your field throughout Denmark. You engage in scientific exchange to bridge science to clinical practice in order to improve patient outcomes and access.', 'Driven by science, you are engaged in knowledge sharing activities with scientific leaders and key decision makers to close data gaps and provide solutions to the unmet medical needs of patients. At the same time, you establish a trustful and productive long-term engagement between MSD and the local health care community. You pride yourself of being the undisputed medical and scientific knowledge hub and take ownership of the medical affairs agenda focusing on scientific and medical aspects important to the entire company.', 'Internally, you assist your colleagues in understanding clinical practice and the developing clinical realities that are important for external stakeholders. You take an active part in turning your insights into action that will deepen our understanding of the health care sector and scientific landscape. This also includes assisting the clinical research department in identifying potential clinical trials just as we collaborate with other company disciplines to focus their understanding on the patient needs.', 'As you can see, your tasks as Associate Director/Medical Advisor are many and varied. They also include:', 'Providing presentations to key stakeholders in the health care sector', 'Attending and contributing to international conferences', 'Organising and seeing through scientific events', 'Participating in cross-functional activities', 'Ensuring 100% compliance with all applicable SOPs, rules and regulations', 'Qualifications', 'You understand science – and people', 'You are either a PhD, MD or PharmD with preferable experience with medical affairs as a Medical Science Liaison, Medical Advisor or an equivalent position in pharma. If you have previous experience in Oncology, this is seen as a strong advantage. You have a strong focus on patients’ and stakeholders’ needs which is a prerequisite for success in this industry. Combining a strong head for science with business acumen, you easily communicate with various stakeholders. You are goal-oriented and have a strong desire to reach results while observing the high ethical standards MSD is known and respected for.', 'As a person, you have the flexibility and dynamism to adapt and succeed in a rapidly changing environment, and your people skills are equally impressive. You are able to work independently with very little supervision. You are open-minded, yet you know when and how to speak your mind and get your point across in a way that makes colleagues and external stakeholders appreciate your expertise, skills and high ethical standard. You exhibit the following qualities:', 'Excellent verbal and written skills', 'Communication skills', 'Excellent command of Danish and English', 'Excellent cross-functional collaboration skills', 'Approximately 40-60% of your time will be spent travelling.', 'Application and further information', 'Start the application process by clicking the application button. Application deadline is January 31st, 2019.', 'Questions and further information regarding the position can be addressed to Thomas Walz, Director Medical Affairs, Oncology Nordics & Baltics, by phone  +46 (0) 70 603 28 19.', 'About MSD in the Nordics', 'For over 125 years and counting MSD has revolutionised global health care. Today, more than 800 people work for MSD in the Nordics alone. Innovation is our life’s blood, and you will be a part of developing new and customer centric health care solutions that go beyond medicine to help people be well and live better lives during treatment. We have a strong pipeline of products within medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies and animal health products. We work every day to make healthcare accessible to as many as possible, which requires top talent within both R&D;, marketing, finance, health economy and policy shaping. Globally, we operate in 140 countries and demonstrate our commitment to increasing access to health care through far-reaching policies, programs and partnerships. For more information, visit', 'www.workforlife.com', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 50 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'In Oncology, MSD is dedicated to delivering breakthrough innovations that extend and improve the lives of cancer patients worldwide. Our team of dauntless, forward-thinking individuals achieves this through an unwavering commitment to supporting accessibility to medicine, providing new therapeutic procedures, and collaborating with governments and payers to ensure that people who need medicines have access to them. At MSD, our focus is on innovation and launch execution excellence; we translate breakthrough science into innovative medicines that help people with cancer across the globe.', 'MSD faces many opportunities to bring our breakthrough innovations to patients in the Japan, Asia Pacific and China Region. The company has launched life-saving treatments for many cancer patients in recent years and is poised to introduce many more treatments and treatment combinations in 2018 and beyond. In realizing the full potential of these treatments, MSD must engage with governments, payers, patient organizations and other stakeholders to ensure that the benefits of new treatment approaches are understood, and to advocate for changes in policy and practices that can facility faster access for patients to these treatments.', 'This position is responsible for leading MSD’s regional oncology policy program in Japan, Pacific, Asia and China (JCAP). It reports to the Global Lead for Oncology Policy, with a dotted line into the President Oncology for JCAP. In implementing the regional policy program, the Oncology Policy Director, JCAP will liaise closely with regional and in-country colleagues in Policy, Market Access, Communications, Commercial and Medical. The Director will also be a member of the Asia Pacific Policy, Communications and Population Health Hub.', 'Geographical scope', '• Japan, China and Asia Pacific (JCAP)', '• Preference will be given to candidates who are located or can locate in region', '• MSD’s regional head office for JCAP is in Singapore', '• Relocation benefits may be considered for successful candidates who are not Singapore-based and can re-locate to Singapore for this position.', 'Responsibilities', '\uf0a7 Lead the oncology policy strategy for JPAC in collaboration with country affiliates, including providing strategic guidance to country Managing Directors and Policy Leads', '\uf0a7 Lead strategic oncology policy projects to secure sustainable funding for cancer care', '\uf0a7 Identify opportunities for regional and in-country policy change that can facilitate patient access to MSD’s cancer portfolio and work with subsidiaries and regional & global teams to design and implement advocacy programs in pursuit of these opportunities', '\uf0a7 Monitor and respond to any external developments that may threaten patient access to oncology care, now and in the future, including policy changes related to product approvals, funding and intellectual property', '\uf0a7 Strengthen MSD’s network of key policy makers, patient organizations and other institutions in the region', '\uf0a7 Build strong collaborative relationships with colleagues in policy, communications, access and commercial functions globally, in the region and at country level', '\uf0a7 Conduct training for Managing Directors, Policy Leads and Oncology Commercial Directors and their teams across the region on oncology policy topics', '\uf0a7 Develop internal and external position papers on Oncology policy issues', '\uf0a7 Facilitate internal information sharing on a routine basis', 'Qualifications', 'Skills', '\uf0a7 Commercial and political acumen, with strong ability to prioritize business critical issues and develop create solutions to complex policy problems', '\uf0a7 Strong initiative and leadership, with demonstrated ability to identify opportunities, design effective advocacy efforts and execute impactful advocacy programs, mobilizing internal and external stakeholders towards a shared goal', '\uf0a7 Strong collaborative skills, with proven strengths in inspiring confidence and cooperation amongst internal stakeholders', '\uf0a7 Demonstrated ability to build professional relationships with external influencers and decision makers', '\uf0a7 Excellent communicator across functions and leadership levels', '\uf0a7 Capability to stay focused in a complex, fast-evolving environment', '\uf0a7 Fluency in the local language of one of the major JCAP markets would be an advantage', '(in addition to English)', 'Education and Experience', '\uf0a7 Bachelor’s Degree in Policy, Business Administration or similar discipline (Masters preferred)', '\uf0a7 5-10 years of experience in healthcare policy (in and outside pharmaceutical sector)', '\uf0a7 While policy experience is preferable, candidates with exceptional track-records in senior commercial, medical or related positions might also be considered for this role', '\uf0a7 Preference given to a leader with cross functional experience covering oncology, access & commercial functions', '\uf0a7 Experience at regional, global or country level across the markets covered by this role is a distinct advantage.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Ben jij een gemotiveerde capaciteitsplanner en word jij enthousiast van het coördineren en uitvoeren van de operationele materiaal- en capaciteitsplanning van de verpakkingsafdeling en de beheersing van de voorraadniveaus?', 'Voor het Integrated Process Team (IPT) Blister in Haarlem zijn we op zoek naar een:', 'Capaciteitsplanner', 'Over de functie', 'Als Planner ben je verantwoordelijk voor het coördineren en uitvoeren van de operationele materiaal- en capaciteitsplanning van de verpakkingsafdeling en de beheersing van de voorraadniveaus. Als Planner rapporteer je aan de Planner/Buyer van de IPT Blister.', 'Welkom in ons team', 'De IPT (Integrated Proces Team) Blister is verantwoordelijk voor het verpakken van blister verpakkingen. Vanaf het ontwikkelen en bestellen van componenten en bulk tot aan het afleveren in de verzendverpakking. De strategische focus van de IPT Blister is o.a gericht op het optimaliseren van de volume output en het minimaliseren van down-time en kosten. Dit in samenspel met een wisselende vraag en bulk beschikbaarheid en het optimaal inzetten van de lean-principes.', 'Primaire verantwoordelijkheden', 'Als Planner rapporteer je aan de Planner/Buyer van de IPT Blister. De volgende taken behoren tot de verantwoordelijkheden van de Planner.', 'Creëren van een optimaal (wekelijks) verpakkingsplan;', 'Deelnemen aan de dagelijkse walk throughs binnen de IPT en actief bijsturen op de weekplanning;', 'Oplossen van capaciteitsvraagstukken op korte en middellange termijn;', 'Verzorgen van tijdige beschikbaarheid van componenten en nauwe samenwerking met regionale bulkplanning;', 'Uitvoeren van controles op variaties op bulk materialen, zodat er compliant wordt verpakt;', 'Onderhouden van relaties met klanten, E2E planners, interne en externe leveranciers;', 'Mede verantwoordelijk voor de voorraad eindproduct;', 'Samenwerken met New Product Planning;', 'Analyseren, monitoren en up-to-date houden van planningsparameters;', 'Bewaken van het planningsproces en initiëren en uitvoeren van verbetervoorstellen.', 'Qualifications', 'Jouw profiel', 'Afgeronde HBO/WO -opleiding in', 'bedrijfskundige of een technische richting;', 'Minimaal 3-5 jaar werkervaring binnen', 'een logistieke omgeving en ervaring met planning;', 'Goede kennis van en ervaring met', 'SAP (APO) en Excel;', 'Oog voor details zonder het', 'overzicht over het geheel uit het oog te verliezen;', 'Zowel goed in teamverband als', 'zelfstandig kunnen werken;', 'Goed kunnen organiseren en kunnen', 'plannen van werkzaamheden;', 'Stressbestendig en flexibel;', 'Zeer accuraat;', 'Mondeling en schriftelijk', 'communicatief vaardig, zowel in het Nederlands als het Engels.', 'Wij bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in', 'een internationale werkomgeving met', 'toegewijde collega’s.', 'Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te', 'laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke', 'arbeidsvoorwaarden:', 'Een competitief salaris;', '35,5 vakantiedagen;', '8% vakantietoeslag en 3%', 'eindejaarsuitkering;', 'MSD Incentive Plan;', 'Een uitstekend pensioen;', 'Gratis gebruik sportschool;', 'Reiskostenvergoeding;', 'Verschillende trainingsmodules.', 'Solliciteren', 'Ben jij de kandidaat waar wij naar op zoek zijn? We', 'ontmoeten je graag!', 'Stuur ons jouw sollicitatie vandaag nog toe.', 'Heb je nog vragen? Laat het ons weten!', 'Stuur een app naar Barbara Razenberg (06-24904897) of een', 'email naar', 'barbara.razenberg@msd.com', '.', 'Bellen mag natuurlijk ook.', 'Over MSD', 'MSD is een wereldleider op het gebied van geneesmiddelen', 'en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze vaccins, biologische therapieën', 'en geneesmiddelen bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere', 'gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We richten ons op', 'aandoeningen die mensen ernstig belemmeren in hun functioneren of zelfs', 'levensbedreigend zijn en die vragen om nieuwe geneesmiddelen. MSD is tevens', 'pionier in biologische research & development voor diergezondheid.', 'Bij MSD geloven we in de kracht van verschillen van teams', 'van getalenteerde medewerkers op alle niveaus. Uiteenlopende vaardigheden,', 'ervaringen, achtergronden en culturele perspectieven helpen ons om beter', 'inzicht te krijgen in de behoeften van diverse klanten, zorgverleners en', 'patiënten. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4500 medewerkers op drie', 'verschillende locaties.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read', 'Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this', 'employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted', 'by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form', 'and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this', 'position will be deemed the sole property of MSD. No fee will be paid in the', 'event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through', 'other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

accordance with current Good Manufacturing Practices (cGMPs).', 'The Bioprocess Associate will operate to the highest standards of Safety, Quality and Compliance.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Work metrics, Production Plan, OEE, compliance and team training.', 'Execute commercial manufacturing processes according to established work instructions and Standard Operating Procedures.', 'Work as part of a dedicated process team where flexibility and teamwork are a key requirement', 'Generate SOPS/Electronic Batch Records for start-up.', 'Adhere to Right First-Time principals', 'Provide assistance and/or support maintenance, engineering, quality or other colleagues as requested.', 'Escalate issues as appropriate to Process Lead', 'Maintain a high level of personal expertise and working knowledge of all aspects of the manufacturing process and process equipment through continuous training and development.', 'Liaise', 'with other groups and individuals to ensure planning of tasks is effective and linked into the manufacturing process plan.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'The Bioprocess Associate will report to the Manufacturing Shift Manager, Operations.', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'General', 'Demonstrated successes in a team environment in either a project or work related activities .', 'Demonstrated troubleshooting competency.', 'Technical', 'Broad Understanding of Drug Substance Manufacturing Operations is desirable.', 'Good understanding of GMP requirements in a Biopharmaceutical Facility.', colleagues.', 'high degree of problem solving ability and adherence to scheduled timelines.', 'Education', 'Minimum of a Level 7 qualification in a science or engineering discipline.', 'A level 6 with description: ['This could be the transformative opportunity you’ve been waiting for. It’s your chance to work toward a better future—for patients and your career—with a new program created by the team at MSD: The MSD Aim Hire Academy.', 'Dedicated to enhancing the health and well-being of patients around the globe, MSD offers innovative research and far-reaching development initiatives designed to save lives. We address some of the world’s most important health challenges to provide effective new treatments, vaccines, and products. Our work is complex, but our mission is very simple: to be the best healthcare company in the world. And you can play an important role as part of our team.', 'MSD HIRE ACADEMY PROGRAMME DETAILS:', 'MSD is seeking others who share our passion for excellence. Who demand more than just a job. Who have raised their expectations and want to work for the greater good, create lasting change, and have a positive impact every single day.', 'You can make it happen by attending MSD Aim Hire Academy, a 13-week programme for students graduating. Beginning within three months prior to graduation, this exceptional initiative offers learning sessions that will provide you with valuable knowledge, opportunities for individual growth, and competency-based behavioral education about life at MSD. Planned around your studies, these valuable training sessions will earn you a certificate of graduation, and possibly a permanent role with MSD, so you can continue your journey of learning.', 'Qualifications', 'Pharmacy Graduate', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['The Head of Procurement China Lead has the responsibility for building best in class procurement performance and capability for a $150M annual addressable spend across China, which is a top 6 MSD focus market globally. This position will take an active role in development of procurement strategy for his/her areas of responsibility & categories, working closely with key local stakeholders and procurement colleagues within the region as well as in the global category teams .He/she will also serves as Global Supply Management Group (GSMG) country lead to drive synergies and talent development cross GSMG.', 'Key responsibilities include developing and transforming the procurement function to enable MSD China’s strategy via value creation and fostering innovations. The successful candidate will be expected to drive transformation in line with the APJ procurement 3-year plan.', 'Responsibilities of the role include key stakeholder and senior management partnership, fostering supplier enabled innovations, accelerate MSD’s China’s digital transformation, country sourcing category development, country procurement operating strategy development and execution for all categories, while maintaining a strong alignment to global and regional sourcing strategies through the global operating framework.', 'He/she will provide leadership and direction for the china procurement team to engage the business as trusted partners; represent Global Procurement locally, understand & participate in global supply strategy councils (SSCs)to implements global and regional sourcing initiatives locally and leads local sourcing teams focused on improvements in AQSCI for Local spend categories.', 'He/she needs to own all country and key regional functional KPIs, including key talent development and engagement objectives.', 'Qualifications', 'Primary activities, but not limited to:', '• Procurement business partner Operating model design and implementation', '• Stakeholder Management and Business Sponsorship: Assists in analysing customer’s business and evaluate if there are potential savings through supplier consolidation. Engages assigned stakeholders and partners with them across divisions to define and meet or exceed business requirements and identify and manage profit plan savings targets. Understands strategic business requirements at 1-3-5 year horizon.', '• Drive innovation project pipeline and accelerate innovations in MSD China', '• Participate in or providing inputs into global supply strategy councils so China requirements and unique conditions are correctly captured & addressed. Liaises with the global and Region to ensure country spend is managed in line with agreed sourcing strategies.', '• Sourcing Rigor – In alignment with Global and Regional strategy, uses the Sourcing Management Process (SMP) to manage assurance of supply, quality, service, cost, innovation and regulatory compliance within China, which optimize value while ensuring appropriate risk management. Understands the Sourcing Management Process and how to apply required tools in the creation and implementation of source plans.', '• Proactive Cost Management: Achieves cost control, cost reduction, and cost containment targets, and adds value to area of expenditure through a strong total cost orientation.', '• Supplier Relationship Management and Conditioning: Assists in evaluating potential suppliers on country specific issues. Is familiar with the various suppliers and product lines available in stakeholder areas. Responsible for building relationships with Local suppliers and managing supplier performance against business requirements using proven processes; ensures adequate inclusion of diversity suppliers in RFPs and contracts as applicable. And strong supplier performance monitoring via regular established business review with stakeholders, and concrete issue resolution.', '• Contract Negotiation and Management: Once strategy is approved, personally leads critical sourcing project including RFX, RFP, negotiations and contracting to put in place the right supplier cross all categories.', '• People Management: Responsible for selection, development, retention, and performance management of country procurement personnel. And be part of strong Asia Procurement leadership to develop talents across the region.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Process Scientist Technical Specialist', 'MSD Brinny', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Our Manufacturing Division, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BRINNY', "MSD Brinny is a leading facility for the development, testing and manufacturing of new biologics and vaccines, exporting to over 90 countries across the world. With a team of approximately 500 people, MSD Brinny specialises in the late-stage development and commercial supply of biotech products, including some of the company's most successful and life-changing treatments for oncology, hepatitis C and rheumatoid arthritis.", 'The Brinny site has been a vibrant part of the local Innishannon community for nearly 35 years and is now one of the region’s largest employers. MSD has invested €130m in the site since 2016 as a result of increased global demand for MSD medicines and vaccines which will see MSD Brinny further expand its production facilities and capacity to meet this demand.', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. Today, we are building a new kind of healthcare company – one that is ready to help create a healthier future for all of us. Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of an individual like you. To this end, we strive to create an environment of mutual respect, encouragement and teamwork. As part of our global team, you’ll have the opportunity to collaborate with talented and dedicated colleagues while developing and expanding', 'your career.', 'The Process Sciences team require a Technical Specialist with strong process, small scale start up and in process analytics experience to provide multidisciplinary expertise and technical support to the team and Technical Operations Department.', 'The successful candidate will be responsible for assisting in the effective and efficient running of Process Sciences projects and will be active members within the wider Technical Operations Department, providing Technical support, guidance and expertise to ensure the success of the team.', 'A high level of innovation, enthusiasm and drive will be required to deliver technical excellence for small scale process set up, optimisation studies, lab innovation, and in process analytical characterisation testing.', 'The Technical Specialist provides in-line technical support to ensure the continued manufacture and supply of quality pharmaceutical products in meeting the company priorities of: Compliance, Supply, Strategy and Profit Plan. This role is responsible for all aspects of verification of in-process characterisation analytics, start-up of small scale processes and its optimisation and process comparability studies. The candidate is required to work with moderate work direction and is skilled and knowledgeable to the position.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'Good knowledge of protein chemistry and analytical techniques such as HPLC', 'Perform laboratory experiments required to deliver on project timelines', 'Participate in continuous improvement initiatives, including method optimisation and troubleshooting', 'Support small scale process optimisation activities', 'Preparation of documentation associated with the projects in accordance with GDP (good documentation practice) and procedures.', 'Lead and Participate in cross-functional problem solving teams for troubleshooting, and investigations within API, Sterile and Quality functions.', 'Qualification of laboratory equipment and small scale process equipment', 'Prepare, review and approval of technical documents, procedures, metrics, etc.', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'MSc/BSc. qualification (Science)', 'At least 3 years’ experience in an analytical/ small scale process development role in QC or an analytical/process development group.', 'High level written and verbal communications with advanced PC skills.', 'Self-motivated and ability to work as part of a team with good project management skills.', 'Demonstrated ability to fully realize improvement initiatives.', 'Demonstrated successes in a team environment, such as project teams, problem solving teams etc.', 'Stakeholder management of multiple decision makers, corporate colleagues, cross functional teams.', 'Desired Qualifications/', 'Experience:', 'Project management qualification such as, Project Management Professional (PMP) Evidence of Continuous Professional Development.', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 5 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '2', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BRINNY', "MSD Brinny is a leading facility for the development, testing and manufacturing of new biologics and vaccines, exporting to over 90 countries across the world. With a team of approximately 500 people, MSD Brinny specialises in the late-stage development and commercial supply of biotech products, including some of the company's most successful and life-changing treatments for oncology, hepatitis C and rheumatoid arthritis.", 'The Brinny site has been a vibrant part of the local Innishannon community for nearly 35 years and is now one of the region’s largest employers. MSD has invested €130m in the site since 2016 as a result of increased global demand for MSD medicines and vaccines which will see MSD Brinny further expand its production facilities and capacity to meet this demand.', 'Purpose of Role:', 'The purpose of this role is to be a clean utilities Engineer supporting the Sterile Integrated Process Team. This is a key role to ensure that the day to day operations of the Utilities provided to the IPT are compliant.', 'Activities Within Role:', 'Support audits on clean utility systems.', 'Be responsible for adherence to site and corporate QMS for clean Utility Systems', 'Point of contact for Quality Alerts and Bulletins for Utility Systems. Review and prepare formal responses.', 'Complete periodic reviews and other compliance documentation aligned with the site QMS.', 'Review and approve Utility & HVAC modifications, change requests, and SOP’s.', 'Conduct life cycle analysis of all critical system equipment to ensure equipment is upgraded and replaced in accordance with the Site Master Plan', 'Represent the Utilities engineering group and lead highly technical cross-functional teams and work across utilities engineering areas to deliver robust and sustainable solutions and business processes.', 'The primary focus of the position is on GMP/clean utilities and operations (WFI, Purified Water, Clean Steam, Reverse Osmosis, Process Gasses, and HVAC systems).', 'Drive functional commitments on initiatives and provide high level of oversight and coordination to seamlessly integrate utility engineering efforts within the site.', 'Consult with other subject matter experts to ensure design solutions achieve long term business objectives and are supported by robust technical rationale to withstand scrutiny.', 'Act as the utilities engineering expert and technical consultant to management in identifying opportunities, prioritizing work and will make sound recommendations for design and construction solutions.', 'Continuous Improvements:', 'Use Lean principles to deliver a cost efficient operating model for commercial production while not compromising EHS and Quality standards.', 'Coaching and Training:', 'Coaching others by sharing your skill-set and expertise. Identifying talent and coaching and nurturing them to develop and perform at their maximum potential.', 'Reports to:', 'Compliance Engineering Manager.', '*Featured', '*Engineering', 'Qualifications', 'At least 5 years’ experience in the Pharmaceutical industry or a similar operating environment.', 'Qualifications', 'Degree or 3rd Level Qualification (Engineering), Masters preferred.', 'Desirable to have qualification in Reliability Engineering and/or Project Management.', 'Bachelor of Engineering in a related discipline.', 'Skill-Set Expected:', 'Strong Compliance Mindset, demonstrated capability of understanding EHS & GMP compliance requirements (particularly from an Engineering perspective), demonstrated capability within the Audit environment (specifically EHS & GMP)', 'Very Strong Leadership Skills', 'Technical knowledge', 'Ability to respond to competing priorities', 'Communications skills', 'Problem solving skills', 'Ability to prepare budgets and tightly control expenditures', 'Relevant experience in pharmaceutical production management.', 'Very strong knowledge of industrial safety standards.', 'Beneficial to have previous operational knowledge within Drug Product, Drug Substance or Utilities.', 'Demonstrated knowledge in more than one pharmaceutical and/or chemical manufacturing operation (e.g. Engineering, Manufacturing or Quality etc.)', 'Knowledge and experience in applying Six Sigma and Lean Methodologies.', 'Demonstrated leadership and change management skills with a continuous improvement focus.', 'Proven experience in reducing energy consumption through innovative technology and lean thinking.', 'Demonstrated understanding of Project life Cycle , from design through to commissioning/qualification & retirement', 'Strong talent developer, proven capability of fostering engineering/technical talent', 'Beneficial to have strong networks within Engineering/Technical community', 'Customer Focus – proven ability to delight customers & end users.', '*Engineer', '*HJ Brinny', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 5 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Over MSD', 'Het MSD van vandaag is wereldleider op het gebied van gezondheidszorg en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze geneesmiddelen, vaccins, biologische therapieën en ondersteunende diensten bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We zijn actief betrokken bij een betere toegang tot de gezondheidszorg. Dat doen we met uitgebreid beleid, programma’s en samenwerkingsverbanden. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4500 medewerkers op drie verschillende hoofdlocaties Oss, Haarlem en Boxmeer.', 'Voor meer informatie ga naar', 'www.werkenbijmsd.nl', 'De afdeling', 'Binnen de afdeling Technical Operations bevindt zich de groep Maintenance & Calibration. Deze groep fungeert als kenniscentrum voor onderhoudstechnologie. De groep ondersteunt de productie afdelingen betreffende beleid, verbeteringen en investeringsprojecten op het gebied van automatisering & Equipment management. Verder beheert de M&C; group enkele overkoepelende automatiseringssystemen binnen Pharm Ops zoals: Building Automation System, OSI Soft PI, Desigo, EPMS, SCADA, GUARDIAN (Serialisatie) en SAP Plant Maintenance.', 'De functie', 'Als onderdeel van het site Automation team en rapporterend aan de M&C; Lead, voltooit de Automation Specialist zelfstandig taken gerelateerd aan de infrastructuur voor site automation t.b.v. het produceren en verpakken van de MSD producten. De Automation Specialist fungeert als een Centre of Excellence in het Automation domein en zal Pharm Ops vertegenwoordigen in de wereldwijde Community of Practise met betrekking tot Automatisering in zowel lokale en wereldwijde projecten en zorgt tevens voor een optimale samenwerking tussen automatisering, IT, computervalidatie en systeembeheer.', 'Dit omvat:', 'Beheer van een of meer systemen in het Automation domein', 'Verantwoordelijk voor de ondersteuning, continuïteit, beschikbaarheid, validatie en geautoriseerd gebruik van deze systemen. Verantwoordelijk voor change control, incident & problem management, gebruikersbeheer, performance management en training.', "Management van/en participatie in middelgrote en/of complexe industriële automatiseringsprojecten m.b.t. de implementatie van nieuwe systemen, of projecten die belangrijke nieuwe functionaliteit toevoegen aan reeds bestaande systemen, vaak met meerdere disciplines waar, bij integratieproblemen, intensieve in- en externe communicatie met leveranciers en belanghebbenden, zoals interne klanten (IPT's) en het wereldwijde automation team, vereist is.", 'Expertise bieden in automatisering- en projectdocumentatie volgens MSD-richtlijnen (System Development Lifecycle (SDLC).', 'Adviseert het Leadership Team Oss over nieuwe automatiseringssystemen t.b.v. Facility Management .', 'Treedt op als een Centre of Excellence voor het automatiseringsgedeelte van Facility Management', 'Ondersteuning van automatiseringsprojecten in multidisciplinaire projecten. Dit omvat onder andere het opstellen/beoordelen van scope, ontwerp, C & Q documentatie en begeleiding en/of het uitvoeren van tests.', 'Verantwoordelijk voor het houden van de focus op veiligheid, gezondheid en milieu. Toezicht houden op de naleving en actief bevorderen van het bereiken van verbeteringen op het gebied van zorg voor veiligheid, gezondheid en milieu.', 'Voldoen aan MSD QMS System Development Lifecycle (SDLC);', 'Monitoring en verspreiding van lokale en internationale normen en standaarden op het gebied van procesautomatisering (GAMP, 21CFRPart11, Data Integrity, etc.)', 'Qualifications', 'Wat breng je met je mee?', 'Een afgeronde Technische HBO opleiding (bijv. Automatisering);', '7+ jaar werkervaring in de Automatisering;', 'Kennis van systemen zoals Siemens (S7), SCADA, SAP, Vision of andere pakketten;', 'Ervaring in Life Sience Industry (o.a. cGMP, Safety, Validatie);', 'Sterke projectmanagementvaardigheden en bewezen vermogen om complexe projecten te beheren;', 'Klantgericht, procesgericht en data driven;', 'Passie voor Lean en Continuous Improvement;', 'Sterke mondelinge en schriftelijke communicatievaardigheden in zowel Nederlands als Engels;', 'Je sociale en communicatieve vaardigheden zijn goed ontwikkeld;', 'Je toont overtuigingskracht en pro activiteit.', 'MSD als werkgever', 'Keer op keer nieuwe uitdagingen aangaan, dat is wel iets wat je leuk moet vinden als je bij MSD aan de slag wilt. Want continu verbeteren is een van onze drijfveren. Dat geldt zowel voor werkprocessen als voor medewerkers. Gedrevenheid, teamwork en eigen initiatief zijn van groot belang. Bij MSD kun je je op allerlei manieren ontwikkelen. In de diepte, door je te specialiseren in je vak. Maar ook door jezelf te verbreden en door te groeien naar een leidinggevende functie. Internationaal of juist heel lokaal, er zijn talloze andere mogelijkheden om stappen te zetten in je loopbaan, te rouleren in functies of te groeien in je functie. Werken bij MSD is werken in een dynamische high tech omgeving van internationale allure, die toch sterk lokaal geworteld is in Oss, Haarlem en Boxmeer', 'Informatie', 'Voor meer informatie over deze vacature kun je contact opnemen met Ado Mehic, Maintenance & Calibration Lead, via: 0412- 66 37 82.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'No', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Mit seinen verschreibungspflichtigen Arzneimitteln, Impfstoffen, Biologika, Präparaten zur Selbstmedikation und für die Tiergesundheit in verschiedenen Therapiebereichen bietet MSD in mehr als 140 Ländern umfassende und innovative Lösungen für Gesundheit. Ein besonderes Anliegen von MSD ist darüber hinaus die Verbesserung der weltweiten Gesundheitsversorgung und der verbesserte Zugang zu Medikamenten. Dafür engagiert sich MSD in weitreichenden Gesundheitsprogrammen und Partnerschaften.', 'Für unsere Abteilung Medical Affairs in Haar suchen wir in Vollzeit und unbefristet einen:', '(Senior) Medical Advisor (m/w/d) Antibiotika', 'Ihre Aufgaben:', 'Medizinischer Input zu wissenschaftlichen Studien der Phasen I-IIIb sowie Analyse und Einordnung der Daten in einen medizinischen Kontext', 'Initiierung und Betreuung medizinischer Forschungsprojekte (lokale nicht-interventionelle Studien und Investigator Sponsored Trials) einschließlich Publikationen in Zusammenarbeit mit den Medical Science Liaison (MSL´s)', 'Medizinische Unterstützung und Betreuung von wissenschaftlichen Symposien, Teilnahme an Studientreffen und (inter-) nationalen Fachkongressen', 'Erstellung und Präsentation von Vorträgen zum Indikationsgebiet', 'Konzeption, Organisation und Durchführung von Nationalen Advisory Boards, fachliche Unterstützung bei lokalen Workshops, Symposien und Fortbildungen', 'Unterstützung bzgl. medizinischer Inhalte bei Health Technology Assessments und Value Dossiers und enge crossfunktionale Zusammenarbeit mit Inhouse-Abteilungen', 'Aufbereitung und Erstellung von produktspezifischen medizinisch-wissenschaftlichen Informationen und Unterlagen', 'Eigenverantwortliche Gestaltung und Betreuung von digitalen Infoportalen und Medien', 'Erstellung und Implementierung des Medical Affairs Plans (MAP)', 'Beantwortung wissenschaftlicher Anfragen von internen und externen Kunden', 'Bereitstellung wissenschaftlicher Informationen für externe wissenschaftliche Experten und Akteure im Gesundheitswesen', 'Mitglied im lokalen Brand Team Antibiotika und Abstimmung mit europäischen Regionalen Medical Affairs Teams (RMAT)', 'Planung & Durchführung interner und externer Trainings', 'Qualifications', 'Abgeschlossenes pharmazeutisches oder medizinisches Hochschulstudium, vorzugsweise mit Promotion bzw. abgeschlossenes naturwissenschaftliches Studium mit Promotion', 'Fundierte Kenntnisse im Bereich Antiinfektiva, insbesondere Antibiotika wünschenswert', 'Erfahrung in der pharmazeutischen Industrie und Verständnis von Studiendesigns und/oder Publikationen im medizinisch/wissenschaftlichen Bereich erwünscht', 'Kenntnisse der einschlägigen externen und internen Regularien', 'Erfahrung im Arbeiten im crossfunktionalen Team, hohe Teamfähigkeit', 'Selbständiges ergebnisorientiertes Arbeiten mit hohen eigenen Qualitätsmaßstäben', 'Ausgeprägte strukturierte Arbeitsweise und Organisationsfähigkeit', 'Klare Kommunikation und Vortragssicherheit sowohl in deutscher als auch englischer Sprache', 'Unser Angebot:', 'Attraktives Gehaltspaket', 'Betriebliche Altersvorsorge plus Entgeltumwandlung in den Chemiepensionfond', '30 Tage Urlaub plus Urlaubsgeld', 'Interne und externe Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten', 'Flexible Arbeitszeiteinteilung', 'Homeoffice Möglichkeit', 'Mitarbeitervergünstigungen', 'Employee Assistance Program', 'Zuschuss zum Fahrradleasing', 'Mitarbeiterkantine', 'Parkplätze für Mitarbeiter', 'Arbeitsfreistellung bei ehrenamtliche Ausübung (20 Std/Jahr)', 'Wir haben Ihr Interesse geweckt und Sie möchten Teil einer wachsenden und sich entwickelnden Organisation werden? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre Bewerbungsunterlagen über unsere Karriereseite.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Sr. Pharmaceutical Info Specialist Job

description: ['MSD is a global healthcare leader with a diversified portfolio of innovative medicines, vaccines, and animal health products.', 'The Bioinformatics & Cheminformatics team within the Product Strategy group is seeking a highly motivated and skilled Bioinformatics Product Owner to support the development, maintenance and optimization of bioinformatics workflows. The position will involve regular interactions with scientists as part of a cross-regional and multidisciplinary network of researchers, computational biologists, data scientists and software engineers.', 'In this role, you will', '• Guide the development, optimization and scaling up of NGS related pipelines particularly in microbiome research and translational medicine', '• Act as a scientific lead for multiple software development projects', '• Lead prototyping, testing and validating of novel algorithms', 'Qualifications', 'Required Experience and Skills:', '• MSc or PhD (preferred) degree in bioinformatics or related field with at least 2 years experience in industry or academic settings', '• A good track record of peer-reviewed publications is desirable', '• Experience in implementing computational workflows for analysis of NGS and other high-throughput data, for example: WGS, Exome-seq, single cell, metagenomics (preferred), epigenetics, GWAS, eQTL, RNA-seq, ChIP-seq and quantitative proteomics', '• Extensive knowledge of open source and proprietary computational biology tools and databases', '• Solid statistical knowledge and understanding of current scientific challenges in microbiome research and/or immunology and oncology.', '• Excellent problem-solving skills and high professional standards with strong ability to prioritize and work under pressure', '• Strong communication skills and ability to simplify and explain complex biological problems to data scientists and software engineers', '• Excellent programming skills in a subset of the following Python, Perl, Java/C++, R/Shiny, Matlab, Linux/Unix, SQL and versioning control e.g. Git', '• Experience with HPC and cloud computing (AWS) distributed computing', '• Experience in clinical data mining and machine learning approaches is a plus', 'We offer', '• Challenging career, trainings, conferences and meet up sessions organized internally and externally', '• Learning opportunities, rotation program, internal transfer move options', '• Professional growth based on performance', '• Innovative and flexible working environment', '• Wide range of benefits', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is an innovative, global healthcare leader committed to', 'improving health and well-being in 140 countries around the world. Our product', 'categories include Oncology, Heart and Respiratory health, Diabetes, Infectious', "diseases and Women's health. We continue to focus our research on conditions", "that affect millions of people around the world - diseases like Alzheimer's,", 'Diabetes and Cancer - while further expanding our strengths in areas such as', 'Vaccines and Biologics. We aspire to be', 'the best healthcare company in the world and are dedicated to providing leading', 'innovations and solutions for tomorrow.', 'We are seeking energetic, forward thinking professionals to', 'join our Information Technology group in Prague. You will have the opportunity', 'to work on global teams to identify the biggest opportunities as well as tackle', 'the biggest challenges at the intersection of healthcare, information and', 'technology.  We offer project-based', 'rotations to help with your professional development, incredible opportunities', 'to learn from others and a flat, collaborative environment.', 'This position will be part of our Research Division Global', 'Development (GD) IT Competency in Prague, which supports the areas of Clinical', 'Research, Regulatory Affairs, Pharmacovigilance and Real-world Evidence.', 'Specifically, this role will focus on supporting IT client', 'services leaders in the engagement with region/country teams and contribute to', 'the delivery and execution of our Research Division IT projects in Clinical Development.', 'Key responsibilities', 'include:', 'Provide business analysis to understand and', 'support regional/country needs of the business partners in Clinical Research,', 'Regulatory Affairs and Pharmacovigilance', 'Support the Clinical Development IT International', 'teams with implementation of global IT solutions to our Research Division', 'business partners community in the regions/countries.', 'Collaborate with Clinical Development IT team members and IT', 'Platform teams, as well as our Hubs in Branchburg, Singapore and Prague to', 'deliver IT solutions', 'Participate in innovative experiments and', 'identify potential areas for business process improvement to increase our', 'research division business partners productivity', 'Travel will be required (~10%)', 'All activities must be conducted in compliance with company', 'policies and standards, as well as regional and country specific regulations.', 'Qualifications', 'Education and Skills', 'Required', 'Degree or advanced degree in Science or Computer', 'related field', 'Minimum Experience', 'Required', '2 years of significant business analysis', 'experience with large scale validated scientific computer systems', 'Skills/Knowledge', 'Required', 'Proven knowledge of business processes within', 'the pharmaceutical R&D; space – specifically Clinical Research, Regulatory', 'Affairs, Clinical Safety', 'Good business acumen, with proven ability to', 'understand business processes in detail – both at global and region/country', 'levels – and translate these into requirements', 'Proven leadership skills are preferred, along', 'with excellent English communication (both oral and written)', 'Good analytical and problem-solving skills', 'Good interpersonal skills along with the ability', 'to communicate appropriately and confidently with other colleagues and navigate', 'a complex matrix environment', 'Excellent organizational skills and the ability', 'to organize and prioritize work', 'Self-motivation and ability to work', 'independently with minimum direction, a proactive approach', 'Skills/Knowledge/Experience', 'Preferred', 'Experience and/or knowledge in at least one of', 'these areas: Clinical Research, Regulatory Affairs, Pharmacovigilance (business', 'and/or technology exposure)', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new', 'breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your', 'skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global', 'medical advancement.
