description: ["MSLs' engagements are based on in-depth scientific exchange in a therapeutic area and often lead to knowledge transfer initiatives and research. The MSL, in interacting with healthcare professionals and researchers, is governed by the following guiding principles intended to deliver unbiased and evidence based information", '• Report into Global Medical Affairs.', '• Have no sales objectives or accountability for prescribing or sales of any MSD product and do not participate in Sales Incentive Plans (SIP).', '• Discussions between MSLs and Health Care Professionals should focus on bi-directional exchange of ideas on disease related topics, scientific presentations of data in the public domain, and reporting scientific results (e.g. discussion of clinical study results.)', '• Product claims must be discussed in the context of clinical and scientific exchange, and shall be consistent with prescribing information and substantiated with reference-able data.', '• Communicate evidence with fair balance, in accordance with company and local regulatory standards.', '• If unsolicited, responses to requests that necessitate providing information or data that is not within the current product indication, must clearly disclose that the information being provided is not contained within the regulatory-approved labeling and that MSD recommends the use of its products in accordance with its approved labeling.', '• In response to an unsolicited request for information, the MSL can provide references, abstracts and bibliographies for the specified topics. The literature and data that MSL use to support their discussions, as a general rule, are peer-reviewed, of the highest quality, and from databases and sites of information approved by the Medical Affairs Management Team.', '• Slides must go thorugh proper medical review per local procedures prior to use. Refrain from use of corporate product trademark and branding in slide kits, unless expressly approved by Medical Affairs in the specific context used.', '• Information provided will not be highlighted or annotated by the MSL.', '• MSLs must not provide materials to Sales Representatives as these should only use materials approved in compliance with the Local Review Guidelines.', 'Qualifications', '- strong scientific baseline knowledge in therapeutic area 1) Clinical doctor in the related TA (bachelor of clinical medicine degree or above) resident level at Tier III hospital (preferred) or resident to attending level at Tier II hospital. 2) Clinical doctor in the unrelated TA (bachelor degree of clinical medicine plus master degree or above) resident level (preferred) at Tier III hospital or resident to attending level at Tier II hospital. 3) Pharmacologist or Biologist (master degree of Pharmacology, or Ph.D degree for Life Science).', '- strong, confident and engaging presentation skills', '- outstanding communication and skills and the ability to function within a team environment.', '- handling of multiple tasks at the same time and working under pressure', '- proactive "can do" attitude and passion for the science related to the products and associated therapeutic area', '- strong customer facing skills, listening skills, probing skills, and flexibility', '- corporate culture competencies of Leader Behaviors, including Business Integrity', '- experience within a clinical drug development environment preferred.', '- be able to travel', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['T', 'he Market Access division acts as both educators and advocates for the products, processes, and practices that help MSD revolutionize medicine across the globe. Our tenacious, assertive group of individuals uses a deep understanding of the healthcare market in order to build collaborative relationships with the business leaders, customers, and legislative powers that help cultivate positive uptake of and education about MSD’s products throughout the world.', 'Position Overview', 'Purpose of the job:', 'Technical Manager (TM) is responsible for a scientific and technical medical veterinary consultation, training for internal and external customers of the organization in a direction to support commercial targets of the organization on regional (EM) level.', 'The position is also accountable for the close cooperation with Marketing Manager (EM) and key account management in order to create and implement the strategic and tactical marketing and commercial plans.', 'The position shall in a delegated area create a close and intensive connection to identified key customers (KA) key opinion leaders (KOL) and distributors, universities and medical and scientific stakeholders.', 'TM efficiently allocate delegated resources in an accordance to meet agreed Marketing and SM (Sales Manager) plans in order to increase the commercial performance of the organization.', 'The position is in its daily work accountable for the work in the field in order to support sales team to achieve commercial targets of the organization as well as guarantying a fulfilment of the organizations’ valid SOPs in practical use of the products, services, trials and technologies.', 'Major Activities', 'Roles and responsibilities:', 'Cooperation on the development of the strategic and tactical marketing and commercial plans on the basis of a feedback from the customer consultations, the product price and technical positioning as well as on the experience on practical use of the products', 'Reactive and proactive scientific and technical medical veterinary consultation in a delegated area for the customers and colleagues in the organization including an needed processing of PV cases', 'Proactive feedback/formulated propositions to technical and scientific positioning of the products on a market competitive environment based on the feedback from the customer consultations, the experience on practical use of the products, the knowledge of small animal clinics and equine practices.', 'Proactive feedback/formulated propositions to the mid- to long-term strategic completeness of product portfolio including the propositions on sales supporting measures (services, equipment, diagnostic,..)', 'Implementation and evaluation of the strategic and tactical marketing and commercial plans on daily working routine including by keeping records on the proactively or reactively supported customer audience in the organization’s supported Customer relationship management system (CRM)', 'On daily working routine keep by planning for a regular and efficiently frequent visiting and contact schedule the active and positive connections to KA, distributors, KOL, universities and medical and scientific stakeholders in a delegated area (EM)', 'Plan for and proceed with the creation of data, their written or verbal presentation for the purpose of product management or local or international presentations in context of agreed the strategic and tactical marketing plans', 'Plan for and proceed with the educative customers programs in a delegated area in context of agreed the strategic and tactical marketing and commercial plans', 'Membership in a name of the organization and active work in an effectively broad number of the scientific associations, the projects or the projects groups', 'Effectively broad participation on relevant congresses, symposia and professional fairs', 'Provide field consultancy for responsible area supporting SMs team in particular countries on EM level', 'Qualifications', 'Expertise Required / Core Competences', 'Requirements on candidate:', 'Professional Competence:', 'University degree in veterinary medicine preferably with PhD or similar in area of', 'required species specialization', 'Satisfactory time and content of practice in veterinary medicine in veterinary clinic or in scientific organization or in technical services', 'Attitude to and preparedness for a continuous education', 'High level of diplomacy, negotiating skills but constructive assertiveness in dealing with internal and external stakeholders', 'Excellent organizational and planning skills and be flexible to successfully handle conflicting time pressures and a large volume of work including a preparedness for frequent travel', 'Competence to work in MS-Office', '(Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook)', 'and in IT technology in general', 'High motivation and work engagement', 'English in excellent written and verbal command', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['De afdeling', 'Binnen MSD Animal Health locatie Boxmeer, is de afdeling Maintenance & Reliability Live Vaccins verantwoordelijk voor de technische beschikbaarheid van diverse productieapparatuur voor de afdelingen CFFD en Sphereon.', 'Functieomschrijving', 'Als Maintenance Technician ben je verantwoordelijk voor het voorkomen en oplossen van technische problemen op diverse vakgebieden: mechanisch, elektrotechnisch en industriële automatisering. Je verhelpt en analyseert technische (ver)storingen aan procesequipment, bewaakt richtlijnen en procedures en komt met verbetervoorstellen om de betrouwbaarheid aan onze equipment te verhogen. Je plant uitvoerende werkzaamheden en bespreekt deze, indien nodig, met de interne klant, Werkvoorbereider, Maintenance Engineer en/of collega Technicians. Je houdt contact met externe partijen, coördineert en begeleidt hun werkzaamheden. Je houdt je bezig met modificaties en adviseert en ondersteunt bij de uitvoering van onderhouds- en investeringsprojecten. Je geeft advies over technische aspecten en levert input bij het opstellen van wijzigingen, voorschriften, werkinstructies, documentatie en onderhoudsplannen.', 'Je komt te werken in een met zorg uitgewerkt dienstrooster, dat bestaat uit dagdienst, vroeg/laat, weekend en consignatiedienst.', 'Je rapporteert aan de M&R; Lead Live Vaccins.']

description: ["MSD is an innovative, global healthcare leader committed to improving health and well-being in 140 countries around the world. Our product categories include Oncology, Heart and Respiratory health, Diabetes, Infectious diseases and Women's health. We continue to focus our research on conditions that affect millions of people around the world - diseases like Alzheimer's, Diabetes and Cancer - while further expanding our strengths in areas such as Vaccines and Biologics.  We aspire to be the best healthcare company in the world and are dedicated to providing leading innovations and solutions for tomorrow.", 'We are seeking energetic, forward thinking professionals to join our Information Technology group in Prague. You will have the opportunity to work on global teams to identify the biggest opportunities as well as tackle the biggest challenges at the intersection of healthcare, information and technology.  We offer project-based rotations to help with your professional development, incredible opportunities to learn from others and a flat, collaborative environment.', 'This position will be part of our Research Division Global Development (GD) IT Competency in Prague, which supports the areas of Clinical Research, Regulatory Affairs, Pharmacovigilance and Real-world Evidence.', 'Specifically, this role will focus on supporting IT client services leaders in the engagement with region/country teams and contribute to the delivery and execution of our Research Division GD IT projects.', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Provide business analysis to understand and support regional/country needs of the business partners in Clinical Research, Regulatory Affairs and Pharmacovigilance', 'Support the Global Development IT International teams with implementation of global IT solutions to our Research Division business partners community in the regions/countries.', 'Collaborate with GD IT team members and IT Platform teams, as well as our Hubs in Branchburg, Singapore and Prague to deliver IT solutions', 'Participate in innovative experiments and identify potential areas for business process improvement to increase our research division business partners productivity', 'Travel will be required (~10%)', 'All activities must be conducted in compliance with company policies and standards, as well as regional and country specific regulations.', 'Qualifications', 'Education and Skills Required', 'Degree or advanced degree in Science or Computer related field', 'Minimum Experience Required', '2 years of significant business analysis experience with large scale validated scientific computer systems', 'Skills/Knowledge Required', 'Proven knowledge of business processes within the pharmaceutical R&D; space – specifically Clinical Research, Regulatory Affairs, Clinical Safety', 'Good business acumen, with proven ability to understand business processes in detail – both at global and region/country levels – and translate these into requirements', 'Proven leadership skills are preferred, along with excellent English communication (both oral and written)', 'Good analytical and problem-solving skills', 'Good interpersonal skills along with the ability to communicate appropriately and confidently with other colleagues and navigate a complex matrix environment', 'Excellent organizational skills and the ability to organize and prioritize work', 'Self-motivation and ability to work independently with minimum direction, a proactive approach', 'Skills/Knowledge/Experience Preferred', 'Experience and/or knowledge in at least one of these areas: Clinical Research, Regulatory Affairs, Pharmacovigilance (business and/or technology exposure)', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 10 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ["MSLs' engagements are based on in-depth scientific exchange in a therapeutic area and often lead to knowledge transfer initiatives and research. The MSL, in interacting with healthcare professionals and researchers, is governed by the following guiding principles intended to deliver unbiased and evidence based information", '• Report into Global Medical Affairs.', '• Have no sales objectives or accountability for prescribing or sales of any MSD product and do not participate in Sales Incentive Plans (SIP).', '• Discussions between MSLs and Health Care Professionals should focus on bi-directional exchange of ideas on disease related topics, scientific presentations of data in the public domain, and reporting scientific results (e.g. discussion of clinical study results.)', '• Product claims must be discussed in the context of clinical and scientific exchange, and shall be consistent with prescribing information and substantiated with reference-able data.', '• Communicate evidence with fair balance, in accordance with company and local regulatory standards.', '• If unsolicited, responses to requests that necessitate providing information or data that is not within the current product indication, must clearly disclose that the information being provided is not contained within the regulatory-approved labeling and that MSD recommends the use of its products in accordance with its approved labeling.', '• In response to an unsolicited request for information, the MSL can provide references, abstracts and bibliographies for the specified topics. The literature and data that MSL use to support their discussions, as a general rule, are peer-reviewed, of the highest quality, and from databases and sites of information approved by the Medical Affairs Management Team.', '• Slides must go thorugh proper medical review per local procedures prior to use. Refrain from use of corporate product trademark and branding in slide kits, unless expressly approved by Medical Affairs in the specific context used.', '• Information provided will not be highlighted or annotated by the MSL.', '• MSLs must not provide materials to Sales Representatives as these should only use materials approved in compliance with the Local Review Guidelines.', 'Qualifications', '- strong scientific baseline knowledge in therapeutic area 1) Clinical doctor in the related TA (bachelor of clinical medicine degree or above) resident level at Tier III hospital (preferred) or resident to attending level at Tier II hospital. 2) Clinical doctor in the unrelated TA (bachelor degree of clinical medicine plus master degree or above) resident level (preferred) at Tier III hospital or resident to attending level at Tier II hospital. 3) Pharmacologist or Biologist (master degree of Pharmacology, or Ph.D degree for Life Science).', '- strong, confident and engaging presentation skills', '- outstanding communication and skills and the ability to function within a team environment.', '- handling of multiple tasks at the same time and working under pressure', '- proactive "can do" attitude and passion for the science related to the products and associated therapeutic area', '- strong customer facing skills, listening skills, probing skills, and flexibility', '- corporate culture competencies of Leader Behaviors, including Business Integrity', '- experience within a clinical drug development environment preferred.', '- be able to travel', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global healthcare leader with a diversified portfolio of innovative medicines, vaccines, and animal health products.', 'The Bioinformatics & Cheminformatics team within the Product Strategy group is seeking a highly motivated and skilled Bioinformatics Product Owner to support the development, maintenance and optimization of bioinformatics workflows. The position will involve regular interactions with scientists as part of a cross-regional and multidisciplinary network of researchers, computational biologists, data scientists and software engineers.', 'In this role, you will', '• Guide the development, optimization and scaling up of NGS related pipelines particularly in microbiome research and translational medicine', '• Act as a scientific lead for multiple software development projects', '• Lead prototyping, testing and validating of novel algorithms', 'Qualifications', 'Required Experience and Skills:', '• MSc or PhD (preferred) degree in bioinformatics or related field with at least 2 years experience in industry or academic settings', '• A good track record of peer-reviewed publications is desirable', '• Experience in implementing computational workflows for analysis of NGS and other high-throughput data, for example: WGS, Exome-seq, single cell, metagenomics (preferred), epigenetics, GWAS, eQTL, RNA-seq, ChIP-seq and quantitative proteomics', '• Extensive knowledge of open source and proprietary computational biology tools and databases', '• Solid statistical knowledge and understanding of current scientific challenges in microbiome research and/or immunology and oncology.', '• Excellent problem-solving skills and high professional standards with strong ability to prioritize and work under pressure', '• Strong communication skills and ability to simplify and explain complex biological problems to data scientists and software engineers', '• Excellent programming skills in a subset of the following Python, Perl, Java/C++, R/Shiny, Matlab, Linux/Unix, SQL and versioning control e.g. Git', '• Experience with HPC and cloud computing (AWS) distributed computing', '• Experience in clinical data mining and machine learning approaches is a plus', 'We offer', '• Challenging career, trainings, conferences and meet up sessions organized internally and externally', '• Learning opportunities, rotation program, internal transfer move options', '• Professional growth based on performance', '• Innovative and flexible working environment', '• Wide range of benefits', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

Standorten', 'Qualifications', 'Abgeschlossenes Studium der Veterinärmedizin', 'Erfahrung in der tierärztlichen Praxis als praktizierender (Assistenz)Tierarzt für Groß- und/oder Kleintiere', 'Erfahrung in einer ähnlichen Position oder im Pharmabereich wünschenswert', 'Sorgfältige, strukturierte und ergebnisorientierte Arbeitsweise; description: ['MSD es un líder global en el cuidado de la salud con una diversificada cartera de medicinas de prescripción, vacunas y productos de consumo para la salud, así como productos para la salud animal. Hoy en día, nos encontramos construyendo un nuevo tipo de compañía de salud – que esté listo para ayudar a crear un futuro más sano para todos nosotros.', 'Nuestra capacidad de superación depende de la integridad, conocimiento, imaginación, habilidad, diversidad y trabajo en equipo de gente como usted. Con este fin, nos esforzamos en crear un ambiente de respeto mutuo, estímulo y trabajo en equipo. Como parte de nuestro equipo global, usted tendrá la oportunidad de colaborar con colegas talentosos y dedicados, mientras su carrera se desarrolla y expande.', 'P', 'osition\tJefe de Deposito', 'Area/Division\tSCM – Warehouse', 'Position Objectives \tSupervisar las actividades de las zona de Almacén, resolviendo las incidencias técnicas y de gestión con el fin de asegurar el buen funcionamiento de la producción y servicio a clientes. Asegurar el cumplimiento de las GMP, normas y procedimientos locales y de la planificación en el área de Almacén.', 'Main Responsibilities:', '-\tSupervisión general de las zonas y ayudar a solventar incidencias cuando sea requerido', '-\tCoordinar con el departamento de mantenimiento, las reparaciones, reformas o mantenimiento de las instalaciones', '-\tGestionar en su departamento la actualización de procedimientos y metodologías orientadas a alinear la planta de Montevideo con los intereses de la Compañía', '-\tLiderar la investigación de desviaciones y la posterior implantación de acciones CAPA´s', '-\tResponsable del cumplimiento de normas GMP en Almacén', '-\tResponsable del cumplimiento de normas de seguridad en Almacén', '-\tResponsabilizarse de su estado de formación y del estado de formación de los operarios en función de su plan de aprendizaje', '-\tRealizar las transacciones administrativas SAP necesarias para asegurar las tareas de almacén', '-\tResponsable por recepciones y entregas de toda mercadería que pasa por el Almacén', 'Qualifications', '-\tInglés (Escrito y Oral medio/avanzado - excluyente)', '-\tSAP (experiencia con SAP en cualquiera de sus versiones muy valorado para el puesto)', '-\tGMP (no excluyente)', '-\tWindows, Word y Excel (Excluyentes)', 'Nuestros empleados son la clave del éxito de nuestra empresa. Demostramos nuestro compromiso con nuestros empleados ofreciéndoles un programa de recompensas competitivo y valioso. Los beneficios en MSD están diseñados para apoyar la amplia gama de objetivos, necesidades y estilos de vida de nuestros empleados y de muchas de las personas que constituyen lo más importante en sus vidas.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 20 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Jefe de Deposito

description: ['The MSD International (GmbH) Patient Engagement IT team is focused on building a dynamic understanding of the patient experience that can be consumed by our stakeholders. And co-creatively developing solutions, usually with a digital or partnership component, in the areas of awareness, access, affordability and adherence.', "Our objective is to ensure that we understand and identify unmet needs. We are then responsible for orchestrating the prototyping and testing of solutions. We carefully package our learnings and we shepherd the transfer of knowledge and assets. Your responsibility is to ensure we do that in a way that effectively copes with risks related to compliance while ensuring the timely delivery of the opportunities we're producing to move MSD forward in the area of digital health.", 'We are looking for people who are willing to spend the time to understand the problem; people who are curious and thoughtfully frame their questions, listen openly, observe carefully; people who are ready to then move from insights to action.', 'As part of the team, the Consumer / Patient-As-Consumer Design Architect holds the commitment for –designing the experience, and then helping to design and test prototypes that support the experience we are looking to trigger.  You are a team player who is expert with wireframes, mockups, requirements engineering and physical prototypes.  You are a designer with a deep domain knowledge of design principles, and part artist to know when to break the rules. You are conceptual enough to see the big picture and caring enough to explore and produce all of the little things involved in achieving it.', 'You love to collaborate with a wide range of best in breed talent (product managers, marketing managers, strategists, techies, and more). And you have a strong point of view and are comfortable in presenting it. While intensely passionate you are long on execution. You have a sense of urgency and relish the opportunity to put something in front of people to get a reaction.', "Your degree in social or behavioral sciences, cognitive sciences, design, graphic arts or the equivalent experience and fluency with Adobe creative suite are part of your toolkit. But you also enjoy and appreciate the physical experience of products and are willing to experiment with other media. You are deeply comfortable with implementing 'mobile first'.", 'You are ready to:', '•', 'Participate in ethnographic analysis to help form reports, personas, scenarios, journey maps, conceptual models, sitemaps, functional flows, and annotated wireframes.', '•', 'Plan, produce and co-lead workshops that frame human-centered design, design thinking or consumer experiences; across internal MSD functions and external stakeholders.', '•', 'Lead a multidisciplinary or cross-functional team that develops the UI/UX as needed, working with market researchers, other designers, product owners and engineers to strategize, prioritize, plan, and execute on initiatives.', '•', 'Collaborate on design components with lead iOS, Android and HTML developers.', '•', 'Manage the design process including researching, planning, prototyping, usability testing and specification.', '•', 'Ideate and execute on tactical usability assessments and work collaboratively with ethnographers, other designers, and staff to uncover new customer insights by combining quantitative and qualitative research.', '•', 'Contribute user experience best practices and act as an experience evangelist, advocating for consumers of health and representing their needs and perspectives to the entire organization.', 'Qualifications', 'Education Level:', '•', 'Bachelors or advanced degree Sociology, Psychology, Behavioral Sciences, Human-Computer Interaction (HC), Product or Service Design or related fields; or', '•', '7-10 years of related experience.', 'Experience/Technical Skills:', '•', 'Have 3+ years work experience in an applied user experience design.', '•', 'Experience and strong working knowledge of user centred design methodologies.', '•', 'Passionate about research, data and user experience.', '•', 'Experience developing customer insights using a combination of qualitative research and quantitative data analysis is highly desired .', '•', 'Must be organized, able to think beyond what is asked for, act independently, and juggle multiple projects and competing priorities in a fast-paced environment .', '•', 'Demonstrated ability to show initiative and work as part of a highly collaborative team: able to listen effectively, respectful of others perspectives and contributions, and able to both offer and accept feedback openly.', '•', 'Successful record of influencing product design by providing insight into customer behaviours and preferences through effectively communicated findings and potential design solutions inspired by the findings.', '•', 'Have excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills.', '•', 'Portfolio of relevant research and design work is required with application for consideration.', 'Personal Attributes:', '•', 'Ability to demonstrate leadership behaviours in alignment with the MSD leadership standards.', '•', 'Ensures both operational knowledge and technical skills are maintained and compliant against individual job program.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Our Manufacturing Division, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', 'Position Overview:', 'Supported by the Quality Systems Manager and Qualified Persons located in Milton Keynes, provides full Quality Assurance support to the Milton Keynes site operations.', 'Ensures that the Milton Keynes Quality Compliance (IPT1 Compliance) function operates in a safe manner and that all staff are suitably qualified and trained to undertake the tasks assigned to them.', 'Manages the Milton Keynes IPT1 Compliance function and work with the Qualified Person(s) to provide an efficient and effective service to support the timely and compliant release of materials, components and products.', 'Working with the site management, ensures that the Milton Keynes site operates in a fully GMP compliant manner in accordance with all of the relevant corporate governance requirements (including reporting), policies, procedures and guidelines as well as ensuring that the products and processes are fully compliant with the filed regulatory dossiers for the products supported.', 'Partners with and supports other sites and functions as needed during the technical transfer of products into and out of the site.', 'Working with the Quality Systems Manager ensures that the Quality Management System (QMS) in use at the Milton Keynes site is fit for purpose.', 'Acts as the point of focus for all compliance inspections of the sites e.g. internal and corporate audits as well as Regulatory Inspections.', 'Either directly or through the QP, liaises with the Veterinary Medicines Directorate (VMD) regarding the routine release of biological products and at other times to secure the resolution of complaints and other issues that might impact the quality and supply of the products supplied by or for the company.', 'Deputises for the Head of Quality as required and if needed for other Quality Compliance managers.', 'Duties, Responsibilities, Activities', 'Management', 'Ensures that hazards from work operations including the working environment are identified, that risks are understood and controlled and that where appropriate effective control measures such as guards and/or personal protective equipment are available, maintained and used.', 'Ensures that all IPT1 Compliance staff are suitably empowered and fully engaged with other business functions and that appropriate processes and systems are established and maintained to ensure the efficient, effective and compliant support of site (and global) operations.', 'Ensures that standard operating procedures including safe systems of work are developed and approved for all activities and operations undertaken by IPT1 Compliance staff.', 'Recruits, trains, coaches and mentors suitably qualified and knowledgeable people to ensure that they are able to carry out their duties and tasks in a compliant and safe manner in accordance with the relevant approved procedures.', 'Coordinates and organises the efficient review and approval of records and data to support the timely release of intermediates and products to meet the needs of production, the supply chain and other internal customers.', 'Contributes as required to ensure timely completion of Product Quality Reviews.', 'Where inspections and audits of the sites are undertaken ensures that any adverse observations or findings are thoroughly evaluated and suitable CAPAs implemented and closed out in a timely fashion to fully address the deficiencies raised.', 'Reviews and approves protocols, reports, SOPs, and other documents as needed', 'Communicates effectively with the team, senior management and internal customers and stakeholders.', 'Reports and manages performance metrics in a timely and effective manner.', 'Ensures regular safety monitoring of the IPT1 Compliance facilities are undertaken as needed.', 'Ensures that accidents and incidents are fully investigated and documented, that near misses are recorded and that appropriate CAPAs are put in place so as to prevent the occurrence/recurrence of such events.  Also ensures that the SHE department is advised of all statutory reportable events.', 'Ensures that the IPT1 Compliance team understand and comply with all relevant work-related legislation and regulatory standards; including the relevant Health, Safety, Environment, Medicines GMP, Home Office and Employment legislation relevant to the operations and duties they undertake.', 'Conducts regular performance reviews of the IPT1 Compliance team, including appropriate role, project, and GMP/HSE compliance aspects against agreed objectives and to set targets.', 'Manages the IPT1 Compliance expenditure and headcount to agreed targets.', 'Leadership', 'In all activities is a role model for the successful implementation of the MSD Corporate Policies and MSD Leadership Behaviours such that they become the shared mindset of the Quality Function.', 'Focuses the team on Quality Systems thinking and continuous improvement.', 'Provide coaching and support for all team members in setting and achieving realistic development goals aligned with career aspirations and potential.', 'Leads and models the partnership with Global Supply Chain, Global Quality, Partner sites within the network and other stakeholders towards full, open, inclusive and effective engagement in achievement of site and global objectives.', 'Engages with external authorities and stakeholders to deliver outcomes in best interest of the company and its patients.', 'Technical', 'Provides technical/scientific/GxP advice and guidance as required.', 'Supports the sites to improve Right First Time (RFT) and process capability as well as drives improvements to the QMS.', 'Supports the implementation and use of Lean Sigma and Class A throughout the sites using data to drive continuous improvement.', 'Provides active support and, as required, conducts investigations into deviations and Out of Specification/Tolerance (OOS) events.', 'Qualifications', 'Ideal Background', 'Minimum Experience', 'Required:', '8 years post graduate experience in pharmaceutical manufacturing either in a QA or QC role.', '5 years supervisory or management experience.', 'Skills/Knowledge Required:', 'Degree in Chemistry, Biology or biosciences field.', 'Experience as a Project License Holder preferred.', 'Proven technical ability including: knowledge of GMP/GCLPs, QMS, test method validation & equipment qualification, Lean and 6 Sigma, continuous improvement/business excellence.', 'Excellent interpersonal skills including good communication, conflict management and leadership.', 'Your role at MSD is advancement. description: ['We zoeken we een ervaren Manager Operations die verantwoordelijk is voor het bouwen van een team van technicians in een sterk groeiende afdeling binnen de productiesite Boxmeer. Ben je toe aan een nieuwe uitdaging? Reageer dan snel!', 'Voor onze locatie', 'Boxmeer', 'zijn wij op zoek naar een', 'Manager Operations.', 'Als Manager Operations bij MSD ben je verantwoordelijk voor de dagelijkse aansturing van productieafdelingen, warehouse-activiteiten of binnen een QC omgeving. Een van de productieafdelingen is de afdeling SFFD waar de productie van levende gevriesdroogde vaccins gaat plaatsvinden - de fabriek is nog in aanbouw. De bouw is gestart en de eerste apparatuur wordt getest bij de leverancier. Daarom zijn we ons team aan het uitbreiden en zoeken we een Manager Operations die samen met ons het team van technicians gaat opzetten. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het bouwen van een team en samen met de nog aan te nemen collega Managers operations stuur je dit team aan. In totaal heb je op termijn 10-15 direct reports. Je coacht hen op het gebied van persoonlijke ontwikkeling. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het behalen van de aanname van de technician en op termijn de dagplanning en bij grotere afwijkingen of storingen ben je het aanspreekpunt voor FPU experts en help je waar nodig. Je documenteert de afwijkingen met produ', 't impact in een deviatie systeem.', 'Daarnaast werk je samen met je collega’s aan het optimaliseren van processen en transfers van nieuwe producten. De rol zal zich na oplevering van de faciliteit wijzigen tot een Manager Operations met verantwoordelijkheid voor het behalen van de dagplanning, oplossen van storingen en afwijkingen.', 'Welkom in ons team', 'Wij zijn een afdeling in (op)bouw en daarmee een sterk groeiende afdeling binnen de productiesite Boxmeer. Op dit moment houden we ons met name bezig met de aanschaf van apparatuur, het schrijven van relevante documenten en het opzetten van het productiesysteem. Het team bestaat daarmee dus uit toegewijde mensen welke goed in staat zijn veranderingen te zien, en deze pro-actief te implementeren. Met jou vooruitstrevende houding en bereidheid tot verandering maken we samen SFFD klaar om productie te starten en te voldoen aan de  klantvraag van morgen!', 'Primaire taken / verantwoordelijkheden', 'Aanname van productie technicians', 'Aansturing, ondersteuning en training van Technicians en bijbehorende people management activiteiten', 'Afstemming met IPT planners en collega Managers van alle activiteiten die de productieplanning beïnvloeden', 'Realiseren van de afgesproken leverdata van klantorders, tegen zo laag mogelijke kosten. Focus op tijdige en complete belevering van klanten', 'Onderhouden en continu verbeteren van de huidige processen qua techniek, kwaliteit en veiligheid in samenwerking met ondersteunende disciplines binnen en buiten het IPT. Hiermee streven naar een right-first-time Operations zonder ongevallen', 'In samenwerking met collega’s waarborgen en handhaven van eenduidige kwaliteitsprocedures', 'Monitoren en initiëren van data-administratie en sturen van verbeteringen op basis van de data-afgeleide performance indicatoren', 'Qualifications', 'Jouw profile', 'Afgeronde HBO/ WO opleiding', 'Relevante leidinggevende werkervaring is een pre', 'In staat oam sturing en richting te geven aan een groep medewerkers en ze te coachen naar toenemende zelfstandigheid', 'In staat om prioriteiten te stellen en ook onder tijdsdruk een juiste afweging te kunnen maken', 'Project management vaardigheden', 'Stevige persoonlijkheid', 'Mondeling en schriftelijk communicatief vaardig, zowel in het Nederlands als in het Engels', 'Wij bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met  toegewijde collega’s. Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', 'Een competitief salaris', '35,5 vakantiedagen', '8% vakantietoeslag', '3% eindejaarsuitkering', 'MSD Incentive Plan', 'Een uitstekend pensioen', 'Over MSD Animal Health', "MSD Animal Health ontwikkelt en produceert vaccins en farmaceutische specialiteiten voor landbouwhuisdieren, gezelschapsdieren en vis. We hebben kantoren in meer dan 50 landen, verkopen onze producten in meer dan 140 markten en opereren een netwerk van productielocaties en R&D; faciliteiten in de hele wereld. Binnen MSD Animal Health zijn we altijd op zoek naar innovatieve talenten die zich richten op voortdurende verbetering van onze producten en de manier waarop we werken. We zijn op zoek naar nieuwe collega's die ondernemend en resultaatgericht zijn. Niet alleen de resultaat telt; de manier waarop je deze resultaat behaalt is van cruciaal belang om succesvol te zijn binnen MSD Animal Health. MSD Animal Health loopt voorop in diergeneesmiddelen.", 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

Through our prescription medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies and animal health products, we work with customers and operate in more than 140 countries to deliver innovative health solutions.', 'Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of people like you.', 'We are looking for an', 'Infrastructure Automation Leader', 'who will enhance our infrastructure operational effectiveness and recovery capabilities. You will document roadmaps and guidance, increase process efficiency and deliver innovative technology in part by collaborating with DevOps teams.  As the successful candidate you will have the opportunity to make a significant contribution to MSD business, drug development, and patient health.', 'You:', 'Can build a strategic roadmap and strive to deliver in short increments', 'Are hands on, ready to use your skillset and insights to improve a global IT infrastructure (servers, storage and database)', 'Are passionate about delivering reliable infrastructure with APIs using a DevOps / SRE approach', 'Encourage Production Observability practices such as metrics monitoring and log aggregation', 'Use tooling and services like Artifactory, BitBucket, Confluence, Jira, Docker, vSphere, AWS', 'Express your ideas through written and visual content with efficient methodology', 'Supervisory leader, addressing escalations and ensuring work life balance of the team', 'Want to work with a global infrastructure team of talented individuals', 'Have a keen interest to design, architect, and debug infrastructure service offerings', 'We:', 'Are the IT Infrastructure team within MSD, an established Pharmaceutical company founded in 1891', 'Hope you will join us to deliver secure, reliable, capable technologies that innovate for the future', 'Qualifications', 'Required', 'Experience:', '3+ years of experience in a service delivery technical lead role', 'Knowledge of least one scripting language (ability to read and interpret the code)', 'Lead projects with focus on delivery standards', 'Documentation of developed solutions', 'Product road-mapping, backlog and lifecycle', 'Preferred Skills:', 'Solid foundation in Computer Science or experience building and managing scalable systems', "Understand how to create, expose and consume REST API's using Web Services design principles", 'Familiar with configuration management tools, such as: Ansible, Saltstack, SCCM, Tainium or Terraform', 'Demonstrated ability to work with a diverse group of professionals globally', 'Besides a great atmosphere and flexible working environment, we also offer:', 'Competitive remuneration', 'Position in a world leading global company', 'Challenging career', 'Professional growth based on performance', 'Innovative working environment', 'Wide range of benefits', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD’s Information Technology division partners with colleagues across the business to help serve our patients and customers around the world. Ours is a high-energy team of dynamic, innovative individuals dedicated to advancing MSD’s contribution to global medical innovation by leveraging information and technology to efficiently advance the business by driving revenue and productivity.', 'Job Purpose:', 'The enterprise Information Technology field is rapidly changing. The explosion of data tied to the ubiquity of digital technologies and services available to consumers is changing the expectations of senior leaders, employees, customers and patients. People want access to information, everywhere, on any device, anytime. These challenges require IT to significantly uplift its technology assets and skillsets to speed up and drive the changes. To address this challenge, IT has established a three-hub model in Singapore, Branchburg and Prague to provide a follow-the-sun operational model leveraging networked teams that can better support the business, the patients and make the cross work between different departments and regions more and more agile.', 'The Network Specialist is required to support the planning, implementation and deployment phases of complex projects, in line with IT strategies of Network and Unified Communication divisions. This requires a highly skilled individual with subject matter expertise in Network Security, Firewall Management, IPS/IDS, Site to Site VPN and Network Protocols. A strong ability to collaborate with stakeholders across Managed partners, IT functional groups and Business is also required on a daily basis. We are looking for someone who is capable of working in a dynamic global environment operating in a 24/7 follow the sun model, with a broad understanding of Data Network technology areas as well as wide exposure to complex global network infrastructure setup. The individual will need to demonstrate sound technical knowledge, good communication and good operational mindset.', 'Primary activities/responsibilities:', 'To support and promote the overall quality status of the managed services and ensure compliance to optimal service levels according to the highest standards provided by the Engineering Teams.', 'To act as the highest technical escalation point in all the technology areas managed by the team.', 'To Troubleshoot complex network issues escalated to the team with Incidents on a world-wide scale. To Handle post-incident analysis and Long-Term Remediation actions.', 'To handle confidently the escalation process up to Executive levels within the company.', 'Will be directly responsible for implementing Network and UC projects and also supervise projects being implemented by the Managed Services provider.', 'To work with technical teams and business teams when developing standardized network solution and communication plans to provide an optimal end user experience.', 'To adhere to project management and ITIL best practices and methodologies across projects and service delivery while meeting time-lines, budgets and business deliverables.', 'To ensure new tools, devices, platforms are properly put in production by following standard processes.', 'To be involved in global & regional initiatives and duties based on Management and Business requirements.', 'To Coach, mentor and motivate others in the team.', 'To manage vendors and drive deliverables to meet target dates.', 'Qualifications', 'Qualifications, Skills & Experience', 'Required:', 'Education: MSc Degree or BSc Degree or equivalent with relevant experience in Computer Science, Computer Science Engineering, Math, or equivalent experience', '5-8 years in providing technical operation support and service delivery in Data Network areas', '2 years’ experience as a Tier3 engineer in an Enterprise level NOC', 'Wide experience with Cisco, F5, Pulse Secure and Palo Alto technologies', 'Good knowledge of ITIL processes or similar best practices (Eg: Change, Incident, Problem management)', 'Proven experience in troubleshooting and fixing complex networking issues', 'Strong working knowledge in the following areas:', 'Routing protocols (BGP, OSPF, EIGRP)', 'SDN (Cisco ACI)', 'VPN solution like DMVPN, IPSEC, GRE and SSL', 'Data Center technologies (OTV, Fabric Path, VDC, VPC, ACI, Load Balancing)', 'Perimeter Security (Cisco ASA/Firepower, SourceFire, Palo Alto/IPS, Pulse Secure)', 'Monitoring and management tool such as or similar to (example ServONE, Tufin, NetBrain)', 'Experience with scripting and DevOps tools and languages (e.g. Python, GitHub, etc.) and automation tool like Gluware will be an advantage', 'Experience with Cisco WAAS, QOS, Cloud (AWS, Azure) and DNS/DHCP via tool like IPAM will be an advantage', 'Experience with Global IT operations following the sun support', 'Ability to work independently and to deliver projects effectively', 'The Cisco CCNP certification is highly recommended', 'Industry recognized certifications such as CISSP, CCIE, PMP are a very welcome plus', 'Excellent communication and negotiation skills within a matrix organization', 'Proven people management skills are a very welcome plus', 'Fluent English in both verbal and written forms is a must', 'Being able to work under pressure with limited supervision', 'Ability to create positive relationships at all levels across different groups & teams', 'Being Able to review priorities and adjust them quickly and work on tight deadlines', 'Proven experience with working across technical and business teams to achieve common objectives and good customer experience', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD’s Financial division helps plan and analyze the resources that allow us to continue advancing medical innovation around the world. This team of attentive, exacting individuals prepares and organizes financial assets in order to drive MSD’s momentum towards providing the world with an evolving, diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines, and animal health products that fuel global wellness.', 'STS Resolution Center Associate Specialist with English', 'Position Overview', 'MSD Regional Delivery Centers (RDC), located across three regions (Americas, Europe, and Asia), are responsible for the timely and efficient delivery of standardized, global financial processes. The RDC – Europe in Prague, Czech Republic will be responsible for the execution and delivery of a broad range of financial services and processes across MSD business divisions and markets for the Europe region.', 'The Source to Settle (STS) Resolution Center Associate Specialist will be responsible for the execution and delivery of the customer service for all applicable markets in the Europe. Scope of position includes handling and resolving internal and external stakeholder requests pertaining to procurement process, invoice process, supplier & employees inquiries', 'Position Responsibilities', 'Primary responsibilities for this position include, but are not limited to, the following:', 'Provide administrative and functional support to the suppliers and employees', 'Receive and respond to all incoming queries via phone or email', 'Investigate, capture, and record all complex queries', 'Collaborate within the team to ensure effective support for the entire region being supported', 'Resolve customer queries in the areas of procurement, accounts payable and employee expense management inquiries', 'Identify, propose, and implement process improvement through daily problem resolution', 'Communicate with internal business customers', 'Manage significant/strategic relationships with vendors and internal/external stakeholders to develop an excellent working relationship with these groups and manage issues proactively', 'Manage issues proactively in conjunction with internal stakeholders where necessary to achieve satisfactory solutions in a timely manner', 'Ensure compliance with company policies and procedures in line with SOX requirements and supports company mission, values and standards of ethics and integrity', 'Collaborate with various personnel to resolve reconciliation issues within system and/or vendor relationships', 'Effectively manage and prioritize workload efficiently and accurately while promoting a positive customer service culture', 'Qualifications', 'Education & Experience', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Accounting or Finance', 'Minimum of 2 year of experience in a finance or accounting department of a multinational company preferred', 'Experience from administration or customer service', 'Business-level English (written and spoken) required', 'Experience working with Case/Ticket Management Software, specifically BMC Remedy', 'Experience using SAP desired', 'Experience working in an organization providing services across multiple markets or geographies', 'Technical Skills Requirements', 'Strong customer focus orientation', 'Knowledge of SAP software is a plus', 'Intermediate to Advanced PC skills (MS Excel, Word, PowerPoint) required', 'Works effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, under pressure and with a high degree of professionalism', 'Team player with a focus on collaboration', 'Strong communication, interpersonal, and organization skills required', 'Demonstrated commitment to education and professional development', 'Ability to operate independently and navigate through change or uncertainty', 'Problem solving and analytical skills with a proactive management style to implement new processes', 'Possess a high degree of integrity and personal ethics in implementing corporate policies and procedures', 'Physical Position Requirements', 'Prague, Czech Republic', 'We offer:', 'Competitive remuneration', 'Position in a leading global healthcare company', 'Challenging career', 'Professional growth based on performance', 'Innovative and flexible working environment', 'Wide range of benefits', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD’s Information Technology division partners with colleagues across the business to help serve our patients and customers around the world. Ours is a high-energy team of dynamic, innovative individuals dedicated to advancing MSD’s contribution to global medical innovation by leveraging information and technology to efficiently advance the business by driving revenue and productivity.', 'Job Purpose:', 'The enterprise Information Technology field is rapidly changing. The explosion of data tied to the ubiquity of digital technologies and services available to consumers is changing the expectations of senior leaders, employees, customers and patients. People want access to information, everywhere, on any device, anytime. These challenges require IT to significantly uplift its technology assets and skillsets to speed up and drive the changes. To address this challenge, IT has established a three-hub model in Singapore, Branchburg and Prague to provide a follow-the-sun operational model leveraging networked teams that can better support the business, the patients and make the cross work between different departments and regions more and more agile.', 'The Network Specialist is required to support the planning, implementation and deployment phases of complex projects, in line with IT strategies of Network and Unified Communication divisions. This requires a highly skilled individual with subject matter expertise in Network Security, Firewall Management, IPS/IDS, Site to Site VPN and Network Protocols. A strong ability to collaborate with stakeholders across Managed partners, IT functional groups and Business is also required on a daily basis. We are looking for someone who is capable of working in a dynamic global environment operating in a 24/7 follow the sun model, with a broad understanding of Data Network technology areas as well as wide exposure to complex global network infrastructure setup. The individual will need to demonstrate sound technical knowledge, good communication and good operational mindset.', 'Primary activities/responsibilities:', 'To support and promote the overall quality status of the managed services and ensure compliance to optimal service levels according to the highest standards provided by the Engineering Teams.', 'To act as the highest technical escalation point in all the technology areas managed by the team.', 'To Troubleshoot complex network issues escalated to the team with Incidents on a world-wide scale. To Handle post-incident analysis and Long-Term Remediation actions.', 'To handle confidently the escalation process up to Executive levels within the company.', 'Will be directly responsible for implementing Network and UC projects and also supervise projects being implemented by the Managed Services provider.', 'To work with technical teams and business teams when developing standardized network solution and communication plans to provide an optimal end user experience.', 'To adhere to project management and ITIL best practices and methodologies across projects and service delivery while meeting time-lines, budgets and business deliverables.', 'To ensure new tools, devices, platforms are properly put in production by following standard processes.', 'To be involved in global & regional initiatives and duties based on Management and Business requirements.', 'To Coach, mentor and motivate others in the team.', 'To manage vendors and drive deliverables to meet target dates.', 'Qualifications', 'Qualifications, Skills & Experience', 'Required:', 'Education: MSc Degree or BSc Degree or equivalent with relevant experience in Computer Science, Computer Science Engineering, Math, or equivalent experience', '5-8 years in providing technical operation support and service delivery in Data Network areas', '2 years’ experience as a Tier3 engineer in an Enterprise level NOC', 'Wide experience with Cisco, F5, Pulse Secure and Palo Alto technologies', 'Good knowledge of ITIL processes or similar best practices (Eg: Change, Incident, Problem management)', 'Proven experience in troubleshooting and fixing complex networking issues', 'Strong working knowledge in the following areas:', 'Routing protocols (BGP, OSPF, EIGRP)', 'SDN (Cisco ACI)', 'VPN solution like DMVPN, IPSEC, GRE and SSL', 'Data Center technologies (OTV, Fabric Path, VDC, VPC, ACI, Load Balancing)', 'Perimeter Security (Cisco ASA/Firepower, SourceFire, Palo Alto/IPS, Pulse Secure)', 'Monitoring and management tool such as or similar to (example ServONE, Tufin, NetBrain)', 'Experience with scripting and DevOps tools and languages (e.g. Python, GitHub, etc.) and automation tool like Gluware will be an advantage', 'Experience with Cisco WAAS, QOS, Cloud (AWS, Azure) and DNS/DHCP via tool like IPAM will be an advantage', 'Experience with Global IT operations following the sun support', 'Ability to work independently and to deliver projects effectively', 'The Cisco CCNP certification is highly recommended', 'Industry recognized certifications such as CISSP, CCIE, PMP are a very welcome plus', 'Excellent communication and negotiation skills within a matrix organization', 'Proven people management skills are a very welcome plus', 'Fluent English in both verbal and written forms is a must', 'Being able to work under pressure with limited supervision', 'Ability to create positive relationships at all levels across different groups & teams', 'Being Able to review priorities and adjust them quickly and work on tight deadlines', 'Proven experience with working across technical and business teams to achieve common objectives and good customer experience', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD’s Information Technology division partners with colleagues across the business to help serve our patients and customers around the world. Ours is a high-energy team of dynamic, innovative individuals dedicated to advancing MSD’s contribution to global medical innovation by leveraging information and technology to efficiently advance the business by driving revenue and productivity.', 'As the Automation & IT Lead you are responsible for the management of all IT and Automation capabilities at MSD’s Pharmaceutical Operations Site in Cramlington, UK.', 'This role is responsible for the performance of all IT and Automation operations carried out at site, ensuring appropriate support to site operations is maintained, and that all operational activities are safe, compliant and demonstrate appropriate financial stewardship. To support this goal, this role will lead and manage a team of IT and automation colleagues at the site, as well as leveraging the capabilities of our local and global partners, and of the global IT platform and infrastructure teams within MSD.', 'The role has the accountability for all IT and Automation capabilities deployed at the site, including the site components of the global network and server infrastructure, and IT capabilities deployed on the shop floor and within the lab environment. This includes ensuring that the solutions deployed are fit for purpose, appropriately resourced and supported, validated as per current and evolving regulatory expectations and maintained as part of an active lifecycle management program.', 'The Automation and IT lead will continue to build on a single Digital Technology organisation at site to combine the relevant site level IT, Automation and Laboratory activities and to sustain our modernization investment as well as leveraging that investment to provide significant additional value for the organization and managing future capital investment over a rolling 7-year horizon. Participates in overall business IT and Automation planning, bringing a current knowledge and future vision of technology and systems as related to site objectives. Establishes and communicates overall strategy for information technology & automation needs (business-aligned A&IT; strategy).', 'The role requires strong ownership of the development and implementation of an Integrated Digital Technology strategy and roadmap for the site, which will underpin the site’s mission and fully align with Corporate strategy.  The Automation & IT Lead drives a culture of Data Driven Decision making across the site and implements best practice Digital solutions and Industry 4.0 technologies to efficiently manage the provision of IT, Automation and Lab support across the site.', 'Automation, Lab and IT solutions and improvements to be realized will be a combination of globally and locally driven solutions, but always with a view to create an optimal value for the overall corporation, integrated and the innovative use of process data analytics and Industry 4.0 technologies to support operations.', 'The lead will act as a bridge between our manufacturing division business challenges and technology solutions and will maintain a close relationship with our manufacturing division business leads and is an active member of our manufacturing division Cramlington Leadership team.', 'Qualifications', 'Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant discipline is required. Master’s Degree is preferred.', 'At least 10 years of experience in providing IT and Automation services to a diverse customer base and leading large teams (required).', 'Demonstrated GxP experience (life science, pharma, med device) and/or manufacturing experience.', 'Strategic planning, decision making and problem-solving skills.', 'Good understanding of SDLC and LEAN/MPS principles. Experienced in validation of Automation and IT systems.  Lean Six Sigma Green or Black belt is desirable.', 'Demonstrated excellent communication and influencing skills, and high personal integrity, credibility, and energy.', 'Demonstrated ability to build relationships with senior clients, A&IT; and business leaders is a mandatory requirement. Demonstrated leadership in achieving shared objectives in a matrix organization.', 'Strong understanding of manufacturing principles/processes and ability to translate manufacturing requirements into solutions.', 'Ability to develop, articulate and build support around a long-term vision and implement incremental milestones in support of that vision.', 'Ability and passion to build and empower effective teams & experience in working in global organization and teams.', 'Project management experience on large sized projects, with demonstrated knowledge of project management process and methodologies.', 'Expertise in the application of Innovative Analytics solutions in a production environment and good understanding and working experience with Industry 4.0 philosophy is preferred.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 10 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Sr. Pharmaceutical Info Specialist-shiyan Job

description: ['Prondil fabrica y provee productos para el cuidado de la salud animal, particularmente vacunas de alta calidad y eficacia, a mercados locales e internacionales. Se especializa y centra en la producción de vacunas de Anthrax y Clostridios, en formulación tanto simple como múltiple.', 'A través del trabajo en equipo, nos comprometemos a proveer productos de alto rendimiento a nivel mundial, precios accesibles y prácticas empresariales que no solo satisfagan, sino que superen las expectativas de clientes y empleados. Damos rápida respuesta a requerimientos, cumplimiento de acuerdos, servicio de post venta y diseño de productos a medida, desarrollados de acuerdo a las necesidades del mercado.', 'MSD, poseedora del control accionario de Prondil, es un líder global de la salud con un portafolio diverso de medicamentos de venta con receta, vacunas y productos de salud animal. La diferencia entre el potencial y el logro radica en la energía que intensifica la innovación y la inventiva; es donde MSD ha demostrado su legado de 125 años. El éxito de MSD está respaldado por la integridad ética, el impulso por ir hacia adelante, y una misión inspiradora de lograr resultados importantes en el cuidado de la salud global.', 'La División de Salud Animal de MSD trabaja para mejorar la salud de los animales alrededor del mundo a través de los acuerdos de colaboración y un sentido profundo de responsabilidad hacia nuestros clientes, consumidores, animales, la sociedad y el planeta. Este equipo de pensadores independientes y enérgicos ofrece uno de los portafolios más innovadores de productos, servicios, y tecnologías que sirven para prevenir, tratar, y controlar enfermedades a través de todas las granjas principales y especies de animales de compañía, tanto a nivel doméstico como internacional.', 'Objetivos generales:', 'Atención de clientes externos logrando  relaciones exitosas con ambos, a fin de maximizar las oportunidades comerciales y con foco en la obtención de los resultados esperados para el área.', 'Desempeñarse bajo políticas y procedimientos, de conformidad con las normas, para proporcionar servicio al cliente necesario y promover buenas relaciones con los mismos. Toma la responsabilidad de las actividades de los clientes en relación a las ventas, atención al cliente, servicio de post ventas y comunicaciones. Desarrolla iniciativas dentro de la organización de diferente índole para informar y educar a los clientes de forma proactiva. Desarrolla planes de mejora acerca de las encuestas a los clientes.', 'Dar seguimiento de ventas a los clientes por cada canal y dar soporte a las unidades de negocio.', 'Actividades/responsabilidades:', '•\tRecepción de órdenes de pedidos;', '•\tContacto y atención telefónica y vía email de clientes. description: ['M', 'SD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', "MSD’s Global Human Health (GHH) Division abides by a “patient first, profits later” ideology. Results-driven and ambitious, this team of individuals represents a functional balance between meeting company objectives and the needs of people around the world. The division is comprised of sales and marketing professionals who are passionate about their role in bringing MSD's prescription medicines, vaccines, and other medical products to our customers worldwide.", 'The Key Account Specialist (KAS) is the MSD Hospital', '& specialty point of contact in the allocated region and accounts. KAS', 'will report to Key Account Manager. In collaboration and alignment with hospital & specialty team, KAS needs to provide a highly effective customer experience, ensuring that MSD delivers value to patients, payers and physicians and become a trusted partner.', 'The KAS sales and financial responsibilities:', "Responsibility for business result within assigned accounts - achieving/exceeding sales targets and agreed KPI's but staying within the approved promotional budgets", 'Account/ Business plan development', 'Account prioritization, setting goals for priority accounts and evaluation of achievements', 'The KAS Customer engagement responsibilities:', 'Anticipation of customer needs and ensuring good product knowledge of Key Customers', 'High level of scientific/clinical knowledge is required to provide approved disease & therapeutic solutions (e.g. approved product information and patient education) to key decision makers and stakeholders.', 'Creating and managing long-term relationships and partnerships with Key Customers', 'Establish and develop relations with Key Decision Makers (Head of Accounts, Account Financial directors, Head of Hospital departments, Hospital Health Committees, Pharmacists) providing sufficient support materials and information on MSD products', 'The KAS is familiar with principles of health economics and the clinical implications. Proactively identifies business opportunities and supports appropriate pull-through and understands current state and evolving landscape of integrated payers in the country', 'Developing and implementing activity plans for Key Customers', 'The KAS collaboration responsibilities:', 'Implementation and evaluation of Marketing strategy', 'Active participation at regular Brand Team business update meetings', 'Providing business feedback and local expertise to Brand Team', 'Initiation and coordination cross-functional team within MSD to develop projects that respond to customers and business needs in assigned accounts.', 'Administrative tasks like CRM, national, regional events coordination', 'Under his/her responsibility assures highest ethical principles conducting Local law, MSD SOPs and regulations', 'This is a critical role for MSD’s Commercial Model', 'Ability to work in a very complex setting and across many functions and levels and across different customer types.', 'Qualifications', 'Education & Experience', 'Minimum: Healthcare education, Bachelor or University degree from accredited university, preferably Medical Doctor or Pharmacists', 'Commercial experience within Pharma- preferable of 2 years minimum.', 'Experience in a hospital environment is preferable', 'Ability to manage key external stakeholders, to influence without authority, and to create and carry out action plans in matrix cross-functional team structures', 'Exhibit strong problem solving, project planning, teamwork, analytical, and written/verbal communication skills', 'Language', 'Fluent in conversational and written English', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', '#LI-DNI', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 50 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']
