description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', "MSD’s Global Human Health (GHH) Division abides by a “patient first, profits later” ideology. Results-driven and ambitious, this team of individuals represents a functional balance between meeting company objectives and the needs of people around the world. The division is comprised of sales and marketing professionals who are passionate about their role in bringing MSD's prescription medicines, vaccines, and other medical products to our customers worldwide.", 'The Key Account Manager (KAM) has important responsibilities with respect to the interaction and communication with hospital representatives, ensuring at the same time compliance with MSD internal policy and legal provisions relevant in this respect. The KAM is the primary key point of contact for hospital pharmacists and hospital management.', 'The KAM covers the hospital/Acute Care MSD Portfolio in a selected number of key accounts and is responsible for the business result of the assigned accounts in his/her sales area.', 'Once MSD Romania becomes an authorized wholesaler (trading entity), the KAM takes over responsibilities regarding the preparation and participation in public hospital tenders on behalf of MSD Romania, in accordance with the relevant public procurement legislation.', 'The KAM creates, for MSD Romania, an account plan with customized tactics, solutions, as regards every key account.', 'The KAM also builds internal relationships and coordinates an entire cross-functional team.', 'Sets up cross-functional teams within MSD to develop projects that respond to customers and business needs.', 'The KAM interacts with the following functions: within the Hospital: General Manager, Finance Manager, Medical Manager, Head of Hospital Department, Hospital pharmacies and Customer Solutions Managers, in the aim of identifying and understanding the hospital environment and patient profiles, the issues that the hospital is confronted with in the therapeutic areas of interest as well as understanding the hospital needs.', 'Key Result Areas & Tasks', 'Strategy building, targeting and segmentation', 'Business analysis of the hospital environment (macro environment, account level) and finds overlaps with MSD’s business objectives', 'Develops center by center action plans and coordinates related activities implementation, including value solutions', 'Resource management: invests where MSD’s portfolio growth opportunities lay', 'Defines and reaches measurable goals and KPIs for MSD Romania, as regards the Key Accounts.', 'Develop value propositions and Customer Solution', 'Identifies value differentiators linked to MSD’s products and services per key account needs.', 'Understands how MSD products address clinical needs, differentiating profiles between competing products, in compliance with MSD relevant internal policies.', 'Leverages resources within MSD to deliver the best results to the key hospitals;', 'Collaborates with Sales Representatives, Customer Solutions Managers, Trading Entity Specialist, Access Management, Medical Affairs Managers, Senior Management (if needed), legal, back office functions and also with local payer (NHF subsidiaries) - to ensure that appropriate MSD solutions and personnel are deployed to deliver a consistent desired customer experience. Shares information about clients and activities through the active use of the existing CRM system', 'Uses the HTA (Health Technology Assessment – mainly pharma-economics data) models to ensure that MSD products are available on the market.', 'Networking relationship building', 'Maps, in collaboration with reps and other colleagues working with the account, patterns within the key accounts and targets the right stakeholders at the right time', 'Connects with multiple stakeholders and committees within a hospital, and helps to ensure cooperation between hospitals and local payers', 'Functions as the key contact for Hospital Management and Hospital Pharmacists and other key stakeholders', 'The KAM manages hospital pharmacy inquiries related to such matters as invoicing errors, product supply issues, product recalls and general communication regarding MSD’s pricing policies & practices', 'Establishes a high degree of credibility with external and internal stakeholders.', 'Negotiation', 'Negotiates (including solutions/price/discounting) and develops value-added propositions in order to support effectively the business objectives', 'Once MSD Romania becomes trading entity, identifies when formularies take place and tenders are published and follows up MSD internal process to respond', 'Qualifications', 'Education and Experience', 'University (business or scientific), Master degree preferred', '5+ years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry', '5+ years of experience in customer facing role', 'Experience in key account management', 'Experience in Marketing is a plus', 'Finance background either through education or experience', 'Strong knowledge of customer/business strategy', 'Understanding of local healthcare and reimbursement systems', 'Academic experience related to disease management/ health economics / public health policy is an advantage', 'Language: Romanian and English proficiency and understanding', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', '#LI-DNI', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 50 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

Furthermore, you will plan and control Facilities Management expense and capital budgets and manage the Facilities Management team of direct reports and an externalized IFM team.', 'About Werthenstein BioPharma GmbH', 'At our pharmaceutical manufacturing site in Schachen (Lucerne), MSD develops and analyses new biological drug substances. The facilities provide investigational medicinal products to clinical trial sites worldwide. Each year up to 2 Million units are being labelled in more than 30 different languages and distributed into more than 50 different countries. Analytical laboratories at the site are equipped to test and run stability studies on drug substances or drug products. description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Position Overview', 'This position is responsible', 'for sourcing', 'of relevant indirect purchase spend through collaboration with regional and global sourcing professionals and local stakeholders in the region of Central Eastern Europe (CEE) Balkans, Greece, Cyprus and Malta.', 'Associate Specialist Procurement conducts and coordinates sourcing projects to support development and implementation of global and regional sourcing strategies in the field of indirect spend. Willing to participate in and coordinate cross-functional teams through the Sourcing management process and to participate in execution of sourcing plans according to global, regional and local components of the category strategy.', 'Co-responsible for identifying and managing saving targets and other key metrics to establish target.', 'Takes part in sourcing, contracting , data gathering & analysis, compliance, as well as process set-up, management and continuous improvement. Ensures overall administration process related to regional sourcing projects.', 'Major Activities', '1.', 'Category Scope', '–Associate Specialist Procurement is responsible for sourcing operations of sourcing projects in indirect categories in Central Eastern', 'Europe (CEE), Balkans, Greece, Cyprus & Malta', '( sub-cluster) including implementation. Liaises with Global and Regional Procurement to ensure sub-cluster category spends are managed in line with agreed Regional and Global sourcing strategies. Ensures overall administration process related to regional sourcing projects.', '2.', 'Sourcing Management', '– Applies, coordinates and conducts Sourcing Management Process to manage assurance of supply, quality, service, cost, innovation and compliance within the sub-cluster', 'for indirect purchasing categories resulting in optimized value. Is involved in development of buyer business plans and execution in alignment with Global Procurement and MSD sourcing rigor processes.', '3.', 'Proactive Cost Management:', 'Participates on achievement of cost control, cost reduction, and cost containment', 'targets, and adds value to area of expenditure through a strong total cost orientation. Ensures proper reporting and documenting in accordance with the company policies and standards.', '4.', 'Market Knowledge:', 'Uses thorough market knowledge and data analysis to gain critical insights that help to drive the selection of sourcing projects and continuous improvement for spend optimization activities.', '5.', 'Supplier Management:', 'Engages in building relationship with local and regional suppliers in the sub-cluster and in managing key supplier performance against business requirements. Ensures adequate inclusion of diversity suppliers in selection process and contracts applicable.', '6.', 'Stakeholder Management and Business Sponsorship:', 'Participates on engagement of assigned stakeholders and partners with them across divisions and across countries to define and meet or exceed business requirements and identify and manage profit plan savings targets. Involved in understanding business requirements at different stakeholder levels.', '7.', 'Contract Negotiation and Management:', 'Conducts sourcing including RFX, RFP, negotiations and contracting for sourcing projects in indirect indirect categories to select and put in place the right suppliers. Responsible for presenting supplier award and for applying for approval according to the MSD GP process and requirements.', '8.', 'Compliance', ': Ensures compliance with MSD local and global Purchasing policies and standards.', 'Value creation:', 'Seeks and implements opportunities to drive value (e.g. cost and quality) for MSD.', 'Qualifications', 'Expertise Required / Core Competences', 'Education:', 'University or College degree preferably in economical or business area.', 'Experience:', '6-12 months in sourcing and preferably in category management. .Fluency in English as a must and additional language knowledge within the sub-cluster is an advantage.', 'Skills', ': Knowledge of Indirect', 'Procurement categories and Pharmaceutical industry is an advantage.', 'Good interpersonal and communication skills.', 'Cultural awareness and sensitivity', 'is an advantage.', 'Project management capabilities with particular strength in collaboration, written and verbal communication and cross-functional team work.', 'Process oriented and analytical skills as well as solid IT application skills are required in Microsoft Office. SAP experience is an advantage.', 'Eager to learn and improve, open minded, and ready to provide support in an international environment and work in an European team.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

Hiertoe onderhouden de verschillende afdelingen contacten met alle Integrated Process Teams (IPT’s) en Centers of Excellence (CoE’s) van Manufacturing Division Haarlem alsmede met andere MSD vestigingen en met de External Manufacturing organisatie wereldwijd. Binnen de CoE Quality is Quality Release verantwoordelijk voor de kwaliteitshandhaving en het vrijgeven van producten naar de markt in een multidisciplinair team waaronder een aantal Qualified Persons (QP).', 'Primaire verantwoordelijkheden', 'Uitvoering van batch documentatie review door jou of onder jouw verantwoordelijkheid;', 'Bijdragen aan de kwaliteitsstrategie binnen Manufacturing Division Haarlem door te adviseren op het gebied van compliance- en kwaliteit gerelateerde verbeteringen en het initiëren en het ontwikkelen van farmaceutisch beleid en procedures;', 'Ambassadeur van het kwaliteitsbewustzijn binnen Manufacturing Division Haarlem;', 'Leiden van (internationale) onderzoeken naar en rapporteren van kritische afwijkingen;', 'Goedkeuren van productie gerelateerde onderzoeken (binnen en buiten Manufacturing Division Haarlem) en klachten.', 'Opbouwen van relaties en frequent onderhouden van contact met diverse collega’s zowel binnen Manufacturing Division Haarlem als met collega’s van andere MSD vestigingen; jaarlijks bezoeken van enkele productiesites.', 'Qualifications', 'Jouw profiel', 'Afgeronde WO studie Biotechnologie, (Micro-)Biologie, Farmacie met apothekersdiploma (of equivalent);', 'Meerdere jaren werkervaring als QP in de farmaceutische industrie;', 'Ervaring met quality oversight over complexe supply chains', 'Ervaring met wet- en regelgeving binnen en buiten EU, o.a. EMEA, FDA, Anvisa', 'Ervaring met implementeren van kwaliteitsverbeteringen', 'In staat om een kwaliteitsgerichte mindset te combineren met een praktische benadering en om dit goed op anderen over te brengen.', 'Sterke persoonlijkheid die in staat is zelfstandig besluiten te nemen;', 'Proactief, besluitvaardig, kritisch en stressbestendig;', 'Uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden (woord en schrift) in het Nederlands en Engels.', 'Wij bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met  toegewijde collega’s. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', 'Een competitief salaris;', '35,5 vakantiedagen;', '8% vakantietoeslag en 3% eindejaarsuitkering;', 'MSD Incentive Plan;', 'Een uitstekend pensioen;', 'In-house sportfaciliteiten;', 'Reiskostenvergoeding;', 'Verschillende trainingsmodules.', 'Over MSD', 'MSD is een wereldleider op het gebied van geneesmiddelen en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze vaccins, biologische therapieën en geneesmiddelen bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We richten ons op aandoeningen die mensen ernstig belemmeren in hun functioneren of zelfs levensbedreigend zijn en die vragen om nieuwe geneesmiddelen. MSD is tevens pionier in biologische research & development voor diergezondheid.', 'Bij MSD geloven we in de kracht van verschillen van teams van getalenteerde medewerkers op alle niveaus. Uiteenlopende vaardigheden, ervaringen, achtergronden en culturele perspectieven helpen ons om beter inzicht te krijgen in de behoeften van diverse klanten, zorgverleners en patiënten. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'We have an exciting opportunity for a Quality Operations Manager', 'As an Quality Operations Manager at MSD you are responsible for the operational management and', 'realization of planning at the Quality Release Blister/Specialties department.', 'In this role you will work in close cooperation with peers within overall Production and Quality departments with continue focus on quality, GMP compliance and Operationalizing Quality.', 'The Quality Operations Manager reports  to the Associate Director within the department Quality Release Blister/Specialties.', 'Responsibilities', '• Manage the execution of the operational process based on daily walkthroughs and visual management, clarify operational status to others in Centre of Excellence  or Integrated Process Teams and ensure problem solving;', '• Responsible for managing the realization of the planning of the operational work processes within timeframe;', '• Develop and implement standardized work (Operationalizing Quality) and performance indicators;', '• Initiate and contribute to the development of improvement business cases and the implementation of improvement initiatives;', '• Ensure batch review, including all associated activities, meet relevant quality criteria;', '• Monitor daily processes, contribute to the investigation of problems, authorize solutions and ensure solutions are implemented;', '• Formulate change management proposals and authorize changes;', '• Responsible for all people management activities for direct reports including all performance management activities. Contributes for the recruitment and retaining of employees through development of people and execution of training programs;', '• Foster teamwork and motivate individuals to high level performance;', '• Monitor and initiate administration of data (e.g. performance indicators) and documentation (e.g. SOP).', 'Qualifications', '• Master’s Degree Biotechnology, (Micro-)Biology, Pharmacy (or equivalent);', '• Preferable 5 years of experience in the pharmaceutical industry', '• Strong written and verbal communication skills', '• People manager', 'About us', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of an individual like you. To this end, we strive to create an environment of mutual respect, encouragement and teamwork. As part of our global team, you’ll have the opportunity to collaborate with talented and dedicated colleagues while developing and expanding your career.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 10 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD is on a quest for cures and is committed to being the world’s premier, most research-intensive biopharmaceutical company. Today, we’re doubling down on this goal. Our research division is a true scientific research facility of tomorrow and will take MSD’s leading discovery capabilities and world-class small molecule and biologics R&D; expertise to create breakthrough science that radically changes the way we approach serious diseases.', 'We have an exciting opportunity for a', 'Senior Statistical Programmer', 'to join our European Health Technology Assessment programming team, on a position based in Kings Cross, London with flexibility to work from home up to 3 days/week.  This is a unique development opportunity with global collaborations in a highly diverse and supportive corporate environment with direct impact on patient’s lives across various therapeutic areas.', 'The BARDS organization', "The Biostatistics and Research Decision Sciences (BARDS) organization has a proud record of providing comprehensive analytical and methodological expertise to support MSD's strategic goals. BARDS applies the highest ethical business practices and encourages a work ethic based on open and honest interpretation and communication of results. Our quantitative scientists aspire to maintain the highest quality output while adopting the most efficient and effective scientific and operational procedures that will promote breakthrough innovation, collaboration and professional activity.", 'The BARDS  European Center of Excellence is supporting Health Technology Assessment (HTA) dossiers through analysis and reporting of late stage clinical trials. This Center of Excellence consists of one team of Statisticians and Statistical Programmers based across its London (UK) and Brussels (Belgium) sites. It provides support to the Center for Observational and Real World-Evidence (CORE), within our research division.', 'The BARDS Europe statistical programming team is composed of talented and inspired scientists, working in a multi-cultural and collaborative environment.', 'Roles and Responsibilities for this Position', 'You will be part of the Biostatistics and Research Decision Sciences (BARDS) organization which has a presence in the US, Europe and Asia. By joining MSD on this role, you will apply your skills and experience in support of developing scientifically based arguments aiming to provide fair accessibility to MSD drugs and vaccines making a real difference in patient’s lives.', 'In this role, you will:', 'Support and lead analysis and reporting on HTA projects. Those HTA projects consist of(re-)using clinical trial data to derive HTA analysis datasets and deliver Tables, Figures and Listings (TFLs) in support of HTA dossiers.', 'Collaborate with the HTA statisticians to gather and interpret the requirements.', 'Ensure proper project planning.', 'Access, gather and transform the required data into HTA analysis datasets.', 'Working independently and as part of project teams, ensure high quality, compliant and efficient delivery of flexible FTLs reporting tools mostly using the SAS programming macro language.', 'Qualifications', 'Essential', 'Master’s Degree or equivalent in an analytical field (Computer Science, Statistics, Life Sciences or related fields) with 3-7 years of SAS statistical programming experience preferably in clinical trial environments for safety and efficacy reporting.', 'or', 'BS degree in an analytical field (Computer Science, Statistics, Life Sciences or related fields) with 5-9 years of SAS statistical programming experience preferably in clinical trial environments for safety and efficacy reporting Advanced SAS programming skills including SAS/BASE, SAS/MACRO, SAS/GRAPH, etc.', 'Strong analytical mind-set with high level of accountability for quality, compliance and timelines.', 'Team oriented with demonstrated history of teamwork and collaboration; enjoying diversity, respect and integrity. Ability and interest to work across cultures in an international environment.', 'Demonstrated excellent interpersonal skills. Excellent collaboration, negotiation and organization skills, creative thinking, and good communication and leadership skills.', 'Capacity to seamlessly assimilate new projects and stakeholders.', 'Successful experience in developing analysis and reporting statistical programming deliverables (datasets, statistical analyses, report tables, and graphics) for research and development projects.', 'Understanding of statistical terminology and concepts; Potential to design and develop complex programming algorithms.', 'Desirable', 'Prior experience with project management. Ability to coordinate the work of others and to engage key stakeholders.', 'Experience in supporting deliverables used for HTA dossiers.', 'Experience in CDISC data standards (SDTM, ADaM).', 'Publications in professional societies (Phuse, PSI, PharmaSUG, etc.).', 'Compensation and Benefits', 'Our employees are the key to our company’s success. We demonstrate our commitment to our employees by offering a competitive compensation and other valuable benefits including a car allowance. Our Company’s benefits are designed to support the wide range of goals, needs and lifestyles of our employees, and many of the people that matter the most in their lives.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'No', 'Number of Openings:', '2', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Position Overview - Basic Functions & Responsibility', 'Description', 'Accountable for the effective planning and delivery of vaccine blending and filling (FPU) manufacture at the Milton Keynes site; in accordance with GMP requirements and company policy and procedures. The incumbent is a pivotal member of the IPT1 (Antigen & FPU) team.', 'Duties and Responsibilities:', '•\tEnsures compliance with applicable Safety and Quality laws and regulations', '•\tBuilding and leading a high performing team. Coaching and developing team members to reach their full potential and providing regular guidance, recognition and feedback through regular individual and team meetings.', '•\tManages talent to ensure robust succession plans and knowledge transfer and provides developmental experiences to exploit talent pool potential to the fullest.', '•\tSets clear priorities and SMART objectives for the team, ensures all team members have a meaningful development plan and the opportunity for career development discussions and that these are recorded in Mycareer. Holds regular 1 to 1 meetings with their direct reports to provide feedback and coaching on performance, behaviors and to regularly review progress against performance and development plans.', '•\tWorks with direct reports and relevant HR COEs to manage team and individual changes and ensure these are correctly reflected in HtR.', '•\tEnsures Continuous Improvement; at all levels of the business, and drives the organisation for ongoing productivity, customer satisfaction and profitability improvement.', '•\tProvides leadership to manufacturing projects at all phases', '•\tDevelops an operating budget and initiates action to operate within those fiscal plans.', '•\tPrepares and presents project status and briefings to the IPT.', '•\tDelivers against the product development plan.', '•\tSolves complex technical problems and provides effective and innovative solutions.', '•\tManages functional resources, processes, and procedures of the antigen departments and ensures technical, cost and schedule objectives of the departments are met.', '•\tDirects all departmental staff in the management of their assigned areas to ensure that their responsibilities to attain objectives and satisfactory operation and performance are met in a way that is consistent with established policies and programs.', '•\tAnalyses and appraises, regularly and systematically, the effectiveness of all operations to ensure that established objectives will be met, that company polices will be observed, and that prompt corrective action will be taken when necessary.', '•\tSupports, communicates, reinforces and defends the mission, values and culture of the organisation.', '•\tIs fully accountable for the Safety, Quality, Delivery and Cost for the FPU departments', 'Qualifications', 'Skills, Knowledge, Experience, and Qualifications Required for the Role', 'The Operational Coach is a key, senior level position, reporting directly to the IPT lead. The incumbent must have previous experience in vaccine blending and aseptic filling. The requirements below are representative of the expected knowledge, skill and ability', 'Required:', '•\tDemonstrated success as a team leader is essential and experience in leading leaders is preferred', '•\tDegree in Science or related technical field with a minimum of 8 years combined experience.', '•\tMinimum of 5 years working with ERP, SAP and MRP environments', '•\tMinimum of 5 years’ hands on experience with all of the following: change control management; coordination and oversight of technical work effort; and risk and opportunity management.', '•\tMust have knowledge of full manufacturing lifecycle from start to finish.', '•\tExperience leading manufacturing teams through quick-turn projects managing technical, schedule and costs.', '•\tRequires professional written and verbal communication skills including briefings and presentations.', '•\tStrong interpersonal skills in order to lead, collaborate and work effectively with all levels of internal and external customers.', '•\tWillingness and ability to travel domestically and internationally.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 5 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'The Market Access division acts as both educators and advocates for the products, processes, and practices that help MSD revolutionize medicine across the globe. Our tenacious, assertive group of individuals uses a deep understanding of the healthcare market in order to build collaborative relationships with the business leaders, customers, and legislative powers that help cultivate positive uptake of and education about MSD’s products throughout the world.', 'The Market Access Manager is part of the Market Access Team and reports to the Market Access Director. This position is located in Polish market and requires knowledge of the market, local authorities and language.', 'The Market Access Manager is accountable for building and maintaining access to top customers (MoH/NHF authorities). It requires management of national access strategy for new and already existing on the market MSD products in close collaboration with medical and marketing departments. The individual defines payer strategy for all products in the scope of his/her responsibility, leads comprehensive, national pricing and reimbursement negotiations with MoH', 'Qualifications', '• Manage and drive Market Access for MSD products to optimize their commercial potential', '• Represent Market Access in cross-functional teams locally and nationally', '• Pricing and Reimbursement for MSD products towards SLV – the P&R; agency', '• Work closely with Top Scientific Leaders and global teams to develop and optimize business opportunities', '• Contribute to the development of account management with market access support', '• Build and maintain relationships with targeted national/regional stakeholders, key experts and influencers to capture customer insights that lead to impactful actions', '• Initiate and lead selected projects with scientific content; clinical, economic and/or patient reported outcomes', '• Propose business oriented actions based on an understanding of changes in the health care system and the consequences of these changes for MSD', '• Ensure that all market access activities, while supporting the overall commercial objectives, are in compliance with internal policies and external rules/regulations', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', '#LI-DNI', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['For our Belgian Human Resources organization we are currently recruiting a:', 'Human Resources Lead', 'Based in Heist-op-den-Berg', 'MSD in Heist-op-den-Berg', 'The site in Heist-op-den-Berg is manufacturing and packaging innovative prescription and consumer care drugs. 31 6 510 282 82 or via e-mail:', 'ralph.salden@msd.com', 'Application', 'If you are interested in this challenging role, you are invited to apply online by uploading your resume and application description: ['MSD Tiergesundheit ist mit über 50 Standorten ein weltweit tätiges, forschungsorientiertes Unternehmen mit einem breiten Spektrum an Veterinärmedizin und Dienstleistungen.', 'Unser Ziel ist es, Werte zu schaffen und zum stetigen Erfolg unserer Kunden beizutragen. Kurz gesagt: Wir zielen darauf ab, das Vertrauen unserer Kunden jeden Tag neu zu gewinnen. Indem wir die Bedürfnisse aller Interessensgruppen aufnehmen und die Kundenzufriedenheit im Fokus unseres Geschäfts steht, bieten wir innovative, hoch qualitative und vor allen Dingen lösungsorientierte Produkte und Dienstleistungen für Nutz- und Heimtiere an.', 'Zur Verstärkung unseres Teams am Standort München - Unterschleißheim suchen wir ab sofort und in Vollzeit einen Techniker (m/w/d) für den Bereich Verpackung von Arzneimitteln.', 'Ihre Hauptaufgaben beinhalten:', 'Ursachenanalyse und Fehlerbehebung bei technischen Störungen der Verpackungsanlagen', 'Ansprechpartner bei technischen Fragestellungen', 'Umrüstung der Verpackungslinien im Rahmen von Formatwechseln', 'Wartung und Instandhaltung des Maschinenparks in der Verpackung', 'Unterstützung bei der Durchführung von Prozessoptimierungen', 'Unterstützung bei der Auswahl, Beschaffung und Implementierung neuer Verpackungsanlagen', 'Unterstützung bei der Umsetzung neuer Qualitäts- oder Sicherheitsanforderungen an den Verpackungsanlagen', 'Mitarbeit an den Verpackungsanlagen', 'Qualifications', 'Als erfolgreicher Kandidat für diese Stelle bringen Sie idealerweise folgende Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten mit:', 'Erfolgreich abgeschlossene Berufsausbildung - vorzugsweise zum Mechatroniker (m/w/d) oder Elektroniker (m/w/d) mit fundierten mechanischen Kenntnissen oder eine vergleichbare Qualifikation mit entsprechender Erfahrung', 'Organisierte und selbstständige Arbeitsweise sowie ausgeprägte Teamfähigkeit', 'Gute Kommunikationsfähigkeiten', 'Grundkenntnisse der englischen Sprache sind wünschenswert', 'Kreativität und hohe Motivation sich in neue technische Aufgaben einzuarbeiten', 'Erfahrung im Bereich der Automatisierungstechnik und/oder Pneumatik ist von Vorteil', 'Erste praktische Erfahrungen im Bereich Verpackung, idealerweise in der Pharma- oder Lebensmittelindustrie sind wünschenswert', 'Bereitschaft zur Arbeit im 2-Schichtmodell', 'Was wir Ihnen bieten:', 'Sehr gute Zukunftsaussichten an einem wachsenden pharmazeutischen Produktionsstandort', 'Attraktive Sozialleistungen wie z. B. betriebliche Altersvorsorge, verlängerte Lohnfortzahlung im Krankheitsfall und vieles mehr', 'Angenehmes Arbeiten in einem erfahrenen, interdisziplinären Team', 'Technische Weiterbildung durch die Tätigkeit an verschiedensten Verpackungsanlagen, sowie durch interne und externe Schulungen', 'Wir haben Ihr Interesse geweckt und Sie möchten Teil einer wachsenden und sich entwickelnden Organisation werden? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre Bewerbungsunterlagen über unsere Karriereseite.', 'Ihre Rolle bei MSD ist von entscheidender Bedeutung, um der Welt dabei zu helfen, neue Durchbrüche zu erzielen, die kommende Generationen betreffen. Wir zählen auf Ihre Fähigkeiten und Ihren Erfindungsreichtum, um einen bedeutsamen Beitrag zum weltweiten medizinischen Fortschritt zu leisten. Bei MSD erfinden wir fürs Leben.', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen:', 'MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. Bitte keine Anrufe oder E-Mails. Alle Lebensläufe, die von Personalberatungen per E-Mail, im Internet oder in irgendeiner Form und/oder Methode an einen Mitarbeiter von MSD gesendet werden, ohne dass eine gültige schriftliche Vermittlungsvereinbarung für diese Position besteht, gelten als alleiniges Eigentum von MSD. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Temporary', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BRINNY', "MSD Brinny is a leading facility for the development, testing and manufacturing of new biologics and vaccines, exporting to over 90 countries across the world. With a team of approximately 500 people, MSD Brinny specialises in the late-stage development and commercial supply of biotech products, including some of the company's most successful and life-changing treatments for oncology, hepatitis C and rheumatoid arthritis.", 'The Brinny site has been a vibrant part of the local Innishannon community for nearly 35 years and is now one of the region’s largest employers. MSD has invested €130m in the site since 2016 as a result of increased global demand for MSD medicines and vaccines which will see MSD Brinny further expand its production facilities and capacity to meet this demand.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'Purpose of Role:', 'The Associate Director of Engineering plays a key strategic role leading a diverse, energetic and enthused team of engineering professionals. The role has overall responsibility for:', 'Electrical Department', 'Energy Management', 'Reliability Team', 'Process Safety Team (including equipment safety and site permit office)', 'Drawing Office', 'Project Engineering team', 'Emergency Response and Security systems', 'The Engineering team will function as a High Performing Organisation and act as a Centre of Expertise for Engineering excellence. This is a high profile strategic leadership role with signifincant above site exposure.', 'Activities Within Role:', 'The Associate Director will work closely with cross-functional onsite teams including Operations, Facility Management, I.T, Strategic Partners and Engineering projects and will ensure a strong partnership with above site functions such as Global Engineering, Reliability, Energy, EHS, and Technical operations. Thereby ensuring that the site has best in class infrastructure and systems to manufacture and supply of Quality pharmaceutical products in meeting our Manufacturing Division priorities of Compliance, Supply, Strategy and Profit Plan.', 'Responsible for Engineering Centre of Excellence, including performance management, prioritisation of resource assignments, recruitment, mentoring and supervision.', 'Champion effective employee relations and communication within the department, while demonstrating a flexible management style.', 'Promote a positive employee environment by open communication, engagement and development of team members.', 'Select and develop a talented and competent team of Engineering Professionals.', 'Coach and mentor team members and others outside of the designated team.', 'Develop SMEs (subject matter experts) as necessary to both foster initiatives in strategic areas.', 'Agree and drive engineering excellence by setting clear direction and expectations for performance. Take appropriate and timely corrective action if adverse trends begin to emerge.', 'Prioritizes and drives execution of multiple complex departmental projects.', 'Provide leadership and direction to team on process improvements, address obstacles, provide resources and interact with other areas of the organsiation to assist the team in overcoming problems and streamlining the work process as part of a structured continuous improvement program.', 'Development of a world class-manufacturing group that is proficient in process improvement and problem solving.', 'Collaborate with the Capital Projects Team to ensure that all new projects are introduced into production in compliance of site EHS and Engineering standards and are operationally successful.', 'Development of, and management of personnel.', 'Lead and/or represents the function in periodic business metric reviews.', 'Initiates cross-functional/site partnerships to identify and resolve engineering issues.', 'Actively interfaces all other sites, 3rd part Vendors / Suppliers in pursuit of achieving business targets.', 'Observing the Quality and EHS Management Systems requirements on site at all times.', 'Keeps oneself well-informed of all relevant technological advancements that could offer Brinny competitive advantage.', 'Be an active participant within the Engineering Department sharing Engineering best practices with the site.', 'Ensure supply of high quality product through equipment availability, maximize performance of Utility equipment and identify/implement continuous process improvement initiatives.', 'Ensure highest Quality & Compliance Standards.', 'Provide Engineering expertise within the Emgomeering Team covering a wide range of projects such as the introduction of new equipment, improvements to existing processes etc.', 'Participate and Comply with our Quality Management System (QMS) requirements, including ownership.', 'Prioritisation of proposed mitigation plans and/or acceptance of Quality Risks identified as part of the Quality Risk Management Process under the remit of decision maker roles and responsibilities.', 'All other duties as assigned.', 'Continuous description: ["As Associate Director / Health Economist you are part of Denmark's strongest health-economic team in an international and well-consolidated company whose ambition is to be one of the fastest growing drug companies in Denmark. You set the agenda for the dissemination of the company's work through relationship building to medical and non-medical decision-makers as well as other relevant health-economic stakeholders.", 'Your main tasks are to coordinate and conduct health-economic analysis. You involve external and internal resources to ensure progress in the projects. You are also responsible for communicating the scientific evidence of analyzes. The persons you primarily communicate with externally are medical and health-economic decision-makers in regional and national institutions.', 'Internally at MSD, your relationships are local, regional and global. Part of your area of responsibility is also to lead national and international strategic projects, just as you also participate in projects led by others.', 'You have the courage to express your opinions and you have your social values in order. With your winning mindset and good collaboration skills, you can inspire, motivate and challenge your surrounding both externally and internally. You are able to generate momentum and significant results through your visions, ideas and your methodical approach to the tasks. You have a relevant academic education as well as a good network and good knowledge of the health sector from a research community, consultancy or public authority.', 'In addition, you have solid health economics understanding. You are able to think and act strategically and you both have the desire and talent to plan and communicate health-economic analyzes and contexts also to those who do not have this as a primary task.', 'You are offered a challenging and varied workday, where only your abilities limit the nature of your work and your results. Your work will be versatile and outgoing. You are part of a team of skilled and committed colleagues, thus you get the opportunity to be challenged and developed both professionally and personally.', 'Qualifications', 'Academic:', 'for example Master’s degree in Political Science, Economics or Social Health Sciences.', 'Professional', 'Experience:', '2-5 years of experience in a relevant position, preferably in public domain, or other institutions with influence on the decision making process (Ministry of Health, Ministry of Finance, National Board of Health etc.)', 'Preferably well-established network in Ministries, Regions, Organizations.', 'Good understanding of influencing patterns in healthcare organizations. Good understanding of instruments of decision making processes in the healthcare environment. Good understanding of market dynamics and health economics. Understand how products address clinical needs. Good knowledge of ethical rules within health care and public administration.', 'Competencies:', 'Strong interpersonal, networking, and team-building skills. Opportunity-driven mindset. Strong strategic planning, analytical and administrative skills. Ability to be responsive to meet the needs of creative suggestions. Drive and own responsibility for optimizing. Personal leadership and good knowledge of project management. Ability to work effectively in a matrix organization. Unafraid to collaborate and interact with persons with authority and to try new opportunities internally and externally. Make rapid, disciplined decisions. A self- starter – independent of direct manager.', 'Language:', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills in English and Danish.', 'About MSD in the Nordics', 'For over 125 years and counting MSD has revolutionised global health care. Today, more than 800 people work for MSD in the Nordics alone. Innovation is our life’s blood, and you will be a part of developing new and customer centric health care solutions that go beyond medicine to help people be well and live better lives during treatment. We have a strong pipeline of products within medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies and animal health products. We work every day to make healthcare accessible to as many as possible, which requires top talent within both R&D;, marketing, finance, health economy and policy shaping. Globally, we operate in 140 countries and demonstrate our commitment to increasing access to health care through far-reaching policies, programs and partnerships.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'No', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Shape and implement MSD’s market access position for vaccines and hospital care products (HCV, HIV and Immunology) - reimbursement, guidelines, recommendations, outcome research and registries - in order to address the health care systems aspirations to apply more evidence in healthcare decision-making.', 'Develop and maintain a strong network and cooperate with both medical and non-medical decision makers within the National Healthcare environment. Explain the value of MSD product to relevant decision makers; KOLs, Healthcare employers, authorities, healthcare organizations and political institutions. In cooperation with the medical and commercial colleagues plan and execute outcome research and registry investigations and healthcare financial analysis for existing and future products.', 'The right candidate enjoys being challenged over and over again, but also to have fun in a good team spirit and cooperation.', 'MSD invest heavily in the development of their people, and gives plenty of opportunities for individual initiative and responsibility. The right candidate can expect a rapid career path within MSD.', 'Coordinate and facilitate production of real world evidence to support MSD products. Lead priority projects on evidence demonstration to tangible results. Establish collaboration with KOLs, health care institutions and internal stakeholders. Meet doctors, medical- and financial responsible decision makers in the health care system. Build trust with decision makers. Good', 'understanding of instruments of decision making processes in the healthcare environment. Good understanding of market dynamics and health economics. Understand how products address clinical needs. Good knowledge of ethical rules within health care and public administration.', 'Competencies:', 'Strong interpersonal, networking, and team-building skills. Opportunity-driven mindset. Strong strategic planning, analytical and administrative skills. Ability to be responsive to meet the needs of creative suggestions.  Drive and own responsibility for optimizing. Personal leadership and good knowledge of project management. Ability to work effectively in a matrix organization. Unafraid to collaborate and interact with persons with authority and to try new opportunities internally and externally. Make rapid, disciplined decisions. A self- starter – independent of direct manager.', 'Language:', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills in English and Danish.', 'Proven hands-on experience and a strong track record delivering successful digital marketing tools and communication solutions to relevant customer groups', 'Geographical coverage:', 'Local position based in Copenhagen', 'Travel:', 'A small amount of travel in relation to internal education, meetings, conferences etc.', 'Point of Contact:', 'Simon Leth', 'About MSD in the Nordics', 'For over 125 years and counting MSD has revolutionised global health care. Today, more than 800 people work for MSD in the Nordics alone. Innovation is our life’s blood, and you will be a part of developing new and customer centric health care solutions that go beyond medicine to help people be well and live better lives during treatment. We have a strong pipeline of products within medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies and animal health products. We work every day to make healthcare accessible to as many as possible, which requires top talent within both R&D;, marketing, finance, health economy and policy shaping. Globally, we operate in 140 countries and demonstrate our commitment to increasing access to health care through far-reaching policies, programs and partnerships. description: ['The department', "MSD Corporate Audit and Assurance Services' (MCAAS) primary purpose is to provide value-added independent and risk based audit and assurance services.", 'The position', 'Under the direction of the Client Audit Director ("CAD") and the Auditor-in-Charge ("AIC"), the Audit Specialist will:', 'Participate in the execution of financial, operational, SOX 404 and IT audits, integrated audits and process audits, both domestic and abroad to maintain a strong internal control environment at MSD.', 'Under the direction of the AIC, partner with colleagues and clients, support groups, and other organizations to effectively complete all assigned audit work.', 'Execute audit programs and work papers (including walkthroughs and sample testing) in line with the established quality standards and timelines.', 'Collaborate with the audit team in the writing of audit summaries of issues and reports which accurately describe identified control concerns, associated risks, and appropriate recommendations.', 'Participate in department projects and ensure the realization of the specified results.', 'Maintain the highest standards of professionalism and independence in the execution of duties with the highest level of integrity and quality. Show good judgment in the conduct of work.', 'Qualifications', 'Desired skills & experience', 'Education:', "Bachelor's degree in accounting/finance.", 'Required Experience and Skills:', 'A minimum of 2 years of Audit experience (internal audit and / or public accounting).', 'Excellent interpersonal skills, including the ability to interact effectively with client and business process owners as well as MCAAS colleagues.', 'Effective oral and written communication skills.', 'Understanding of information technology and ability to use various applications and systems.', 'Strong time management skills and the ability to work within a team as well as independently.', 'Attention to detail and the ability to multi-task are essential to this position.', 'Ability to travel both domestically and internationally up to 50% of the time.', 'Preferred:', 'CPA or pursuing a CPA.', 'Big 4 or Regional Accounting Firm Experience.', 'About MSD', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. Today, we are building a new kind of healthcare company – one that is ready to help create a healthier future for all of us. Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of an individual like you. To this end, we strive to create an environment of mutual respect, encouragement and teamwork.  As part of our global team, you’ll have the opportunity to collaborate with talented and dedicated colleagues while developing and expanding your career.', 'MSD. Be well. For more information, visit our website:', 'www.werkenbijmsd.nl', 'A good place to work', 'Our employees are the key to our company’s success. We demonstrate our commitment to our employees by offering a competitive and valuable rewards program. Our Company’s benefits are designed to support the wide range of goals, needs and lifestyles of our employees, and many of the people that matter the most in their lives.', 'Information', 'For further information regarding this position, please contact Christiaan van den Bosch, (Corporate Recruiter) phone +31 624 474 717.', 'Application', 'If you are interested in this challenging role, you are requested to apply online by uploading your resume and application letter in English.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 50 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['De afdeling', 'MSD Animal Health produceert virale levende vaccins volgens strikte GMP-normen. Het Integrated Proces Team (IPT) heeft als afdelingen Tissue Culture Boxmeer en De Bilt, Sphereon, Central Filling & Freeze Drying (CFFD) en de ondersteunende activiteiten Planning, Maintenance & Reliability en Improvement.', 'Drie CFFD teams zijn verantwoordelijk voor de productie van ongeveer 40 levende vaccins voor pluimvee, grote dieren en kleine gezelschapsdieren. Dit zijn gevriesdroogde preparaten in flesjes welke worden gevuld in steriele ruimtes volgens strenge normen. CFFD telt 110 medewerkers in ploegendienst die samen meer dan 80 miljoen stuks per jaar produceren. Onze afdeling wordt gekenmerkt door de prettige werksfeer. Je krijgt een gedegen inwerktraject en er zijn volop doorgroeimogelijkheden.', 'IPT Viral Live produceert virale levende vaccins (antigenen & half-fabrikaat) volgens strikte GMP-normen. Onder deze IPT vallen de volgende afdeling: Tissue Culture Boxmeer en De Bilt, Sphereon, Central Filling & Freeze Drying (CFFD) en de ondersteunende activiteiten Planning, Maintenance & Reliability en Improvement. Drie CFFD teams zijn verantwoordelijk voor de productie van ongeveer 40 levende vaccins voor pluimvee, grote dieren en kleine gezelschapsdieren bestemd voor Europa en de rest van de wereld. Virale en bacteriële antigenen worden verwerkt tot stabiele gevriesdroogde preparaten in flesjes, meestal in steriele ruimtes volgens strenge normen. Ongeveer 700 partijen worden geproduceerd op jaarbasis. CFFD telt 100 medewerkers in ploegendienst die samen meer dan 60 miljoen stuks per jaar produceren.', 'Qualifications', 'Je hoofdtaak bestaat uit het zelfstandig en accuraat uitvoeren van alle werkzaamheden,', 'die nodig zijn om het geplande vaccin af te vullen binnen de gestelde eisen en tijdslijnen.', 'Je houdt daarbij toezicht op de kwaliteit, erkent afwijkingen, communiceert en rapporteert deze.  Je houdt je bezig met verbetering van processen en methodieken (improvement) en assisteert daarin de Operational Coach, Product Specialist en SME-Q’s. Het afvullen van de vaccins vindt plaats in faciliteiten die voldoen aan de hoogste eisen voor veiligheid en GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice). De werkzaamheden worden uitgevoerd in A-, B-cleanrooms en in D-cleanrooms. Het team bestaat uit ca. 45 personen die allen rapporteren aan drie OC’s (Operational Coach).', 'Hoofdtaken:', 'Kan worden ingezet op alle deelprocessen binnen de afdeling (formuleren, afvullen, cappen en visueel inspecteren', 'Ondersteuning voor Product Specialist en/of Operational Coach bij rapportage/trending /problem solving', 'Betrokken bij probleemanalyses van grondstof tot eindproduct en het oplossen hiervan, daarbij gebruik makende en faciliteren van MPS technieken zoals Scientific Problem Solving of Kaizen', 'Verricht personele taken als het begeleiden van nieuwe medewerkers, heb maken van een personeelsplanning en het fungeren als aanspreekpunt voor operators', 'Registreren en opvolgen van afwijkingen ten opzichte van voorschriften, procedures en/of SOP’s en bij storingen of afwijkingen in de te gebruiken apparatuur. En eventueel hieruit volgend verbeterplan te implementeren', 'Betrokken bij transfers van bestaande en nieuwe producten en optimalisaties', 'Stuurt validatie, calibratie en onderhoud aan, begeleidt deze en ziet toe dat dit volgens protocol wordt uitgevoerd', 'Bestellen van materialen en opboeken van eindproduct met behulp van SAP', 'Functie-eisen:', 'Tenminste MBO 4 Bioprocestechnologie of proceskunde of hoger', 'Je hebt tenminste 2 jaar ervaring in farma/food en ervaring met vriesdrogen of microbiologische/biochemische kweekprocessen', 'Je bent bij voorkeur fulltime inzetbaar maar tenminste 80%GMP ervaring en ervaring in een cleanroom is een pre', 'Heeft technische kennis of affiniteit met techniek', 'Yellow belt certificering is een pre', 'Je bent Stress bestendig, gemotiveerd, leergierig, analytisch ingesteld en veranderingsgezind', 'Ervaring met Microsoft office, trackwise en SAP', 'Extra aandachtspunten', ':', 'Er worden meerdere processen en activiteiten tegelijkertijd uitgevoerd in volle ruimtes en dit in combinatie met vele kortstondige nauwkeurige handelingen', 'Dragen van steriele pakken onder voorgeschreven kledingprocedures', 'De functie wordt uitgevoerd in een 7 daags ploegendienst rooster. Dat betekent dat je zeer regelmatig op zaterdag en zondag zult werken. Werktijden zijn van 06:00 tot 14:30 uur en van 14:00 – 22:30 uur', 'Bereid tot overwerken en consignatiedienst indien noodzakelijk', 'Informatie:', 'Voor informatie over deze vacature neem je contact op met Marten Buter (Operational Coach CFFD) op +31 06 11061780. Voor vragen over de procedure neem je op met de recruiter via', 'ragna.post@merck.com', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Voor Biotech Oss zijn we op zoek naar een:', 'Automation Specialist', 'Over MSD', 'Het MSD van vandaag is wereldleider op het gebied van gezondheidszorg en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze geneesmiddelen, vaccins, biologische therapieën en ondersteunende diensten bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We zijn actief betrokken bij een betere toegang tot de gezondheidszorg. Dat doen we met uitgebreid beleid, programma’s en samenwerkingsverbanden. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4000 medewerkers op drie verschillende hoofdlocaties.', 'Voor meer informatie ga naar', 'www.werkenbijmsd.nl', 'MSD Biotech', 'Bij MSD Biotech Operations in Oss worden actieve bestanddelen van medicijnen gemaakt. Quality IPT Upstream is de kwaliteitsafdeling die productgericht toezicht houdt op de Upstream productie afdeling (USP). USP is de Biotech afdeling waar actieve bestanddelen door het kweken van levende cellen of micro organismen in speciale reactoren worden gemaakt. Vervolgens worden ze in de afdeling Downstream Processing (DSP) gezuiverd. Het toezicht houden gebeurd door het reviewen van batchrecords en aanverwante systemen en door aanwezigheid op de productie afdeling.', 'Kijk voor meer informatie over MSD Biotech Oss naar bijgaande video', 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzzdXlQNzYY', 'De afdeling', 'Binnen de afdeling Biotech Technical Operations bevindt zich het Site Automation Team. Deze groep fungeert als Center of Excelence voor Automation technologie. De groep ondersteunt de verschillende afdelingen binnen de Biotech Devisie in Oss betreffende beleid, onderhoud, innovatie en investeringsprojecten op het gebied van automatisering. Verder beheert dit team enkele overkoepelende automatiseringssystemen binnen de Biotech devisie zoals: Environmental Monitoring System, Building Automation System, Osisoft PI en SBOL.', 'De functie', 'Als onderdeel van het site Automation team en rapporterend aan de Site Automation Lead, voltooit de Automation Specialist (intern: Associate Specialist Automation) zelfstandig', 'of onderverantwoordelijkheid taken gerelateerd aan site automationsystemen t.b.v. het produceren (direct of indirect) van de Biotechnologische MSD producten. De Automation Specialist fungeert als een intermediar tussen de verschillende productieafdelingen en CoEs op het gebied van Automation. Dit omvat:', 'Uitvoeren van operationeel beheer taken van een of meer systemen in het Biotech Automation domein.', 'Verantwoordelijk voor de ondersteuning, continuïteit, beschikbaarheid, validatie, innovatie en geautoriseerd gebruik van Biotech centrale automation systemen.', 'Voert change control, incident & problem management, gebruikersbeheer, performance management en training uit voor een of meer Biotech automation systemen.', 'Geeft leiding aan kleine automatiseringsprojecten en zorgt voor afstemming leverancier en system integrator.', 'Participatie in middelgrote en/of grote complexe multi disciplinaire projecten als kennisdrager voor industriële automatisering voor de implementatie van nieuwe systemen of uitbreiding aan reeds bestaande systemen. De taken in deze projecten omvat onder andere het opstellen/beoordelen van scope, ontwerp, C&Q; documentatie en begeleiding en/of het uitvoeren van test werkzaamheden.', 'Expertise bieden in automatisering- en projectdocumentatie volgens MSD-richtlijnen (System Development Lifecycle (SDLC).', 'Initieert projecten en verbetervoorstellen vanuit compliance of business gedreven behoefte en vertaalt deze naar automatiseringsoplossingen.', 'Verantwoordelijk voor het houden van de focus op veiligheid, gezondheid en milieu. Toezicht houden op de naleving en actief bevorderen van het bereiken van verbeteringen op het gebied van zorg voor veiligheid, gezondheid en milieu.', 'Voldoen aan MSD QMS System Development Lifecycle (SDLC);', 'Monitoring en verspreiding van lokale en internationale normen en standaarden op het gebied van procesautomatisering (GAMP, 21CFRPart11, Data Integrity, etc.)', 'Qualifications', '•', 'Een afgeronde Technische HBO opleiding (bijvoorkeur Industriele Automatisering);', '•', 'Kennis van systemen zoals Siemens PLC en DCS (S7/PCS7), SCADA (iFix / WinCC), industriele netwerken (Profibus, Profinet);', '•', 'Affiniteiten met industrie gedrevenen ontwikkelingen (ISPE, Industrie 4.0)', '•', 'Ervaring in Life Sience Industry (o.a. cGMP, Safety, Validatie);', '•', 'Projectmanagementvaardigheden en bewezen vermogen om projecten te beheren;', '•', 'Klantgericht, procesgericht en data driven;', '•', 'Werkt graag in teamverband;', '•', 'Passie voor Lean en Continuous Improvement; (Certified Yellow Belt)', '•', 'Sterke mondelinge en schriftelijke communicatievaardigheden in zowel Nederlands als Engels;', '•', 'Je sociale en communicatieve vaardigheden zijn goed ontwikkeld;', '•', 'Je toont overtuigingskracht en pro activiteit.', 'Informatie', 'Voor nadere informatie over deze functie kun je contact opnemen met Joris van Schayk, Sr. specialist automation, op telefoonnummer 0412-666338', 'Sollicitatie', 'Als je interesse hebt in deze functie, nodigen we je uit om online je curriculum vitae en een motivatiebrief te versturen.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Automation Specialist - Technical Operations Job

description: ['Our Animal Health division works to improve the health of animals around the world through collaborative partnerships and a deep sense of responsibility towards our customers, consumers, animals, society, and our planet. This team of energetic, independent thinkers offers one of the industry’s most innovative portfolios of products, services, and technologies that serve to prevent, treat, and control diseases across all major farm and companion animal species both domestically and internationally.', 'As part of our clinical research team and reporting to the Director Biostatistics, we are looking for a', 'Scientific Data Manager (m/f/d)', 'to join our team in Schwabenheim, office based (Full-time, indefinite).', 'The Scientific Data Manager will be responsible for:', 'Writing study-specific data management plans', 'Developing and maintaining databases to collect and retain clinical study data for laboratory challenge and clinical field trials for pharmaceutical and biological veterinary compounds by good Data Management practices', 'Collaborating with the Clinical Research Assistants (CRA) on the design of the Data Capture Forms and the establishment of data entry screens', 'Setting up and running UATs (User Acceptance Tests)', 'You will be responsible for the comparison of the two independently entered data (“confrontation”) and will collaborate with the Clinical Research Manager (CRM) to resolve data entry differences', 'Programming and running edit checks and testing the integrity and consistency of the data', 'You will collaborate with the CRM and CRA on data findings and resolve these via data queries with the Investigator site', 'Evaluating protocol deviations for effect on data analysis and interpreting the results', 'Tracking and transferring of external data to the primary database', 'You will develop and implement processes to allow studies to be conducted paperless by using an Electronic Data Capture system', 'Qualifications', 'Bachelor of Science in Data Management, Management Information Systems (MIS), Biological or Clinical Sciences, Statistics, or equivalent. Alternatively, professional education (e.g. Medical Documentation) with several years of professional experience', 'Expertise on the Clinsight software or another Data Management Software', 'Experience with Data Management processes', 'Electronic Data Capture', 'Knowledge of CDISC CDASH/SDTM', 'Basic knowledge of a programming or query language (SAS, R, SQL)', 'Knowledge of Clinical Research, Clinical Trials, GCP and GLP in Animal Health', 'Strong interpersonal skills, negotiation skills, communication skills and teamwork focus', 'Self-organized and structured working style', 'Fluency in English; German Knowledge is desired', 'We offer:', 'An exciting opportunity within a stable and growing company', 'Development and career opportunities within the company', 'A competent, motivated and great team', 'Interested in becoming part of a dynamic, developing team and contributing your know-how to an innovative environment that allows you to show initiative and that offers long-term perspectives? Please apply using the link to our career site!', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD’s Animal Health (MAH) division works to improve the health of animals around the world through collaborative partnerships and a deep sense of responsibility towards our customers, consumers, animals, society, and our planet. This team of energetic, independent thinkers offers one of the industry’s most innovative portfolios of products, services, and technologies that serve to prevent, treat, and control diseases across all major farm and companion animal species both domestically and internationally.', 'We are looking for an experienced Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) Senior Specialist for a recently acquisitioned site. Building, principle utilities and systems are existing and in the next 4-5 years innovative and state-of-the-art biological processes and processing equipment will be installed.', 'Reporting to the Director EHS, the Senior Specialist will be responsible for specific environmental health and safety programs and compliance for the Biologics manufacturing site Krems, Austria. MSD offers attractive career opportunities within the EHS function in Austria and on international level.', 'Responsibilities include but will not be limited to the following main tasks:', 'Provide technical support and coordination in defining and implementing site EH&S; systems for the site. This entails guiding and directing site support efforts, communicating to the site staff and sub groups and providing in addition to obtaining site EH&S; inputs where required.', 'Prioritize EH&S; related risks and develop and assist with implementing corrective action and preventive action plans. Monitor and communicate overall status of plans to Site Management.', 'Proactively identify improvement opportunities and collaborate with other EHS staff/ Engineering/and Operations personnel to leverage best practices and drive continuous improvement efforts', 'Ensures ongoing evaluation of changes in Safety Regulatory requirements. Develops and implements site positions and strategies to ensure 100% compliance with all current and future safety requirements as and when they arise.', 'Ensures that site systems are in place to maintain 100% site compliance with all Safety and Environmental Regulations and Programs and are aligned with global safety and environment expectations.', 'Establish and maintain excellent communication processes to ensure management, occupational health, and affected employees understand the workplace hazards, exposures, and accompanying risks, as well as the needed control strategies.', 'Provide technical support for new projects and modifications to ensure proper EH&S; design review, as well as routine /maintenance evaluation after process / equipment installed / implemented.', 'Conduct independent inspections of facilities and practices, as required, for conformance with Site, Corporate and/or Statutory safety requirements. Ensures Operations are carried out in accordance with required standards of safety and in adherence to all relevant Company Policies and Procedures', 'Develop and implement effective EH&S-related; training programs for both management and employees.', 'Qualifications', 'Bachelor’s degree in an environmental or safety related technical discipline', 'Minimum 5 years of experience in a similar role within a highly regulated manufacturing environment', 'Previous experience in leading project teams with and/or without managerial responsibility is advantageous', 'Documented knowledge of EU and Austrian EHS laws and regulatory framework', 'Clear and recognizable understanding of the processes, equipment and methods associated with Biologics and Sterile manufacturing', 'Proven ability to develop sustainable cooperative professional relationships on all levels of the organization', 'Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills', 'High ethical standards, being a role model of business compliance and integrity', 'Proven ability to prioritize, focus on and obtain business results', 'Demonstrated analytical and logical problem solving abilities', 'Flexibility to perform multiple, complex tasks simultaneously to efficiently support the business', 'Fluency in written and spoken German and English', 'Preferred Experience and Skills:', 'Relevant professional certification(s)', 'Lean/Six Sigma experience desirable', 'Vision and sound judgment; ability to develop strategy and execute tactically', 'Robust skills interpreting and applying regulatory frameworks such as EU OSHA, OHSAS 18000, EPA, ISO, NFPA, GMP', 'Robust skills interpreting and applying regulatory frameworks', 'The minimum annual salary for this position is EUR 50’000 and varies according to the qualifications and experience of the successful candidate.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']
