description: ['MSD Manufacturing Division ist ein Team von engagierten, energiegeladenen Personen, die sich dazu verpflichtet haben, weltweit der vertrauenswürdigste Anbieter von Arzneimitteln und Gesundheitsprodukten zu sein. Unsere Einrichtungen, zusammen mit unseren externen Auftragnehmern, Lieferanten und Partnern, umfassen ein voneinander abhängiges globales Fertigungsnetzwerk, das sich zu einer konformen, zuverlässigen Versorgung von Kunden und Patienten pünktlich und jederzeit auf der ganzen Welt verpflichtet hat.', 'Für unsere neue Produktionsstätte in Krems suchen wir eine/n', 'Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) Senior Specialist (m/w/d)', 'Vollzeit, ab sofort', 'Der leitende Spezialist ist dem Direktor EHS unterstellt und wird für die spezifischen Umwelt-, Gesundheits- und Sicherheitsprogramme und die Compliance des Biologics-Produktionsstandortes Krems, Österreich, verantwortlich sein. MSD bietet attraktive Karrieremöglichkeiten innerhalb der EHS-Funktion in Österreich und auf internationaler Ebene.', 'Zu Ihrem Aufgaben- und Verantwortungsbereich in dieser neugeschaffenen Position zählen:', 'Technische Unterstützung und Koordination bei der Definition und Implementierung von EHS-Systemen für den Standort.', 'Durchführung von EHS Risikoanalysen, Unterstützung bei der Entwicklung und Umsetzung von Korrektur- und Präventionsplänen sowie Berichtspflicht darüber an das Standort Management.', 'Finden von Verbesserungsmöglichkeiten und Kooperation mit anderen Mitarbeitern von EHS / Engineering / Operations, um Best Practices zu nutzen und kontinuierliche Verbesserung zu erzielen.', 'Gewährleistung der fortlaufenden Bewertung von Änderungen der Sicherheitsanforderungen. Entwicklung und Implementierung von Standortstrategien, um sicherzustellen, dass alle aktuellen und zukünftigen Sicherheitsanforderungen zu 100% eingehalten werden.', 'Sicherstellung von stabilen Systemen am Standort, um die Einhaltung aller rechtlichen Sicherheits- und Umweltvorschriften zu gewährleisten und mit den globalen Sicherheits- und Umwelterwartungen übereinzustimmen.', 'Etablierung von exzellenten Kommunikationsprozesse, um sicherzustellen, dass alle am Standort die Gefahren am Arbeitsplatz, die Expositionen und die damit verbundenen Risiken sowie die erforderlichen Kontrollstrategien verstehen.', 'Unterstützung für neue Projekte und Änderungen, um eine ordnungsgemäße Evaluierung der EHS Aspekte zu gewährleisten.', 'Durchführung von regelmäßigen Rundgängen und Überprüfungen um sicherzustellen, dass der Standort alle EHS Anforderungen (gesetzlich und konzernintern) erfüllt.', 'Etablierung und Durchführung von EHS Trainingsprogrammen um die Qualifizierung aller Mitarbeiter aufrecht zu erhalten.', 'Kontrolle der EHS-Dokumentation.', 'Qualifications', 'Für diese Tätigkeit bringen Sie folgende Voraussetzungen mit:', 'Abgeschlossenes Studium Fachrichtung ausgezeichnete Leadership Mentalität und Berufserfahrung im EHS-Bereich (Compliance, Safety, Health, Environment).', 'Kenntnisse der österreichischen und europäischen Rechtslage im Bereich Arbeitssicherheit und Umwelt.', 'Kenntnis der Prozesse und Methoden im Biotechnologie- und sterilen Produktionsbereich.', 'Prozessbezogene Fachkenntnisse bezüglich: Abweichungen, Change Control, Schulungen, Dokumentation, Begehungen, Audits, Vorschriften.', 'Sehr hohe Anforderungen an analytisches Denken, konzeptionelle Stärke, strukturiertes Vorgehen, Entscheidungsstärke und Integrität.', 'Sehr gute Deutsch und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift.', 'Gewünschte Zusatzqualifikationen:', 'Ausgebildete Sicherheitsfachkraft.', 'Lean/Six Sigma Kenntnisse erwünscht.', 'Managementsystemerfahrung EU OSHA, OHSAS 18000, EPA, ISO, NFPA, GMP.', 'Erfahrung im Bereich ArbeitnehmerInnenschutzgesetz, Gewerberecht und Umweltrecht.', "Das Mindestgehalt beträgt Euro 50'000 brutto/Jahr, die Bereitschaft zu Überzahlung abhängig von Qualifikationsprofil und Berufserfahrung ist gegeben.", 'Sie sind kompetent, belastbar, zuverlässig, initiativ und wollen unseren Standort in dieser intensiven Start-Up Phase der Entwicklung einer großen Produktionsstätte aktiv unterstützen? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre aussagekräftige Bewerbung über unser Bewerbungsportal!', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen:', 'MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. description: ['Voor het integrated process team (IPT) Steriles Bulk in Oss zijn we momenteel op zoek naar kandidaten voor de functie van:', 'Kwalificatie & Validatie Engineer', 'Over MSD', 'Het MSD van vandaag is wereldleider op het gebied van gezondheidszorg en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze geneesmiddelen, vaccins, biologische therapieën en ondersteunende diensten bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We zijn actief betrokken bij een betere toegang tot de gezondheidszorg. Dat doen we met uitgebreid beleid, programma’s en samenwerkingsverbanden. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4500 medewerkers op drie verschillende hoofdlocaties Oss, Haarlem en Boxmeer.', 'Voor meer informatie ga naar', 'www.werkenbijmsd.nl', 'De afdeling', 'De IPT Steriles Bulk is binnen Pharmaceutical Operations verantwoordelijk voor de productie van Steriele medicijnen. De operationele taken van het IPT reiken van het bestellen van ruwe grondstoffen tot het formuleren van geneesmiddelen (productie). De strategische focus van het IPT is op het right-first-time produceren van door de klant gevraagde producten waarbij er een sterke focus is op kwaliteit. Hierbij is continue verbeteren op basis van lean-principes leidend. Dit gebeurt in een hoog geautomatiseerde farmaceutische fabriek waarin de komende jaren heel veel geïnvesteerd wordt voor de toekomst van producten in Oss.', 'De functie', 'Als Kwalificatie & Validatie Engineer (intern: Asset Manager level 2) draag je zorg voor de gekwalificeerde status van productieapparatuur, procesinstallaties en utiliteiten die voor de productie van eindproducten worden gebruikt. Het opstellen van kwalificatieprotocollen en zorgdragen voor uitvoering van fysieke metingen aan genoemde productie apparatuur en rapportage van de kwalificatie zijn tevens onderdeel van de functie. Je genereert kalibratie-, onderhouds- en storingsgegevens ten behoeve van hervalidatie. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de archivering van alle onderhoud, kwalificatie en technische documentatie conform de geldende GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) regelgeving.', 'Daarnaast ben je (technisch) kennisdrager van de jouw assets en in die rol aanspreekbaar voor tweede lijn support en medeverantwoordelijk voor verbeteringen aan deze assets.', 'Taken en verantwoordelijkheden', 'Analyseren van de oorzaak van terugkerende problemen aan productieapparatuur en/of processen;', 'Doen van verbetervoorstellen o.b.v. analyse tot verbetering/optimalisatie inclusief de juiste implementatie van deze voorstellen volgens de van toepassing zijnde procedures;', 'Zelfstandig opstellen van alle benodigde informatie, het maken van voorstellen tot verbeterde procedures en instructies die betrekking hebben op beheer, onderhoud en bediening van apparatuur;', 'Optreden als 2e lijns troubleshooter bij complexe storingen aan genoemde apparatuur en processen;', 'Opstellen van change requests voortkomend uit technische issues en erop toezien dat wijzigingen aan directe impact systemen onder change control worden uitgevoerd;', 'Opstellen van protocollen, laten uitvoeren van testen (accepteren van het uitgevoerde werk) en opstellen van eindrapportages;', 'Optreden als projectleider voor interne IPT gerichte multidisciplinaire technische projecten ter verbetering van bestaande productieapparatuur en aanschaf van nieuwe apparatuur;', 'Optreden als Subject Matter Expert (kennisdrager) voor de complexe assets', 'Informeren en instrueren van operators en technici uit de eigen IPT over technische wijzigingen.', 'Qualifications', 'HBO Technische, Mechatronica, Bedrijfskundige of Farmaceutische achtergrond;', 'Minimaal 3 jaar relevante werkervaring in een productieomgeving (steriele ervaring en of automatiserings kennis is een pre);', 'Ervaring met en kennis van projectmanagement;', 'Ervaring in het oplossen van het zelfstandig oplossen en/ of coördineren van complexe storingen aan productieapparatuur en processen;', 'Kennis van geautomatiseerde archiefsystemen;', 'Affiniteit met het uitvoeren van fysieke metingen aan procesapparatuur en systemen;', 'Goed kwaliteits- en veiligheidsbewustzijn;', 'Resultaatgericht, innovatief vermogen en gedreven om te verbeteren;', 'Goed ontwikkelde focus op klanten, kwaliteit en compliance;', 'Zowel zelfstandig als in een teamverband kunnen werken;', 'Uitstekende communicatieve en sociale vaardigheden naar verschillende niveaus in woord als schrift.', 'Wij bieden', 'Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', '• Een competitief salaris;', '• 35,5 vakantiedagen;', '• 8% vakantietoeslag en 3% eindejaarsuitkering;', '• MSD Incentive Plan (bonus);', '• Een uitstekend pensioen;', '• Reiskostenvergoeding;', '• Verschillende trainingsmodules.', 'MSD als werkgever', 'Keer op keer nieuwe uitdagingen aangaan, dat is wel iets wat je leuk moet vinden als je bij MSD aan de slag wilt. Want continu verbeteren is een van onze drijfveren. Dat geldt zowel voor werkprocessen als voor medewerkers. Gedrevenheid, teamwork en eigen initiatief zijn van groot belang. Bij MSD kun je je op allerlei manieren ontwikkelen. In de diepte, door je te specialiseren in je vak. Maar ook door jezelf te verbreden en door te groeien naar een leidinggevende functie. Internationaal of juist heel lokaal, er zijn talloze andere mogelijkheden om stappen te zetten in je loopbaan, te rouleren in functies of te groeien in je functie. Werken bij MSD is werken in een dynamische high tech omgeving van internationale allure, die toch sterk lokaal geworteld is in Oss, Haarlem en Boxmeer.', 'Informatie', 'Voor meer informatie over deze vacature kun je contact opnemen met een van de Jaap Dragt, Senior Specialist Engineering/ Asset Management IPT Steriles Bulk, via 0412-661472', 'Solliciteren', 'Als je interesse hebt in deze uitdagende functie kun je je interesse kenbaar maken door online je CV en een motivatiebrief te versturen.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD’s Animal Health (MAH) division works to improve the health of animals around the world through collaborative partnerships and a deep sense of responsibility towards our customers, consumers, animals, society, and our planet. This team of energetic, independent thinkers offers one of the industry’s most innovative portfolios of products, services, and technologies that serve to prevent, treat, and control diseases across all major farm and companion animal species both domestically and internationally.', 'MSD Animal Health is one of the top Animal Health companies in the world, providing a broad product range, with locations in more than 50 countries and marketed products in more than 140 countries. We have a strong network of manufacturing and R&D; facilities.', 'For our new production facility in Krems we are looking for a', 'Production Planner (f/m)', '. Full-time, as soon as possible.', 'Key attributes of the Position:', 'Responsibility for the IPT-planning process end-to-end (from planning to final release)', 'Definition of mid- and short-term production plans in collaboration with Global Supply Chain', 'Translation of the monthly plan in a weekly production program in close cooperation with the production managers for the optimization of customer service, overall working capital and activity level of the IPT', 'Allocation of batches to process orders and release orders to the production managers for day to day planning as well as monitoring their scheduling adherence', 'Coordination with the maintenance and engineering leads on expected downtime', 'Coordination of product transfers, validation batches, qualification and re-qualification activities with the relevant stakeholders (internal & external)', 'Responsibility for Master Data: Creation, adaption and maintenance of BOMs, recipes, article numbers, production versions and stock levels with respect to supply reliability and working capital', 'Responsibility for purchase and availability of direct materials as well as monitoring inventory of these materials in collaboration with Procurement and Production Managers', 'Monitoring of stock levels and initiation of improvements for stock (cost) reduction', 'Notification of stakeholders on short dated and unusable stock and initiation of D&O; process', 'Qualifications', 'Completed Apprenticeship together with practical experience or Bachelor’s Degree in Logistics or Supply Chain Management', '3 – 5 years of relevant experience in a manufacturing environment, preferably in the Pharmaceutical Industry', 'Knowledge of ERP and Demand Planning', 'Experience with LEAN-Concepts and methodologies', 'Strong IT-skills and experience with SAP', 'Competence in communication with focus on clients, quality and compliance', 'Skills in prioritizing; description: ['Gaat jouw hart sneller kloppen van automatiseringsprojecten, PLC’s, problemen oplossen en het werken in een productie-omgeving?', 'Voor onze productieafdelingen in Haarlem zijn we vanwege uitbreiding op zoek naar een:', 'Automation Engineer', 'Over de functie', "De automation engineer is een belangrijk lid van de IPT's (Integrated Process Teams) bij het beheer van automatiseringskwesties op de werkvloer die van invloed zijn op de productie. Samen met de andere automation engineers die onze drie IPT's ondersteunen, ben je het eerste aanspreekpunt bij technische automatiseringsproblemen van de verpakkingslijnen. Indien nodig, escaleer je problemen naar onze  Site Partners (Technical Operations) of de Global IT Hub. Je beheert de automatiseringssystemen binnen de IPT’s en bent verantwoordelijk voor troubleshooting, onderhoud, kapitaalprojecten, upgrades en systeem harmonisatie activiteiten. Dit alles wordt gedreven door zowel technische als kwaliteitssysteemvereisten.", 'De automation engineer werkt in dagdienst aangevuld met consignatiediensten.', 'Welkom in ons team', 'De business unit waar je gaat werken is verantwoordelijk voor de totale supply keten met betrekking tot het verpakken van medicijnen. Dus van het ontwikkelen en bestellen van componenten en bulk tot aan het afleveren van de geneesmiddelen in de verzendverpakking.', 'Primaire verantwoordelijkheden', 'Rapporterend aan de (Associate) Director Operations ben je als automation engineer verantwoordelijk voor het oplossen van automatiseringsproblemen die van invloed zijn op de productie. Je faciliteert probleemoplossing met andere afdelingen binnen MSD (Technicial Operations, Global IT-team). Daarnaast deel je je technische kennis met belanghebbenden zoals technicians, operationeel managers en andere engineers. Als automation engineer maak je onderdeel uit  van Global Communities of Practice, zoals het wereldwijde serialisatieteam. Je biedt input vanuit een functionaliteitsperspectief, maar biedt tevens je input als expert over wat de normen / standaarden van MSD zouden moeten zijn met betrekking tot het automatiseringsgedeelte van serialisatie.', 'Overige verantwoordelijkheden:', 'Ondersteuning van automatiseringsprojecten in multidisciplinaire projecten. Dit omvat het opstellen en beoordelen van scope, ontwerp, C & Q-documentatie en begeleiding en / of het uitvoeren van testen.', 'Beheer van een of meer applicaties in de MES/Antares/Systech domeinen.', 'Verantwoordelijk voor het houden van de focus op veiligheid, gezondheid en het milieu. Houd toezicht op de naleving en bevorder actief verbeteringen in gezondheid, veiligheid en het milieu.', 'Voldoen aan MSD QMS System Development Lifecycle (SDLC).', 'Monitoring en verspreiding van lokale en internationale normen en standaarden op het gebied van procesautomatisering (GAMP, 21CFRPart11, Data Integrity, etc.).', 'Qualifications', 'Jouw profiel', 'Je hebt een afgeronde HBO of Master opleiding in elektrotechniek of automation.', 'Je hebt bij voorkeur kennis van GMP-richtlijnen en wereldwijde automatiseringsverwachtingen.', 'Je hebt aantoonbare ervaring met:', "Inspectiesystemen: visuele systemen zoals door mensen leesbare printdetectie; gebruik fo-camera's en vision-sensoren; PLC & pc", 'Veldbesturingssystemen - PLC. Bijv. ProfiBUS', 'Netwerk - TCIP (Transmission Control Protocol)', 'Motion control - 3-assige robots', 'Je hebt een sterk probleemoplossend vermogen en ervaring met het gebruik van analyse instrumenten voor root cause analysis (Lean skills).', 'Je beschikt over uitstekende projectmanagement vaardigheden en kunt goed prioriteiten stellen en ook onder tijdsdruk een juiste afweging maken.', 'Je beschikt over goede communicatieve vaardigheden en de Nederlandse en Engelse taal en in staat om op alle niveaus binnen de organisatie te communiceren.', 'Wij bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met  toegewijde collega’s.', 'Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', 'Een competitief salaris;', '35,5 vakantiedagen;', '8% vakantietoeslag en 3% eindejaarsuitkering;', 'MSD Incentive Plan;', 'Een uitstekend pensioen;', 'Gratis gebruik sportschool;', 'Reiskostenvergoeding;', 'Verschillende trainingsmodules.', 'Solliciteren', 'Ben jij de kandidaat waar wij naar op zoek zijn? We ontmoeten je graag!', 'Stuur ons jouw sollicitatie vandaag nog toe.', 'Heb je nog vragen? Laat het ons weten!', 'Stuur een app naar Barbara Razenberg (06-24904897) of een email naar', 'barbara.razenberg@msd.com', '. Bellen mag natuurlijk ook.', 'Over MSD', 'MSD is een wereldleider op het gebied van geneesmiddelen en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze vaccins, biologische therapieën en geneesmiddelen bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We richten ons op aandoeningen die mensen ernstig belemmeren in hun functioneren of zelfs levensbedreigend zijn en die vragen om nieuwe geneesmiddelen. MSD is tevens pionier in biologische research & development voor diergezondheid.', 'Bij MSD geloven we in de kracht van verschillen van teams van getalenteerde medewerkers op alle niveaus. Uiteenlopende vaardigheden, ervaringen, achtergronden en culturele perspectieven helpen ons om beter inzicht te krijgen in de behoeften van diverse klanten, zorgverleners en patiënten. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4500 medewerkers op drie verschillende locaties.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Automation Engineer

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Our Manufacturing Division, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', 'Basic functions and responsibilities', 'Individual contributor responsible to ensure that all MSD products supplied by External Partners are manufactured, packaged, analyzed, released, stored and/or distributed in accordance with MSD expectations and all applicable regulatory requirements. Responsible for implementing Quality Assurance and Quality Control policies, supporting the compliant supply of product by External Partners, by means of a risk based quality oversight, support and technical advice and counselling to the partner.', 'Responsibilities include involvement  in activities such as permanent audit readiness, providing coaching and training were applicable to build effective quality systems at the partner, and supporting continuous improvement activities. Support in product release where MSD holds the market authorizations, support in  deviation investigations, complaint investigations  and change control requests.', 'Primary activities for the incumbent in this position are:', 'Requires minimal support and oversight to complete responsibilities, including resolution of recurring/complex problems. Understands requirements for the role and has knowledge of assigned responsibility areas, including a combination of analytical/scientific skills in order to effectively manage and control activities necessary to support a  Quality Assurance program governing External Partners that manufacture non sterile pharmaceuticals products.', 'Receives guidance  and direction, but functions independently. Main responsibilities are:', "Assures compliance with established MSD policies/procedures and complies with all applicable governmental regulations (GMP, etc.) Provides guidance to External Partners with regards to MSD's requirements", 'Assists  the development, and ongoing execution of the Quality Agreement with the External Partners', 'If necessary, assists in quality due diligence assessments of new External Partners. Supports the partner in remediation of due diligence or GMP audit gaps and ensures the audit observations related to MSD products are fully investigated with proposed actions and effectively, tracked and implemented within the agreed time frame where warranted', 'Assists or leads coordination and communication on matters related to the cGMP status of the External Partner. Must be conversant with all regulations and compendia governing the external partner´s operations. Works with the partner to ensure that effective and robust Quality Systems are in place to comply with required regulations, policies and guidelines. Provides on-site guidance in the preparation of metrics, procedures and guidelines where warranted', 'May act as the MSD Quality point of contact for the External Partner  and as a liaison between the External Partner  and internal MSD  personnel for activities including technology and method transfers, supplier', 'Qualifications', ', equipment, processes and method validation, routine QA and QC activities', 'Responsibility of the incumbent involve concurrent release of products  with the assurance that the goods were produced in conformance to all applicable policies/procedures of MSD and compliance with all governing regulations', 'Assists or leads the responding to complaints from  market', 'Ensures that all deviations at External Partners related to MSD Products are fully investigated with any assigned actions effectively implemented within the agreed time frame', 'Tracks and monitors operational and quality performance of the External /Partner', 'P', 'rovides proactive support in training and coaching to initiate quality improvements within Operations and Quality; reviews Annual Product Stability and Annual Product Reviews', 'In conjunction with other internal MSD departments, ensures that external partners are inspection ready for all new product introductions or transfers, closely collaborating with appropriate business and operations areas, both internal and external, to achieve MSD objectives', 'Manages compliance issues promptly and performs risk assessments on critical issues to prevent stock out situation in the market', 'Participates in EHS, Business Compliance, cGMP and all other compliance-related matters, where applicable', 'Demonstrates and promotes EHS leadership behavior, ensuring that all MSD site activities are carried out in accordance with SHE requirements', 'Ensures both operational knowledge and technical skills are maintained and compliant against individual training requirements', 'Assists  the coordination of significant investigations including Fact Findings. Assists in the coordination of any product recall involving the external partner', 'Qualifications', 'BS  Pharmacy, Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Biology (or equivalent), preferred. Minimum of three years  experience in the pharmaceutical industry with a thorough knowledge of Quality Systems, Quality Assurance and Quality Control including solid knowledge of global GMP and regulatory requirements. Must be fluent in English, both spoken and written. Competent in scientific problem solving  and risk analysis capabilities. Strong compliance mindset, demonstrated interpersonal skills,as well as communication and  negotiation skills. Demonstrates organizational skills, is proactive and self-motivated with ability to multi-task. Some level of contractual and financial awareness is preferred.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'NL; Cramlington, England, GB; Heist op den Berg, Van, BE; ArdÃ¨che, RhÃ´ne-Alpes, FR; Istanbul, Istanbul, TR; Lisbon, Lisbon, PT; Moscow, Moscow, RU; London, England, GB; Rome, Lazio, IT; Haarlem, North Holland,', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 25 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Specialist, External Quality Assurance

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Quality Assurance Associate - QMS', 'MSD Biotech Dublin', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BIOTECH, DUBLIN', 'The latest addition to the MSD Ireland family is MSD Biotech, Dublin.  The site will play a pivotal role in the manufacture of MSD’s biologics-based medicines, including in the area of immuno-oncology, and will expand MSD’s current internal network of biologics drug substance manufacturing plants when full manufacturing operations begin in 2021.', 'MSD Biotech Dublin, will be MSD’s first ever Large-Scale Mammalian-Based Drug Substance Facility, with the mission and ambition to manufacture breakthrough medicines from Ireland for patients around the world.', 'This facility will be a significant supplier of drug substances for one of MSD’s key treatments and will also be critical in the future supply of new biotechnology products to its global network.', 'Our Manufacturing Division, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'The Quality Assurance Associate - QMS is responsible for active contribution to, maintaining and continuing improvement of the MSD Quality Management System throughout their knowledge and areas of expertise.', 'This position has an important role within the site for implementing and sustaining the Dublin Biotech Quality Management System as the site transistions from start-up to steady state.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', 'This position will include a combination of the responsibilities listed depending on the phase of the start-up of the site', 'Controlling the site Document / SOP management systems', 'Managing the review process for Global standards, policies, directives and bulletins', 'Participate in GMP Training & Knowledge Management', 'Implementing and managing the Annual Product Review system', 'Site SME/ representative at Global CoE groups pertaining to QMS topics.', 'Implementing any changes to the our manufacturing division Quality Management System at the site', 'Other general specified tasks e.g. Site Master File, Manufacturing License, metrics', 'The candidate will provide quality support to the project and site, including training and guidance on the interpretation and implementation of the MSD Quality Manual.', 'Provides compliance contribution to project teams and leads small projects.', 'Coaches and guides colleagues within the site.', 'Understands and applies regulatory / compliance requirements to their role together with remaining current on upcoming regulatory and compliance changes.', 'Responds to non-standard requests from customer needs.', 'Makes decisions within guidelines and policies which impact own priorities and allocation of time to meet deadlines.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'Reports to the Site QMS Lead', 'Qualifications', ', Skills & Experience Required  - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'General', 'A minimum 3 years experience in Quality Control, Quality Assurance or Pharmaceutical, Vaccine or Biological Operations or Technical Operations', 'Technical', 'Excellent knowledge of relevant Quality and Compliance Guidelines (cGMP, Auditing, Quality Management Systems, Quality Agreements, Regulatory Affairs, Training) and respective regulations', 'People', 'The motivation to be an inspiring member of a high performing team.', 'The passion to build the future of MSD Biotech Dublin', 'The desire to continuously learn, improve and develop', 'A great communicator, decisive decision maker and proven ability to deliver excellence', 'Confidence to direct off-site suppliers to the project, willingness to support the team and a lazer light focus to deliver excellence', 'Strong contemporary knowledge of relevant cGMPs, regulations and current industry trends.', 'Experience with new product introductions and/or process qualification/technology transfer', 'Education', "Bachelor's degree (or higher) in Chemistry, Biology, Microbiology, Automation, Engineering or equivalent", 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT', 'solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT', 'the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE', 'your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', '*HJFeatured', '*HJDublin', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BRINNY', "MSD Brinny is a leading facility for the development, testing and manufacturing of new biologics and vaccines, exporting to over 90 countries across the world. With a team of approximately 500 people, MSD Brinny specialises in the late-stage development and commercial supply of biotech products, including some of the company's most successful and life-changing treatments for oncology, hepatitis C and rheumatoid arthritis.", 'The Brinny site has been a vibrant part of the local Innishannon community for nearly 35 years and is now one of the region’s largest employers. MSD has invested €130m in the site since 2016 as a result of increased global demand for MSD medicines and vaccines which will see MSD Brinny further expand its production facilities and capacity to meet this demand.', 'Our Manufacturing Division, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'We currently have 2year fixed term contract opportunities for Process Craft Technicians (Mech). The successful candidate will be responsible for the hands-on operation and maintenance of process, utility and facility equipment to support manufacturing operations and maximise asset performance.', 'Duties include:', 'Carrying out all routine and non-routine tasks delegated according to appropriate procedures and standards.', 'Repairing equipment malfunctions (mechanical).', 'Executing site preventive maintenance routines.', 'Assisting in construction, commissioning and qualification of equipment.', 'Developing maintenance procedures and equipment files. Assisting with generation, review and revision of maintenance documentation as necessary.', 'Selecting of appropriate spare parts to ensure maximum availability of equipment.', 'Operating utilities and equipment safely and efficiently, whilst maximizing uptime.', 'Collecting and analysing equipment data to report on equipment performance.', 'Assisting with rolling shutdown preparation and execution.', 'Training other staff in department procedures and techniques, as required.', 'Operate, troubleshoot, maintain and support Utility and Manufacturing equipment to support the Integrated Process Team (IPT) to enable the manufacture of quality pharmaceutical products.', 'Responsible and accountable for the safe accomplishment of all activities within the team whilst following all statutory, environmental, regulatory (cGMP), corporate, site and team practices.', 'Reporting any EHS incidents and/or near misses.', 'Ensuring housekeeping standards are maintained to a high standard within the IPT.', 'Support efficient and safe daily operations of equipment as required whilst maximizing uptime.', 'Assist engineering in executing projects..', 'Perform all necessary maintenance PMs and repairs.', 'Perform troubleshooting and maintenance of equipment while maintaining production schedule.', 'Supporting a culture of Continuous Improvement by participating in Six Sigma tool activity within the Utility area such as: Kaizen Projects, MTBR, MTTF, problem solving, energy reduction and Lean principles.', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'General', 'Must have a mechanical craft qualification.', '3+ years industrial experience ideally in the operations and maintenance of Process and Utility equipment.', 'Excellent interpersonal skills.', 'Customer focus.', 'Innovative.', 'Excellent communication skills both written and verbally.', 'Good problem solving skills.', 'Results and performance driven.', 'Adaptive and flexible.', 'Pharmaceutical/GMP experience an advantage.', 'Experience carrying out mechanical repairs and fault finding on utility/process / manufacturing equipment e.g. pumps, mechanical seals, rotating equipment, HVAC, refrigeration etc.', 'Experience of utility systems maintenance and troubleshooting.', 'Experience of CMMS type systems (PEMAC/SAP).', 'Experience of Root Cause Analysis techniques an advantage: 5 Whys, Fishbone etc.', 'Be familiar with daily activities in all areas of Maintenance.', 'Deputise for Maintenance Team Lead as necessary.', 'Facilitate an environment of continuous improvement.', 'Participate in investigations in work area as necessary.', 'Participate in Cross-Functional teams as necessary to support site goals.', 'Support training of other technicians.', 'Collaboration and teamwork.', 'Initiative and motivation.', 'Share ideas and suggestions for improvement and encourage others to do the same.', 'Work as a strategic partner with all other departments within the facility.', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT', 'solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT', 'the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE', 'your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'No', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Bij MSD in Haarlem zijn we voor het Center of Excellence (CoE) Quality op zoek naar een', 'Change Control coördinator', 'Over de functie', 'Als change control coördinator draag je zorg voor de initiëring en uitvoering van kwaliteitsverbeteringen, het adviseren over farmaceutisch technische issues en over kwaliteit- en compliance gerelateerde issues, alsook het implementeren van oplossingen. Wanneer er verzoeken zijn tot het veranderen van apparatuur, een proces of materiaal, ben jij de persoon die verantwoordelijk is voor een goed en efficiënt verloop van het change proces.', 'Uiteraard draag je bij aan een groeiende kwaliteitsbewustzijn binnen de bedrijfsomgeving en je bent daarbij vertegenwoordiger voor Quality Assurance binnen verschillende systemen.', 'Welkom in ons team', 'De Center of Excellence Quality is verantwoordelijk voor het sturen en coördineren van het kwaliteitsbeleid van de site Haarlem, in overeenstemming met bestaande wet- en regelgeving. Hiertoe onderhouden de verschillende afdelingen contacten met alle Integrated Process Teams (IPT’s) en Centers of Excellence (CoE’s) van de locatie Haarlem en tevens met andere sites wereldwijd en het hoofdkantoor in de VS.', 'De afdeling bestaat van een hecht team van 30 personen. Met name een goede sfeer, betrokkenheid van de medewerkers en de bereidheid om elkaar te helpen maakt dit een team waar iedereen graag deel van uit maakt.', 'Als change control coördinator rapporteer je aan de Associate Director QMS.', 'Primaire verantwoordelijkheden', 'Je verantwoordelijkheden zijn:', 'Geeft leiding aan en is voorzitter van het Change Control Team of Experts.', 'Het onderhouden van het Change Control proces', 'Borgen van een goed verloop en kwaliteit van het Change Control proces.', 'Samenwerking met de Pharmaceutical Specialists van de IPTs en de CoE TechOps/engineering;', 'Evalueren van de gevolgen van externe richtlijnen; initiëren en ontwikkelen van policies en procedures; goedkeuren van (incidentele) afwijkingen van goedgekeurde policies en procedures;', 'Initiëren, formuleren en uitvoeren van voorstellen voor kwaliteitsverbeteringen;', 'Optreden als Subject Matter Expert tijdens GMP inspecties en klanten audits;', 'Zorgdragen dat Operationele interne CoE Quality activiteiten in compliance zijn met regelgeving en voldoen aan vastgestelde lead times.', 'Qualifications', 'Jouw profiel', 'WO / Master (MSc) opleiding, aangevuld met minimaal 4 jaar relevante werkervaring binnen kwaliteits- of productie- omgeving;', 'Kennis van en ervaring met farmaceutisch-technische aspecten, GMP, registratie van geneesmiddelen, validatiestudies en verpakkingstechnologie is een eis;', 'Overtuigingskracht en resultaatgericht;', 'Nauwkeurig, flexibel en zelfstandig;', 'In staat om medewerkers aan te sturen zonder formele hiërarchie;', 'Goede communicatieve vaardigheden in zowel woord als geschrift, in Nederlands en Engels.', 'Wij bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met toegewijde collega’s. Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Je kunt bijvoorbeeld andere Pharmaceutical specialist rollen gaan vervullen binnen MSD of doorgroeien naar een managementfunctie. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', 'Een competitief salaris;', '35,5 vakantiedagen;', '8% vakantietoeslag en 3% eindejaarsuitkering;', 'MSD Incentive Plan;', 'Een uitstekend pensioen;', 'In-house sportfaciliteiten', 'Reiskostenvergoeding;', 'Verschillende trainingsmodules.', 'Solliciteren', 'Ben jij de kandidaat waar wij naar op zoek zijn? We ontmoeten je graag! Stuur ons jouw sollicitatie vandaag nog toe. Dit doe je door op onderstaande button te klikken.', 'Heb je nog vragen? Laat het ons weten! Neem contact op met Cor Marsman op tel nr 06- 11254521 voor vragen.', 'Over MSD', 'MSD is een wereldleider op het gebied van geneesmiddelen en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze vaccins, biologische therapieën en geneesmiddelen bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We richten ons op aandoeningen die mensen ernstig belemmeren in hun functioneren of zelfs levensbedreigend zijn en die vragen om nieuwe geneesmiddelen. MSD is tevens pionier in biologische research & development voor diergezondheid.', 'Bij MSD geloven we in de kracht van verschillen van teams van getalenteerde medewerkers op alle niveaus. Uiteenlopende vaardigheden, ervaringen, achtergronden en culturele perspectieven helpen ons om beter inzicht te krijgen in de behoeften van diverse klanten, zorgverleners en patiënten. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 5600 medewerkers op drie verschillende locaties.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'No', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Voor de Quality afdeling binnen Oss Biotech zijn we op zoek naar een:', 'Quality Officer', 'Over MSD', 'Het MSD van vandaag is wereldleider op het gebied van gezondheidszorg en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze geneesmiddelen, vaccins, biologische therapieën en ondersteunende diensten bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We zijn actief betrokken bij een betere toegang tot de gezondheidszorg. Dat doen we met uitgebreid beleid, programma’s en samenwerkingsverbanden. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4000 medewerkers op drie verschillende hoofdlocaties.', 'Voor meer informatie ga naar www.werkenbijmsd.nl', 'De afdeling', 'Bij MSD Biotech Operations in Oss worden actieve bestandelen van medicijnen gemaakt. Quality Intergrated Proces Team (IPT) Upstream is de kwaliteitsafdeling die produktgericht toezicht houdt op de Upstream productie-afdeling (USP). USP is de Biotech afdeling waar actieve bestandelen door het kweken van levende cellen of micro-organismen in speciale reactoren worden gemaakt. Vervolgens worden ze in de afdeling Downstream Processing (DSP) gezuiverd. Het toezicht houden gebeurd door het reviewen van batchrecords en aanverwante systemen en door aanwezigheid op de produktiewerkvloer.', 'Kijk voor meer informatie over MSD Biotech Oss naar bijgaande video', 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzzdXlQNzYY', 'De functie', 'Rapporterend aan de Quality IPT Lead Upstream ben je als Quality Officer (intern: QIPT Officer Level 1) bezig met batchrecord review en toezicht binnen de produktie en het magazijn. Je helpt daarbij de produktie-afdeling om volgens GMP te produceren. Je functioneert als kwaliteitsadviseur in geval van afwijkingen en helpt om herhaling te voorkomen. Je geeft gevraagd en ongevraagd advies aan het management over kwaliteitsproblemen of kwaliteitsverbeteringen. Dit alles om ervoor te zorgen dat er volgens de GMP richtlijnen wordt geproduceerd.', 'De volgende taken maken onderdeel uit van de functie van QIPT officer level 1:', '• Als onderdeel van Quality on the floor:', 'o Uitvoeren van batch record review inclusief acties in andere systemen', 'o Reviewen en goedkeuren van logboeken.', '• Behandelen van afwijkingen van de USP produktie-afdeling, inclusief het ondersteunen bij correctieve en preventieve acties (CAPA’s).', '• Beoordelen van changes.', '• Deelnemen aan kwaliteitsprojecten binnen de afdeling om verbeterde werkprocessen te ontwikkelen en te implementeren.', 'Qualifications', '• Afgeronde MBO/HBO opleiding, bij voorkeur in een biochemische, analytische of microbiologische richting.', '• Minimaal 1 - 2 jaar werkervaring.', '• Basale kennis/overzicht van biotech processen, farmaceutische kwaliteit en GMP richtlijnen.', '• Onder beperkt toezicht kunnen werken.', '• Goede communicatieve vaardigheden.', '• Ervaring met SAP is een pre.', '• Ervaring met root cause analyse of technisch schrijven is een pre.', '• Percentage in dienst 80-100%.', 'MSD als werkgever', 'Keer op keer nieuwe uitdagingen aangaan, dat is wel iets wat je leuk moet vinden als je bij MSD aan de slag wilt. Want continu verbeteren is een van onze drijfveren. Dat geldt zowel voor werkprocessen als voor medewerkers. Gedrevenheid, teamwork en eigen initiatief zijn van groot belang. Bij MSD kun je je op allerlei manieren ontwikkelen. In de diepte, door je te specialiseren in je vak. Maar ook door jezelf te verbreden en door te groeien naar een leidinggevende functie. Internationaal of juist heel lokaal, er zijn talloze andere mogelijkheden om stappen te zetten in je loopbaan, te rouleren in functies of te groeien in je functie. Werken bij MSD is werken in een dynamische high-tech omgeving van internationale allure, die toch sterk lokaal geworteld is in Oss, Haarlem en Boxmeer.', 'Wij bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met toegewijde collega’s. Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', '• Een competitief salaris;', '• 35,5 vakantiedagen;', '• 8% vakantietoeslag en 3% eindejaarsuitkering;', '• MSD Incentive (bonus) Plan;', '• Een uitstekend pensioen;', '• Reiskostenvergoeding (OV wordt 100% vergoed);', '• Interne training- en opleidingsmogelijkheden.', 'Informatie', 'Voor nadere informatie omtrent deze functie kun je contact opnemen met Alexander Bijman, Quality IPT manager USP, op telefoonnummer 0412-663245.', 'Sollicitatie', 'Als je interesse hebt in deze functie, nodigen we je uit om online je curriculum vitae en een motivatiebrief te versturen.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Our Animal Health division works to improve the health of animals around the world through collaborative partnerships and a deep sense of responsibility towards our customers, consumers, animals, society, and our planet. This team of energetic, independent thinkers offers one of the industry’s most innovative portfolios of products, services, and technologies that serve to prevent, treat, and control diseases across all major farm and companion animal species both domestically and internationally.', 'MSD Animal Health (MSD AH) in Portugal is looking for a Marketing Person, to support the Food Production Business Unit. The main roles of the position are:', 'Develop and implement with the commercial team, the marketing plan for Food Production Animals;', 'Maximize MSD AH resources and approach towards One Health challenges;', 'Facing the “tehcnification” of Animal Health develop an approach that leverage MSD AH on the market;', 'MSD AH portfolio life cycle management;', 'Control and monitor Promotional Budget. Implement corrective measures when necessary;', 'Collaborate with Scientific field affairs, guaranteeing the correct product placement;', 'Provide assistance and support of the launch and promotion of the products, train and update the Field Force search of new business opportunities, analyzing competitor products, and managing questions raised by veterinarians and Field Force;', 'Initiate the development of promotional materials with the definition of the technical contents of these materials;', 'Interface with headquarters with the participation in international teams, in order to share Marketing and Technical information;', 'Participating in conferences, even as speaker and participate/lead meetings organized by MSD AH with veterinarians/farmers with the objective to increase technical knowledge/awareness of disease related to the corporate products portfolio, as well on the use and /or correct administration of the product;', 'Provide ongoing support and tools to continue develop the business;', 'Qualifications', 'Degree or Master in Veterinary Medicine or Economicas and managment;', 'Post degree on Sales and Marketing will be a plus;', 'Knowledge of Food Procduction Animals Market;', 'Expertise of Market Access wil be a plus;', '3 years (minimum) of experience in the function;', 'Correct use of the native language (Portuguese);', 'Understanding and fluency in English language;', 'Regulation Knowledge – Portuguese legislation;', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. description: ['Learning Specialist', 'Biotech Dublin', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Our Manufacturing Division, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BIOTECH, DUBLIN', 'The latest addition to the MSD Ireland family is MSD Biotech, Dublin.  The site will play a pivotal role in the manufacture of MSD’s biologics-based medicines, including in the area of immuno-oncology, and will expand MSD’s current internal network of biologics drug substance manufacturing plants when full manufacturing operations begin in 2021.', 'MSD Biotech Dublin, will be MSD’s first ever Large-Scale Mammalian-Based Drug Substance Facility, with the mission and ambition to manufacture breakthrough medicines from Ireland for patients around the world.', 'This facility will be a significant supplier of drug substances for one of MSD’s key treatments and will also be critical in the future supply of new biotechnology products to its global network.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'The Learning Specialist will help define, develop, and facilitate all learning and development plans and activities for particular client group(s) within the site in support of the site’s learning strategy and Annual Learning Plan.  This individual will partner will their clients to implement and ensure adherence to the site’s learning processes/system and will work with their peers to continuously improve the learning processes through to foster a continuous learning environment.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Establishes relationships with and partners with client group(s) to understand the business goals/objectives and collaboratively defines appropriate learning strategies for client area.', 'Conducts learning needs assessments and/or job analyses with client to identify relevant learning plans and solutions.', 'With the business, implements learning strategy/plans (inclusive of job and functional skills) for business client.  Monitors progress with appropriate documentation and metrics and defines opportunities for continuous improvement.', 'Implements standard learning processes for client group; ensures ongoing adherence through coaching and appropriate use of metrics.', 'Works collaboratively within the Learning organization to implement, maintain and continuously improve standard site learning processes (i.e.,  Job Skills Qualification, SOP Process, Annual GMP, Safety Programs and New Employee Onboarding).', 'Ensures client is in Permanent Inspection Readiness and cGMP Compliance as it relates to Training/Learning & Development.', 'Support any Environmental, Health and Safety (EHS) or Quality Compliance regulatory audits as required.', 'Collaborate with Global Learning and Development, Learning Support Services and other manufacturing sites to implement best practices.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'The Learning Specialist will report to the Site Learning Lead.', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'General', 'Experience in Lean Manufacturing Production Systems', 'Expert level in Learning Management Systems (LMS)', 'Strong in analysing data, building metrics, and using visualisation tools.', 'Working knowledge and application of Instructional Design, Adult Learning Principles, and Evaluation Methodologies', 'Technical', 'Minimum of 5 years of pharmaceutical manufacturing experience', 'People', 'Working Across Boundaries: Demonstrates an understanding of how one’s job responsibilities contribute to the departments goals and a knowledge of the business’s core strategy for long-term success.', 'Fosters Interpersonal Relationships & Collaboration: Actively listens and seeks to understand differing perspectives; work together to achieve the common goals of MSD. Demonstrated skill in applying approaches, tools, and techniques for working with individuals and groups in a constructive and collaborative manner, including the ability to build and maintain critical networks and collaborative relationships.', 'Productive Communications (Oral & Written): Ability to distribute accurate information and craft messages for appropriate target audiences, with guidance if needed. Speaks and writes clearly and concisely with the ability to select the appropriate form of communication to share information.', 'Education', 'Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. description: ['Ben jij een professional op het gebied van Lean en wil jij jouw kennis en vaardigheden inzetten in een omgeving waar producten worden verpakt die ertoe doen? Dan zoeken we jou!', 'Voor onze locatie', 'Haarlem', 'zijn wij op zoek naar een', 'Improvement Engineer', 'Over de functie', 'Als Improvement Engineer ben je verantwoordelijk voor het continue verbeteren van processen binnen de business unit Vaccins locatie Haarlem. Voor jouw afdeling ben je dé expert op het gebied van Lean. Doel van de verbeteringen is het verhogen van de productiviteit, veiligheid en kwaliteit. Je neemt hiervoor het initiatief, formuleert business cases voor verbeterprojecten, analyseert data en dagelijkse processen en komt met verbetervoorstellen.', 'Ook bij de implementatie van de verbeteringen speel je een belangrijke rol.  Je ondersteunt de leiding bij het bewerkstellingen van de benodigde gedrags- en/ of cultuurveranderingen en je zorgt ervoor dat de nieuwe werkwijzen en gedragingen worden geborgd door middel van hands- on coaching en begeleiding.', 'Tot slot stel je als Improvement Engineer jaarlijks het budget op voor de afdeling (Profit Plan). Deze monitor je gedurende het jaar door rapportages op te stellen en performance indicatoren bij te houden. De Improvement Engineer rapporteert rechtstreeks aan de Director van de business unit.', 'Welkom in ons team', 'Je werkt samen met collega’s en specialisten uit de andere afdelingen, alsmede met leveranciers om veranderingen op de juiste manier te documenteren en de kwaliteit van onze producten te waarborgen.', 'Qualifications', 'Jouw', 'profiel', 'Een afgeronde HBO of WO opleiding, aangevuld met 3-5 jaar', 'relevante werkervaring.', 'Uitgebreide', 'hands-on Lean/TPS ervaring en Green Belt of Black Belt gecertificeerd.', 'In staat', 'zijn met alle niveaus in de organisatie samen te werken.', 'Uitstekende', 'mentoring en proces begeleidende vaardigheden.', 'Zeer', 'overtuigend en in staat om stakeholders te beïnvloeden.', 'Ervaring /', 'kennis op het gebied van operationele productie en/of Supply Chain Management.', 'Projectmanagement', 'vaardigheden zoals teamleiderschap en besluitvaardigheid.', 'Uitstekende', 'communicatieve vaardigheden, zowel in woord als geschrift (Nederlands / Engels).', 'Wij', 'bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken', 'aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met  toegewijde collega’s. Je krijgt alle ruimte', 'om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen', 'op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', 'Een competitief', 'salaris;', '35,5', 'vakantiedagen;', '8%', 'vakantietoeslag en 3% eindejaarsuitkering;', 'MSD Incentive', 'Plan;', 'Een uitstekend', 'pensioen;', 'In-house', 'sportfaciliteiten;', 'Reiskostenvergoeding;', 'Verschillende', 'trainingsmodules.', 'Over', 'MSD', 'MSD is een wereldleider op het gebied', 'van geneesmiddelen en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze vaccins,', 'biologische therapieën en geneesmiddelen bieden we innovatieve behandelingen', 'voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We richten', 'ons op aandoeningen die mensen ernstig belemmeren in hun functioneren of zelfs', 'levensbedreigend zijn en die vragen om nieuwe geneesmiddelen. MSD is tevens', 'pionier in biologische research & development voor diergezondheid.Bij MSD', 'geloven we in de kracht van verschillen van teams van getalenteerde medewerkers', 'op alle niveaus. Uiteenlopende vaardigheden, ervaringen, achtergronden en', 'culturele perspectieven helpen ons om beter inzicht te krijgen in de behoeften', 'van diverse klanten, zorgverleners en patiënten. Bij MSD in Nederland werken', 'ongeveer 5300 medewerkers op drie verschillende locaties.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Site Procurement Lead', 'MSD Ballydine, Ireland', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BALLYDINE', 'MSD Ballydine develops and supplies the active ingredients and final formulated product for a range of innovative medicines at its manufacturing and R&D; facilities. The plant, which has been operating in Tipperary for over 40 years, exports to over 25 countries around the world with primary markets being Europe, USA and Japan.', 'Our highly-skilled local workforce of 500 employees is now leading the way in the development of new medicines, including MSD’s treatment for hepatitis C, which is being manufactured in Tipperary for patients around the world.', 'MSD Ballydine’s existing portfolio and future pipeline offers team members the opportunity to operate at the cutting-edge of science and technology, and develop new treatments that positively impact patients across the globe.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'Do you have 5-7 years of experience in strategic sourcing & procurement? Are you result-driven whilst dealing with ambiguity? Do you have experience in complex project management, demonstrating the ability to successfully complete large and complex projects? If so, we would like to ask you to apply for this challenging position within MSD.', 'As a Site Procurement Lead within EMEA Pharmaceutical Operations Procurement Team, you will be responsible for executing strategic projects and supporting the site’s operating objectives, ensuring that procedures and processes are securely established to support the growth plans for MSD manufacturing site in Ballydine, Ireland. You will collaborate with senior functional and operational stakeholders to develop and execute global supply and sourcing strategies. In this position you will support the our Manufacturing Division strategic imperatives and will enable our Manufacturing Division core elements of strategy: stability, responsiveness, building biologics capacity, and foster innovation. Site Procurement Lead will provide leadership and direction for procurement activities including the support of site operating and strategic plans. Responsible for planning and conducting negotiations as well as leading and conducting RFx for direct materials projects, coaching and coordinating Indirect Procurement Senior Specialist.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Your responsibilities include, but are not limited to:', 'Manages performance and coaches Indirect procurement professional', 'Manages direct materials categories including some Indirect Procurement services', 'Is responsible for developing Site procurement objectives and targets incl. annual Productivity / PPV forecast, working capital conversion / pull through targets, Supplier diversity & Economic inclusion targets, Contract compliance etc.', 'Oversees and supports SSC participation and alignment, proactively flags risks and opportunities to senior management, escalates to Cluster lead appropriately, secures active participation and contribution', 'Is accountable for Buyer Business Plan for local site spend', 'Is responsible for continuous procurement process improvement, increasing personal productivity', 'Interfaces with site’s stakeholders to understand and influence long term strategy considering internal and external manufacturing requirements', 'Engages, obtains sponsorship and influences senior level stakeholders / demonstrates procurement value proposition, creates a delivery plan shared jointly with business stakeholders', 'Develops end to end risk management strategies and performance management & improvement strategies', 'Acts as change agent, demonstrating added value brought by the procurement function. Is a personal example and role model of the MSD leadership behaviors', 'Actively supports diversity, within MSD as well as including, expanding relationships with diverse, SME suppliers', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'This person will report to EMEA Procurement Lead who is responsible for Pharmaceutical Operations Manufacturing sites.', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'General', 'Working experience in multinational companies, complex matrix organizations, exposure to international teams', '5-7 years of experience in manufacturing / supply chain / direct materials procurement', '3 to 5 years of direct materials procurement experience', 'Demonstrates strong leadership, collaboration, problem solving, and conflict management skills', 'Drives results while dealing with ambiguity and complex environment', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'Able to influence at all levels in the organization', 'Demonstrates capabilities in Strategic stakeholder relationship management, Supplier relationship management, Project management, Cost optimization, Negotiations and Contract management, Financial / Legal / Business acumen', 'Native fluency in English', 'People', '1 to 3 years of people management experience', 'Education', 'BS/BA degree in Engineering / Supply Chain or Business minimally; MBA or CPM /supply chain certification preferred', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 10 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD Tiergesundheit ist mit über 50 Standorten ein weltweit tätiges, forschungsorientiertes Unternehmen mit einem breiten Spektrum an Veterinärmedizin und Dienstleistungen. Umsetzung globaler Projekten', 'Umsetzung und Wahrung der Firmengrundsätze', 'Qualifications', 'Mehrjährige Berufserfahrung im Produktmanagement im Veterinär-Pharmabereich', 'Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium der Betriebswirtschaftslehre, der Veterinärmedizin oder vergleichbare Ausbildung', 'Erfahrung im Marketing an Tierärzte in Zusammenspiel mit einer Vertriebsorganisation', 'Kommerzielles Gespür und ausgeprägte Projektmanagementfähigkeiten inkl. description: ['The Nordic', 'Poultry Business Unit', 'in', 'MSD Animal Health', 'has one of the industry’s most innovative portfolios of vaccines and pharmaceuticals and an exciting pipeline.', 'We have now a position available for a Technical Account Manager based in Southern Sweden/Eastern Denmark to strengthen our focus on technical support in the Nordic countries.', 'The position is part of MSD’s Nordic sales organization and includes responsibility for:', 'Technical customer support of MSD’s current product and device portfolio', 'Initiating field trials and developing marketing activities in collaboration with the team', 'Participation in conferences, organization of scientific meetings', 'Qualifications', 'Educational background: Veterinary Science', 'Minimum 3 years relevant experience in the veterinary poultry sector', 'Knowledge of the Danish and Swedish poultry industry is a clear advantage', 'Willing to be part of a team where projects and activities are mutually agreed', 'A strong sense of ownership in driving results', 'Ability to work proactively with a structured and analytical mindset', 'Good working IT/digital skills', 'Positive attitude, enthusiastic and creative', 'Interest in a long-term relationship is appreciated', 'Language:', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.', 'Proficiency in Danish or Swedish is a clear advantage.', 'Geographical coverage:', 'Based in Southern Sweden/Eastern Denmark.', 'Travel:', 'The position constitutes of 60% field work in the Nordics. Presence at the Copenhagen office is expected one day per week.', 'Point of Contact:', 'Further information regarding the position can be addressed to Heike Köhler-Aanesen, Nordic Poultry Business Unit Director (phone: +47 92665146/ e-mail: heike.kohler-aanesen@msd.com).', 'We look forward to receiving your written application and CV in English.', 'About MSD Animal Health', '- THE SCIENCE OF HEALTHIER ANIMALS', 'MSD Animal Health is a global research-based company that develops, produces and markets a wide range of veterinary medicine and service solutions. We offer one of the pharmaceutical industry’s most innovate portfolios preventing and controlling diseases within all the major therapy areas of both production animals and pets. Working with more than 100 current research projects it is the goal of MSD Animal Health to become the leading force within the development of new, valuable veterinary pharmaceuticals - and thereby improve animal health, ensure the future production of healthy quality food products, protect public health and help owners and their pets enjoy their life together.', 'MSD Animal Health Nordic Cluster consists of 5 different business units covering companion animals, swine, ruminant/equine, poultry and aqua and operates across borders within the Nordic Area.', 'MSD Animal Health offers', 'MSD offers an attractive job in a company with a leading position within the Nordics. The position offers a market competitive and attractive salary package. We invest in the development of our people and give plenty of opportunities for individual development and increasing responsibility.', 'About MSD in the Nordics', 'For over 125 years and counting MSD has revolutionised global health care. Today, more than 800 people work for MSD in the Nordics alone. Innovation is our life’s blood, and you will be a part of developing new and customer centric health care solutions that go beyond medicine to help people be well and live better lives during treatment. We have a strong pipeline of products within medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies and animal health products. We work every day to make healthcare accessible to as many as possible, which requires top talent within both R&D;, marketing, finance, health economy and policy shaping. Globally, we operate in 140 countries and demonstrate our commitment to increasing access to health care through far-reaching policies, programs and partnerships. For more information, visit', 'www.msd.dk', 'Other Locations:', 'SE', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']
