description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Senior Micro Lab Analyst', '[MSD Brinny]', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BRINNY', "MSD Brinny is a leading facility for the development, testing and manufacturing of new biologics and vaccines, exporting to over 90 countries across the world. With a team of approximately 500 people, MSD Brinny specialises in the late-stage development and commercial supply of biotech products, including some of the company's most successful and life-changing treatments for oncology, hepatitis C and rheumatoid arthritis.", 'The Brinny site has been a vibrant part of the local Innishannon community for nearly 35 years and is now one of the region’s largest employers. MSD has invested €130m in the site since 2016 as a result of increased global demand for MSD medicines and vaccines which will see MSD Brinny further expand its production facilities and capacity to meet this demand.', 'Our Manufacturing Division, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'MSD Brinny have an opportunity for a QC Microbiology Senior Analyst to join our team. The purpose of the Quality Senior Analyst is to provide laboratory support, expertise and co-ordination of analysis,release and testing of samples to support Quality release of product.', 'The teamworking style is one of collaboration, coaching and facilitating to provide solutions to the Quality CoE team to support a High Performance Organisation.', 'He/She will contribute to the High Performance culture within the Quality CoE by providing an inclusive environment to enable team members to achieve their best work.', 'The Quality Senior Analyst is an active member of the cross functional CoE Team, providing support, guidance and expertise to ensure the success of the Quality Control. The Quality Senior Analyst will model the MSD Leadership behaviors and understand the MPS principles to drive a culture of continuous improvement building a High Performance Organisation.', 'The Quality Senior Analyst will participate and comply with our manufacturing division Quality Management System (QMS) requirements, including ownership, as relevant to you.', 'I Primary activities/responsibilities:', 'Co-ordination of analysis, release and testing of samples.', 'Operational Testing and ATT (if applicable).', 'Scheduling of Laboratory activities.', 'Training of Laboratory personnel.', 'Delivery of area performance to meet or exceed functional unit goals.', 'Co-ordination and Implementation of Continuous Improvement Initiatives.', 'Ensure compliance with safety, health, environmental and cGMP and other applicable regulations.', 'Implementation of Lean Labs.', 'Participate in corporate and regulatory audits.', 'Problem solving to get to root cause of issues.', 'Compliance with 6S standards.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Coaching others by sharing your skill-set and expertise.', 'Focus on Customers, Including Patients', 'Focus the entire organization on delivering value for customers, including patients, by understanding and meeting their needs.', 'Collaborate', 'Actively listen and seek to understand differing perspectives; work together to achieve the common goals of the new MSD.', 'Act with Candor and Courage', 'Speak openly, honestly and with conviction; have the courage to take appropriate risks and make difficult decisions.', 'Make Rapid, Disciplined Decisions', 'Make timely decisions at the right level with the right data, and support them once made.', 'Drive Results', 'Set clear performance standards; overcome obstacles; hold ourselves and others accountable for achieving results.', 'Demonstrate Ethics & Integrity', 'Adhere to the highest standards of trustworthy and ethical behavior in all interactions and hold others to the same standards; comply with all laws, policies and regulations; identify and address ethical issues without hesitation.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'Reporting to QC Microbiology Supervisor', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'General', 'Expected:', 'Knowledge of working practices required for a Microbiology laboratory', 'Good verbal and written communication skills', 'Ability to plan and organize effective and efficient work schedules.', 'Ability to set and maintain high standards of laboratory housekeeping.', 'Demonstrated ability to problem solve.', 'Ability to respond to changing priorities', 'Demonstrated ability to fully realize improvement initiatives.', 'PC skills such as Excel, Word, PowerPoint', 'Technical', 'Demonstrated knowledge in more than one pharmaceutical and/or chemical manufacturing operation (e.g. Quality, Science etc).', 'At least three years experience in the Pharmaceutical industry or a similar operating environment which includes experience in a QC Laboratory or equivalent – as applicable.', 'A good knowledge of cGMP, GLP, site and corporate Quality Systems', 'People', 'Demonstrated high level of scientific problem solving and facilitation skills', 'Education', '3rd level Degree in Science or related discipline.', 'Preference for Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is an equal opportunity employer, proudly embracing diversity in all of its manifestations.', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'No', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Position Overview', 'Менеджер по работе с ключевыми клиентами (KAM)', 'c', 'оздает основы для долгосрочного сотрудничества и инновационных контрактов с больницами. КАМ налаживает партнерские отношения с ключевыми лицами, принимающими решение в больницах, и поддерживает отношения с ключевыми административными ответственными лицами (включая', 'локальных плательщиков), чтобы влиять на процесс принятия решений, для фасилитации госпитального бизнеса. КАМ является основным контактным лицом для больничных аптек и менеджмента больницы.', 'KAM покрывает полный портфель MSD в рамках своих ключевых учетных аккаунтов и отвечает за бизнес-результат данных учетных аккаунтов в его / ее зоне ответственности (ВИЧ, противогрибковые средства, антибиотики, вакцины).', 'KAM имеет четкое понимание ценностного предложения по продуктам MSD для того, чтоб формировать тендеры и формуляры с наиболее подходящими клиентами.', 'КАМ ведет переговоры с больницами. КАМ делает свой вклад в тендерный процесс , обеспечивая подготовку и подачу предложений при проведении тендера.', 'КАМ дает информацию главврачам по сегментации аккаунтов и определению приоритетов продаж по всему региону, чтобы максимизировать все рыночные возможности и эффективно использовать ресурсы.', 'KAM также строит внутренние отношения и координирует кросс-функциональные команды, а также собирает межфункциональные команды в MSD для выполнения проектов, обеспечивающих потребности клиентов и бизнеса.', 'КАМ работает в качестве консультанта для руководителей больниц и для Менеджера по продукту при разработке стратегии бренда и франшизы (передает информацию от клиента, идеи для клиентских решений, стратегии обслуживания и скидок / ценообразования и т. д.).', 'Major Activities', 'Основные зоны отвественности и задачи', 'Разработка стратегии, таргетинг и сегментация', '•', 'Бизнес-анализ состояния больницы (макросреда, уровень аккаунта) и определяет точки соприкосновения с бизнес-целями', 'MSD', '• Активно участвует в «диагностике» аккаунта, включая потребности клиентов и сегментацию', '• разрабатывает планы действий центра по проектам в сотрудничестве со всеми внутренними заинтересованными сторонами и координирует реализацию соответствующих мероприятий, включая оценочные решения', '• Управление ресурсами', '• Определяет и достигает измеримых целей и', 'KPI', '.', 'Разработка ценностных предложений и решения для клиентов', '• Определяет ценностные отличия продуктов и услуг', 'MSD', 'для потребностей каждого аккаунта. Понимает, как продукты', 'MSD', 'соответсвуют клиническим потребностям, дифференцируя профили между конкурирующими продуктами.', '• Использует ресурсы в рамках', 'MSD', 'для обеспечения лучших результатов в ключевых больницах', '• Сотрудничает с отделом Управления доступом к рынкам; Менеджером по продукту; Медицинским отделом, Отделом логистики; Руководством (при необходимости), бэк-офисом, а также с бухгалтерией - для внедрения принятых решений и поддержания постоянного желаемого качества обслуживания клиентов. Предоставляет информацию о клиентах и действиях посредством активного использования существующей', 'CRM', '-системы', '• Использует модели', 'HTA', '(', 'Health', 'Technology', 'Assessment', '- главным образом, данные фармацевтического рынка) для внедрения продуктов', 'MSD', 'в больницы.', 'Построение отношений', '• Связывается и взаимодействует с многими заинтересованными сторонами и сообществами в больницах, а также налаживает сотрудничество между больницами и местными плательщиками', '• Является ключевым контактом для менеджмента больницы и больничных аптек и других ключевых заинтересованных сторон', '• KAM управляет запросами от больничных аптек, связанных с ошибками выставления счетов, проблемами с поставками продуктов, отзыва продуктов и получения общей информации о политике и практике ценообразования MSD', '• Обеспечивает высокую степень доверия со стороны внешних и внутренних клиентов.', 'Переговоры', '• Ведет переговоры (включая решения / цену / скидки) и разрабатывает предложения с добавленной стоимостью, чтобы эффективно выполнять бизнес-цели', '• Мониторит обсуждения формуляров и проведение тендеров', '• Обеспечивает надлежащий уровень финансирования больниц среди смежных терапевтических областей, тесно сотрудничая с местным плательщиком.', 'Qualifications', 'Expertise Required / Core Competences', 'Образование и опыт:', '• 3-5 лет опыта работы в фармацевтической промышленности', '• Степень магистра', '• Знание языков: русский, украинский - разговорный. Английский - приветствуется', '• Опыт работы в больничной среде и / или с ценообразованием и реимбурсацией / управлением тендерами', '• Опыт, связанный с управлением болезнями / экономикой здравоохранения / политикой общественного здравоохранения, является преимуществом', 'Другие требования:', '• Широкое понимание фармацевтического бизнеса', '• Навыки ведения переговоров', '• Хорошие аналитические способности', '• Навыки управления проектами', '• Удобная работа независимо', '• Стратегические, аналитические и очень хорошие административные навыки', '• Не бояться взаимодействовать с заинтересованными сторонами высокого уровня (лицами, обладающими полномочиями)', '•', 'Предпринимательское мышление', '#LI-DNI']

title: Key Account Manager

description: ['MSD’s Business Service Center (BSC), located across three regions (Americas, Europe, and Asia), are responsible for the timely and efficient delivery of standardized, global financial processes. The BSC – Europe in Prague, Czech Republic will be responsible for the execution and delivery of a broad range of financial services and processes across MSD business divisions and markets for the Europe region.', 'The', 'Source to Settle (StS) Invoice processing Associate Specialist', 'will work within the BSC and will be responsible for the execution and delivery of invoice processing services for markets under their remit. The Associate Specialist will have overall responsibility for ensuring their market is hitting required targets and should have an end-to-end view of all matters pertaining to StS and be the expert on their market. They will have overall responsibility for all IP related tasks and related reporting for their markets.', 'Primary responsibilities for this position include, but are not limited to, the following:', 'Processes accurately AP documents for vendors/suppliers in SAP system within deadlines by priority and ensuring payment terms', 'Processing data in accordance with internal controls and country legal requirements', 'Solving queries received and responding accurately and in a timely manner', 'Check and reconcile supplier statements', 'Close cooperation with other departments', 'Support cross functional teams and management with reporting activities', 'Review, validate, and update all relevant process manuals to reflect current practice', 'Proactively assist on implementation of process improvements and optimization', 'Deliver SLA targets through goal-setting and continuous effective feed-back throughout the year in line with corporate deadlines', 'Qualifications', 'Education &', 'Experience:', 'Bachelor’s Degree required, preferably in Accounting or Finance', 'A minimum of 1 years of demonstrated work experience within a General Accounting and/or Finance Shared Services, and/or StS/PtP area', 'Business-level English (speaking and writing) required; additional languages are an advantage', 'Experience of working with larger enterprise customers and institutional customers required', 'Experience of working in an organization providing services across multiple markets or geographies', 'Experience with BPO collaboration/transition', 'Technical and Soft skills Requirements:', 'Experience using SAP is desired', 'Different ERP system experience is an advantage', 'Good knowledge of MS Excel', 'Effective team player with a collaborative focus', 'Ability to take ownership of a task with minimal direction and bring to a successful conclusion', 'Excellent organization skills ensuring tasks are prioritized correctly to meet business objectives', 'Must be comfortable in an environment of changing technologies and processes, and demonstrate flexibility in adjusting to new ways of working', 'Ability to operate independently and navigate through change', 'Strong oral and written communication and interpersonal skills', 'Works effectively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, under pressure', 'Problem solving and analytical skills with a proactive management style to implement new processes', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Key Account Manager Job

description: ['MSD es un líder global en el cuidado de la salud con una diversificada cartera de medicinas de prescripción, vacunas y productos de consumo para la salud, así como productos para la salud animal.    Hoy en día, nos encontramos construyendo un nuevo tipo de compañía de salud – que esté listo para ayudar a crear un futuro más sano para todos nosotros.', 'Nuestra capacidad de superación depende de la integridad, conocimiento, imaginación, habilidad, diversidad y trabajo en equipo de gente como usted.   Con este fin, nos esforzamos en crear un ambiente de respeto mutuo, estímulo y trabajo en equipo.   Como parte de nuestro equipo global, usted tendrá la oportunidad de colaborar con colegas talentosos y dedicados, mientras su carrera se desarrolla y expande.', 'OBJETIVOS GENERALES:', 'Se encarga de cerrar la venta directa de productos con el fin de cumplir con las cuotas individuales,  del equipo y los objetivos de negocio de la organización. Crea, monitorea y revisa los planes de generación de oportunidades. Responde a las preguntas de los clientes . Efectivamente construye una buena relación con los clientes mediante el sondeo de necesidades y recomendar soluciones apropiadas. Logra objetivos de ventas mensuales, trimestrales y anuales, garantizando al mismo tiempo la experiencia del cliente y la satisfacción óptima siguiendo los procesos y procedimientos establecidos.', 'El Representante de Ventas será parte de un equipo especializado, el cual tendrá el objetivo fundamental de promocionar el portafolio de Salud Femenina, a un grupo de médicos especialistas en las patologías mencionadas, así como la gestión de venta y negociaciones.', 'El área de cobertura será  territorios de Antofagasta, Iquique, Arica y Calama .', 'PRINCIPALES RESPONSABILIDADES:', '•\tVisita a los actores clave de la salud (médicos, farmacéuticos, enfermeras ) que conducen la información técnica y científica sobre los productos contenidos en la red de promoción. Conoce objetivo propuesto por compañía, la frecuencia, secuencia y el calendario;', '•\tSupervisar y validar el panel de las partes interesadas e identificar periódicamente nuevos actores para productos de MSD;', '•\tSatisfacer la demanda de los objetivos establecidos para el territorio, ya sea en hospitales, clínicas y / o departamentos de salud;', '•\tCumplir con todos los procedimientos y políticas de la empresa (FCPA, carta contrato), incluidos los relacionados con la ética y la conducta empresarial;', '•\tLograr los objetivos establecidos para el territorio y cuota de mercado a través de las visitas médicas;', '•\tDesarrollar un plan de negocio para cada territorio, en consonancia con las metas cuantitativas y cualitativas del distrito', '•\tEstablecer prioridades; establecer objetivos cuantitativos y cualitativos desafiantes; estimar los plazos y las actividades de los programas e itinerarios de trabajo; identificar y asignar los recursos;', '•\tDesarrollar un plan de negocios basado en el uso de técnicas y habilidades de ventas para apoyar y retener a los principales prescriptores de su especialidad;', '•\tDesarrollar relaciones con los clientes internos y externos de manera proactiva, centrándose en escuchar y responder;', '•\tMantenga un registro exacto de las visitas médicas y los informes de gastos, enviando periódicamente en unos plazos determinados;', '•\tFomentar el trabajo en equipo;', '•\tCrear y gestionar actividades preventivas y educativas de las patologías relacionadas con los productos de MSD que tiene bajo su responsabilidad.', 'Qualifications', 'Educación', '•\t Título universitario  - preferiblemente en área biológica', 'Experiencia:', '•\tExperiencia en la posición de Representante de Ventas mínima de 4 años – Preferentemente  de compañías multinacionales', '•\tDeseable experiencia en área de Salud Femenina', '•\tAmplio conocimiento del sistema de salud nacional local, cómo funciona y cuáles son los principales actores.', '•\tIdealmente representante sea de la zona', '•\tPostulante internos y externos', 'Competencias:', '•\tCapacidad para analizar problemas y encontrar soluciones.', '•\tAptitud para el trabajo en equipo.', '•\tExcelentes relaciones interpersonales y habilidad para fomentar relaciones con diferentes clientes internos y externos.', '•\tPlanificación y ejecución.', '•\tCapacidad de autogestión.', '•\tManejo básico Excel', 'Nuestros empleados son la clave del éxito de nuestra empresa.  Demostramos nuestro compromiso con nuestros empleados ofreciéndoles un programa de recompensas competitivo y valioso.  Los beneficios en MSD están diseñados para apoyar la amplia gama de objetivos, necesidades y estilos de vida de nuestros empleados y de muchas de las personas que constituyen lo más importante en sus vidas.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'No', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD  is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. Today, we are building a new kind of healthcare company – one that is ready to help create a healthier future for all of us.  Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of an individual like you.  To this end, we strive to create an environment of mutual respect, encouragement and teamwork. As part of our global team, you will have the opportunity to collaborate with talented and dedicated colleagues while developing and expanding your career.', 'As a new addition to our Digital Marketing Team, we are looking for a Digital Campaign Architect (m/f) to join our MSD Site in Lucerne, Switzerland and be part of the digital transformation that our commercial organization is undergoing (Full-time, indefinite).', 'As an expert in digital customer engagement, the Digital Campaign Architect (m/f) will operate the Digital Marketing and Content Management Tools to create, implement and execute digital marketing campaigns, contributing to the overarching digital brand strategy and ensuring that MSD effectively engages with customers with personalized content, through the right channel, at the right time.', 'The primary activities include but are not limited to:', 'Co-create, implement and execute automated digital marketing campaigns that will deliver a seamless customer experience across all digital channels together with the Brand Manager', 'Measure and Report on the performance of all digital marketing campaigns', 'Drive channel performance and “Digital Reach” by defining measurable key performance indicators and tracking the progress/success of the digital marketing activities', 'Ensure that all activities in e-Marketing adhere to medical, legal and compliance regulations', 'Collaborate closely with local cross-functional teams and engage marketing and customer-facing colleagues with digital offerings to ensure available channels are fully leveraged and high-performing', 'Collaborate closely with local and regional stakeholders in cross-functional teams such as Marketing and Sales, Customer Solutions, IT, etc. to drive digital projects and build up digital platforms that add value to the franchises', 'Share best practices in local and regional teams', 'Qualifications', 'Apprenticeship, bachelor’s degree or international equivalent from an accredited educational institution in economics, communication, public relations, information technology or relevant Business experience', '3-5 years’ work experience in a digital-mature environment e.g. consumer goods, marketing consultancy, digital media agency or technology Start-Up', '3 years’ hands-on experience with HTML programming, JavaScript and CSS; as well as experience with Photoshop', 'Experience with marketing technology (Marketing Automation, Content Management, Social Media Marketing, A/B Testing, UX/UI, SEO/SEM, etc.)', 'Further digital education e.g. online marketing would be advantageous', 'Strong communication and presentation skills', 'Business fluency in German and English. Good knowledge of French would be advantageous', 'Data driven personality with passion for technology, who enjoys hands-on work with state of art Digital Marketing Tools', 'A self-starter, with motivation and goal-driven', 'Sensitive and open to the world of pharmaceuticals with all its opportunities and restrictions', 'We offer:', 'An exciting opportunity within a stable and growing company', 'Development and career opportunities within the company', 'A competent, motivated and great team', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Interested in becoming part of a dynamic, developing team and contributing your know-how to an innovative environment that allows you to show initiative and that offers long-term perspectives? Please apply using the link to our career site!', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD Tiergesundheit ist mit über 50 Standorten ein weltweit tätiges, forschungsorientiertes Unternehmen mit einem breiten Spektrum an Veterinärmedizin und Dienstleistungen.', 'Unser Ziel ist es, Werte zu schaffen und zum stetigen Erfolg unserer Kunden beizutragen. Kurz gesagt: Wir zielen darauf ab, das Vertrauen unserer Kunden jeden Tag neu zu gewinnen. Indem wir die Bedürfnisse aller Interessensgruppen aufnehmen und die Kundenzufriedenheit im Fokus unseres Geschäfts steht, bieten wir innovative, hoch qualitative und vor allen Dingen lösungsorientierte Produkte und Dienstleistungen für Nutz- und Heimtiere an.', 'Als Mitarbeiter/in in der tierärztlichen Fachberatung Schwein verfügen Sie über umfassende fachliche Kenntnisse im Bereich der Schweinekrankheiten sowie deren Behandlungs- und Prophylaxemöglichkeiten.', 'Sie sind als kompetente/r Ansprechpartner/in und Betreuer/in für alle Produktfragen verantwortlich für den Transfer der tiermedizinisch-wissenschaftlichen Informationen an die Tierärzte in der Praxis. Als tierärztliche Fachberatung Schwein im Gebiet sind Sie verantwortlich in der regionalen Betreuung der Kunden u.a. über die MSD Serviceangebote und den Aufbau einer intensiven Kundenbeziehung sowie von Netzwerken. Durch verschiedene Aktivitäten wie Kunden- und Betriebsbesuche, von MSD organisierte tierärztliche Fortbildungsveranstaltungen sowie Repräsentation des Unternehmens bei Kongressen und Fachtagungen unterstützen Sie erfolgreich Ihr Gebiet.', 'Gebiet:  Nordwest Deutschland', 'Wichtigste Aufgaben und Zuständigkeiten:', 'Beratung im Bereich Schwein, regionale und überregionalen Verantwortung für Anfragen von Praxen insbesondere zu Impfstoffen, Impfkonzepten und diagnostischen Services', 'Bearbeiten von Nebenwirkungen und Qualitätsmängeln (Pharmakovigilanz)', 'Expertise für Krankheitserreger des Schweins, insbesondere PRRS', 'Erarbeitung, Betreuung und Veröffentlichung wissenschaftlicher Untersuchungen', 'Planung und Umsetzung von Veranstaltungen, Besuchen und Vorträgen', 'Unterstützung des Außen- und Innendienstes (vor allem Produktmanagement)', 'Teilnahme an Fachmessen, Kongressen und Fortbildungen', 'Erarbeitung von Vorschlägen für das Produktmanagement', 'Mitarbeit in Projekten/Projektgruppen', 'Kontaktpflege zu Meinungsbildnern, Universitäten und Fachpresse', 'Umsetzung und Wahrung der Firmengrundsätze', 'Qualifications', 'Als erfolgreicher Kandidat für diese Vakanz bringen Sie idealerweise folgende Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten mit:', 'Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium der Veterinärmedizin mit Promotion', 'mehrjährige Berufserfahrung im Bereich Schwein mit Focus klinische Diagnostik/Routinediagnostik, im Pharmabereich mit Schwerpunkt Nutztierpraxis Schwein', 'Bereitschaft zur mehrtägiger Reisetätigkeit', 'Interesse für Wissenschaft und Beratung unserer Kunden', 'starke Präsentationsfähigkeit', 'gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift', 'gute Anwenderkenntnisse in MS-Office (Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook)', 'Freude an Kommunikation und Arbeit im Team', 'Flexibilität im Alltag', 'Wir bieten:', 'Attraktives Gehaltspaket', 'Betriebliche Altersvorsorge plus Entgeltumwandlung in den Chemiepensionfond', '30 Tage Urlaub plus Urlaubsgeld', 'Firmenwagen', 'Interne und externe Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten', 'Flexible Arbeitszeiteinteilung', 'Homeoffice Möglichkeit', 'Mitarbeitervergünstigungen', 'Employee Assistance Program', 'Ihre Rolle bei MSD ist von entscheidender Bedeutung, um der Welt dabei zu helfen, neue Durchbrüche zu erzielen, die kommende Generationen betreffen. Wir zählen auf Ihre Fähigkeiten und Ihren Erfindungsreichtum, um einen bedeutsamen Beitrag zum weltweiten medizinischen Fortschritt zu leisten. Bei MSD erfinden wir fürs Leben.', 'Wir haben Ihr Interesse geweckt und Sie möchten Teil einer wachsenden und sich entwickelnden Organisation werden? Bitte keine Anrufe oder E-Mails. Alle Lebensläufe, die von Personalberatungen per E-Mail, im Internet oder in irgendeiner Form und/oder Methode an einen Mitarbeiter von MSD gesendet werden, ohne dass eine gültige schriftliche Vermittlungsvereinbarung für diese Position besteht, gelten als alleiniges Eigentum von MSD. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Sur son secteur, sous la responsabilité du Directeur Régional, et en conformité avec la Charte de la « Visite Médicale », la carte APM, ainsi que dans le respect de l’éthique professionnelle et des règles, réglementations et procédures en vigueur, le Délégué Parcours de Soins se positionne et interagit avec les professionnels de Santé dans le cadre d’une démarche centrée sur le bénéfice patient, au travers entre autres de l’optimisation de son parcours de soin et de sa prise en charge.', 'Dans le respect de la stratégie de l’entreprise et des priorités définies dans les domaines thérapeutiques des médicaments du portefeuille dont il a la charge, le Délégué Parcours de Soins s’inscrit dans une démarche qualitative d’accompagnement des Professionnels de Santé, notamment dans :', '• l’utilisation de la donnée (données cliniques, données économiques ou organisationnelles etc…) pour accompagner les professionnels de santé dans l’identification des points d’amélioration de la prise en charge du patient et de son parcours de soin,', '• le bon usage du médicament', '• l’identification des éventuels services ou solutions MSD standards de nature à répondre à ces besoins,', '• la mise en place effective des services et solutions standards proposées par MSD,', '• la mesure des résultats obtenus.', 'Cette approche Parcours peut consister à conduire de projets avec les Clients.', 'Il contribue également au développement du chiffre d’affaires des produits de son portefeuille sur son secteur. A ce titre, il est le garant de la promotion et du bon usage du portefeuille de médicaments auprès des Professionnels de Santé c’est-à-dire les médecins, les professions para médicales – comme les infirmières, sages-femmes, etc.- les pharmaciens hospitaliers) et les autres acteurs de santé de son secteur intéressés par les pathologies dont il a la charge. Il promeut les approches pharmaco-économiques de son portefeuille ou de ses pathologies.', 'Il construit son approche en maximisant l’utilisation des ressources digitales à travers la donnée, qu’il s’agisse de l’utilisation des informations mises à sa disposition pour une meilleure connaissance de ses clients et la personnalisation de ses interactions ou de l’enrichissement des données de l’entreprise grâce à sa connaissance Clients dans le cadre de ses interactions et à travers l’utilisation des outils digitaux pour amplifier et maximiser la qualité de ses interactions.', 'Il structure ses actions sur la base d’un plan d’action sectoriel qu’il établit en cohérence avec la stratégie de MSD France et en collaboration transversale avec ses partenaires internes (Responsables Grands Comptes, Spécialistes Solutions Santé,…) en intégrant la connaissance de son environnement et des Professionnels de Santé, les aspects médico-économique et de l’offre de MSD en matière de produits, services et solutions.', 'Il assure la mise en place et le suivi opérationnel de ce plan, validé par le Directeur Régional auquel il reporte.', 'Activités principale', '1. Plan d’action et suivi.', 'En fonction de la stratégie de l’entreprise et des priorités définies pour les médicaments du portefeuille dont il a la charge, de la connaissance de son environnement intégrant les aspects médico-économiques, pharmaco-thérapeutiques et réglementaires, de ses Clients et de leurs besoins, de l’offre de MSD articulée autour des produits, des services et des solutions, le Délégué Parcours de Soins définit et structure ses actions à destination des Professionnels de Santé et en regard de ses objectifs.', 'Ces actions intègrent :', '• La promotion des produits au travers des différents modes d’interaction en face-à-face (Visites, Staff hospitaliers, Relations Professionnelles, Congrès,…) ou à distance pour enrichir et maximiser la qualité des échanges avec les Professionnels de Santé', '• L’accompagnement des professionnels dans la démarche d’optimisation du parcours de soin de leurs patients avec des phases d’analyse des besoins, d’accompagnement dans la mise en place de solutions standards et de suivi des résultats obtenus. Cette approche Parcours peut être conduite dans le cadre de projets avec les Clients.', '• La mise en place de projets spécifiques', 'En fonction d’objectifs stratégiques qui permettent d’atteindre ses objectifs, le délégué Parcours de Soin définit ses actions en utilisant toutes les voix d’approche et d’interaction avec les professionnels de santé (médecins ou non). Pour réaliser ses actions, le délégué choisira et utilisera les moyens proportionnellement adaptés à l’univers thérapeutique, au cycle de vie du produit, aux besoins des professionnels de santé dans le respect des règles éthiques et réglementaires, que ce soit :', '• Visites face-face,', '• Relations Professionnelles,symposium, congrès…,', '• Visites à distance (e-detailing, Webex…),', '• Et/ou toute action de communication mise à disposition par le laboratoire (notamment Ipad) ou toute initiative locale qu’il propose lui-même.', 'L’ensemble est formalisé dans un plan d’action sectoriel validé par le Directeur Régional.', 'Le Délégué Parcours de Soin analyse et monitore ensuite de manière régulière les résultats des produits de son portefeuille, analyse la concurrence, l’état d’avancement de son plan d’action, les budgets éventuels pour ajuster son plan d’action.', '2. Mise en oeuvre', 'Le Délégué Parcours de Soin déploie le plan d’action sectoriel en mettant en oeuvre les différentes les actions identifiées.', 'Pour cela :', '• Il planifie son activité en fonction des besoins des Clients et en optimisant l’organisation de son activité.', '• Il se coordonne avec les autres acteurs du secteur et notamment les Responsables Grands Comptes et le Médical.', '• Il communique de manière interactive pour comprendre et répondre aux besoins du Professionnel de Santé, dans le respect des éléments de bon usage du médicament et des documents de la liste positive et appuie son discours sur des preuves scientifiques.', '• Il maîtrise le processus d’achat des Hôpitaux, des budgets pharmaceutiques et des référencements afin d’assurer le référencement des produits au travers des acteurs du Comedims en collaboration avec le Responsable Grands Comptes.', '• Pour les Professionnels de Santé engagés dans une approche centrée sur l’amélioration du parcours de soin de leurs patients, il met en oeuvre la démarche et les outils permettant d’accompagner les Professionnels de Santé, de la phase de diagnostic à la phase de mise en place de solutions standards et de suivi des progrès réalisés.', '• Dans toutes ses interactions, il maximise l’utilisation des outils digitaux mis à sa disposition pour enrichir leur contenu et apporter une plus grande valeur ajoutée aux Professionnels de Santé.', "• Il organise et suit les invitations congrès et coordonne l’intervention d’orateurs dans le cadre du plan d'action prévu.", '• Dans le cadre d’intervention d’orateurs, le Délégué Parcours de Soin identifie, suit et prépare les orateurs selon le plan d’action sectoriel prévu et avec le DMR pour la formation de ces orateurs.', '• Il reporte dans les systèmes les informations issues de ses interactions pour enrichir la connaissance du Client afin de partager ces informations avec les autres partenaires et également de permettre aux équipes Marketing Agile de mettre en oeuvre des actions personnalisées répondant aux besoins des Clients, soit directement par des canaux digitaux, soit par l’intermédiaire des Délégués Parcours de soin.', '• Il saisit son activité et gère les activités administratives en conformité avec les règles établies par le laboratoire.', '3. Développement et entretien des connaissances', 'Dans une démarche de développement et d’entretien continu de ses connaissances le Délégué Parcours de Soins :', '• Réalise de manière régulière les formations obligatoires lui permettant d’exercer son activité en conformité avec les obligations règlementaires ou définies dans le cadre des procédures internes.', '• Maintient un très bon niveau de connaissance scientifique sur les fondamentaux et l’actualité des médicaments qu’il présente ainsi que sur les pathologies et leur environnement (y compris les enjeux médico-économiques) afin de mieux adapter son offre et en utilisant l’ensemble des moyens mis à sa disposition, formation en présentiel, formation e.learning, revue de presse, etc..-', '• Active les ressources mises à sa disposition via différents canaux, pour se former en fonction de ses besoins spécifiques dans le cadre de son activité.', '• Valide de manière régulière les actions réalisées pour répondre à nos obligations règlementaires ou mesurer les progrès réalisés et déterminer de nouveaux besoins de développement.', '4. Compliance', 'Afin de garantir la conformité de ses actions avec la Charte de la « Visite Médicale », la carte APM, ainsi que dans le respect de l’éthique professionnelle et des règles, réglementations et procédures en vigueur, le Délégué Parcours de Soins :', "• Maintient un très bon niveau de connaissance scientifique sur les fondamentaux et l’actualité des médicaments qu’il présente ainsi que sur les pathologies et leur environnement (y compris les enjeux médico-économiques) afin de mieux adapter son offre et en utilisant l'ensemble des moyens mis à sa disposition, formation en présentiel, formation e.learning, revue de presse, etc..-", '• Utilise une communication interactive pour comprendre et répondre aux besoins du professionnel de santé, dans le respect des éléments de bon usage du médicament et des documents de la liste positive.', "• S'appuie sur des preuves scientifiques et s'adapte à la situation et aux besoins des professionnels de santé.", '• Est capable de mettre en évidence les points forts et les limites des produits et de toute autre donnée discutée conformément aux éléments de bon usage du médicament présenté et des documents de la liste positive.', '• Remonte les informations de pharmacovigilance dans le respect des règles établies par le laboratoire.', "• Ecoute, partage les informations et fait activement participer les autres collaborateurs de l’entreprise qui interagissent avec le même professionnel de santé, en vue d'assurer une cohérence et une continuité.", "• Dans le cadre d'un processus continu et dans le respect des règles de l’entreprise et de l’éthique professionnelle, le Délégué Parcours de Soins prépare chaque interaction en analysant les comptes-rendus des visites antérieures avec le professionnel de santé et en fixant des objectifs pour chaque entretien. à jour des informations exactes et en temps utile sur les professionnels de santé dans le système CRM en respect des exigences CNIL et en conformité avec les règles établies par le laboratoire; est description: ['El Clinical Safety Scientist (CSS) es responsable de respaldar los informes de seguridad en los ensayos clínicos realizados en múltiples áreas terapéuticas como parte de los programas de desarrollo de productos en investigación a lo largo del desarrollo en etapa temprana y tardía. Bajo la dirección del administrador, el CSS será responsable de la admisión, la revisión inicial, la gestión de consultas y la creación de informes de casos para todos los eventos de seguridad notificables según los procedimientos operativos estándar. Además, el CSS colaborará con colegas de funciones cruzadas en el desarrollo clínico, operaciones clínicas, procesamiento de casos y revisión de seguridad médica. El CSS puede participar en iniciativas interdisciplinarias o internas y / o proyectos de mejora de procesos.', 'Qualifications', 'Requisitos:', 'Profesional en medicina', 'Al menos', '1 año de experiencia en clínica', 'después de graduarse', 'Excelente habilidad de organización y priorización.', 'Capaz de trabajar bajo presión', 'Dominio del', 'inglés. (>90% oral y escrito)', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD BIOTECH, DUBLIN', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BIOTECH, DUBLIN', 'The latest addition to the MSD Ireland family is MSD Biotech, Dublin. The site will play a pivotal role in the manufacture of MSD’s biologics-based medicines, including in the area of immuno-oncology, and will expand MSD’s current internal network of biologics drug substance manufacturing plants when full manufacturing operations begin in 2021.', 'MSD Biotech Dublin, will be MSD’s first ever Large-Scale Mammalian-Based Drug Substance Facility, with the mission and ambition to manufacture breakthrough medicines from Ireland for patients around the world.', 'This facility will be a significant supplier of drug substances for one of MSD’s key treatments and will also be critical in the future supply of new biotechnology products to its global network.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'The Operational Excellence Lead is an integrated production system for how we design, manage, and continuously improve our operations and supporting business processes enabled through the development of our people. Learning and Development shapes the company’s future by building people capabilities through relevant continuous improvement learnings. As part of our Manufacturing Division network, the Biotech Dublin team will manufacture, test and release critical biologics products used globally in lifesaving medicines. To support excellence in production execution, this biologics drug substance facility (BDS) will be supported by a local, small MPS and Learning & Development (L&D;) Team made up of lean technical experts that are responsible for leading the installation of MPS across the site and Learning experts responsible for the delivery of a site wide learning plan. As a result, MPS and L&D; will be embedded into the foundation of every operational area and become the basis for how weoperate.', 'The Operational Excellence Lead will provide site support for the deployment of lean systems and processes to enabling the MSD Dublin Biotech team to produce critical biologics medicines at the highest quality, for the lowest cost, and in the shortest lead time.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', '• Utilize various lean tools, techniques and global MPS standards to design and install critical business processes and standardized work.', '• Provide teaching and coaching to effectively transfer Lean skills into the organization for the development of Lean Leaders.', '• Provide cross functional support on all elements of the lean toolkit including value stream and process mapping, standard work, tier process, 5S work place organization, Strategic A3 thinking, Hoshin Kanri, managing change, 8 wastes identification, poka yoke, Kanban etc.', '• Provide rapid improvement projects through the use of Kaizen, KATA and/or project teams.', '• Lead the development of standardized and robust process using Task Breakdown Sheets', '• Lead and support effective problem solving using the 8-step methodology to solve problems quickly.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'Biotech Dublin MPS/L&D; Director', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE – KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'Experience', 'Required', 'Experience:', '• A minimum of 4 years working in a Toyota-based lean operations environment.', '• Hands-on application of lean tools and techniques: standardized work, scientific problem solving, value stream mapping, mistake proofing, SMED, 5S-Visual Factory, capacity analysis.', '• Proven experience in coaching and teaching others to think, behave and apply lean methods and tools.', 'Preferred Experience:', '• Experience in a Vaccines, Biologics or Sterile pharmaceutical manufacturing environment.', '• Experience with operations start-up activity including greenfield or brownfield facilities.', 'Skills', '• Excellent communication, presentation and interpersonal skills, to interface effectively with all levels of colleagues and with external customers in a team orientated manner', '• Excellent analytical and systematic problem solving skills', '• Ability to Develop visual controls and a framework to make problems visible and responds with urgency to effectively break down complex problems, lead root cause analysis, and develop effective countermeasures.', '• Lead and coach kaizen with a team to achieve multiple target conditions to achieve an overall challenge.', '• Lead kaizen to improve standardized work.', '• Strong influencing skills', 'Qualifications', '• Bachelor’s Degree in Operations Management, Engineering or related field', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 5 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

With a team of approximately 500 people, MSD Brinny specialises in the late-stage development and commercial supply of biotech products, including some of the company's most successful and life-changing treatments for oncology, hepatitis C and rheumatoid arthritis.", 'The Brinny site has been a vibrant part of the local Innishannon community for nearly 35 years and is now one of the region’s largest employers. MSD has invested €130m in the site since 2016 as a result of increased global demand for MSD medicines and vaccines which will see MSD Brinny further expand its production facilities and capacity to meet this demand.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'Purpose of Role:', 'This role is to lead the Engineering Safety Programs for Process Safety and Machinery and Equipment Safety. This successful candidate for this role will be the site principle point of contact for these topics. The successful applicant will work closely with above site stakeholders to ensure alignment of the site Process Safety plan to corporate guidelines. This is a very exciting role that will offer the right candidate exposure and experience of:', '1. Providing leadership and responsibility for significant programs.', '2. Guiding a team of Engineers and consultants to delivering the strategies.', '3. Personal and Technical development oppertunities.', '4. Site SME for consultation on technical issues and decision making.', '5. Exposure to global stakeholders.', 'Activities Within Role:', '• Act as site point of contact for process safety and machinery compliance requests/queries.', '• Ensure that all process changes and projects have the correct assessements to ensure compliance ahead of becoming operational.', '• Set up systems on-site that ensure that on-site processes, systems and procedures ensure compliance to the corporate standards.', '• Engage with above site stakeholders to understand the global Engineering and EHS standards associated with Process Safety and Equipment,Machinery Safety.', '• Develop and Deliver a site plan ensuring site compliance with the global standards.', '• Ensure that all relevant documentation is to the required standard and filed appropriately for reference.', '• Ensure the site HAZOP register is upto date and schedule periodic review Hazops as per site schedule.', '• Assist in trouble shooting issues.', '• Conduct safety audits and continuously improve the Site safety management systems', '• Oversee introduction of new products to the site from a process safety perspective.', '• Review plans and specifications for new machinery and equipment to make sure they meet safety requirements.', '• Review Corporate EHS Policies, Procedures, and Programs, provide technical expertise review and recommend improvements where necessary and apply knowledge of internal policies, regulations, and industrial processes.', '• Provide mentoring and training for site personnel.', '• Perform other activities as assigned.', 'Continuous Improvements:', 'Use Lean principles to deliver a cost efficient operating model for commercial production while not compromising EHS and Quality standards.', 'Coaching and Training:', 'Coaching others by sharing your skill-set and expertise', '*Featured', '*Hjbrinny', '*Engineering', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'Associate Director, Engineering Centre of Excellence.', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', '• 5+ Years working in a regulated environment in a similar role.', 'Qualifications', '• Bachelor of Chemical or Mechanical Engineering in a related discipline.', 'Skill-Set Expected:', '• Ability to work on own initiative to resolve issues.', '• Excellent communication skills.', '• Ability to muti-task and work to tight deadlines.', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

The difference between', 'potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and', 'inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy.', 'MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an', 'inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Right', 'now, thousands of MSD associates are working to cure the world’s most complex', 'diseases. We know that our people are the key to our success, which is why  we take pride in building teams of skilled,', 'forward-thinking individuals who contribute to MSD’s pioneering medical', 'advancements.', 'As', 'a new addition to our', 'Customer Solutions & Commercial Operations', 'Team in Switzerland, we are looking for an experienced', 'Pharmaceutical Training/Coaching Senior Specialist', '(m/f)', 'responsible', 'to develop and execute an industry-leading raining curriculum around commercial and strategic capabilities', '(Full-time, indefinite).', 'The trainer will design, develop, coordinate and execute training activities with a special focus on Sales Force Effectiveness, traditional & digital Marketing Capabilities, Strategic Account Management and Customer Solutions, among others.', 'T', 'he', 'primary activities include but are not limited to:', '<div style="mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:7.05pt;mso-element-wrap:
around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;mso-element-anchor-horizontal:
margin;mso-element-left:center;mso-element-top:11.95pt;mso-height-rule:exactly">', 'Identify and prioritize learning and development needs across the Global Human Health Teams in Switzerland, that support the organizational development', 'Develop an annual Swiss Learning and Development plan which outlines training priorities according to inputs from the Swiss Leadership Team and prioritize resources accordingly', 'Design & facilitate training interventions according to the plan developed', 'Collaborate and proactively liaise with regional & global managers to shape regional learning-programs to local needs and support the implementation of such learning programs at a local level to secure the Swiss voice', 'Collaborate with HR to ensure interventions align & support MSD’s competency framework.', 'Build a strong network of specialized Learning and Development external providers who can provide additional and/or alternative training solutions and expertise where relevant', 'Create and automate a structured onboarding process ensuring new employees are trained according to their respective functions (', 'e.g. Sales Representatives, Brand Managers, Digital Marketing Managers, Customer Solution Managers, Key Account Managers, etc.)', 'Create solid performance measures including KPIs with regards to training efforts. Consistently evaluate the delivery and quality of training and development, and its impact on behavioral change & business outcomes. Inform leadership team about training progress in the organization.', 'Serve as a consultant to the Customer Unit Leads to deliver end-user trainings according to the identified needs within', 'the', 'respective business area (e.g. leadership & skill trainings, selling with iPad etc.)', 'Secure compliance and adhesion to the medical/legal/regulatory/ pharmacovigilance/quality requirements through applying all laws, regulations, policies, SOPs and adheres to highest standards of ethics and integrity', 'Qualifications', 'Qualifications:', 'Master’s Degree, preferably as a Coaching/Training certification owner', 'Minimum of 3 years’ experience within the pharmaceutical industry', '2 years of experience in teaching, coaching and adult learning', 'Experience in leading project teams and implementing complex projects', 'Experience in Sales & Marketing and Sales Force Effectiveness would be of advantage', 'Experience teaching agile ways of working', 'Demonstrated skills in conducting performance- and needs analysis and ability to summarize and communicate needs and recommendations to management at all levels verbally and in writing', 'Strong planning and organizational skills', 'Good knowledge of excel and comfortable with data and systems', 'Business fluency in English and German (C1 level). description: ['Mit seinen verschreibungspflichtigen Arzneimitteln, Impfstoffen, Biologika, Präparaten zur Selbstmedikation und für die Tiergesundheit in verschiedenen Therapiebereichen bietet MSD in mehr als 140 Ländern umfassende und innovative Lösungen für Gesundheit. Ein besonderes Anliegen von MSD ist darüber hinaus die Verbesserung der weltweiten Gesundheitsversorgung und der verbesserte Zugang zu Medikamenten. Dafür engagiert sich MSD in weitreichenden Gesundheitsprogrammen und Partnerschaften.', 'STELLENPROFIL:', '• Ansprechpartner für unsere Topkunden aus dem Hospitalbereich in Bezug auf Verkauf, Vertrieb und Logistik unserer Produkte', '• Permanente Analyse der Warenströme aller Produkte im Hinblick auf Plausibilität und tatsächlichen Patientenbedarf der einzelnen Kliniken', '• Sicherstellung transparenter Informationen hinsichtlich des Patientenbedarfs unserer Klinikkunden', '• Betreuung Telefonhotline und Abteilungspostfach Hospital Administration', '• Bearbeitung von Kundenanfragen', '• Eingangskontrolle von eingehenden Verträgen und Konditionsvereinbarungen', '• Hinterlegung von Sonderkonditionen in SAP', '• Hinterlegung von Basispreisen in SAP', '• Hinterlegung von Bonusdaten in einer Datenbank', '• Plausibilitätsprüfung aller Abrechnungen, Bonusgutschriften, Preisdifferenzen, Rückerstattungen usw.', '• Ansprechpartner für Kollegen intern und extern, verschiedene Kundengruppen,', '• Kundendatenpflege und Überprüfung  – Neuanlagen, Änderungen, Inaktivierungen', '• AMG-Vertragsmanagement – Vertriebsbindungsverträge, behördliche Genehmigungen,', '• Erstellung von Analysen/ECC-Berichten (SAP), Aktualisierung von Cognos-Berichten,', '• Ablage/Archivierung von Verträgen, Abrechnungsberichten, Genehmigungen und sonstige Unterlagen für anfallende Audits in Dokuware und Ordnern', '• enge Zusammenarbeit mit dem Team Key Account Management, OTC, Buchhaltung, Infocenter, Pharma Mall, EMEA Customer Master Team', 'Qualifications', '• kaufmännische Ausbildung oder vergleichbare Berufserfahrung', '• zielführender Handlungsstil sowie hohes Maß an Eigeninitiative', '• analytische Fähigkeiten, gutes Zahlenverständnis', '• belastbar und geduldig', '• zeitlich sehr flexibel (Jahresende, Jahresanfang, Quartalsabrechnung, Halbjahresabrechnung, Preissenkungen, Preisänderungen)', '• Genauigkeit, Zuverlässigkeit und Termintreue', '• SAP, Excel (Pivot), Word, Access, Cognos, Appian, Netsend, Lens', '• englische Sprachkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift', '• Kenntnisse der MSD-Produkte und Klinikkunden in Bezug auf Verkauf, Vertrieb, Logistik', 'Wir bieten', '• Attraktives Gehaltspaket', '• Betriebliche Altersvorsorge plus Entgeltumwandlung in den Chemiepensionfond', '• 30 Tage Urlaub plus Urlaubsgeld', '• Interne und externe Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten', '• Flexible Arbeitszeiteinteilung', '• Mitarbeitervergünstigungen', '• Employee Assistance Program', '• Zuschuss zum Fahrradleasing', '• Kantine', '• Parkplätze für Mitarbeiter', '• Arbeitsfreistellung bei ehrenamtl. Ausübung (20 Std/Jahr)', 'Wir haben Ihr Interesse geweckt? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen (Lebenslauf, Motivationsschreiben, Zeugnisse) über unsere Karriereseite.', 'Ihre Rolle bei MSD ist von entscheidender Bedeutung, um der Welt dabei zu helfen, neue Durchbrüche zu erzielen, die kommende Generationen betreffen. Wir zählen auf Ihre Fähigkeiten und Ihren Erfindungsreichtum, um einen bedeutsamen Beitrag zum weltweiten medizinischen Fortschritt zu leisten. Bei MSD erfinden wir fürs Leben.', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen:', 'MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. Bitte keine Anrufe oder E-Mails. Alle Lebensläufe, die von Personalberatungen per E-Mail, im Internet oder in irgendeiner Form und/oder Methode an einen Mitarbeiter von MSD gesendet werden, ohne dass eine gültige schriftliche Vermittlungsvereinbarung für diese Position besteht, gelten als alleiniges Eigentum von MSD. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Sr. Mgr, Oncology, Medical Affairs Job

description: ["MSLs' engagements are based on in-depth scientific exchange in a therapeutic area and often lead to knowledge transfer initiatives and research.  The MSL, in interacting with healthcare professionals and researchers, is governed by the following guiding principles intended to deliver unbiased and evidence based information", '•         Report into Global Medical Affairs.', '•         Have no sales objectives or accountability for prescribing or sales of any MSD product and do not participate in Sales Incentive Plans (SIP).', '•         Discussions between MSLs and Health Care Professionals should focus on bi-directional exchange of ideas on disease related topics, scientific presentations of data in the public domain, and reporting scientific results (e.g. discussion of clinical study results.)', '•         Product claims must be discussed in the context of clinical and scientific exchange, and shall be consistent with prescribing information and substantiated with reference-able data.', '•         Communicate evidence with fair balance, in accordance with company and local regulatory standards.', '•         If unsolicited, responses to requests that necessitate providing information or data that is not within the current product indication, must clearly disclose that the information being provided is not contained within the regulatory-approved labeling and that MSD recommends the use of its products in accordance with its approved labeling.', '•         In response to an unsolicited request for information, the MSL can provide references, abstracts and bibliographies for the specified topics.  The literature and data that MSL use to support their discussions, as a general rule, are peer-reviewed, of the highest quality, and from databases and sites of information approved by the Medical Affairs Management Team.', '•         Slides must go thorugh proper medical review per local procedures prior to use. Refrain from use of corporate product trademark and branding in slide kits, unless expressly approved by Medical Affairs in the specific context used.', '•         Information provided will not be highlighted or annotated by the MSL.', '•         MSLs must not provide materials to Sales Representatives as these should only use materials approved in compliance with the Local Review Guidelines.', 'Qualifications', '-\tstrong scientific baseline knowledge in therapeutic area 1) Clinical doctor in the related TA (bachelor of clinical medicine degree or above) resident level at Tier III hospital (preferred) or resident to attending level at Tier II hospital. 2) Clinical doctor in the unrelated TA (bachelor degree of clinical medicine plus master degree or above) resident level (preferred) at Tier III hospital or resident to attending level at Tier II hospital. 3) Pharmacologist or Biologist (master degree of Pharmacology, or Ph.D degree for Life Science).', '-\tstrong, confident and engaging presentation skills', '-\toutstanding communication and skills and the ability to function within a team environment.', '-\thandling of multiple tasks at the same time and working under pressure', '-\tproactive "can do" attitude and passion for the science related to the products and associated therapeutic area', '-\tstrong customer facing skills, listening skills, probing skills, and flexibility', '-\tcorporate culture competencies of Leader Behaviors, including Business Integrity', '-\texperience within a clinical drug development environment preferred.', '-\tbe able to travel', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Medical Science Liaison Job

description: ['Do you enjoy working in an international environment with lots of room for personal development? Would you like to change and drive things and do you want to work on one of the key strategic initiatives of MSD Small Molecule with visibility throughout the organization?', 'At MSD we have an exciting opportunity for a', 'Learning Partner Small Molecule EMEA', 'In this role you support, influence and facilitates the design and development of strategic learning solution activities within the region/division to achieve business results. You will work with Global and Site Learning Leaders, Plant Managers, HR Business Partners, Subject Matter Experts and middle managers to understand business goal and performance needs; and through consultation and analysis identify learning solutions that drive performance and capabilities needs. You will be responsible to develop and execute global and specific learning solutions according to the division/region annual learning and capability plan. You will routinely engage with key stakeholders to ensure learning solutions continue to support and positively drive desired outcomes.', 'Main responsibilities', ':', 'Establish and sustain key relationships with key learning stakeholders in the region', 'Collaborate with stakeholders to define desired performance outcomes', 'Provide feedback and coaching on issues related to learning programs and policies', 'Identify performance needs and learning solutions or non-traditional learning solutions to drive business goals', 'Monitor, analyze, interpret, and report internal trends to make recommendations for learning solutions for the division or function', 'Interpret and discuss feedback with stakeholders, and monitor impact and cost-effectiveness of learning solutions', 'Serve as the Project Leader for learning solution development; drive the creation of modern learning journeys to support upskilling of capabilities to impact business deliverables', 'Remain current on learning and development related tools, techniques, strategies and practices to provide relevant, informed consultative advice to clients', 'Share leading learning practices with teams and stakeholders', 'Act as a liaison between the Learning Support Services function and learning stakeholders', 'Deliver training and/or support local SMEs providing training, as needed', 'Report timely feedback on learning effectiveness to the business and communicate suggestions for improvement', 'What we offer', 'We welcome you to a truly global, dynamic and challenging environment with great opportunities for personal development. Our benefits are very competitive', 'Competitive salary', 'Solid Pension Plan', 'Bonus plan subject to the company annual results', 'Flexible working arrangements', 'Welcome in our team', 'You will be part of the MSD Global Learning and Development based in US and will be supporting Small Molecule Manufacturing the EMEA Region. You will oversee 7 sites across the region in Ireland, UK, Netherlands, Brussels, and South Africa. GL&D; is team of highly qualified Learning and development professionals supporting the MSD Manufacturing Division.', 'Qualifications', 'Your profile', 'Education Minimum Requirement:', 'Bachelor’s degree required, with a preferred in Education and/or Sciences', 'Master’s degree preferred', 'Required Experience and Skills:', 'Minimum of 10 years of related experience, with minimum 5 years of leadership experience and minimum 1 year of experience facilitating / delivering learning solutions', 'P', 'referred Experience and Skills:', 'Experience in the areas of learning, talent, HR, or comparable areas', 'Experience in Global Pharmaceutical Operations or Small Molecule in the areas of Manufacturing', 'About us', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of an individual like you. To this end, we strive to create an environment of mutual respect, encouragement and teamwork. As part of our global team, you’ll have the opportunity to collaborate with talented and dedicated colleagues while developing and expanding your career.', 'Other Locations:', 'BE;  LV;  Estonia;  LT;  HU;  PL;  PT;  RO;  SK;  SI;  CY;  HR;  GR;  CZ;  BG;  DK;  SE;  FI;  AT;  DE;  GB;  ES;  IT;  IE;  FR', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ["MSD is an innovative, global healthcare leader committed to improving health and well-being in 140 countries around the world. Our product categories include heart and respiratory health, diabetes, infectious diseases, oncology and women's health. We continue to focus our research on conditions that affect millions of people around the world - diseases like Alzheimer's, Diabetes and Cancer - while further expanding our strengths in areas such as vaccines and biologics. We aspire to be the best healthcare company in the world and provide innovative solutions for tomorrow.", 'We are seeking talented individual, who possesses both leadership potential, as well as critical IT capabilities, to join our Emerging Talent Rotation (ETR) Program; a two and a half years program during which, candidates can rotate and experience three diverse areas (one x half year, two x full year), within the Singapore Hub.', 'This program offers candidate a path of differentiated exposure and investment, in order to develop their technical, business, and leadership capabilities so that they know MSD’s business, understand IT processes and will engage meaningfully to help positively affect the company economics and impact the value realization of IT and business solutions.', 'Success candidate will be partnered with a buddy, a coach and an executive mentor who will be able to help with acculturalization at MSD and career planning.', 'Primary Activities/Responsibilities:', '•', 'Rotations are assigned based on the individual’s development interest, discussions with their mentor, and alignment with business needs', '•', 'Areas of IT Expertise:', 'o', 'Data Science', 'o', 'Enterprise Platforms', 'o', 'Commercial Capabilities', 'o', 'Infrastructure, Client Computing and Network', 'o', 'Manufacturing Division', 'o', 'Operation Management', 'o', 'Strategy Execution & Business Operations', 'o', 'Research & Development', 'o', 'Patient Engagement', 'o', 'Human Health Division', 'o', 'Cybersecurity & Risk Management', 'o', 'Software Engineering & Design Thinking', 'Qualifications', 'Education Minimum Requirement:', '•', 'Recent Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree or equivalent', '•', 'Degree should be in Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics, Business, Computer Science (or similar)', 'Required Experience and Skills:', '•', 'Passion for technology and healthcare', '•', 'Superior communication and interpersonal skills', '•', 'Team-oriented self-starter', '•', 'Demonstrated leadership abilities', '•', 'Effectively works under pressure', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 5 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '5', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD Tiergesundheit ist mit über 50 Standorten ein weltweit tätiges, forschungsorientiertes Unternehmen mit einem breiten Spektrum an Veterinärmedizin und Dienstleistungen.', 'Unser Ziel ist es, Werte zu schaffen und zum stetigen Erfolg unserer Kunden beizutragen. Kurz gesagt: Wir zielen darauf ab, das Vertrauen unserer Kunden jeden Tag neu zu gewinnen. Indem wir die Bedürfnisse aller Interessensgruppen aufnehmen und die Kundenzufriedenheit im Fokus unseres Geschäfts steht, bieten wir innovative, hoch qualitative und vor allen Dingen lösungsorientierte Produkte und Dienstleistungen für Nutz- und Heimtiere an.', 'Für unsere neue Produktionsstätte in Krems suchen wir Techniker (m/w) für den Bereich Wartung und Instandhaltung. Sie haben die Gelegenheit, Teil eines sich neuformierenden Teams zu werden. In den nächsten 3-4 Jahren installieren wir an diesem Standort eine moderne “State-of-the-Art” Produktionsanlage zur Herstellung von Vakzinen und Impfstoffen für die Tiergesundheit.', 'Die Position berichtet direkt an den Leiter Wartung und Instandhaltung innerhalb der Abteilung Site Engineering.', 'Techniker Wartung und Instandhaltung (m/w)', 'Vollzeit, ab sofort', 'Zu Ihrem Aufgaben- und Verantwortungsbereich zählen:', 'Betreuung, Instandhaltungs- und Störungsmanagement der technischen Versorgungseinrichtungen sowie Durchführung von vorbeugenden Wartungs- und Inspektionsarbeiten', 'Durchführung von Kalibrierungstätigkeiten', 'Durchführung von Reparaturen', 'Genaue Führung der Anlagendokumentation und Änderungsmanagement', 'Betreuung von externen Fachfirmen', 'Einhaltung der anwendbaren gesetzlichen- und technischen Vorschriften, sowie konzerninterner Vorgaben und Regelungen', 'Mitarbeit bei der Konzeptionierung, Kommissionierung und Qualifizierung von Anlagen und Geräten', 'Bereitschaftsdienst', 'Qualifications', 'Für diese Tätigkeit bringen Sie folgende Voraussetzungen mit:', 'Abgeschlossene technische Fachausbildung (Elektro, HKLS, Schlosser, Mechaniker - eventuell HTL)', 'Mehrjährige einschlägige Berufserfahrung', 'Erfahrung im Bereich Pharma und grundlegende GMP-Kenntnisse von Vorteil', 'Sehr gute MS-Office Kenntnisse', 'Englisch-Kenntnisse in Wort und Schrift', 'AutoCAD-Kenntnisse sind von Vorteil', 'Vorausschauende Herangehensweise, Genauigkeit und Termintreue', 'Verantwortungsvolles selbständiges Arbeiten', 'Teamorientierung', 'Flexibel, hilfsbereit und freundlich', 'Wir bieten Ihnen:', 'Aktive Mitarbeit von der Planungsphase, über die Abnahme beim Lieferanten bis hin zur Installation der Anlagen im Produktionsbereich', 'Spannendes und herausforderndes Arbeitsfeld mit modernen „State- of-the-Art“ Technologien in einer neuen, wachsenden Organisation', 'Abwechslungsreiche Tätigkeit in einem international agierenden Unternehmen', 'Sehr gute Aus- und Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten', 'Mitarbeit in einem professionellen, ambitionierten und hoch motivierten Team und einer wertschätzenden positiven Arbeitsumgebung', 'Das Mindestgehalt für diese neu geschaffene Position beträgt Euro 35.235,20 brutto/Jahr, die Bereitschaft zu Überzahlung abhängig von Qualifikationsprofil und Berufserfahrung ist gegeben.', 'Sie sind kompetent, belastbar, zuverlässig, initiativ und wollen unseren Standort in dieser intensiven Start-Up Phase der Entwicklung einer großen Produktionsstätte aktiv unterstützen? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre aussagekräftige Bewerbung über unser Bewerbungsportal!', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen: MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. Bitte keine Anrufe oder E-Mails. Alle Lebensläufe, die von Personalberatungen per E-Mail, im Internet oder in irgendeiner Form und/oder Methode an einen Mitarbeiter von MSD gesendet werden, ohne dass eine gültige schriftliche Vermittlungsvereinbarung für diese Position besteht, gelten als alleiniges Eigentum von MSD. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '2', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

In addition as a Senior Engineer Technician you will be required to participate in an on call roster.', 'Qualifications', 'ABOUT YOU', 'To be successful in these positions you will be an experience Instrumentation / Electrical Engineer, holding a trade qualification in this field. description: ['Do you enjoy working in an international environment with lots of room for personal development?
