title: PMO Program Manager Job

description: ['Unsere Manufacturing Division ist ein Team von engagierten, energiegeladenen Personen, die sich dazu verpflichtet haben, weltweit der vertrauenswürdigste Anbieter von Arzneimitteln und Gesundheitsprodukten zu sein. Unsere Einrichtungen, zusammen mit unseren externen Auftragnehmern, Lieferanten und Partnern, umfassen ein voneinander abhängiges globales Fertigungsnetzwerk, das sich zu einer konformen, zuverlässigen Versorgung von Kunden und Patienten pünktlich und jederzeit auf der ganzen Welt verpflichtet hat.', 'Für unsere neue Produktionsstätte in Krems suchen wir', 'Produktionsmitarbeiter (m/w)', 'mit Arbeitserfahrung in der Herstellung von Biologika bzw. steriler Arzneimittel. Sie haben die Gelegenheit, Teil eines sich neu formierenden Teams zu werden. In den nächsten 4 – 5 Jahren installieren wir an diesem Standort eine moderne “State-of-the-Art” Produktionsanlage zur Herstellung von Vakzinen und Impfstoffen für die Tiergesundheit.', 'Sie können den Standort in dieser intensiven Start-Up Phase der Entwicklung einer großen Produktionsstätte unterstützen. Unter Verwendung von Single-Use-Equipment soll in einem zunächst kleinen Maßstab mit der Herstellung von bakteriellen Antigenen begonnen werden. Die Einschulung in die Produktionsprozesse findet zunächst an anderen Standorten von MSD, im globalen Netzwerk innerhalb Europas statt.', 'Ihre Aufgaben:', 'Mitarbeit beim Aufbau des Produktionsbereiches Bakterielle Antigene am Standort (mittelfristig übernehmen Sie Linienverantwortung im Zuge der weiteren Entwicklung dieses Bereiches)', 'Vorbereitung, Reinigung und Sterilisation von Geräten und Equipment; Materialtransfer und Buchungen im Warenwirtschaftssystem', 'Herstellung von Bakteriellen Antigenen, Nährmedien und Ausgangsstoffen', 'Kultivierung und Down-Stream-Processing; Durchführung von In-Prozess Kontrollen', 'Überwachung der Reinraumbedingungen: Probennahme im Zuge des Reinraum-Monitoring und von Reinstmedien-Systemen', 'Störungsmanagement der technischen Anlagen', 'Durchführung von vorbeugenden Wartungs- und Inspektionsarbeiten und kleineren Reparaturen', 'Mitarbeit bei Qualifizierungs- und Kalibrierungstätigkeiten', 'Sicherstellung der Einhaltung aller Vorgaben in einem GMP Umfeld', 'Genaue Führung der Anlagendokumentation und Änderungsmanagement', 'Erstellung und Aktualisierung von Arbeitsvorschriften (SOPs)', 'Kontinuierliche Verbesserung der Prozesse und Arbeitsabläufe', 'Prozessüberwachung und Dokumentation', 'Schichtarbeit (mittelfristig) und Bereitschaftsdienste', 'Qualifications', 'Abgeschlossene Fachausbildung zum Chemie- / Pharmawerker oder vergleichbare Qualifikation', 'Berufserfahrung im Bereich der Herstellung von sterilen Arzneiformen oder Biologika; description: ['Do you enjoy working in an international environment with lots of room for personal development? Did you always want to work in a company where your work can have a real impact on people’s life?', 'We have an exciting opportunity for a', 'Senior Specialist IT Compliance & Risk Management.', 'The primary focus for this role will be IT incidents & deviation investigations. It includes leading investigators to develop and manage IT Compliance Investigation Reports (CIRs), IT Quality Variances, and the associated CAPA, which includes supporting determination of compliance impact on the business, leading the development of root cause and Corrective and Preventative Actions (CAPAs) planning across IT.  As such, second level support to external Inspections/QA audits will be provided.', 'Main responsibilities', 'Lead the ITCIR and CAPA as well as IT Quality Variance processes in collaboration with IT divisional business and technical owners and regulatory areas.', 'Partner with the IT Incident, Problem Management, Operational and Delivery teams as well as Divisional Quality and Regulatory teams in support of investigations in order to ensure the overall compliance posture of Global IT system is resilient and sustained.', 'Proactively collaborate with other ITRMS, IT, Compliance, and Quality organizations, as well as a broad client base to break-down organizational boundaries in favor of a highly collaborative culture which focuses on the investigation of identified risks and compliance issues.', 'Possess strong knowledge of company policies, procedures, SDLC and standards as well as work collaboratively with the policy owners and teams to assess deviations and compliance impact.', 'Author, and track to completion, IT systems incidents with a potential or definitive compliance impact that have an impact on the business.', 'Develop risk-based processes to provide second level support for IT GxP inspections (where GxP could be Good Laboratory Practices [GLP] Good Clinical Practices [GCP], Good Manufacturing Practices [GMP], Good Distribution Practice [GDP] or Good Clinical Data Management Practices [GCDMP]) for above-site systems.', 'Manage, in a timely matter Inspection support requests, Compliance Investigation Reporting, and Quality Variance investigation results and related risks to business and communicate and raise awareness about critical GxP inspection and QA audit risks, trends and emerging themes.', 'Welcome in our team', 'The ITRMS department is part of the global IT Risk Management and Security (ITRMS) organization. The team consists of several colleagues, who interact with business as leaders of Global IT Incident/Compliance Investigation Report (CIR) and IT Quality Variances processes for computerized systems as well as second level support  for Global IT Systems Inspection Readiness.  The Team closely collaborates with global & regional IT Teams as well a Quality & Regulatory Teams.', 'Qualifications', 'Your profile', "Bachelor's- or Master's degree in a science or technology discipline", '7 years required experience in Quality, Regulatory, IT, or GxP/non-GxP Operations, with preferably 5 years of experience in IT compliance, quality or a regulatory area', 'Possess strong root cause analysis investigation skills.', 'Possess strong problem-solving skills, knowledge of GxP, technical writing, data management collection and analysis', 'Demonstrated interpersonal skills including flexibility and ability to work in a team environment', 'Innovative, analytical and inquisitive mindset: demonstrate the ability to adapt current work processes to meet emerging needs and changes in job responsibilities.', 'Good administrative skills and the ability to work a strongly regulated environment.', 'Ability to lead, support, and influence enterprise change initiatives', 'What we offer', 'We welcome you to a truly global, dynamic and challenging environment with great opportunities for personal development. Our benefits are very competitive and the summary (NL based reference) below will give you an idea of what you can expect.', 'Competitive salary and a 3% year-end bonus;', '35,5 days of leave;', 'Attractive collective health care insurance package with considerable reduction rates;', 'Solid Pension Plan;', 'MSD Incentive Plan;', 'Travel allowance for commuting;', 'Free in-house sport facilities', 'Numerous training, coaching and e-learning modules for long term job opportunities and development.', 'Information', 'For more information on this vacancy please contact: Harry Vuijk , Associate Director, Compliance & Risk Management, phone: +31 6514 951 96.', 'Application', 'If you are interested in this challenging role, you are invited to apply online by uploading your resume and application letter in English.', 'About us', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. Today, we are building a new kind of healthcare company – one that is ready to help create a healthier future for all of us. Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of an individual like you. To this end, we strive to create an environment of mutual respect, encouragement and teamwork. As part of our global team, you’ll have the opportunity to collaborate with talented and dedicated colleagues while developing and expanding your career.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 10 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'We are seeking energetic, forward thinking professionals to join our Information Technology group. You will have the opportunity to work on global teams to identify the biggest opportunities as well as tackle the biggest challenges at the intersection of healthcare, information and technology.  We offer rotations to help with your professional development, incredible opportunities to learn from others and a flat, collaborative environment.', 'This position will be part of the International Research & Development IT organization which supports the areas of Clinical Research, Regulatory Affairs, Pharmacovigilance and Discovery/Pre-Clinical in the following regions: Latin America (LA), Europe/Middle East/Africa (EMEA) and Asia Pacific (AP).', 'The position will be operating from Europe, preferably from London, Brussels, Paris or Prague.', 'The incumbent will provide IT account management to the Research & Development business partners within the EMEA (Europe/Middle East/Africa) region.', 'The incumbent will be responsible for relationship management, will support the business and IT strategy, will drive the IT portfolio and innovation discussions and contribute to the delivery and execution of Research & Development IT programs.', 'Key responsibilities include:', 'Responsible for maintaining a close relationship with the Research & Development organization in EMEA', 'Support the Research & Development organization in EMEA from a technology perspective leveraging the MSD IT network and operating model', 'Accountable for translating the business strategies and needs into IT programs for complete alignment on investment portfolio', 'Accountable for pulling through IT strategies for greater business value over time (e.g., platforms, analytics, digital, innovation)', 'Responsible for change management, helping to accelerate technology adoption and value realization', 'Responsible for creating and maintaining Account plans for the Research & Development business partners in EMEA', 'Collaborate with Research & Development IT team members, IT Platform teams, country IT teams, as well as our Hubs in Branchburg, Singapore and Prague to deliver IT solutions', 'Participate in innovative experiments and identify potential areas for business process improvement to increase business partners productivity and improve their user experience', 'Responsible for running a project where applicable', 'Travel will be required (~25%)', 'All activities must be conducted in compliance with company policies and standards, as well as regional and country specific regulations.', 'Qualifications', 'Education and Skills', 'Required:', 'Bachelor’s degree or advanced degree in Science or Computer related field', 'Skills/Knowledge Required:', 'Demonstrated success building and maintaining relationships with business partners and IT areas', 'Business acumen, stakeholder engagement, strategic account planning', 'Strong cross-functional communication and collaboration', 'Energetic self-starter, proactive approach and ability to work independently with minimum direction', 'Ability to thrive in a dynamic and complex matrix environment and to navigate through ambiguity', 'Ability to identify and influence the changes necessary to ensure solution adoption and value realization', 'Ability to challenge and debate issues of importance to the organization.', 'Ability to look at situations from several points of view', 'Proven leadership skills', 'Persuasive with details and facts', 'Good analytical, problem solving and organizational skills', 'Good interpersonal and communication skills', 'Excellent English communication (both oral and written)', 'Skills/Knowledge/Experience', 'Preferred:', 'At least 2 years of experience in IT account management, business architecture and analysis and/or client relationship management within the pharmaceutical industry', 'Experience and/or knowledge in at least one of these areas: Clinical Research, Regulatory Affairs, Pharmacovigilance (business and/or technology exposure)', 'Knowledge of IT tools and assets', 'Experience in a GxP environment', 'Network leader; Focus on influence rather than control, creating a work environment based on trust, sharing and collaboration', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Brussels, Bru, BE; Paris, ÃŽle-DE-France, FR; London, England, GB', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 25 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Heb jij een afgeronde HBO/ WO opleiding en ben jij in staat is om sturing en richting te geven aan een team en kan bewegen tot actief meedenken in het proces en de werkprocedures? Ben je toe aan een nieuwe uitdaging? Reageer dan snel!', 'Voor onze locatie', 'Boxmeer', 'zijn wij op zoek naar een', 'Manager Operations.', 'Ga naar', 'https://www.spielwork.com/msd/manager-operations-2/', 'voor een realistisch beeld van de baan.', 'Als Manager Operations bij MSD ben je verantwoordelijk voor de dagelijkse aansturing van productieafdelingen, warehouse-activiteiten of binnen een QC omgeving. Een van de productieafdelingen is de afdeling Bacto Productie waar de productie van levend en geïnactiveerd antigeen op basis van fermentor kweek en SUB kweek plaatsvindt. Je stuurt Bioprocess Technicians, Senior Bioprocess Technicians en Antigen Experts aan. In totaal heb je ongeveer 12-15 direct reports. Je coacht hen op het gebied van persoonlijke ontwikkeling. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het behalen van de dagplanning en bij grotere afwijkingen of storingen ben je het aanspreekpunt voor Antigen Experts en help je waar nodig. Je documenteert de afwijkingen met product impact in een deviatie systeem.', 'Daarnaast werk je samen met je collega’s aan het optimaliseren van processen en transfers van nieuwe producten.', 'Welkom in ons team', 'Welkom in ons team! Het Bacto Productie team van Boxmeer. Wij zijn een grote én sterk groeiende afdeling binnen de productiesite Boxmeer. Met de sterke groei van het moment hebben we een afdeling waarbij veel verandering plaatsvind. Het team bestaat daarmee dus uit toegewijde mensen welke goed in staat zijn veranderingen te zien, en deze pro-actief te implementeren. Daarnaast lopen we met het gebruik van single-use equipment voor bacterie kweken vooruit in de ontwikkeling. Met jou vooruitstrevende houding en bereidheid tot verandering maken we samen Bacto productie Boxmeer klaar voor de klantvraag van morgen!', 'Primaire taken / verantwoordelijkheden', 'Aansturing, ondersteuning en training van Operators en Technici en bijbehorende people management activiteiten', 'Afstemming met IPT planners en collega Managers van alle activiteiten die de productieplanning beïnvloeden', 'Realiseren van de afgesproken leverdata van klantorders, tegen zo laag mogelijke kosten. Focus op tijdige en complete belevering van klanten', 'Onderhouden en continu verbeteren van de huidige processen qua techniek, kwaliteit en veiligheid in samenwerking met ondersteunende disciplines binnen en buiten het IPT. Hiermee streven naar een right-first-time Operations zonder ongevallen', 'In samenwerking met collega’s waarborgen en handhaven van eenduidige kwaliteitsprocedures', 'Monitoren en initiëren van data-administratie en sturen van verbeteringen op basis van de data-afgeleide performance indicatoren', 'Qualifications', 'Jouw profile', 'Afgeronde HBO/ WO opleiding, bij voorkeur in een Technische, Farmaceutische of Bedrijfskundige richting', 'Relevante leidinggevende werkervaring is een pre', 'In staat om sturing en richting te geven aan een groep medewerkers en ze te coachen naar toenemende zelfstandigheid', 'In staat om prioriteiten te stellen en ook onder tijdsdruk een juiste afweging te kunnen maken', 'Project management vaardigheden', 'Stevige persoonlijkheid', 'Mondeling en schriftelijk communicatief vaardig, zowel in het Nederlands als in het Engels', 'Wij bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met  toegewijde collega’s. Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', 'Een competitief salaris', '35,5 vakantiedagen', '8% vakantietoeslag', '3% eindejaarsuitkering', 'MSD Incentive Plan', 'Een uitstekend pensioen', 'Over MSD Animal Health', "MSD Animal Health ontwikkelt en produceert vaccins en farmaceutische specialiteiten voor landbouwhuisdieren, gezelschapsdieren en vis. We hebben kantoren in meer dan 50 landen, verkopen onze producten in meer dan 140 markten en opereren een netwerk van productielocaties en R&D; faciliteiten in de hele wereld. Binnen MSD Animal Health zijn we altijd op zoek naar innovatieve talenten die zich richten op voortdurende verbetering van onze producten en de manier waarop we werken. We zijn op zoek naar nieuwe collega's die ondernemend en resultaatgericht zijn. Niet alleen de resultaat telt; de manier waarop je deze resultaat behaalt is van cruciaal belang om succesvol te zijn binnen MSD Animal Health. MSD Animal Health loopt voorop in diergeneesmiddelen.", 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['The Medical Science Liaison serves as an advocate for MSD science within the healthcare community. By virtue of his/her training, the MSL is well-positioned to discuss and provide scientific and therapeutic information to Health Care Professionals and Researchers (Clinical and Scientific Leaders) viewed by their peers to be authorities in a therapeutic field. The MSL is responsible for ensuring that he/she is fully versed in the therapeutic area and up-to-date on all major studies, both ongoing and completed, competitive product information and clinical data.', 'Qualifications', '- strong scientific baseline knowledge in therapeutic area 1) Clinical doctor in the related TA (bachelor of clinical medicine degree or above) resident level at Tier III hospital (preferred) or resident to attending level at Tier II hospital. 2) Clinical doctor in the unrelated TA (bachelor degree of clinical medicine plus master degree or above) resident level (preferred) at Tier III hospital or resident to attending level at Tier II hospital. 3) Pharmacologist or Biologist (master degree of Pharmacology, or Ph.D degree for Life Science).', '- strong, confident and engaging presentation skills', '- outstanding communication and skills and the ability to function within a team environment.', '- handling of multiple tasks at the same time and working under pressure', '- proactive "can do" attitude and passion for the science related to the products and associated therapeutic area', '- strong customer facing skills, listening skills, probing skills, and flexibility', '- corporate culture competencies of Leader Behaviors, including Business Integrity', '- experience within a clinical drug development environment preferred.', '- be able to travel', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Medical Science Liaison Job

description: ['Leads the method development and implementation of advanced in-line, on-line, and at-line PAT instruments, for eg, NIR, FTIR, pH, online MS for in process and real time release testing in both the active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (API) and secondary manufacturing plants. The scope of the contributions includes using chemometrics and multivariate analysis for development of methods to support online measurements during manufacturing, technology transfer of new PAT technology, instruments and methods for in process and/or real-time release testing (RTRT) applications for new or current supply manufacturing.', 'Has strong knowledge in PAT analytical technologies that include but are not limited to spectroscopic techniques, such as online HPLC, online MS, Raman, NIR spectroscopy, FTIR Spectroscopy, as well as multivariate and univariate modeling of process data and chemometrics.', 'Leads and advises others on experimental design and execution, statistical analysis for PAT analytical method development and validation.', 'As a subject matter expert in PAT, provides PAT solutions and technical expertise for the plant to support site process robustness issues and process related investigations. Is able to independently problem solve challenging technical issues related to PAT failure in the plant and able to design experiments with limited guidance to efficiently gain results. Experiment design includes designing and conducting feasibility studies for using of new PAT instruments for process understanding and data collection and method validation.', 'Has an understanding of the pertinent regulatory guidance applicable to PAT. Lead contributions to regulatory filings and internal scientific as well as internal quality/GMP documents for PAT. Act as primary lead of regulatory inspections of PAT installations for the site.', 'Supports routine supply manufacture by providing on going technical support to the IPT and proactively monitoring the performance of equipment module(s) or unit operation(s) during manufacturing and cleaning using PAT. Responds to shifts and trends in performance appropriately and based on the data identifies opportunities for improvement.', 'Develops and reviews SOPs, gap analysis and Job Aids for PAT systems in both the lab and the plant as so to be in compliance with divisional and corporate policies and guidelines.', 'Qualifications', 'Bachelor, Master or PHD in related Sciences, for eg Pharmaceutics/Pharmacy or Chemistry/Chemical Engineering.', 'Candidate with experience in PAT in a manufacturing setting and knowledge in chemometrics, NIR, multivariate analysis and SBOL is an added advantage.', 'Minimum 4 years technical experience in pharmaceutical manufacturing industry. Experience with PAT instruments and knowledge are preferred.', 'Good knowledge of secondary manufacturing/drug product manufacturing are preferred.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Do you want to make a difference for patients and physicians – while   unleashing your own full potential? Do you have excellent analytical skills   and experience of digital transformation? Then you could be our new Nordic   Analytics Manager.', 'As our new Nordic Analytics Manager, you enable business decisions   for our Commercial Teams in the Nordic/Baltic cluster. You are the business   partner for local Marketing Teams with business intelligence, advanced data   analytics and customer insights. You will work closely with the Nordic cross   functional team and you build the analytical and digital capabilities and   drive the implementation of our digital transformation using strong   analytical skills combined to agile methodology.', 'As a Nordic Analytics Manager you are part of the Nordic Commercial   Operations Team and, together with your colleagues, you take an active role   of driving the analytical savvyness across the Nordic and Baltic Region.', 'As you can see, your tasks as Nordic Analytics Manager are many and   varied. They also include:', 'Business   portfolio optimization & market data analysis for brand strategy &   financial planning purposes', 'Data modelling and data integration', 'Agile   methodology and prescriptive analytics', 'Execute on the analytical transformation and implementation of BI   tools', 'Support Nordic and country organizations with various data and ad-hoc   analysis', 'Qualifications', 'You are a strong team   player and you lead by example.', 'You have a University degree from accredited university and at least   5 years of experience in the area of data analytics and', 'digital   transformation', 'preferably in an international company or   a consultancy.', 'You are a team player and have a strong desire to reach results while   observing the high ethical standards MSD is known and respected for.', 'As a person, you have the flexibility and enthusiasm to adapt and   succeed in a rapidly changing environment, and your people skills are equally   impressive. You are able to work independently with very little supervision.   You are open-minded, yet you know when and how to speak your mind and get   your point across in a way that makes colleagues and external stakeholders   appreciate your expertise, skills and high ethical standard. You exhibit the   following qualities:', 'Excellent   verbal and written skills in English', 'Experience   working independently in an international environment', 'Exceptional   communication and cross-functional collaboration skills', 'Excellent   skills working in MS-Office, SPSS and Google analytics', 'Experience   of implementing BI tools for large corporations, data integration, data   management & visualization', 'Application and further   information', 'The position is office based and you live in the capital area of   Denmark, Finland, Norway or Sweden. Approximately 20% of your time will be   spent travelling. You report directly to the Nordic Commercial Operations   Lead.', 'Hiring manager: Camilla Steinby, +358 (0)40 1380202', 'About MSD in Nordics', 'For over 125 years and counting MSD has revolutionised global health care. Today, more than 800 people work for MSD in the Nordics alone. Innovation is our life’s blood, and you will be a part of developing new and customer centric health care solutions that go beyond medicine to help people be well and live better lives during treatment. We have a strong pipeline of products within medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies and animal health products. We work every day to make healthcare accessible to as many as possible, which requires top talent within both R&D;, marketing, finance, health economy and policy shaping. Globally, we operate in 140 countries and demonstrate our commitment to increasing access to health care through far-reaching policies, programs and partnerships. For more information, visit', 'www.workforlife.com', 'Other Locations:', 'Espoo, Southern Finland, FI; Stockholm, Stockholm, SE; Oslo, Oslo, NO', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 20 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD Tiergesundheit ist mit über 50 Standorten ein weltweit tätiges, forschungsorientiertes Unternehmen mit einem breiten Spektrum an Veterinärmedizin und Dienstleistungen.', 'Unser Ziel ist es, Werte zu schaffen und zum stetigen Erfolg unserer Kunden beizutragen.', 'Kurz gesagt: Wir zielen darauf ab, das Vertrauen unserer Kunden jeden Tag neu zu gewinnen. Indem wir die Bedürfnisse aller Interessensgruppen aufnehmen und die Kundenzufriedenheit im Fokus unseres Geschäfts steht, bieten wir innovative, hoch qualitative und vor allen Dingen lösungsorientierte Produkte und Dienstleistungen für Nutz- und Heimtiere an.', 'Zur Verstärkung unseres Teams an unserem Standort Friesoythe suchen wir Sie ab sofort, in Vollzeit und befristet auf 2 Jahre als', 'Production - Operator (m/w/d)', 'Ihre Aufgaben in dieser Position umfassen unter anderem:', 'Routinemäßiges Abarbeiten von laufenden Herstellungen und Abfüllungen (nicht steril) und Routinetätigkeiten unter besondere Berücksichtigung der Inclusive Behaviors und MPS', 'GMP / FDA gerechte Dokumentation aller Vorgänge wie Dokumentation der Herstellvorgänge / Dokumentation in Logbücher / allgemeine Dokumentation', 'Pflege von Standardarbeitsanweisungen / Herstellanweisungen / Formblätter u.s.w.', 'Alle anfallenden Arbeiten nach GMP und FDA Richtlinien und Vorgaben ausführen', 'Bedienung, Wartung und ggf. Reparieren von Maschinen und Geräten (Autoklaven / Wägestationen / Abfülllinien / CIP/SIP Anlage / Destille von der Produktionsseite aus u.s.w.)', 'Reinigung und Pflege und pflegliches Behandeln von Produktionsequipment und Räumlichkeiten', 'Unterstützung von Produkttransfers, Unterstützung bei der Einführung neuer nicht steriler Produkte/ Launches von neuen Produkten', 'Unterstützung / Übernahme von diverser Projekte', 'Eigenverwaltung in My Career (z.b. PMP / Entwicklungsziele / My Learning-termingerechter Abschluss von Schulungen und Modulen)', 'Verantwortung für die eigene Sicherheit und die der unmittelbaren Umgebung. Beachtung aller Sicherheitsvorschriften und umgehende Meldung von Mängeln an den Vorgesetzten (siehe ArbSchG § 15)', 'Qualifications', 'Als idealer Kandidat bringen Sie folgende Ausbildung und Kenntnisse mit:', 'Ausbildung zum Pharmakanten oder artverwandten, bei der IHK-abgeschlossenen Beruf.', 'MA sollte über einen längeren Zeitraum mind. 3 Jahre in der Pharmaindustrie oder artverwandt gearbeitet haben', 'Bereitschaft zur, wenn nötig, Mehrarbeit; Bereitschaft zur Schichtarbeit ggf. Bereitschaft am Samstag zu arbeiten', 'Gutes Auffassungsvermögen, Kommunikationsfähigkeit und Konzentrationsfähigkeit;', 'Deutsch fließend in Wort und Schrift, Beherrschung der Grundrechenarten', 'Teamfähig, belastbar', 'Es erwarten Sie eine attraktive Vergütung nach Chemie-Tarif, sehr gute Sozialleistungen, ein angenehmes Arbeitsklima und vielfältige Karrieremöglichkeiten. Wir haben Ihr Interesse geweckt und Sie möchten Teil einer wachsenden und sich entwickelnden Organisation werden? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen über unsere Karriereseite (Lebenslauf, Motivationsschreiben, Zeugnisse).', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen: MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. Bitte keine Anrufe oder E-Mails. Alle Lebensläufe, die von Personalberatungen per E-Mail, im Internet oder in irgendeiner Form und/oder Methode an einen Mitarbeiter von MSD gesendet werden, ohne dass eine gültige schriftliche Vermittlungsvereinbarung für diese Position besteht, gelten als alleiniges Eigentum von MSD. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Mehr über unser Unternehmen erfahren Sie unter', 'www.msd-tiergesundheit.de', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Temporary', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '2', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['BIOTECH DUBLIN', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BIOTECH, DUBLIN', 'The latest addition to the MSD Ireland family is MSD Biotech, Dublin. The site will play a pivotal role in the manufacture of MSD’s biologics-based medicines, including in the area of immuno-oncology, and will expand MSD’s current internal network of biologics drug substance manufacturing plants when full manufacturing operations begin in 2021.', 'MSD Biotech Dublin, will be MSD’s first ever Large-Scale Mammalian-Based Drug Substance Facility, with the mission and ambition to manufacture breakthrough medicines from Ireland for patients around the world.', 'This facility will be a significant supplier of drug substances for one of MSD’s key treatments and will also be critical in the future supply of new biotechnology products to its global network.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'The Senior Engineering Technician will work across the site supporting Engineering activities which could include execution of predictive, preventative and reactive maintenance activities to ensure the site operations are safe and reliable. The role will initially involving supporting project activities, install of equipment and start up and will move to a sustaining the site operations and maintenance.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Participating in project activities which could include design reviews, factory / Site acceptance testing, installation and commissioning support.', 'Ensuring that equipment failures or issues are responded to promptly and appropriately in a cross functional environment. Providing guidance and solutions for preventative action where required.', 'Identifying activities and spare parts for planned activities including the development of procedures and training material.', 'Alarm monitoring, response and resolution.', 'Executing planned routines including predictive, preventative and calibration activities.', 'Ensuring all necessary documentation is completed in a compliant manner and asset management data is captured accurately.', 'Provide clear and concise written and verbal handovers to colleagues.', 'Supporting and manage vendors when on site.', 'Supporting development of training information, cross train colleagues.', 'Assisting colleagues and other functions with tasks – i.e. set-up, sampling, cleaning validation activities.', 'Working in cross functional teams where Operational Excellence techniques are used to optimise processes.', 'Ensuring the site is audit ready at all times, house-keeping standards are always adhered to, training completed on time.', 'Due to the nature of operations, shift work will be required as the site moves into 24/7 mode of operations.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'Reports to Senior Maintenance Specialist or Senior Engineer', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'General', 'At least 8 years of experience working in biologics / pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities in an engineering, maintenance or utilities role.', 'Technical', 'A compliance mindset for Safety and Quality standards, regulation and practices.', 'Expertise high level of attention to detail in following procedures', 'Strong problem solving ability and adhere to scheduled timelines', 'Evidence of multi-skill experience and work in an automated environment', 'People', 'Verbal and written communication skills', 'Ability to work in a cross functional collaborative environment', 'Ability to work independently and also as part of a team', 'Education', 'At minimum Level 6 Electrical, Instrumentation or Mechanical related qualification.', 'Evidence of Continuous Profession Development', 'Desirable – predictive technology experience', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', '*Featured', '*HJBiotech', '*Engineering', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 5 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Senior Maintenance Technician Job

description: ['MSD BIOTECH, DUBLIN', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of biotech in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do, pushing the boundaries of science to discover new medicines that treat the world’s most significant health challenges and benefit patients globally.', 'As one of the world’s leading healthcare companies, we are committed to making a difference. We are now looking for an Associate Director in Validation to play a pivotal role in the development of our new world-class biotechnology facility in Dublin where they will have the opportunity to help shape the future of biotech in Ireland and play a significant role in the next chapter of our invention and discovery story.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co. Tipperary, Brinny, Co. Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'To date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and currently our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'THE OPPORTUNITY', 'Dublin, Ireland has been chosen for MSD’s first ever Large-Scale Mammalian-Based Drug Substance Facility. This facility will be a significant supplier of drug substance for one of MSD’s key treatments and will also be critical in the future supply of new biotechnology products to our global network.', 'Construction on this exciting new facility will commence immediately and this is a unique opportunity for the right person to shape, create, build and grow the MSD Biotech, Dublin site which will support the manufacture of MSD’s biologics-based medicines, including in the area of immuno-oncology.', 'As one of the inaugural hires in project, the Associate Director - Validation role will be essential in ensuring efficient and effective compliant design, construction, qualification, approval and operation of the new state-of-the-art facility during the initial project phase. The successful candidate will take a lead on utilising the latest innovations in technology and automation to create a workplace of the future.', 'THE ROLE', 'Reporting to the site manufacturing and technology head and based at the MSD Biotech Dublin site, the site Validation leader responsibilities include, but are not limited to the following:', 'Provide oversight of the design, construction and qualification of the new MSD Biotech Dublin facility and manufacturing science and technology laboratory by:', 'o Providing technical and validation oversight to teams and coaching to associate staff. Provide leadership for:', '\uf0a7 Developing and maintaining the site Validation Master Plan.', '\uf0a7 Driving completion of cleaning and sterilization cycle validation activities.', '\uf0a7 Aligning the Process Performance Qualification (PPQ) strategy and delivering the necessary protocols and reports.', '\uf0a7 Building and maintaining the site Continued Process Validation (CPV) program and supporting cross-site CPV as needed.', 'o Authoring and reviewing standard operating procedures and technical reports. Supporting global regulatory submissions as needed.', 'o Assuring effective application of LeanSixSigma and Change Management tools in the Validation group by:', '\uf0a7 Securing continuity of an appropriate LSS/CEM level of knowledge.', '\uf0a7 Leading by example in achieving results by using high performing organization (HPO) tools and processes', '\uf0a7 Facilitate problem solving & risk assessment (FMEA) projects/meeting.', '\uf0a7 Make problems visible and strive for continuous improvement.', 'o Serving as a key member during internal audits and external inspections/audits.', 'o Supporting alignment and knowledge exchange with development organizations, other commercial nodes and external manufacturing partners.', 'Manage and coach a staff of 4-6 engineers.', 'Lead and support various organizational initiatives as needed (examples include safety, financial forecasting, work standardization, etc).', 'Represent the site in internal collaborations through Manufacturing Division Validation Communities of Practice to include sharing of best practices in validation and investigation activities.', 'Keep up to date with scientific and technical developments.', 'Support creation of departmental budget and surveil actual performance against the forecast.', 'Maintain continuous focus on quality and safety compliance and unflinching focus on the customer.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'This role reports to the site manufacturing and technology head.', 'Qualifications', 'This role requires an experienced individual with a minimum of 6 years’ (for PhD), 10 years’ (for MSc) or 12 years’ (for BSc) directly related experience in academia, pharmaceutical or biotechnology company – along with a working knowledge of current regulatory requirements and current Good Manufacturing Practices.', 'A self-starter and results-focussed, the successful candidate will have strong contemporary knowledge, and the ability to work independently and on multidisciplinary teams. The successful candidate will also have demonstrated the ability to deliver what is needed on-time, holding self and team accountable for commitments, decisions, actions and behaviours.', 'S/he will also have excellent oral and written communication skills, with the ability to effectively articulate understanding of process science, in order to drive decision making, impact assessments, design of studies, etc., in a multi-disciplinary team environment.', 'With a Bachelor’s degree (or higher) in Biological Sciences/Chemical Engineering/Biological Engineering/Chemistry, the successful candidate will also ideally have a proven track record in delivering excellence. The candidate will also show ambition and drive to develop and advance their career within MSD.', 'Preferred Experience and Skills:', 'Experience with upstream cell culture and downstream purification of biological molecules. Experience with cleaningand process validation, technology transfer, regulatory filing, and commercial drug substance manufacturing of biologics is a plus.', 'Prior experience in drug substance process development, process characterisation studies, process performance qualification and validation, site readiness, batch record reviews, authoring regulatory CTD sections and/or working with external contract organisation for development and/or manufacturing.', 'Working knowledge of statistical process control (SPC) for biologics processes', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by driving MSD’s position as one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', '*HJFeatured', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 15 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD Business Service Centers (BSC) is responsible for the timely and efficient delivery of standardized, global financial processes. The BSC – Europe in Prague, Czech Republic will be responsible for the execution and delivery of a broad range of financial services and processes across MSD business divisions and markets for the Europe region.', 'The AtR General Ledger Manager will be responsible for ensuring that the transactions of all the markets that the RDC support in Prague have been properly accounted for and accurately reflect MSD’s accounting process. The objective of this role is to work closely with Local Finance Teams to ensure that the accounting records: (i) accurately reflect the results of the associated business process, (ii) are in line with US GAAP and (iii) comply with respective local statutory and tax requirements. This role enables the RDC', 'AtR function based in Prague to partner with its Finance and Business counterparts to ensure that business objectives are sufficiently met.', 'Primary responsibilities for this position include, but are not limited to, the following:', '• Supervise general ledger activities and analysis inclusive of period end financial close responsibilities for Europe', '• Manage across General Ledger and other AtR sub-process activities (Fixed Assets and Cash and Investments)', '• Ensure that all transactions are correctly reflected in the ledger on a country basis', '• Direct accurate and timely period reporting that complies with Corporate and country requirements', '• Administer monthly Account Reconciliation processes on a timely basis and adhering to all corporate standards and guidelines', '• Champion opportunities for streamlining and rendering service delivery more efficiently, and leading process improvement projects', '• Coordinate with team members to effectively distribute workload and increase exposure to multiple finance and business disciplines within MSD', '• Approve the period-end financial packages and the Balance Sheet Reconciliations', '• Continue to meet S404 Requirements including performing and enhancing internal controls, and maintaining up-to-date documentation', '• Maintain a strong control environment around financial and operational processes, and external', 'business relationships', 'Qualifications', '• Minimum of 6 years of experience in a shared service department of a multinational company including description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD Business Service Centers (BSC) is responsible for the timely and efficient delivery of standardized, global financial processes. The BSC – Europe in Prague, Czech Republic will be responsible for the execution and delivery of a broad range of financial services and processes across MSD business divisions and markets for the Europe region.', 'The AtR General Ledger Manager will be responsible for ensuring that the transactions of all the markets that the RDC support in Prague have been properly accounted for and accurately reflect MSD’s accounting process. The objective of this role is to work closely with Local Finance Teams to ensure that the accounting records: (i) accurately reflect the results of the associated business process, (ii) are in line with US GAAP and (iii) comply with respective local statutory and tax requirements. This role enables the RDC', 'AtR function based in Prague to partner with its Finance and Business counterparts to ensure that business objectives are sufficiently met.', 'Primary responsibilities for this position include, but are not limited to, the following:', '• Supervise general ledger activities and analysis inclusive of period end financial close responsibilities for Europe', '• Manage across General Ledger and other AtR sub-process activities (Fixed Assets and Cash and Investments)', '• Ensure that all transactions are correctly reflected in the ledger on a country basis', '• Direct accurate and timely period reporting that complies with Corporate and country requirements', '• Administer monthly Account Reconciliation processes on a timely basis and adhering to all corporate standards and guidelines', '• Champion opportunities for streamlining and rendering service delivery more efficiently, and leading process improvement projects', '• Coordinate with team members to effectively distribute workload and increase exposure to multiple finance and business disciplines within MSD', '• Approve the period-end financial packages and the Balance Sheet Reconciliations', '• Continue to meet S404 Requirements including performing and enhancing internal controls, and maintaining up-to-date documentation', '• Maintain a strong control environment around financial and operational processes, and external', 'business relationships', 'Qualifications', '• Minimum of 6 years of experience in a shared service department of a multinational company including description: ['At MSD Haarlem we have an exciting opportunity for a', 'HTA-OR Manager', 'Your challenge', 'The HTA-OR Manager will help shape and implement MSD’s position in this area in order to capitalize on the opportunities of HTA and real-world data and to address potential challenges. As a team member you will contribute to the development and implementation of market access goals that support the value of MSD medicines in key therapeutic area’s (including Oncology and Vaccines).', 'Your responsibilities', 'As the HTA-OR manager you are responsible for:', 'Will be responsible for building solid HTA propositions for optimal access of MSD medicines to patients and to support in achieving MSD business goals.', 'Works in close cooperation with the regional HTA center of excellence for the EURAM countries (Europe, Russia, Africa, Middle-East) and Center of Excellence Outcomes Research and Real-world Evidence (CORE) at global HQ.', 'Is responsible for building local evidence by Health Technology Assessment (e.g. pharmaco-economic model adaptation, budget impact modelling) and coordinating or performing health outcomes research.', 'This will be done in close collaboration with the Market Access managers to assure solid value propositions.', 'Is responsible for delivering the pharmaco-economic component within the local reimbursement dossiers.', 'Your team', 'The HTA-OR manager is a part of the Market Access department at MSD Global Human Health in Haarlem. The combination of different capabilities in one department offers a unique opportunity for collaboration in an ever evolving health care environment. The Market Access department also includes 5 Market Access Managers that are responsible for different therapeutic area’s and 2 Strategic Account Managers responsible for HCI policy and Value-based Health Care projects. All functions report into the Director Market Access. The team works closely together with Policy-, Communications-, Medical- and Business colleagues.', 'Qualifications', 'Your profile', 'Major degree (PhD, PharmD, ScD) in health services discipline and/or Clinical Degree with Master’s degree in Public Health, Health Economics, Outcomes Research.', 'Minimum 5 year of experience in HTA-OR area and performing economic data analysis, econometric modeling, and real world outcomes research in the pharmaceutical industry, within a CRO company or research environment.', 'In-depth knowledge of the market access environment, hospital systems, and integrated systems of care.', 'Knowledge of the Healthcare industry including the pharmaceutical industry (market access, medical, clinical research and marketing and sales) is a plus.', 'Competency in medical science, epidemiology, clinical trials, drug development and outcomes research, pharmaco-economics including a deep understanding of research methods, health economics, and related disciplines.', 'Demonstrated ability to undertake complex analyses and to produce clear recommendations and/or reports.', 'Expertise in a therapy area (i.e. oncology, diabetes, immunology) is of added value.', 'Experience with registries is of added value.', 'You are fluent in', 'English and master the Dutch language on minimal NT2 level.', 'What we offer', 'We welcome you to a truly global, dynamic and challenging environment with great opportunities for personal development. Our benefits are very competitive and the summary below will give you an idea of what you can expect.', 'Competitive salary and a 3% year-end bonus;', '35,5 days of leave;', 'Attractive collective health care insurance package with considerable reduction rates;', 'Solid Pension Plan;', 'MSD Incentive Plan;', 'Travel allowance for commuting;', 'Free in-house sport facilities', 'Numerous training, coaching and e-learning modules for long term job opportunities and development.', 'Application', 'If you are interested in this challenging role, you are invited to apply online by uploading your resume and application letter in English.', 'For further information regarding this position, you can contact: Jurgen Huismans, Director Market Access, phone: +31 23 5153295', 'About us', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. Today, we are building a new kind of healthcare company – one that is ready to help create a healthier future for all of us. Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of an individual like you. To this end, we strive to create an environment of mutual respect, encouragement and teamwork. As part of our global team, you’ll have the opportunity to collaborate with talented and dedicated colleagues while developing and expanding your career.', 'Our employees are the key to our company’s success. We demonstrate our commitment to our employees by offering a competitive and valuable rewards program. Our Company’s benefits are designed to support the wide range of goals, needs and lifestyles of our employees, and many of the people that matter the most in their lives.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'No', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

Met onze geneesmiddelen, vaccins, biologische', 'therapieën en ondersteunende diensten bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor', 'een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. De Quality afdeling draagt er zorg voor dat productie,', 'verpakken, testen, opslag en distributie van onze medicijnen conform een', 'adequaat kwaliteitssysteem wordt uitgevoerd.', 'Voor meer informatie over MSD Biotechnologie Operations, bekijk de video:', 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzzdXlQNzYY', 'De functie', 'Als Senior Technican rapporteer je aan de', 'manager van de afdeling Quality', 'Control Biotech Oss-Method Validation & Transfer (QCB-MVT). Quality', 'Notifications;', 'Ondersteund van de', 'Quality Notifications processen waar nodig;', 'Uitvoeren van Root Cause', 'onderzoeken;', 'Uitvoeren van', 'troubleshoot activitieiten;', 'Als change Control coördinator', 'uitvoeren van analytische Change Control activiteiten binnen QCB;', 'Uitvoeren van vrijgifte', 'en stabilitets onderzoeken op produkten in ontwikkeling met bijbehorende beheer);', 'Uitvoeren van chemicaliën', 'beheer;', 'Verantwoordelijk voor', 'QCB-MVT plannings activiteiten.', 'Qualifications', 'Kwalificaties', 'HLO diploma met enkele', 'jaren ervaring op het 'veiligheidsbewustzijn, resultaatgericht, innovatief vermogen en gedreven om te', 'verbeteren;', 'Goed ontwikkelde focus', 'op klanten, kwaliteit en compliance;', 'Uitstekende', 'communicatieve en technieken;', 'Kennis en ervaring in', 'het statistisch verwerken van onderzoeks resultaten.', 'MSD als werkgever', 'Keer op keer nieuwe', 'uitdagingen aangaan, dat is wel iets wat je leuk moet vinden description: ['Heb jij een bevlogen en inspirerende manier van mensen coachen en begeleiden? En doe je dit het liefst binnen een high tech omgeving waar producten worden verpakt die het verschil maken? De functie van Operationeel Manager bij MSD sluit hier perfect bij aan.', 'Voor onze locatie', 'Haarlem', 'zijn wij op zoek naar een', 'Operationeel Manager', 'De functie', 'Als Operationeel Manager bij MSD geef je leiding aan een team van 10 tot 15 operators en technici binnen een omgeving waar geneesmiddelen worden verpakt.', 'Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de uitvoering van de operationele processen en stemt activiteiten die de productieplanning beïnvloeden af met de planningsgroep van jouw afdeling. Daarnaast zorg je ervoor dat kwaliteitsprocedures en richtlijnen worden gevolgd en zie je toe op een volledige en juiste documentatie door de operators. Verder initieer en manage je verbeterprojecten op het gebied van techniek, kwaliteit en veiligheid aan de hand van Lean Six Sigma methodieken.', 'Je bent gedreven om de productie- en kostendoelstellingen te realiseren, maar doet nooit concessies aan de kwaliteit van het product.', 'Welkom in ons team', 'De business unit waar je werkzaam bent is verantwoordelijk voor de totale supply keten met betrekking tot het verpakken van medicijnen, dus van het ontwikkelen en bestellen van componenten en bulk tot aan het afleveren van de geneesmiddelen in de verzendverpakking.', 'Als Operationeel Manager ben je werkzaam in het geldende ploegenrooster en rapporteer je rechtstreeks aan de Director Operations.', 'Qualifications', 'Wij vragen', 'Een afgeronde HBO opleiding, bij voorkeur in een Technische of Bedrijfskundige richting;', 'Je beschikt over minimaal drie jaar relevante leidinggevende werkervaring;', 'Je bent in staat om sturing en richting te geven aan een groep medewerkers en ze te coachen naar toenemende zelfstandigheid;', 'Je kunt goed prioriteiten stellen en ook onder tijdsdruk een juiste afweging maken;', 'Je beschikt over uitstekende projectmanagement vaardigheden;', 'Je hebt een stevige persoonlijkheid;', 'Mondeling en schriftelijk ben je communicatief vaardig, zowel in de Nederlandse als Engels taal.', 'Wij bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met  toegewijde collega’s. Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', 'Een competitief salaris', '35,5 vakantiedagen', '8% vakantietoeslag en 3% eindejaarsuitkering', 'Een ploegentoeslag tussen de 15% en 25%', 'MSD Incentive Plan', 'Een uitstekend pensioen', 'In-house sportfaciliteiten', 'Reiskostenvergoeding', 'Verschillende trainingsmodules', 'Informatie', 'Meer inzicht in het dagelijkse werk als Operational Manager bij MSD? Ga naar:', 'https://www.spielwork.com/msd/operational-manager', 'Vragen over deze functie?', 'Neem gerust contact op met Johan van Westerloo, Associate Director IPT Blister, 06 - 51 52 54 33.', 'Solliciteren', 'Ben jij de kandidaat waar wij naar op zoek zijn? We ontmoeten je graag! Stuur ons jouw sollicitatie vandaag nog toe. Dit doe je door op onderstaande button te klikken.', 'Over MSD', 'MSD is een wereldleider op het gebied van geneesmiddelen en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze vaccins, biologische therapieën en geneesmiddelen bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We richten ons op aandoeningen die mensen ernstig belemmeren in hun functioneren of zelfs levensbedreigend zijn en die vragen om nieuwe geneesmiddelen. MSD is tevens pionier in biologische research & development voor diergezondheid.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'THE OPPORTUNITY', 'MSD Animal Health in Upper Hutt has an opportunity for a Quality Control (QC) Laboratory Assistant to join the QC team on a Part time basis (0.5). This position will see you work as part of a small team to prepare media and solutions, including ordering of reagents, following company procedures. You will clean, and maintain laboratory equipment and glassware, operate autoclaves and a dishwasher and be responsible for ensuring all relevant documentation is completed and that corporate and regulatory standards are met. This role supports a number of stakeholders.', 'Qualifications', 'ABOUT YOU', 'To be successful as a QC Laboratory Assistant you will:', 'Have the ability to work in a physically demanding role', 'Have excellent attention to detail', 'Demonstrate the ability to work in a methodical manner', 'Have intermediate computer literacy across the Microsoft suite', 'Demonstrate good communication skills', 'In addition:', 'A scientific background with previous laboratory experience is advantageous', 'Knowledge and or / experience working to good manufacturing practices (gmp) is also a benefit', 'MSD ANIMAL HEALTH', 'MSD’s Animal Health (MAH) division works to improve the health of animals around the world through collaborative partnerships and a deep sense of responsibility towards our customers, consumers, animals, society, and our planet. This team of energetic, independent thinkers offers one of the industry’s most innovative portfolios of products, services, and technologies that serve to prevent, treat, and control diseases across all major farm and companion animal species both domestically and internationally.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['We are seeking a highly motivated and enthusiastic scientist in bioinformatics to join a high-performance team of informatics scientists and data science professionals to further the objectives and reputation of MSD, and to drive drug discovery and development, especially in immuno-oncology area in China and globally.', 'The successful candidate will lead/contribute to a broad scope of bioinformatics/health informatics projects-', '• Develop computational pipeline and analytical tools to analyze, visualize and summarize NGS and other molecular data from clinical trials, preclinical data.', '• Use molecular data to identify biomarkers and molecularly defined groups of patients most likely to benefit from individual therapies, with a focus on translating biomarker-driven strategies into the clinic.', 'Qualifications', 'Required', '• A PhD (or with equivalent experience) with a focus on Bioinformatics, computational biology, or related fields.', '• Strong technical expertise in developing and utilizing bioinformatics analytic tools.', '• Hands-on analysis experience with large genetic/genomic datasets.', '• A background in statistics, including familiarity with mathematics and statistics packages such as MatLab, or R, or SAS.', '• Excellent oral and written communication skills in Chinese and English.', '• Experience with a matrix environment and ability to effectively collaborate with colleagues from a wide range of disciplines.', 'Preferred:', '• Understanding of the major concepts of immuno-oncology biology.', '• Understanding of drug discovery and development processes.', '• Record of publishing in high profile scientific journals.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. Today, we are building a new kind of healthcare company – one that is ready to help create a healthier future for all of us.', 'Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of an individual like you. To this end, we strive to create an environment of mutual respect, encouragement and teamwork. As part of our global team, you’ll have the opportunity to collaborate with talented and dedicated colleagues while developing and expanding your career.', 'We are seeking energetic, forward thinking professionals to join our Information Technology group in Prague. As part of that team, you will be helping us launch our new IT Global Innovation Center focused on developing and applying advanced capabilities in information sciences, information security, mobility, social media and big data.', 'You will have the opportunity to work on global teams to identify the biggest opportunities as well as tackle the biggest challenges at the intersection of healthcare, information and technology.', 'We offer project-based rotations to help with your professional development, and a flat, collaborative environment. Overall, our new Global Innovation Center in Prague offers technology professionals incredible opportunities to learn from others, to challenge yourself, and to enjoy a reward that technology careers don’t often bring: the satisfaction of helping to save lives.', "The incumbent has responsibility for Technical Planning of infrastructure related initiatives that support MSD's business strategies.", 'The Technical Planner collaborates across the GTO (Global Technology Operations) organization and relevant business and IT areas to effectively coordinate execution of projects with the program managers and owners.', 'The incumbent will be accountable to understand program or project technologies and identify technical dependencies and risks for programs. This individual combines the expertise of Project Management, Technology knowledge, and Vendor Management.', 'The technical planner engages with various engineering and technical teams that design, develop, implements, and delivers IT infrastructure solutions; gathers resources from various Internal infrastructure areas, and External Vendors; ensures MSD technology standards compliance; and identifies feasibility plans and opportunities for assigned programs.', 'The position will interact with several levels in the organization and will be critical in establishing good relationships with numerous regional IT areas and with other global functions.', 'Primary job responsibilities include:', 'Under the management of the GTO organization, the technical planner becomes accountable for delivery of assigned infrastructure projects. Integral to this activity is the development, implementation, and constant administration of sound project management disciplines in accordance with leading practices and MSD processes.', '• Accountable for realization of project, business, cost and schedule objectives.', '• Responsible for management of highly complex Infrastructure programs or business initiatives consisting of multiple related projects.', '• Oversight of IT solution execution; responsible for working with the solution managers to ensure coordination; ensures that the correct supply-side and architecture staff is made available to support the project.', '• Collaboration on the development of business cases to secure the approval and resources required to pursue the development of new capabilities, manage the development of requirement specifications related to new capabilities and guide the efforts of project teams chartered to implement these same capabilities.', '• Management and coordination across multiple technical projects within the portfolio.', '• Monitoring execution plans, resource deployment and overall coordination efforts to ensure that the overall program and subordinate projects are completed on schedule, on budget and on scope; management of pre/post approval of changes impacting scope, schedule and cost according to the agreed upon change process.', '• Responsible for components of: progress communications, schedule management, resource management, finance management, quality management, scope management and control management as they relate to the overall assigned projects.', '• Partner with affected stakeholders to ensure agreement on scope and priorities.', '• Establish strategies, coach and mentor all levels of the organization to project management skills across the organization.', '• Accountable for ensuring that all work is performed in compliance with applicable policies, laws and regulations.', 'Qualifications', 'Education Minimum Requirement:', 'BSc Degree required in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent', 'Required Experience and Skills:', '• Proven 5+ years record of proficiencies associated with consulting and business analysis on medium and large sized projects.', '• Ability to build, work and manage global and diverse teams and vendors', '• Excellent understanding of System Life Cycle methodologies.', '• Prior hands on experience developing the full SDLC deliverable set.', '• Proven Project Management/Portfolio Management-resource planning', '• Skilled in the enabling integrated methodologies and tools including: Change Management, Knowledge Management, Portfolio Management, Lean Six Sigma, Behavior Coaching and Consequence Management and Inclusion Behaviors', '• Excellent written, communication, and presentation skills.', '• Excellent facilitation, consultation, and Influence skills including experience with outsourced service providers', '• Excellent skills using IT applications to organize and analyses data', '• Embraces, practices, and exemplifies the principles and capabilities outlined in the MSD Leadership Behaviors', '• Demonstrated ability to interact and communicate with all levels of business leadership and operational teams.', '• Demonstrated ability to lead multiple diverse resources and establish training and development plans.', '• Demonstrated ability to think strategically', 'Desired Experience and Skills:', 'PMP and Sigma certification', 'Our employees are the key to our company’s success.  We demonstrate our commitment to our employees by offering a competitive and valuable rewards program.  Our Company’s benefits are designed to support the wide range of goals, needs and lifestyles of our employees, and many of the people that matter the most in their lives.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Mit seinen verschreibungspflichtigen Arzneimitteln, Impfstoffen, Biologika, Präparaten zur Selbstmedikation und für die Tiergesundheit in verschiedenen Therapiebereichen bietet MSD in mehr als 140 Ländern umfassende und innovative Lösungen für Gesundheit. Ein besonderes Anliegen von MSD ist darüber hinaus die Verbesserung der weltweiten Gesundheitsversorgung und der verbesserte Zugang zu Medikamenten. Dafür engagiert sich MSD in weitreichenden Gesundheitsprogrammen und Partnerschaften.', 'Zur Verstärkung unserer Teams an unserem Standort Unterschleißheim suchen wir ab sofort und in Vollzeit und zunächst auf 24 Monate befristet einen', 'Specialist Qualitätskontrolle (m/w/d).', 'Verantwortungsbereiche / Aufgaben:', 'Projektmanagement und Vertretung der Qualitätskontrolle sowohl in internen als auch internationalen Projektteams. Planung, Organisation und Durchführung daraus resultierender Methodentransfers, Methodenoptimierungen, Methodenentwicklungen und Validierungen', 'Lösen von methodischen bzw. gerätespezifischen Problemen im Labor', 'Protokoll- und Berichterstellung gemäß relevanter Richtlinien, GMP-Anforderungen sowie interner Qualitätsstandards', 'Kontrolle GMP-relevanter Dokumente bzw. Laborabläufe', 'Eigenständige Datenbeurteilung und Trendauswertung im Rahmen der Stabilitäts- und Freigabeprüfung sowie Durchführung komplexer OOS-Untersuchungen', 'Verantwortung verschiedener Systeme in der Qualitätskontrolle und konzeptionelle Weiterentwicklung', 'Kontinuierliche Weiterbildung und Kontaktpflege bezüglich des eigenen Aufgabengebietes', 'Qualifications', 'Als erfogreicher Kandidat für diese Vakanz bringen Sie idealerweise folgende Kenntnisse und Fähigkeiten mit:', 'Chemieingenieur oder Chemielaborant mit langjähriger Berufserfahrung', 'Mindestens 2 bis 5 Jahre Berufserfahrung bei der Durchführung und Problemlösung von chromatographischen (z.B. HPLC- und GC), spektroskopischen und nasschemischen Analysen, sowie der entsprechenden Software', 'Sehr gute GMP-Kenntnisse, sowie Erfahrungen zum Methodentransfer zwischen Standorten', 'Prozessverständnis und Erfahrungen in der Umsetzung von Prozessoptimierungen', 'Erfahrungen in matrixbasierten Projekt- bzw. Prozessarbeitsweisen', 'Gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift', 'Exzellente Teamfähigkeit und sehr gute kommunikative Fähigkeiten', 'Überzeugungs- und Durchsetzungsvermögen, Flexibilität und Belastbarkeit', 'Ihre Rolle bei MSD ist von entscheidender Bedeutung, um der Welt dabei zu helfen, neue Durchbrüche zu erzielen, die kommende Generationen betreffen. Wir zählen auf Ihre Fähigkeiten und Ihren Erfindungsreichtum, um einen bedeutsamen Beitrag zum weltweiten medizinischen Fortschritt zu leisten. Bei MSD erfinden wir fürs Leben.', 'Wir haben Ihr Interesse geweckt und Sie möchten Teil einer wachsenden und sich entwickelnden Organisation werden? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre Bewerbungsunterlagen über unsere Karriereseite!', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen:', 'MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. Bitte keine Anrufe oder E-Mails. Alle Lebensläufe, die von Personalberatungen per E-Mail, im Internet oder in irgendeiner Form und/oder Methode an einen Mitarbeiter von MSD gesendet werden, ohne dass eine gültige schriftliche Vermittlungsvereinbarung für diese Position besteht, gelten als alleiniges Eigentum von MSD. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Temporary', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']
