description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'The Market Access division acts as both educators and advocates for the products, processes, and practices that help MSD revolutionize medicine across the globe. Our tenacious, assertive group of individuals uses a deep understanding of the healthcare market in order to build collaborative relationships with the business leaders, customers, and legislative powers that help cultivate positive uptake of and education about MSD’s products throughout the world.', 'Position Overview', 'Responsible for supply chain and logistics functions, which may include, but are not limited to, material procurement, production planning, inventory control, outsourcing, vendor selection, and distribution. Creates integrated processes among internal functions such as operations, procurement and logistics, and outside suppliers. Focuses resources on continuous improvement of the movement of materials through various production processes and establishes key performance metrics and benchmarks relating to supply chain planning/forecasting to measure actual performance against goals on a regular basis. Promotes alignment by understanding and communicating customer needs and requirements throughout the organization.', "Takes responsibility for inbound and outbound logistical operations including inventory management, warehousing, and transportation to ensure sufficient supply of goods and products. Controls the commercial impact of the complete range of activities from receiving, locating and dispatching, sourcing, purchasing and optimizing inventory levels. Administers an effective system that meets the organization's inventory control needs through efficient transportation of raw materials, component parts and/or finished goods.", 'Major Activities', '1)', 'Demand planning:', 'Prepares and submits a sales Forecast for the next period before 15th working day of the current month;', 'Providing data and supporting budgeting process. On the quarterly base receives an updated sales budget forecast figures for the current/next year. Together with Marketing Manager and Technical Specialists discusses sales forecast. Applies an update to the sales budget forecast for the current/next year on the product level. After the final approval upload figures to IFP.', '2)', 'Supply planning & Stock management:', 'Performs stock count', 'Monitoring the stock level (overstock, low stock) and the expiry dates of the products', 'Places a refill orders to maintain a sufficient stock level of the manually ordered products;', 'Performs a verification of the shipping documents for the shipments upon request;', 'Upon request participate on the annual base physical stock count', 'Taking care of the supply cold chain products: dowloading USB data loggers data and making NOE in case of out of specification', 'situation', '3)', 'Reporting:', 's all pre-defined monthly report and give support to CCM Boxmeer upon request (regarding the goods flow, inventory level, availability/absence of the issued Invoices for the shipments from the consignment stock which were not delivered till the end of the month, payments verification from the customers etc)', 'On monthly base checks the invoices received from the third party logistics service provider for their services and submits the final invoice to the competent manager for approval/payment;', 'On weekly base submits the actual sales report/list of the current pending orders and open items\\overdue report per customer.', '4)', 'Customer support:', 'Receives orders for MSD AH products from customers and provides a full support for booking orders into system\\preparation of the shipping documents for the shipment for each customer.', 'Develop customer focus to maximize customers’ satisfaction.', '5)', 'Project & Other tasks', 'Fulfills the additional tasks', 'Achieve individual development plan', 'Establish, maintain and identify potential improvements to working practices and procedures to enhance efficiency, cost-effectiveness and productivity.', 'Identify opportunities and make recommendations in order to contribute to the continuous improvement of decisions and processes', 'Lead and support logistics projects in the region', 'Qualifications', 'Expertise Required / Core Competences', 'Key Capabilities', 'Customer Focus', 'Planning and Prioritizing', 'Teamwork and cooperation', 'Initiative', 'Flexibility', 'Drive for results', 'Confidence and commitment', 'Understanding the organisation', 'Analytical thinking', 'Good communication skills in verbal and in writing', 'Qualifications and Experience', 'Typically has min 5 years’ previous experience in relevant role at a multinational company', 'Have qualification at ‘higher education’ level', 'Good command of English', 'Computer literate with intermediate/advanced skills in Microsoft Office, especially Excel', 'Strong analytical and priority management skills, the ability and willingness to keep learning', 'A team player, who is able to work autonomously', 'Sense for initiatives and overall coordination of projects and activities', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 15 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Operations Coach, Integrated Production Team (IPT)', 'Manufacturing Systems Design & Commercialisation (MSDC)', 'MSD CARLOW', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of biotech in Ireland', 'Our Manufacturing Division, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', 'DETAILED', 'JOB', 'Description', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'The IPT Coach, will play a management role in the development of MSD Carlow 2 drug product facility.', "The IPT Coach will take ownership for designated suite and others as required. description: ['Associate Director Intensive Livestock Business Unit', 'MSD AH Leopardstown', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Our Animal Health division works to improve the health of animals around the world through collaborative partnerships and a deep sense of responsibility towards our customers, consumers, animals, society, and our planet. This team of energetic, independent thinkers offers one of the industry’s most innovative portfolios of products, services, and technologies that serve to prevent, treat, and control diseases across all major farm and companion animal species both domestically and internationally.', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD ANIMAL HEALTH', 'MSD Ireland’s Animal Health team is committed to the science of healthier animals. Based in Red Oak, Leopardstown, Dublin, MSD Animal Health is a leading veterinary pharmaceutical supplier to customers in both the Republic of Ireland and Northern Ireland, providing a full range of vaccines and pharmaceutical products for cattle, sheep, pigs, dogs, cats, horses, poultry and aquaculture.', 'MSD’s network of animal health professionals, work to deliver novel products and solutions that improve the health, performance and well-being of animals, ensure sustainable food supplies, protect public health and help people and pets enjoy their lives together.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'The Associate Director (ILBU) will have full Sales and profit accountability for the business unit and will have three direct reports. The person, in conjunction with their direct reports, will be responsible for all Key Accounts across the Pig, Poultry and Aqua businesses.', 'Key responsibilities will include:', 'Prepare operating budgets, sales and profit forecasts for Unit that are consistent with short and long-term strategic business objectives', 'Achieve or exceed sales and profit targets based on pre-established financial targets', 'Establish and maintain regular contacts with key customers, key opinion leaders, and authorities across the country, promoting communication and customer loyalty.', 'Visiting key customer personnel on a regular basis accompanied, where necessary, with colleagues to promote customer retention and sustained business growth.', 'Stay informed of industry and competitive activities. Keep MSD AH management team informed of trends or other competitive initiatives that could impact the Business Unit.', 'Continuously monitoring the potential financial impact of significant events within the country and developing comprehensive business plans', 'Responsible for the Marketing plans to ensure a sustained growth within the business', 'Determine the launch of new products, positioning, promotions, required support while bemnchmarking against agreed targets', 'Responsible for the delivery of technical services to support customers’ needs', 'Reinforce commitment to ensure full compliance with all company policies as well as applicable government regulations while maintaining a work environment that promotes and fosters MSD’s Leader Behavior.', 'Lead, guide and motivate the team', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'Degree in Science or Business preferred but not essential', 'Significant commercial experience in the Irish market in industries such as: Pharmaceutical, Animal Health, Animal Nutrition or Crop Protection.', 'Min. 5 years in a leadership position with substantial experience of working in a highly competitive environment', 'Demonstrated ability to influence stakeholders and manage the team through leadership skills', 'Min of 2 years sales management experience leading a successful team', 'Have proven strategic thinking and problem solving skills', 'A thorough understanding of the dynamics of the Irish Agricultural Industry', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', '*HJFeatured', 'Other Locations:', 'IE', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 50 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD Tiergesundheit ist mit über 50 Standorten ein weltweit tätiges, forschungsorientiertes Unternehmen mit einem breiten Spektrum an Veterinärmedizin und Dienstleistungen.', 'Unser Ziel ist es, Werte zu schaffen und zum stetigen Erfolg unserer Kunden beizutragen. Kurz gesagt: Wir zielen darauf ab, das Vertrauen unserer Kunden jeden Tag neu zu gewinnen. Indem wir die Bedürfnisse aller Interessensgruppen aufnehmen und die Kundenzufriedenheit im Fokus unseres Geschäfts steht, bieten wir innovative, hoch qualitative und vor allen Dingen lösungsorientierte Produkte und Dienstleistungen für Nutz- und Heimtiere an.', 'Zum nächstmöglichen Zeitpunkt suchen wir für unseren Forschungs- und Entwicklungsstandort Schwabenheim, in Vollzeit und unbefristet nahe Mainz einen', 'Senior Specialist Global Pharmacovigilance Manager', '(m/w/d)', 'Ihre Aufgaben:', 'Übernahme der Produktverantwortung hinsichtlich Pharmakovigilanz (PV) für definierte Produkte', 'Wissenschaftliche Bewertung der weltweiten Meldungen zur Arzneimittelsicherheit und elektronische Weiterleitung an die Behörden innerhalb der gesetzlichen Fristen', 'Eingabe von Nebenwirkungen in die Datenbank für Länder, die keinen direkten Zugriff auf die globale Datenbank haben', 'Erstellung und termingerechte Weiterleitung von PV-Gutachten und -Statements an die regulatorischen Behörden', 'Mitarbeit bei der regelmäßigen Analyse der Meldungen (Trending and Signaling)', 'Mitarbeit bei der Implementierung globaler Prozesse und der Formulierung von SOPs', 'Mitarbeit in Projekten je nach Expertise und Notwendigkeit (z. B. Mitarbeit im globalen Trainingsteam)', 'Qualifications', 'Abgeschlossenes Studium der Veterinärmedizin oder ein Studium im Bereich Life Science', 'Erste Erfahrung im Forschungs- und Entwicklungsumfeld eines internationalen Pharmazieunternehmens, idealerweise im Bereich Pharmakovigilanz oder Regulatory Affairs, von Vorteil', 'Pharmakologie- und Toxikologie-Kenntnisse und/ oder praktische Erfahrungen in der Tierarztpraxis von Vorteil', 'Kommunikationsstärke und eine sehr gute mündliche und schriftliche Ausdrucksweise in deutscher und englischer Sprache', 'Ausgeprägte analytische Fähigkeiten und eine präzise Arbeitsweise', 'Wir haben Ihr Interesse geweckt und Sie möchten Teil einer wachsenden und sich entwickelnden Organisation werden? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre Bewerbungsunterlagen über unsere Karriereseite.', 'Ihre Rolle bei MSD ist von entscheidender Bedeutung, um der Welt dabei zu helfen, neue Durchbrüche zu erzielen, die kommende Generationen betreffen. Wir zählen auf Ihre Fähigkeiten und Ihren Erfindungsreichtum, um einen bedeutsamen Beitrag zum weltweiten medizinischen Fortschritt zu leisten. Bei MSD erfinden wir fürs Leben.', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen:', 'MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. Bitte keine Anrufe oder E-Mails. Alle Lebensläufe, die von Personalberatungen per E-Mail, im Internet oder in irgendeiner Form und/oder Methode an einen Mitarbeiter von MSD gesendet werden, ohne dass eine gültige schriftliche Vermittlungsvereinbarung für diese Position besteht, gelten als alleiniges Eigentum von MSD. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

With a team of approximately 500 people, MSD Brinny specialises in the late-stage development and commercial supply of biotech products, including some of the company's most successful and life-changing treatments for oncology, hepatitis C and rheumatoid arthritis.", 'The Brinny site has been a vibrant part of the local Innishannon community for nearly 35 years and is now one of the region’s largest employers. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', 'Purpose of the Role', 'The Site Learning Lead develops and implements the Learning Strategy and Annual Learning Plan for the site to enable the site’s business performance/results.  S/he owns and is responsible for the learning system (which includes the QMS Training Subsystem standards) and all learning and development activities and requirements at the site.  S/he collaborates with Global L&D; to align on site level execution of all global initiatives and ensures proper delivery of global core/common curriculum, locally tailoring to ensure relevance, as appropriate. Success in this role depends on the candidate’s ability to collaborate with site leaders in the business, subject matter experts, GL&D; Learning Directors and Partners, as well as work cross-functionally to act as a partner and point of contact for the business’ performance needs and communicate them to support design and delivery of learning solutions', 'Main Activities', 'Effectively establish, deepen and sustain key relationships with site leaders, managers and HR business partners to understand their business needs and related performance gaps, provide oversight and analysis when defining requirements, and demonstrate an understanding of processes and methodology in order to provide appropriate learning solutions', 'Lead collaborative efforts with stakeholders to define desired performance outcomes; provide feedback and coaching on issues related to learning programs and policies', 'Identify performance needs and gaps and facilitate delivery of learning solutions to the business, when appropriate; document needs for customization or localization of global core/common learning programs; develops solutions, as needed', 'Ensure successful learning outcomes by directing the identification and translation of the client’s learning needs into a defined learning strategy and implemented solutions', 'Own and manage the site’s learning system and standards for all employees reporting to Plant Manager and SLT ensuring compliance to GL&D;, GMP, EHS and other required standards', 'Own, manage and maintain the site-wide curriculum', 'Business Process Owner for QMS GMP Training Standard (3.1); key contact for GMP audits & inspections', 'Shared responsibility for the execution of our manufacturing division, Subdivision, and Role-based curricula for local site content in conjunction with the our manufacturing division L&D; Learning Partner', 'Deliver training and/or support local SMEs providing training, as needed', 'Manage and deliver site onboarding which incorporates core/common our manufacturing division Onboarding program', 'Remain current on learning and development related tools, techniques, strategies and practices in order to provide relevant, informed consultative advice to clients; share leading learning practices with teams and stakeholders', 'Act as a liaison between the Learning Support Services function and stakeholders to ensure alignment with learning needs; Ensure learning solutions created meet the requirements of the client; Identify alternate non-training solutions when appropriate', 'Control of area expenditure within budgetary limits.', 'Develop an effective, focused and strong team by understanding: their abilities, unique contribution and broadening their skill set to be agile and prepared for any future business requirements.', 'Continuous Improvement', 'Responsible for driving a culture of Continuous Improvement by deploying MSD Six Sigma tools within the Learning & Development Department. work together to achieve the common goals of the company.', 'Act with Candor and Courage', 'Speak openly, honestly and with conviction; have the courage to take appropriate risks and make difficult decisions.', 'Make Rapid, Disciplined Decisions', 'Make timely decisions at the right level with the right data, document decisions and support them once made.', 'Drive Results', 'Set clear performance standards; overcome obstacles; hold ourselves and others accountable for achieving results.', 'Demonstrate Ethics & Integrity', 'Adhere to the highest standards of trustworthy and ethical behaviour in all interactions and hold others to the same standards; comply with all laws, policies and regulations; identify and address ethical issues without hesitation.', 'Build Talent: Build diverse talent with the capabilities necessary to succeed in commercial vaccine manufacture; inspire, reward and develop to ensure individuals reach their potential; make tough calls when necessary.', 'Job Experience', 'Minimum of 10 years of related experience in the Pharmaceutical industry or a similar operating environment, with minimum 5 years of leadership experience and minimum 1 year of experience facilitating / delivering learning solutions', 'Demonstrated Knowledge of pharmaceutical manufacturing operation (e.g. Manufacturing, Quality, Engineering, etc)', 'Knowledge of and experience in supplying Six Sigma and Lean methodologies.', 'Demonstrated leadership and change management skills with a continuous improvement focus.', 'Qualifications', 'Qualifications', 'Degree or 3rd level qualification (Business/Science/Technical). Masters preferred.', 'A Training qualification is desirable.', 'Project Management qualification such as Project Management Professional.', 'Desirable evidence of Continuous Professional Development.', 'Preference lean Six Sigma Green Belt.', 'Skills Set', 'Leadership: Demonstrated skill in applying approaches, tools, and techniques to gain the cooperation and support of others; ability to lead by example and foster collaborative relationships', 'Influencing: Advanced ability to partner, collaborate, and impact decisions within and outside the organization', 'Creative Thinking: Demonstrated skill in applying tools and techniques for grasping new concepts, acquiring new ways of seeing things, and revising ways of thinking and patterns of behavior', 'Interpersonal Relationships: Demonstrated skill in applying approaches, tools, and techniques for working with individuals and groups in a constructive and collaborative manner, including the ability to build and maintain critical networks and collaborative relationships', 'Oral and Written Communications: Advanced ability to express oneself to provide information to others effectively and in a succinct manner; outstanding verbal, written, and presentation abilities; ability to ask thoughtful questions to gain insights, listen, and understand other perspectives', 'Coaching: Ability to encourage, motivate, and guide individuals and teams in learning and improving effectiveness', 'Decision Making and Critical Thinking: Advanced ability to use a broad range of methods, assumptions, frameworks, and perspectives when solving problems and making decisions', 'Continuous Improvement:  Ability to think systemically and drive optimization and continuous improvement of learning processes', 'Planning: Tactical, Strategic: Advanced project planning and management experience, including the ability to contribute to operational (short term), tactical (1–2 years), and strategic (3-5 years) planning in support of the business plan', 'L&D; Policies, Standards, and Procedures: Knowledge of and ability to use industry and organization standards, procedures, and policies relevant to staff learning and development', 'Adult Learning: Theory and Practice: Advanced experience in applying concepts and practices of adult learning to meet the dynamic needs of the business', 'Learning Needs Analysis: Advanced experience in assessing competency gaps and identifying what people need to learn for successful individual and organizational performance', 'Training Delivery: Ability to effectively deliver or facilitate training in face-to-face and virtual instructor led sessions', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. description: ['The Regional Director Medical Affairs (RDMA) is responsible for driving execution of scientific & medical affairs plans for their assigned Therapy Areas (TA) in the countries of their assigned region. They are impactful members of regional cross-functional teams, including regional Commercial, Center of Real-World Evidence (CORE), Policy and Market Access. They engage with their network of scientific leaders in their region. This is a regionally based position (i.e. residing in one of the affiliates of the region or regional hub) in  Global Medical Affairs (GMA).', 'and Responsibilities', 'Primary activities', '• Guides country GMA staff to execute the annual scientific & medical plan for their assigned TA.', '• Chairs the Regional Medical Affairs Team to ensure execution of agreed medical tactics and leverage best Policy and regional Market Access to drive development and execution of region plans.', '• Consolidates actionable medical insights from countries in their region.', '• Engages with a network of description: ['A', 'ccount manager Leader', 'Es', 'principalmente responsable de establecer una sociedad con uno o más clientes de cuentas estratégicas para desarrollar soluciones que puedan impulsar un crecimiento rentable para MSD a través de Satisfacción al Cliente de excelencia apoyándose del portafolio de productos, servicios y soluciones de MSD.', 'T-KAM implementará planes de negocio estratégicos a largo plazo para aquellas cuentas estratégicas claves. El KAM debe liderar y entrar en sociedad con equipos multidisciplinarios de ambas partes para implementar y maximizar los acuerdos estratégicos con la cuenta, asegurando una sola Voz de MSD con el Cliente.', 'Actividades:', 'Conocimiento y Análisis del Mercado y del Cliente', 'Identificar tendencias emergentes o aceleradas del mercado, e información relevante del cliente para generar oportunidades de crecimiento con Clientes Claves.', 'Comprender la misión y visión del cliente, sus intereses, fortalezas, debilidades, oportunidades y amenazas; y crear propuestas de valor alineadas.', 'Desarrollar un entendimiento profundo de las necesidades no satisfechas o de la evolución de nuevas oportunidades del Cliente y remover las implicaciones que impidan la integración del portafolio de productos de MSD.', 'Completar un análisis de competidores para el cliente.', 'Obtener información descriptiva acerca de las cuentas claves individuales como base para la creación de un perfil. El perfil podrá ser desarrollado con fuentes de información internas (ie: miembros internos de los diversos equipos especializados y multifuncionales, base de datos CRM y base de datos externas) y a través de discusiones con Cunetas Claves.', 'Comprensión del proceso de toma de decisiones, logística,', 'Propuestas de negocio y de contratación con la cuenta.', 'Desarrollar oportunidades a través del conocimiento y uso del marco de referencia político del cliente.', 'Identificar principales sujetos (Stakeholders) de las cuentas claves y entender sus puntos de vista con MSD, nuestros competidores y el ambiente de salubridad tanto como sus necesidades para mejorar las condiciones de los pacientes como ventaja competitiva.', 'Desarrollo del Plan de Cuenta', 'Capturar oportunidades de negocios a corto y largo plazo a base del profundo conocimiento del mercado y del cliente.', 'Definir, presentar y validar los objetivos de la cuenta clave y sus KPIs (Indicadores de Productividad Claves) con los principales sujetos del negocio (Stakeholders).', 'Desarrollar un plan completo y comprensivo del cliente que contenga las metas y necesidades del cliente y que considere las amenazas y peligros de la competencia.', 'Definir una propuesta de valor a la medida de las necesidades del cliente mediante un acercamiento multi-franquicia.', 'Desarrollar estrategias a corto y largo plazo centradas en el cliente que generen crecimiento de la rentabilidad,', 'segmento de mercado y penetración del portafolio a la misma vez que fortalezca nuestra reputación a través de una fuerte sociedad y compromiso con los principales decisores.', 'Identificar oportunidades de colaboración mutua para buscar la solución de necesidades no satisfechas así como de la evolución de nuevas oportunidades.', 'Determinar cómo desarrollar e implementar ofrecimientos estratégicos apoyándose de recursos internos multidisciplinarios.', 'Obtener un entendimiento completo de los términos contractuales de MSD con respecto a cada producto del portafolio de productos como la base para desarrollar oportunidades de negocio y propuestas de valor.', 'Desarrollar e implementar un poderoso, efectivo y conciso plan de comunicación de la propuesta de valor para el cliente basado en los intereses comunes dirigido a establecer una relación de valor y compromiso integrando el portafolio total de MSD.', 'Implementación y Monitoreo del Plan del Cliente', 'Desarrollar y mantener una relación de largo plazo con clientes/stakeholders dentro de las cuentas claves que son responsables por el negocio del cliente (ie: primario entre MSD y la cuenta clave para todos los productos y servicios del negocio, coordinando los esfuerzos de todas las otras unidades/funciones o divisiones y el cliente.', 'Conducir todos los esfuerzos de negociación del portafolio de productos y servicios de MSD buscando una colaboración de negocios estratégica. Identificar los productos y servicios de MSD diferenciadores de valor para el cliente.', 'Trabajar de cerca con los decisores claves en las cuentas para alinear oportunidades de negocio mutuamente beneficiosas. Invertir desproporcionadamente donde el crecimiento del portafolio de productos y servicios de MSD esté identificado.', 'Coordinar recursos a través de todo MSD para establecer fuertes lazos de colaboración con el cliente.', 'Manejar el presupuesto asignado para el desarrollo de soluciones y servicios. description: ['Have you heard about MSD?', "MSD is an innovative, global healthcare leader committed to improving health and well-being in 140 countries around the world. We continue to focus our research on conditions that affect millions of people around the world - diseases like Alzheimer's, Diabetes and Cancer - while further expanding our strengths in areas such as vaccines and biologics.", 'We aspire to be the best healthcare company in the world and are dedicated to providing leading innovations and solutions for tomorrow.', 'Opportunity offered : GDMS Manager', 'The Manager is responsible for providing all aspects of supervision to individuals supporting a functional area within GDMS. Interacts effectively with project teams and business partners, and serves as first line escalation path. Provides career development opportunities and manages performance. Responsibilities may include supervision of staff and interaction with individuals across multiple MSD sites under the guidance and direction of the Associate Director/Director, in compliance with MSD Policies and Procedures, GDMS Standard Operation Procedures (SOPs) and ICH-GCP guidelines and within the department budget. Prepares promotion recommendations. Ensures direct reports receive appropriate training and mentoring to be successful in their assignments', 'Participates in the recruitment process', 'Aligns others around a positive direction. Develops challenging but achievable objectives that clearly support stated organizational goals.', 'Maximizes', 'staff effectiveness by working with direct reports to ensure a realistic workload that supports value-added work and work-life balance, estimating length and difficulty of tasks and projects, anticipating and adjusting for obstacles and', 'setbacks, and elevating issues to the appropriate management level', 'Assume specific functional leadership responsibilities for business deliverables assigned to direct reports and supervised staff on project', 'Increases team and functional effectiveness by supporting functional efforts to simplify and standardize procedures to the greatest extent possible, sharing best practices and leading continuous improvement efforts under the direction of Associate Director', 'May supervise contingent, non-exempt, or temporary workers, on-shore and offshore', 'May assume responsibilities to support Process Owner activities in department for specific functional or business activity', 'Manages performance', 'Conducts management and functional area meetings, contributing expertise when necessary through formal', 'or', 'informal presentations.', 'Keeps abreast of process and technology changes both within and outside of MSD that may impact staff.', 'May participate in initiatives beyond functional area (e.g. cross-functional initiatives, etc.).', 'May support any other project or perform any other data management or drug surveillance task deemed appropriate by management', 'Qualifications', 'Expected Qualification of YOURS :', 'We are seeking professionals with the following qualifications, skills and', 'Experience:', 'University degree in relevant discipline', 'Minimum 3-5 years’ experience in Clinical Data Management or Pharmacovigilance as appropriate to business role or', 'related industry, supervisory or management experience is preferred.', 'An overall working knowledge of the drug discovery or Drug Surveillance process, ICH and GCP guidelines.', 'Strong communication skills (oral and written) with the ability to communicate with both the technical and business areas.', 'Demonstrated project management, decision making and problem-solving skills.', 'Ability to establish effective professional relationships across a wide range of business contacts.', 'Ability to build talent and lead team with influencing skill and development skill.', 'Ability to work', 'under pressure in a changing environment with flexibility.', 'We offer:', 'Competitive remuneration', 'Position in a leading global healthcare company', 'Challenging career', 'Professional growth based on performance', 'Innovative and flexible working environment', 'Wide range of benefits', 'Your role at MSD is description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD’s Oncology division is dedicated to delivering breakthrough innovations that extend and improve the lives of cancer patients worldwide. Our team of dauntless, forward-thinking individuals achieves this through an unwavering commitment to supporting accessibility to medicine, providing new therapeutic procedures, and collaborating with governments and payers to ensure that people who need medicines have access to them. At MSD, our focus is on innovation and launch execution excellence; we translate breakthrough science into innovative medicines that help people with cancer across the globe.', 'Position Overview', 'The position is a dedicated resource in the Oncology Business Unit reporting to the Franchise Manager. Being a core member of the commercial team, the Scientific Engagement Lead (SEL) will add value to our stakeholders in all interactions, differentiating MSD from the competition and ensuring that we engage with our stakeholders through the right channel at the right time with the right information to drive the right behavioural change.', 'Relevant stakeholders will mainly be healthcare professionals (oncologists, nurses, pathologists, surgeons, etc) but the successful individual will also focus on our engagement and strategic relationship with professional bodies, pharmacists and patient organisations across a range of indications.', 'The SEL will be responsible for making sure the voice and opinions from our external stakeholders are reflected into MSD’s campaigns and activities. The SEL will act as the clinical data expert within the marketing team and will be proactive in building upon his/her knowledge to increase the value proposition of MSD and its brands in oncology.', 'The role will require close collaboration with all Oncology Brand & Customer managers and the wider cross functional team members to ensure consistent and integrated channel execution for our inline and future indications.', 'The role will require strong external stakeholder engagement and will be classified as a field based marketing role', '.', 'Key Activities', 'Clinical data expert within marketing', '–', 'brings insights into organisation & upskill team on therapy area, product & competition.', 'By working closely with Medical Affairs and proactively monitoring the external environment (publications, clinician feedback, congresses, etc.), the SEL will drive the integration of key scientific topics and insights into the commercial activities within the business unit. The SEL will align these to the product strategy (adoption ladders and desired behaviour changes) defined by the marketing team.', 'Branded Activity:', 'Stakeholder plans to drive adoption of strategic objectives, behaviour change & advocacy for brand.', 'Aligned to the marketing strategy, the SEL will drive advocacy for MSD’s brands and indications through meaningful interactions with external stakeholders. By being an expert in both the therapy area and external environment, the SEL will be in a position to define and execute truly differentiating activities.', 'Delivery through channel mix', '–', 'F2F, webcast, talking heads, etc.', 'The SEL will deliver this through a range of traditional and innovative channels. Being a core member of the marketing team, integration and alignment with other campaigns and activities will be critical.', 'Partnership with professional bodies.', 'The SEL will be responsible for the development and execution of strategic partnerships with key professional groups and organisations within the therapy areas he/she is responsible for. Moving beyond the execution of typical promotional activities, the SEL will identify common goals to create sustainable and value adding partnerships benefiting patients, MSD and the NHS.', 'Medical Education -', 'Supporting Medical Education activities by working alongside Scientific Leaders and Brand & Customer Managers to develop relevant content that drives advocacy for on-license indications.', 'Identify ways to multipurpose relevant content, find synergies and participate in content creation.', 'Proactively seek to engage external stakeholders in novel and compelling ways leveraging technology.', 'Assist in the planning and execution of filming at Conferences or National Medical Education webcasts', 'Lead on the filming and post-production of video content that can later be used on-line in a promotional context', 'Leading the ABPI certification of content via the Medical-Legal approval process', 'Non-Branded Activity:', 'Internal awareness / disease awareness campaigns.', 'Working with the marketing and external affairs team, the SEL will drive elements of internal awareness and disease awareness campaings aligned to the therapy area.', 'Thought leadership development.', 'Engagement with patient orgs.', 'Development of strategic relationships with patient organisations to ensure that MSD activities and campaigns reflect patients’ best interest and are reflected into our day to day strategic planning. Drive value adding activities which will raise MSD’s profile in the relevant therapy areas.', 'Explore/utilise social media channels for delivery of above brand relevant content', '.', 'Clinical training delivery for FF -', 'The SEL will be responsible for defining and delivering components of the field force & wider XFT training linked to the disease area and product specific knowledge/content. To this goal, the SEL will work with the BCMs and Training Team to create the required content.', 'Qualifications', 'Knowledge', 'Required:', 'The Successful candidate should be able to demonstrate experience/competencies in several of the following areas:', 'Strong commercial and scientific acumen, being able to translate scientific information into commercial actions and campaigns', 'Understanding of key marketing principles such as brand planning, campaign execution and pharmaceutical promotion', 'Development of relationships with scientific leaders / professional bodies', 'Experience in delivering / training scientific content', 'Strong project management skills, ideally with experience managing certification of assets via the Med-Leg review process', 'Strong knowledge of the ABPI code', 'Experience with MSD Connect, Veeva and/or other digital platforms', 'A working knowledge of the NHS', 'Skill and Role Competencies:', 'Demonstrates advanced ability to set Customer Engagement strategy and tactical implementation based on commercial strategy', 'Demonstrates ability to analyse and process complex scientific information, synthesizing into relevant insights and actions aligned to the commercial strategy', 'Ability to connect and develop strong relationships with top tier scientific experts and professional organisations', 'Demonstrates in-depth knowledge of opportunities to advance commercial strategy and achieve optimal revenue', 'Demonstrates the ability to manage strategic partnerships to expectations and contractual obligations and encourage mutually beneficial innovative practices', 'Determines ability to set reporting needs to ensure reports are compiled and delivered to the right commercial audience;', 'Demonstrates ability to design metrics for various initiatives, transform complex data sets and situations into easily understood information and uses data to inform commercial strategy and make ROI projections', 'Demonstrates the ability to foresee possible risks to project goals and deadlines and create pre-emptive solutions', 'Leadership Behaviours required:', 'Adheres to the highest standards of trustworthy and ethical behaviour in all interactions and holds others to the same high standards; comply with all laws, policies and regulations; identify and address ethical issues without hesitation', 'Sets clear performance standards; overcomes obstacles; holds oneself and others accountable for achieving results', 'Focus the organisation on delivering value for customers, including patients, by fully understanding and meeting their needs', 'Make timely decisions at the right level with the right data and support them once made', 'Speak openly, honestly and with conviction; have the courage to take appropriate risks and make difficult decisions', 'Actively listen and seek to understand differing perspectives; work together to achieve the common goals the team', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world title: Scientific Engagement Lead, Oncology Job

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', "MSD’s Global Human Health (GHH) Division abides by a “patient first, profits later” ideology. Results-driven and ambitious, this team of individuals represents a functional balance between meeting company objectives and the needs of people around the world. The division is comprised of sales and marketing professionals who are passionate about their role in bringing MSD's prescription medicines, vaccines, and other medical products to our customers worldwide.", 'The UK HH Oncology Business continues to accelerate its growth across Multiple tumor types, in addition to building third party collaborations to extend the portfolio of products needed to sustain success as a leading Oncology Pharma. Company. This has created a demand to effectively managing the growing Research and Analytics requirements cross the portfolio and indications through planning, prioritisation and ensuring an efficient and effect delivery of business insights. In addition there is a need take a strategic approach to leverage opportunities and managing competitor challenges across the MSD Oncology business.', 'A Business Insights Team Leader role is critical to ensure we achieve both a strategic focus with stronger customer engagement and partnerships with the Marketing Leadership to manage the Opportunities and challenges working as part of their leadership committees. They will need to support effective planning and prioritization of tactical research and analytics requirements across the franchise with timely Insights delivered to optimize commercial implementation. Underpinning this will be the need for the Team Leader to directly manage the oncology Business Insights Leads to ensure effectively delivery against the key Oncology Business Priorities in terms of Market Research, Analytics and forecasting and support their development of capabilities to align to the changing business Insights requirements as the Oncology Market becomes more complex and competitive.', 'Key Activities:', 'Direct Management and leadership of the Oncology Business Insights Leads including planning, prioritization, managing, coach and support the Oncology BI leads to deliver on Market Research, Analytics, Forecasting and Reporting requirements across the Oncology Franchise this will include leading:', 'Go to Market Model development.', 'Segmentation and Targeting.', 'Reporting infrastructure planning, Automated Report and Advanced Analytics development.', 'Global and Regional Engagement on Regional and Local Research Planning and delivery.', 'Strategic, Pan Tumour Market Research and Complex Analytics Project Management.', 'Working closely with Oncology franchise leads on a Strategic approach to managing Opportunities and Competitor risks across the Portfolio as part of the strategic leadership committees – managing the Market Research and analytics required to deliver.', 'Lead on the Planning and Prioritisation of BI Market Research, Analytics and reporting plans to support all Indications and Oncology Products.', 'Take ownership and responsibility for delivering Research, Analytics, Forecasting and Reporting for One Indication.', 'Lead the Cross Franchise In Marketing Forecasting Process across 3 cycles per year including short and long range - working closely with Oncology Leadership, Region and Finance. This will be including co-ordinating with Region, global and finance on managing deliver of 26+ line indication forecasts and supporting Patient model population and Assumption building and submission communication to senior local and global leadership.', 'Coaching, providing guidance and expertise on market research technical and governance requirements and analytics to the Oncology BI leads. Leading the Oncology BI leads to deliver on Business Priorities aligned to the Oncology franchises needs.', 'Job dimensions:', 'Head Office based role requiring approximately 20% travel in the UK to manage Market Research Fieldwork requirements and offsite Internal meetings.', 'Qualifications', 'Knowledge', 'Required:', 'Strong product, therapy and services business area knowledge for Oncology Preferred; as well as a broad industry knowledge.', 'Knowledge of Market Research techniques and guidelines.', 'Knowledge and experience in Market Research, Analytics, Forecasting, Patient Modelling and Reporting.', 'Good understanding of NHS and broader health landscape as well as dynamics of the changing customer environment and implications for the company and Business Insights required.', 'Understanding of business metrics and their application.', 'Understand of the of the available public data in the NHS and emerging trends and how they can be used to support decision making.', 'Forecast and Patient modelling knowledge and expertise.', 'Knowledge of Advance Analytics techniques and capabilities including: Segmentation, Targeting, ROI Analysis, Customer Journey mapping and Persona development and implementation.', 'Skills and Competencies Required:', 'Technical / Experience -', 'Strong numeracy and analytical skills.', 'Market Research Capabilities.', 'Forecasting and Patient Modelling Capabilities.', 'Good Microsoft skills.', 'Good communication skills.', 'Ability to work through ambiguity and uncertainty.', 'Collaboration, team work approach, experience of coaching, training and mentoring (people management preferred ).', 'Strong planning, prioritisation and co-ordination and outputs oriented.', 'Good problem solving and decision making.', 'Organized and detail oriented.', 'Ideally 5+ years previous Analytical functional roles within pharmaceutical, biotech or medical industries preferred.', '3+ years’ experience in analytics or related roles (both at a functional and managerial level).', 'Strong marketing and market understanding in areas supporting.', 'Excellent understanding of Market Research, forecasting and analysis methodologies, techniques and guidelines.', 'External Agency engagement and project management.', 'Understanding of data sources, guidelines and their application.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 20 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Manager - Forecasting Job

description: ['Mit seinen verschreibungspflichtigen Arzneimitteln, Impfstoffen, Biologika, Präparaten zur Selbstmedikation und für die Tiergesundheit in verschiedenen Therapiebereichen bietet MSD in mehr als 140 Ländern umfassende und innovative Lösungen für Gesundheit. Ein besonderes Anliegen von MSD ist darüber hinaus die Verbesserung der weltweiten Gesundheitsversorgung und der verbesserte Zugang zu Medikamenten. Dafür engagiert sich MSD in weitreichenden Gesundheitsprogrammen und Partnerschaften.', 'Die Burgwedel Biotech GmbH ist eine Tochter des international tätigen Pharmaunternehmens MSD.', 'In unserem Impfstoffwerk in Burgwedel/Hannover arbeiten rund 200 Mitarbeiter und stellen eine breite Palette hochwertiger Veterinärimpfstoffe zur Prophylaxe/Kontrolle von Krankheiten bei Nutz- und Heimtieren für den weltweiten Bedarf her. Des Weiteren wurden jüngst große Investitionen getätigt, um auf einer neuen Impfstoffproduktionslinie eine Vakzine zur Prophylaxe einer humanen Seuche zu fertigen.', 'Zur Verstärkung unserer Teams an unserem Standort Burgwedel suchen wir ab sofort und in Vollzeit und zunächst befristet auf 1 Jahre', 'QC-Laboranten (m/w/x)', 'im Bereich Qualitätskontrolle.', 'Ihre Aufgaben umfassen unter anderem:', 'Schwerpunkt Serologische Freigabe-Testung (ELISA)', 'Biologisch/Chemisch technischer Assistent oder vergleichbare Ausbildung', 'Selbstständige, fach- und termingerechte Durchführung von serologischen Prüfverfahren zur Freigabe von Antigenen und Vakzinen', 'GMP-gerechte Dokumentation und Auswertung der Analysenergebnisse', 'Mitarbeit bei Entwicklung, Optimierung und Validierung von analytischen Methoden', 'Qualifizierung, Kalibrierung und Wartung von Analysengeräten und Prüfmittel', 'Bereitschaft zur aktiven Mitarbeit im Team und Optimierung der Arbeitsprozesse', 'Qualifications', 'Idealerweise bringen Sie bereits folgenden Hintergrund und Erfahrungen mit:', 'Berufsausbildung zum biologisch/chemisch technischen Assistenten (C/BTA), PTA oder vergleichbarer Ausbildung.', 'Erfahrung in serologischer Methodik (ELISA, Agglutination)', 'Gute SAP Kenntnisse und GMP Kenntnisse', '2-3 Jahre Berufserfahrung im GMP regulierten Pharma-Bereich', 'Erfahrungen im GMP/GDP/Pharmaumfeld', 'Anwenderkenntnisse MS-Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) und SAP-Atlas', 'Sehr gutes Englisch in Wort und Schrift', 'Planungs- und Organisationsgeschick, kommunikationsstark und arbeitet gerne in einem Team', 'Bereitschaft zur Übernahme von Verantwortung', 'Ihre Rolle bei MSD ist von entscheidender Bedeutung, um der Welt dabei zu helfen, neue Durchbrüche zu erzielen, die kommende Generationen betreffen. Wir zählen auf Ihre Fähigkeiten und Ihren Erfindungsreichtum, um einen bedeutsamen Beitrag zum weltweiten medizinischen Fortschritt zu leisten. Bei MSD erfinden wir fürs Leben.', 'Wir haben Ihr Interesse geweckt und Sie möchten Teil einer wachsenden und sich entwickelnden Organisation werden? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre Bewerbungsunterlagen über unsere Karriereseite!', 'Personalberatungsvertreter, bitte sorgfältig lesen: MSD akzeptiert keine unaufgeforderte Unterstützung von Personalberatungen für diese Beschäftigungsmöglichkeit. Bitte keine Anrufe oder E-Mails. Alle Lebensläufe, die von Personalberatungen per E-Mail, im Internet oder in irgendeiner Form und/oder Methode an einen Mitarbeiter von MSD gesendet werden, ohne dass eine gültige schriftliche Vermittlungsvereinbarung für diese Position besteht, gelten als alleiniges Eigentum von MSD. Für den Fall, dass der Bewerber von MSD aufgrund der Verweisung oder auf andere Weise eingestellt wird, wird keine Gebühr gezahlt.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Temporary', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '2', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. Today, we are building a new kind of healthcare company – one that is ready to help create a healthier future for all of us.', 'What will you do:', 'You will become a member of the ERP team, which is responsible for supporting and implementing our global SAP solution. This role will be part of the SAP ABAP development team and is expected to do the global SAP implementation and support.', 'Your role will be technical in nature. After you learn the ropes, you will take part in the software development activities primarily in our ERP Portal area, helping out in other areas when needed.', 'Your typical day might include the following:', '•\tAnalyzing errors and user requests', '•\tImplementing required changes and improvements in the system', '•\tTalking to users and domain experts to identify possible improvements and to gather requirements', '•\tEnsuring compliance and traceability of all system modifications', '•\tHelping users and colleagues by supporting them in your area of expertise', '•\tLearning more about different areas of the system', 'You might like this job if:', '•\tYou enjoy solving problems and digging for answers.', '•\tYou love to learn new things and employ new technologies.', '•\tYou genuinely like helping people, because cooperation is a key part of our daily job.', '•\tYou are motivated and driven to search for new challenges and to make a difference.', '•\tYou are focused on detail, while also not forgetting the big picture.', '•\tYou are confident to put the quality of your work up for review.', 'Qualifications', 'What you need to know:', 'Education Level:', '•\tDegree in science, engineering or related fields; fresh graduates welcome', 'Experience/Technical Skills:', '•\tSoftware development experience - Java or similar', '•\tWeb development - JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS', '•\tInternet protocols – SOAP, REST, XML, JSON', '•\tKnowledge of object-oriented programming techniques', '•\tIDE tools (Eclipse) and any DevOps experience is welcome', '•\tAny SAP-related experience is an advantage (ABAP, ECC, Enterprise Portal etc.)', 'Personal Attributes:', '•\tGood English communication skills', '•\tProactive, eager and quick to learn', '•\tWilling to adapt to new technologies and approaches', '•\tTroubleshoot Java applications', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 10 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD Red Oak (Human Health)', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies..', 'MSD HUMAN HEALTH', 'MSD’s Human Health division based in Red Oak, Leopardstown in Dublin performs a suite of core functions that are central to the strength and capability of MSD’s operations across Ireland. The site’s primary services include Clinical Research, Medical Affairs, Regulatory Affairs, Sales, Policy & Communications and Marketing.', 'MSD Ireland’s Human Health team of over 100 people supports the advancement of a range of treatment areas such as Oncology, Vaccines, Diabetes and Immunology.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'The Brand & Customer manager (BCM) is the local Brand Champion/Expert responsible for maximizing subsidiary revenue of relevant Brand(s) through a strong focus on Customers and excellent market and environmental understanding. This role will be responsible for the preparation and implementation of a sales and marketing strategy that will facilitate the delivery of required level of sales and brand awareness in specified areas. The role will include sales and marketing responsibilities for specific indications for the Oncology portfolio and will include product sales and marketing. The role will be crucial in communicating the strategy, messaging and positioning behind the brand to different customer stakeholders. The role will report to the oncology franchise manager and will play a central part in the strategic planning and operational planning process.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Brand Management: Develop and execute annual subsidiary Brand Profit Plan(s) aligned with Regional Brand Strategies to include environmental assessment, marketing approach, channel mix, segment selection, materials adaptation/localization & development; Brand P&L; Management through optimization of Brand marketing contribution; promotional budget allocation & management; sales forecasting; Represent country customer and brand needs regionally.', 'Focus on implementing innovative customer and patient solutions and look to continuously improve and evolve existing programmes.', 'Commercial excellence: be proactive and agile in responding to market needs and ensure optimal execution of franchise commercial strategy.', 'Customer Focus & Management: Develop a deep understanding of their customer group(s). Interact closely with key Customers; develop and implement a comprehensive customer engagement model; participate in relevant local Customer teams (CMT); champion Customer-centricity in decision making.', 'Compliance / Health & Safety: ensures that all customer marketing activities are conducted in accordance with all MSD Compliance Policies/ Health & Safety standards', 'Leadership / Change Management: consistently demonstrates MSD Leadership Standards; is a leader of change and actively participates in strategy development and implementation in the organisation.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'The BCM reports directly to the Oncology Franchise Manager', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'Essential', 'Minimum 2 years’ experience with Irish Oncology Physicians either in a sales or marketing role.', 'General', 'Brand marketing experience.', 'Strong listening & comprehension skills.', 'Demonstrated orientation towards executional excellence.', 'Strong attention to detail and follow up – strong analytical skills together with developed business acumen.', 'Technical', 'Entrepreneurial mindset, ability and eagerness to challenge status quo, make quick decisions, and operate successfully in an empowered organisation', 'Proven knowledge and understanding of Brand, Customer & Digital Marketing.', 'Strong business acumen including an understanding of the role of the supply chain, policy & access in the development & delivery of the brand plan.', 'High technical ability on handling complex clinical evidence', 'Excellent financial management & planning skills to manage local brand P&L; and forecasting requirements.', 'Strong IT skills, including advanced Excel & Powerpoint.', 'Strong ability to analyse multiple data sources and ability to use insights to effectively inform strategy.', 'Ability to manage projects and programmes using agile methodologies.', 'People', 'Excellent internal & external communication & influencing skills.', 'Strong interpersonal skills including relationship building & ongoing maintenance.', 'Demonstrated ability to work in extended teams and collaborate / partner with others from across the business.', 'Education', 'Primary Degree, preferable in a business or science related area.', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 10 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

Carlow employs over 350 highly skilled employees and is an important element of MSD’s network of sites, playing a pivotal role in the manufacture of our immuno-oncology treatment.', 'MSD Carlow is a state-of-the-art, 200,000 sq ft vaccines and biologics facility focused on formulating and filling vaccine and biologic products that improve and transform the lives of people across the world.', 'MSD’s sustained investment in Ireland empowers Carlow to offer its team the opportunity to continuously grow, learn, invent and thrive. We are growing our highly-skilled team and building our presence in Carlow so that we can continue to lead scientific breakthroughs in the treatment of some of the world’s most harmful diseases.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', "• Take ownership for designated production work stream area shift team. ensure all work is subsequently carried out in line with same.', '• Collaborate with Technical and Quality Departments to ensure robust investigation of quality events. description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'MSD’s Animal Health (MAH) division works to improve the health of animals around the world through collaborative partnerships and a deep sense of responsibility towards our customers, consumers, animals, society, and our planet. This team of energetic, independent thinkers offers one of the industry’s most innovative portfolios of products, services, and technologies that serve to prevent, treat, and control diseases across all major farm and companion animal species both domestically and internationally.', 'We are looking for an experienced Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) Senior Specialist for our manufacturing site in Vienna.', 'Reporting to the Associate Director EHS, the Senior Specialist will be responsible for specific environmental health and safety programs and compliance for the manufacturing site Vienna, Austria. MSD offers attractive career opportunities within the EHS function in Austria and fosters individual career development both through internal trainings and external educational programs and certifications. You will have the opportunity to work with a variety of pharmaceutical professionals, translating safety relevant information into best practices, communicating across all levels of the organization.', 'Responsibilities include but will not be limited to the following main tasks:', 'Provide technical support and coordination in defining and implementing site EHS systems for the site.', 'Prioritize EHS related risks, develop, and assist with implementing corrective and preventive action plans.', 'Proactively identify improvement opportunities and effectively collaborate across the organization to leverage best practices and drive continuous improvement efforts', 'Ensures ongoing evaluation of changes in Safety Regulatory requirements.', 'Ensures that site systems are in place to maintain compliance with all EHS regulations and programs', 'Develop, implement and deliver effective EHS-related training programs for both management and employees', 'Provide technical support for new projects and modifications to ensure proper EHS design review, as well as routine /maintenance evaluation after process / equipment installed / implemented.', 'Conduct inspections of work places and practices, as required, for conformance with Site, Corporate and/or Statutory safety requirements', 'Qualifications', 'Higher education in an environmental or safety related technical discipline', 'Professional certification as Safety Engineer (Sicherheitsfachkraft) is a prerequisite', 'Minimum 3 years of experience in a similar role', 'Previous experience contributing to cross-functional projects', 'Documented knowledge of EU and Austrian EHS laws and regulatory framework', 'Robust skills interpreting and applying regulatory frameworks', 'Proven understanding of the processes, equipment and methods associated in the manufacturing industry; Lean/Six Sigma experience advantageous', 'Experience with fire safety guidelines and regulations is a plus', 'Proven ability to develop sustainable professional relationships on all levels of the organization', 'Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills', 'High ethical standards, being a role model of business compliance and integrity', 'Proven ability to prioritize, focus on and obtain business results', 'Demonstrated analytical and logical problem solving abilities', 'Flexibility to perform multiple, complex tasks simultaneously to efficiently support the business', 'Fluency in written and spoken German and English', 'The minimum annual salary for this position is EUR 50’000 and varies according to the qualifications and experience of the successful candidate.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

Lean/Six Sigma experience advantageous', 'Experience with fire safety guidelines and regulations is a plus', 'Proven ability to develop sustainable professional relationships on all levels of the organization', 'Excellent communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills', 'High ethical standards, being a role model of business compliance and integrity', 'Proven ability to prioritize, focus on and obtain business results', 'Demonstrated analytical and logical problem solving abilities', 'Flexibility to perform multiple, complex tasks simultaneously to efficiently support the business', 'Fluency in written and spoken German and English', 'The minimum annual salary for this position is EUR 43’400 and varies according to the qualifications and experience of the successful candidate.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Senior Specialist, Environmental Health & Safety (m/f), Vienna

description: ['About MSD', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Right now, thousands of MSD associates are working to cure the world’s most complex diseases. We know that our people are the key to our success, which is why our Human Resources division takes pride in building teams of skilled, forward-thinking individuals who contribute to MSD’s pioneering medical advancements. Our Human Resources department shares a spirit of attentive enthusiasm that helps support our associates in achieving new milestones in global healthcare.', 'The site in Heist-op-den-Berg is manufacturing and packaging innovative prescription and consumer care drugs. Our production volume is about 170 mio sales units with 101 formulas and 9400 packaging orders for more than140 countries and it has about 800 FTE’s.', 'The position', 'The vision of HR is to be a driving force in continuously evolving MSD as an efficient organisation with the right capabilities working together to deliver on customers’ and patients’ needs.', 'Reporting into the Heist HR Lead you will as HR Business Partner take part in leading the business forward with emphasis on human capital aspects. You will provide support, guidance and expertise to ensure the success of the Heist site. Moreover, you ensure that core HR processes e.g. performance management and talent management are positioned and executed to deliver value to the business.', 'Main areas of responsibility:', '• Provide advice, challenge and solutions on people and organisation implications of business strategies and decisions;', '• Enable leaders to lead and manage people and teams with high quality;', '• Organizational development – make sure the organization is aligned with business objectives;', '• Partner in bringing in and developing capabilities fit for the future;', '• Talent Management – support the business in accelerating development of key talent;', '• Compensation and benefits', '• Create a performance driven culture through objective setting, development planning, continuous performance feedback and appraisal in line with the company’s process;', '• Employee relations – ensure MSD complies with laws and regulations and lead an effective dialogue with social partners;', '• Support the business in building a strong company culture', 'Qualifications', 'Qualifications', '• Academic degree in business / Human Resource Management or equivalent;', '• At least 5 years of experience as HRBP on management level;', '• Experience in the production area is a plus', '• Experience from working within a global HR environment;', '• Experience from working with unions is a plus;', '• Knowledge of Belgian labour law and state of the art practices in HR;', '• Strong coaching skills, especially coaching managers', '• Capability of inspiring, getting buy-in and influencing to achieve results on a management level.', '• Excellent written and oral communication skills in Dutch and English (French is a plus).', 'A good place to work', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Information', 'Questions and further information regarding the position can be addressed to Kathleen Vynck, HR Lead Heist by T: +32 15 23 86 03.', 'Application', 'If you are interested in this challenging role, you are invited to apply online by uploading your resume and application letter.', 'Acquisition by recruitment agencies is not appreciated.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']
