description: ['Voor het integrated process team (IPT) Solids Bulk in Oss zijn we momenteel op zoek naar kandidaten voor de functie van:', 'Kwalificatie & Validatie Engineer', 'Over MSD', 'Het MSD van vandaag is wereldleider op het gebied van gezondheidszorg en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze geneesmiddelen, vaccins, biologische therapieën en ondersteunende diensten bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We zijn actief betrokken bij een betere toegang tot de gezondheidszorg. Dat doen we met uitgebreid beleid, programma’s en samenwerkingsverbanden. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4500 medewerkers op drie verschillende hoofdlocaties Oss, Haarlem en Boxmeer.', 'Voor meer informatie ga naar www.werkenbijmsd.nl.', 'De afdeling', 'De IPT Solids Bulk is binnen Pharmaceutical Operations verantwoordelijk voor de productie tabletten. De operationele taken van het IPT reiken van het bestellen van ruwe grondstoffen tot het formuleren van geneesmiddelen (productie). De strategische focus van het IPT is op het right-first-time produceren van door de klant gevraagde producten waarbij er een sterke focus is op kwaliteit. Hierbij is continue verbeteren op basis van lean-principes leidend. Dit gebeurt in een farmaceutische fabriek waarin de komende jaren heel veel geïnvesteerd wordt voor de toekomst van hormonale producten in Oss.', 'De functie', 'Als Kwalificatie & Validatie Engineer (intern: Asset Manager level 1) draag je zorg voor de gekwalificeerde status van productieapparatuur, procesinstallaties en utiliteiten die voor de productie van eindproducten worden gebruikt. Het opstellen van kwalificatieprotocollen en zorgdragen voor uitvoering van fysieke metingen aan genoemde productie apparatuur en rapportage van de kwalificatie zijn tevens onderdeel van de functie. Je genereert kalibratie-, onderhouds- en storingsgegevens ten behoeve van hervalidatie. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de archivering van alle onderhoud, kwalificatie en technische documentatie conform de geldende GMP (Good Manufacturing Practice) regelgeving.', 'Taken en verantwoordelijkheden', '• Analyseren van de oorzaak van terugkerende problemen aan productieapparatuur en/of processen;', '• Doen van verbetervoorstellen o.b.v. analyse tot verbetering/optimalisatie inclusief de juiste implementatie van deze voorstellen volgens de van toepassing zijnde procedures;', '• Zelfstandig opstellen van alle benodigde informatie, het maken van voorstellen tot verbeterde procedures en instructies die betrekking hebben op beheer, onderhoud en bediening van apparatuur;', '• Optreden als 2e lijns troubleshooter bij complexe storingen aan genoemde apparatuur en processen;', '• Opstellen van change requests voortkomend uit technische issues en erop toezien dat wijzigingen aan directe impact systemen onder change control worden uitgevoerd;', '• Opstellen van protocollen, laten uitvoeren van testen (accepteren van het uitgevoerde werk) en opstellen van eindrapportages;', '• Optreden als projectleider voor interne IPT gerichte multidisciplinaire technische projecten ter verbetering van bestaande productieapparatuur en aanschaf van nieuwe apparatuur;', '• Optreden als Subject Matter Expert (kennisdrager) voor de complexe assets of QMS systemen binnen MSD Manufacturing Divisie Oss;', '• Informeren en instrueren van operators en technici uit de eigen IPT over technische wijzigingen.', 'Qualifications', '• HBO (Proces) Technische, Bedrijfskundige, Chemische of Farmaceutische achtergrond;', '• Minimaal 1 jaar relevante werkervaring in een productieomgeving;', '• Ervaring met en kennis van projectmanagement;', '• Ervaring in het oplossen van het zelfstandig oplossen en/ of coördineren van complexe storingen aan productieapparatuur en processen;', '• Kennis van geautomatiseerde archiefsystemen;', '• Affiniteit met het uitvoeren van fysieke metingen aan procesapparatuur en systemen;', '• Goed kwaliteits- en veiligheidsbewustzijn;', '• Resultaatgericht, innovatief vermogen en gedreven om te verbeteren;', '• Goed ontwikkelde focus op klanten, kwaliteit en compliance;', '• Zowel zelfstandig als in een teamverband kunnen werken;', '• Uitstekende communicatieve en sociale vaardigheden naar verschillende niveaus in woord als schrift.', 'Wij bieden', 'Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', '• Een competitief salaris;', '• 35,5 vakantiedagen;', '• 8% vakantietoeslag en 3% eindejaarsuitkering;', '• MSD Incentive Plan (bonus);', '• Een uitstekend pensioen;', '• Reiskostenvergoeding;', '• Verschillende trainingsmodules.', 'MSD als werkgever', 'Keer op keer nieuwe uitdagingen aangaan, dat is wel iets wat je leuk moet vinden als je bij MSD aan de slag wilt. Want continu verbeteren is een van onze drijfveren. Dat geldt zowel voor werkprocessen als voor medewerkers. Gedrevenheid, teamwork en eigen initiatief zijn van groot belang. Bij MSD kun je je op allerlei manieren ontwikkelen. In de diepte, door je te specialiseren in je vak. Maar ook door jezelf te verbreden en door te groeien naar een leidinggevende functie. Internationaal of juist heel lokaal, er zijn talloze andere mogelijkheden om stappen te zetten in je loopbaan, te rouleren in functies of te groeien in je functie. Werken bij MSD is werken in een dynamische high tech omgeving van internationale allure, die toch sterk lokaal geworteld is in Oss, Haarlem en Boxmeer.', 'Informatie', 'Voor meer informatie over deze vacature kun je contact opnemen met een van de Paul Mies, Senior Specialist Engineering/ Asset Management IPT Solids Bulk, via 0412-668332.', 'Solliciteren', 'Als je interesse hebt in deze uitdagende functie kun je je interesse kenbaar maken door online je CV en een motivatiebrief te versturen.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

title: Junior Kwalificatie & Validatie Engineer - Solids Bulk

description:
['De afdeling', 'Binnen de afdeling Technical Operations bevindt zich de groep Maintenance & Calibration. Deze groep fungeert als kenniscentrum voor onderhoudstechnologie. De groep ondersteunt de productie afdelingen betreffende beleid, verbeteringen en investeringsprojecten op het gebied van automatisering & equipment management. Verder beheert de M&C; group enkele overkoepelende automatiseringssystemen binnen Pharm Ops zoals: Building Automation System (GBS), HDAS, OSI Soft PI, SCADA,', 'GUARDIAN (Serialisatie) en SAP Plant Maintenance.
', 'De functie omschrijving', 'Als onderdeel van het site Automation team en rapporterend aan de M&C; Lead, voltooit de Associate Automation Specialist zelfstandig taken gerelateerd aan de infrastructuur voor site automation t.b.v. het produceren en verpakken van de MSD producten. De Associate Automation Specialist fungeert als een spin in het web binnen het Automation domein Pharm Ops.', 'De inhoud van de functie', '

', 'Uitvoeren van operationeel beheer & modificatie taken van een of meer systemen in het Automation domein;', 'Verantwoordelijk voor de ondersteuning, continuïteit, beschikbaarheid, validatie en geautoriseerd gebruik van M&C; automation systemen;', 'Voert change control, incident & problem management, gebruikersbeheer, performance management en training uit voor een of meer automation systemeen;', "Participatie in middelgrote en/of complexe industriële automatiseringsprojecten m.b.t. de implementatie van nieuwe systemen, of projecten die belangrijke nieuwe functionaliteit toevoegen aan reeds bestaande systemen, vaak met meerdere disciplines waar, bij integratieproblemen, intensieve in- en externe communicatie met leveranciers en belanghebbenden, zoals interne klanten (IPT's) en het wereldwijde automation team, vereist is;", 'Expertise bieden in automatisering- en projectdocumentatie volgens MSD-richtlijnen (System Development Lifecycle (SDLC);', 'Initieert projecten en verbetervoorstellen vanuit productie behoefte en vertaalt deze naar automatiseringsoplossingen;', 'Ondersteuning/uitvoering van automatiseringsprojecten in multidisciplinaire projecten. Dit omvat onder andere het opstellen/beoordelen van scope, ontwerp, C&Q; documentatie en begeleiding en/of het uitvoeren van tests;', 'Verantwoordelijk voor het houden van de focus op veiligheid, gezondheid en milieu. Toezicht houden op de naleving en actief bevorderen van het bereiken van verbeteringen op het gebied van zorg voor veiligheid, gezondheid en milieu;', 'Voldoen aan MSD QMS System Development Lifecycle (SDLC);', 'Monitoring en verspreiding van lokale en internationale normen en standaarden op het gebied van procesautomatisering (GAMP, 21CFRPart11, Data Integrity, etc.)', 'Qualifications', 'Functie Eisen', '

', 'Een afgeronde Technische MBO/HBO opleiding (bijv.', 'Automatisering);', '5+ jaar werkervaring in de Automatisering;', 'Kennis van systemen zoals Siemens (S7), SCADA, SAP, Vision of andere pakketten;', 'Ervaring in Life Sience Industry (o.a. cGMP, Safety, Validatie);', 'Sterke projectmanagementvaardigheden en bewezen vermogen om complexe projecten te beheren;', 'Klantgericht, procesgericht en data driven;', 'Passie voor Lean en Continuous Improvement;', 'Sterke mondelinge en schriftelijke communicatievaardigheden in zowel Nederlands als Engels;', 'Je sociale en communicatieve vaardigheden zijn goed ontwikkeld;', 'Je toont overtuigingskracht en pro activiteit.', 'Over MSD', 'Het MSD van vandaag is wereldleider op het gebied van gezondheidszorg en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4500 medewerkers op drie verschillende hoofdlocaties.', 'Voor meer informatie ga naar', 'www.werkenbijmsd.nl', 'MSD als werkgever', 'Keer op keer nieuwe uitdagingen aangaan, dat is wel iets wat je leuk moet vinden als je bij MSD aan de slag wilt. Want continu verbeteren is een van onze drijfveren. Dat geldt zowel voor werkprocessen als voor medewerkers. Gedrevenheid, teamwork en eigen initiatief zijn van groot belang. Bij MSD kun je je op allerlei manieren ontwikkelen. In de diepte, door je te specialiseren in je vak. Maar ook door jezelf te verbreden en door te groeien naar een leidinggevende functie. Internationaal of juist heel lokaal, er zijn talloze andere mogelijkheden om stappen te zetten in je loopbaan, te rouleren in functies of te groeien in je functie. Werken bij MSD is werken in een dynamische high tech omgeving van internationale allure, die toch sterk lokaal geworteld is in Oss, Haarlem en Boxmeer.', 'Onze medewerkers zijn de sleutel tot het succes van ons bedrijf. We tonen onze toewijding aan onze medewerkers door onder andere het aanbieden van een concurrerend arbeidsvoorwaardenpakket. Onze voorwaarden bieden ondersteuning aan de verschillende doelen, behoeften en levensstijlen van onze medewerkers én degene die hen het meest dierbaar zijn.', 'Informatie:', 'Voor meer informatie over deze vacature kun je contact opnemen met Ado Mehic, Maintenance & Calibration Lead, via: 0412- 66 37 82.', 'Solliciteren:', 'Herken jij jezelf in deze interessante rol dan nodigen we je van harte uit om online te solliciteren door middel van het indienen van je CV en motivatiebrief.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Right now, thousands of MSD associates are working to cure the world’s most complex diseases. We know that our people are the key to our success, which is why our Human Resources division takes pride in building teams of skilled, forward-thinking individuals who contribute to MSD’s pioneering medical advancements. Our Human Resources department shares a spirit of attentive enthusiasm that helps support our associates in achieving new milestones in global healthcare.', 'The Learning Experience Designer reports to the Strategic Partner and is part of the Learning Shared Services (LSS) Learning Design & Development group.  Success in this role depends on the following efforts:', 'Accountable for', 'The strategic design process, accountable & responsibility for the overall design & learner experience', 'Collaborate with product owners and team members to ensure your designs are meeting the business needs', 'Harmonize user needs with business objectives to solve complex problems through the design of intuitive interfaces and transformative digital experiences', 'Manage user experience (UX) design across multiple initiatives in a fast pace environment', 'Manage a team of Designers to design & deliver wireframes, mockups and prototypes to test user experience and needs', 'Build client trust and respect, establish client relationships, and develop rapport with clients', 'Champion principles of usability and user-centered design', 'Gather primary and secondary research regarding user needs, UX best practices, and technology strategies and tactics', 'Develop personas, analyze and translate data on usage', 'Conduct and participate empathy based user research with focused outcomes', 'Collaborate with other peers in the UX role across the organization on procedures, processes, and best practices', 'Continually seek out opportunities for improvements and efficiencies', 'EMEA, all  countries and cities with MSD presence.', 'Qualifications', 'Education Minimum Requirement:', 'Required:', 'Bachelor’s degree in Usability, Human Factors, HCI (Human Centered Interaction), Human Centered Design & Engineering, Psychology or additionally relevant field', 'Preferred:', 'Degree or certification in instructional design, media design, digital marketing, education, training, or related field of study', 'Required Experience and Skills**:', '6+ years of experience as an Experience Designer preferred.', '2+ years working at a Lead, Principal, or higher level', '3 years or more of experience as a UX Designer/lead', 'Preferred Experience and Skills:', 'A solid understanding of web and mobile design principles and best use of current web and mobile technologies and scalable dynamic user interfaces', 'Broad knowledge of digital interaction design patterns, Web site architecture, user interfaces and navigation on various platforms (Web, mobile, tablet)', 'Experience with UI design and design thinking principles', 'Experience with usability analysis such as: end-user interviews', 'Strong interpersonal skills, as well as excellent communication skills, verbal and written to both technical and non-technical audiences that are in a geographically dispersed environment (conference calls, webcam, face-to-face)', 'Ability to work in a collaborative environment and on multiple assignments at once', 'Experience functioning & executing work in a fast paced iterative environment such as Agile', 'Take initiative to recommend process improvements and demonstrate creative thinking', '2+ years of people management experience', 'Pharmaceutical or healthcare industry experience', 'Experience conducting usability studies. The ideal candidate will be able to create participant recruit screeners, moderator’s guides and final reports and corresponding UX recommendations', 'Ability to guide / mentor other developers and troubleshoot issues', 'Possess an insatiable fascination with technology and finding new ways to leverage it', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'BE;  LV;  Estonia;  PL;  RO;  SK;  SI;  CY;  HR;  GR;  CZ;  BG;  NO;  SE;  AT;  DE;  GB;  CH;  ES;  RS;  NL;  IT;  IE', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 5 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Mit seinen verschreibungspflichtigen Arzneimitteln, Impfstoffen, Biologika, Präparaten zur Selbstmedikation und für die Tiergesundheit in verschiedenen Therapiebereichen bietet MSD in mehr als 140 Ländern umfassende und innovative Lösungen für Gesundheit. Ein besonderes Anliegen von MSD ist darüber hinaus die Verbesserung der weltweiten Gesundheitsversorgung und der verbesserte Zugang zu Medikamenten. Dafür engagiert sich MSD in weitreichenden Gesundheitsprogrammen und Partnerschaften.', 'Als Fachreferent/in für die Pulmonale Hypertonie (PH) verfügen Sie über ein ausgeprägtes wissenschaftliches Grundverständnis, um mit den Leitern der entsprechenden Behandlungszentren „auf Augenhöhe“ diskutieren zu können. Grundvoraussetzung hierfür ist die Fähigkeit zumeist englischsprachige komplexe Studienpublikationen rund um das gesamte Therapiegebiet zu verstehen und interpretieren zu können.', 'Sie sind in der Lage schnell neue und tragfähige Kontakte zu den relevanten PH-Zentren herzustellen und Netzwerke aufzubauen bzw. bestehende zu nutzen. Dabei zeigen Sie überdurchschnittliche Kontakt-und Verhandlungsfähigkeit, um die bereits etablierten Kundenbeziehungen, Vermarktungs- und Veranstaltungskonzepte nahtlos weiterzuführen sowie eigene innovative Ansätze zu entwickeln und zu implementieren.', 'Sie sind kompetente/r Ansprechpartner/in und Betreuer/in in allen Produkt- und Servicefragen und verantwortlich für die Sicherstellung der medizinisch-wissenschaftlichen Information der im Gebiet ausgewählten Ärzte in den PH-Zentren, mit dem Ziel, die Umsatzvorgaben zu erreichen und Ihr Gebiet profitabel zu führen. Hierzu zählen neben den Besuchen auch die Nutzung digitaler Kanäle, die von Ihnen organisierten ärztlichen Fortbildungsveranstaltungen sowie die Repräsentation des Unternehmens bei Kongressen und Fachtagungen.', 'Als Manager/in in Ihrem Gebiet sind Sie verantwortlich für die kontinuierliche Aktualisierung der Kundenselektion. Gleichzeitig sind Sie ein guter Teamplayer, der gerne von seinen Erfahrungen berichtet bzw. am Austausch mit anderen Kollegen im Team interessiert ist, um ständig dazuzulernen.', 'Gebiet: Würzburg, Bamberg, Nürnberg und Regensburg', 'STELLENPROFIL:', 'Produktspezifische Betreuung der definierten Zielgruppen im Gebiet', 'Besprechung von Adempas im Indikationsbereich PH', 'Sehr enge Abstimmung mit den MSL bei Scientific Leadern in wichtigen Zentren', 'Eigenständige Analyse der relevanten Kunden-, Markt- und Mitbewerberdaten', 'Zielorientierte Planung und Nachhaltung des anvertrauten Budgets auf der Basis der regionalen Profitabilität', 'Gute Marktkenntnisse inklusive des gesundheitspolitischen Umfeldes im relevanten Indikationsgebiet', 'Eigenverantwortliche und ständige Weiterbildung im therapeutischen Umfeld, wie z.B. Das Ziel ist die permanente Weiterentwicklung der Arbeitsprozesse', 'Teamübergreifende Kooperation und Kommunikation', 'Umsetzung und Wahrung der Firmengrundsätze', 'Qualifications', 'Abgeschlossenes naturwissenschaftliches Studium, wünschenswert mit Promotion', 'Gesetzliche Anforderungen gemäß § 75 AMG', 'Kontakt- und Kommunikationsstärke, gute Argumentationsfähigkeit und Durchsetzungsvermögen', 'Präsentationsstärke', 'Selbständige Arbeitsweise und Fähigkeit zur Selbstreflektion', 'Unternehmerisches Handeln', 'Solide, mehrjährige Erfahrung in der fachärztlichen Betreuung und oder Klinik', 'Hohe Eigenmotivation, Engagement und Selbstbewusstsein,', 'Sehr guter Networker', 'Sehr gute Kenntnisse im Umgang mit digitalen Medien', '(Umgang mit relevanten Online-Tools, MS Office, etc.)', 'Fließend Englisch in Wort und Schrift', 'Wir bieten', 'Attraktives Gehaltspaket', 'Betriebliche Altersvorsorge plus Entgeltumwandlung in den Chemiepensionfond', '30 Tage Urlaub plus Urlaubsgeld', 'Firmenwagen', 'Interne und externe Weiterbildungsmöglichkeiten', 'Flexible Arbeitszeiteinteilung', 'Homeoffice Möglichkeit', 'Mitarbeitervergünstigungen', 'Employee Assistance Program', 'Arbeitsfreistellung bei ehrenamtl. Ausübung (20 Std/Jahr)', 'Wir haben Ihr Interesse geweckt und Sie möchten Teil einer wachsenden und sich entwickelnden Organisation werden? Dann freuen wir uns auf Ihre vollständigen Bewerbungsunterlagen (Lebenslauf, Motivationsschreiben, Zeugnisse) über unsere Karriereseite.', 'Ihre Rolle bei MSD ist von entscheidender Bedeutung, um der Welt dabei zu helfen, neue Durchbrüche zu erzielen, die kommende Generationen betreffen. description: ['Process Development and Commercialisation (PDC) Specialist Engineering', 'Ballydine', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'Our Manufacturing Division, is a team of dedicated, energetic individuals who are committed to being the most trusted supplier of pharmaceuticals and health products worldwide. Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD BALLYDINE', 'MSD Ballydine develops and supplies the active ingredients and final formulated product for a range of innovative medicines at its manufacturing and R&D; facilities. The plant, which has been operating in Tipperary for over 40 years, exports to over 25 countries around the world with primary markets being Europe, USA and Japan.', 'Our highly-skilled local workforce of 500 employees is now leading the way in the development of new medicines, including MSD’s treatment for hepatitis C, which is being manufactured in Tipperary for patients around the world.', 'MSD Ballydine’s existing portfolio and future pipeline offers team members the opportunity to operate at the cutting-edge of science and technology, and develop new treatments that positively impact patients across the globe.', '& SPECIFIC OBJECTIVES', 'We are currently recruiting for the permanent position of Chemical Engineer within in the Process Development and Commercialisation (PDC) group in MSD Ballydine.', 'This position is for an Engineer with experience in High Potent Compound (OEB4/5) processing either in Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients (API) or Oral Solid Dose (OSD), or both.', 'The selected candidate will be working on a cross-functional team to design, install and start up new potent (OEB4/5) facilities in either API or OSD (or both) at the Ballydine site. By virtue of their prior high potent experience they will be viewed as a technical Subject Matter Expert within the Ballydine site and broader our manufacturing division technical community.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Technical expertise and contribution, including technology development', 'Wide depth and breadth in all aspects High Potent Compound (OEB4/5) processing either in API or OSD, or both.', 'Acts as Subject Matter Expert (SME) in order to efficiently solve problems using appropriate tools and prior knowledge', 'Process transfer/New product introduction activities related to high potent compounds including completing process safety evaluations (including PHA), process fits, technology transfer etc.', 'Influences interactions with key partner groups, and helps to set strategy and tactics across functions', 'Capital Project delivery', 'Acts as the department primary technical rep on a cross-functional team for all stages of the the capital project', 'Reviews and contributes to project design documents covering equipment, facilities, utilities etc.', 'In conjunction with the operating area develops operating procedures, SOPs and start up doicumentation', 'Leads the site aspects of the facility qualification and start up, including documentation generation, execution, resolution of issues and closeout.', 'Technical capability building', 'Mentors and coaches staff within the organization in high potent handling on an an-going basis.', 'Lead developing a high potent processing “capability build” sustain plan for the site to include people development, business systems improvements and infrastructure/technology investments.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'Position will report to the Ballydine site Capital Project Team Leader for High Potency, sitting in PDC Ballydine', 'Qualifications', 'Education:', 'BSc Chemical Engineering (or equivalent) preferred.', 'Required Experience and Skills:', 'Minimum of 5+ years’ experience in the pharmaceutical industry with specific experience in High Potent Compound (OEB4/5) processing in API or OSD, or both.', 'A knowledge of process development, commercialisation and supply systems as well a solid knowledge of global GMP and regulatory requirements is an advantage', 'Desired Experience and Skills:', 'Engineering Principles, Process Chemistry and  Formulation Technology', 'Knowledge of containment technologies and High Potent (OEB4/5) processing.', 'Process development & scale up methodologies, including understanding of analytical techniques,  Lean principles and PAT', 'MSD Commercialisation Business processes', 'Highly proficient in core competencies of a PDC engineer.', 'Process, equipment & cleaning validation', 'cGMP’s & regulatory requirements', 'Knowledge of production operations', 'Productive communication and interpersonal skills with ability to communicate technical information both verbally and written in a concise manner.', 'Ability to scientifically evaluate projects, suggest appropriate options, solutions and timelines.', 'Strategic thinking', 'Project management', 'Build talent - Champion and support innovation and continuous learning', 'Team work skills and ability to work across boundaries', 'Demonstrates and promotes the principles of inclusion', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 5 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Ben jij een enthousiaste en ambitieuze 3e jaars HBO / BSc  student(e) en op zoek naar een stageplaats binnen de allerleukste afdeling Finance Hub? Dan zoeken we jou!', 'Voor onze afdeling Finance Hub in Haarlem zijn we op zoek naar een:', 'Stagiair(e) Bedrijfseconomie', 'Wij zijn MSD. We bieden patiënten én zorgverleners innovatieve geneesmiddelen die het verschil kunnen maken tussen ziek op bed liggen én de gewone, dagelijkse dingen doen. Soms zelfs tussen leven en dood. Wij zijn actief op tal van gebieden. En zoeken continu nieuwe oplossingen voor ziektes waar nog geen antwoord op is. Altijd met aandacht voor de juiste patiënt op het juiste moment.', 'We ontwikkelen ook slimme oplossingen om medicatie optimaal in te zetten. Zodat we mensen helpen en tegelijkertijd verspilling tegengaan. Waardoor geneesmiddelen effectiever, veiliger én doelmatiger gebruikt kunnen worden. En we kijken verder. Zo werken we samen met overheden en internationale partners om veelvoorkomende ziektes en medische problemen in ontwikkelingslanden te voorkomen. Bijvoorbeeld door belangeloos geneesmiddelen te verstrekken.', 'Ook vanuit Nederland dragen wij daar ons deel aan bij. Op verschillende terreinen waarbij elke dag telt. Dagelijks zijn in ons land zo’n 5.600 MSD’ers bezig met de zorg voor gezondheid. Van de allereerste ontwikkelingsfase op weg naar een nieuw geneesmiddel tot het veiligstellen van bestaande en bewezen behandelingen.', 'Zo zorgen we samen voor de gezondheid van honderden miljoenen mensen, in Nederland en ver daarbuiten. Want onze gezondheid is het meest dierbare wat er is. Wij zijn MSD. Wij zorgen voor gezondheid. Samen met jou. MSD kenmerkt zich door een open cultuur met veel ruimte voor eigen initiatief. Jouw ontwikkeling staat in deze stage centraal, maar we willen ook graag van jou leren!', 'Welkom in ons team:', 'Onze afdeling acteert als intermediair tussen de verschillende Finance afdelingen en de business met een duidelijke focus op accounting en compliance.', 'Primaire verantwoordelijkheden:', 'Zelfstandig uitvoeren en monitoren van compliance taken in samenwerking met het team;', 'Een procesbeschrijving maken van de compliance activiteiten binnen onze afdeling;', 'Het inventariseren van verschillen tussen de locaties in Boxmeer, Oss en Haarlem;', 'Het optimaliseren van de compliance taken door nieuwe tools en een risk based approach.', 'De beschreven werkzaamheden vormen het basispakket en zullen na een goede inwerk- en leerperiode vaak zelfstandig uitgevoerd worden. Op eigen initiatief of door vraag vanuit de organisatie kunnen deze worden aangevuld met andere projecten en/of taken.', 'Qualifications', 'Jouw profiel:', 'Je bent een derdejaars HBO student bedrijfseconomie die:', '5 beschikbare dagen per week per week gedurende een periode van 4-6 maanden beschikbaar is per september 2019.', 'Geïnteresseerd is in het verbeteren van processen en kan inspireren om te veranderen.', 'Een professionele houding heeft, enthousiasme en leergierigheid met zich meebrengt en het een uitdaging vindt om in een dynamische complexe omgeving stage te lopen.', 'Wij bieden:', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met  toegewijde collega’s. Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Een breed georiënteerde stageplaats, die je in staat stelt om met veel aspecten van het vakgebied kennis te maken en daar ervaring in op te doen, met veel ruimte voor eigen initiatief.', 'Verder kan je rekenen op:', 'Goede begeleiding door een ervaren specialist.', 'Een stagevergoeding van € 375,-  (op basis van een 40-urige werkweek) voor  HBO studenten.', 'Solliciteren:', 'Ben jij de kandidaat waar wij naar op zoek zijn? We ontmoeten je graag!', 'Stuur ons jouw sollicitatie vandaag nog toe.', 'Heb je nog vragen? Laat het ons weten!', 'Je kunt Mariska van der Leij bellen op 023-5153159 of stuur een email naar', 'mariska_vander_leij@msd.com', 'De sollicitatieprocedure bestaat uit 2 gesprekken.', 'Other Locations:', 'Oss, North Brabant, NL', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['Voor onze locatie Haarlem zijn wij op zoek naar een', 'Reliability Engineer', 'Over de functie', 'Als Reliability Engineer ben je verantwoordelijk voor de betrouwbaarheid van alle installaties en equipment die binnen de scope van de business unit ‘Blister’ vallen. Je schrijft business cases voor verbeterprojecten, stelt deliverables op en maakt planningen voor de ontwikkeling en implementatie van de voorgestelde verbeteringen op het technische vlak. Ook ben jij verantwoordelijk om het onderhoud conceptioneel te begeleiden en continu verbeteringen in het onderhoudsplan te initiëren.', 'Primaire verantwoordelijkheden', 'Je initieert, leidt of neemt deel aan technische projecten en zorgt voor borging van administratieve zaken rondom projecten, budget management en het monitoren en rapporteren van de voortgang van projecten die op engineering vlak binnen de IPT lopen', 'Je bent bekend met standaarden, procedures en richtlijnen zoals geldend binnen MSD en de farmaceutische industrie. Ook ondersteun je als Reliability Engineer de operations lead bij het managen van het capital plan (project portfolio) en het opzetten en bijhouden van een meerjaren plan m.b.t. equipment en installaties van de IPT Blister', 'Jij bent verantwoordelijk voor het kwalificeren en in de gekwalificeerder staat houden van het volledige machinepark van de IPT en zorgt dat hiervoor de periodieke reviews opgesteld worden', 'Welkom in ons team', 'De IPT (lees business unit) is verantwoordelijk voor het verpakken van verschillende soorten humane geneesmiddelen. Dit wordt gedaan op 13 volautomatische verpakkingslijnen voor meer dan 140 landen met een jaarvolume van 90 miljoen verpakkingen. De strategische focus van de IPT is gericht op innovatie en vereenvoudigen van de processen middels het optimaal inzetten van de Lean principes.', 'Qualifications', 'Jouw profiel', 'WO of HBO op het gebied van Electrical/Industrial Automation/Maintenance Engineering of Mechanical Engineering', 'Ervaring met verpakking processen binnen een GMP omgeving is een pre', 'Ervaring met project portfolio management, project management, change control en equipment qualification is een pre', 'Overtuigend, stressbestendig en in staat tot beïnvloeden van stakeholders', 'Uitstekende communicatieve vaardigheden in het Nederlands en Engels, zowel in woord als schrift', 'Sterke project management skills, analytisch inzicht en een groot doorzettingsvermogen', 'Wij bieden', 'Werken bij MSD betekent samen werken aan gezondheid in een internationale werkomgeving met  toegewijde collega’s. Je krijgt alle ruimte om jezelf te ontwikkelen en te laten zien wie jij bent. Verder kan je rekenen op aantrekkelijke arbeidsvoorwaarden:', 'Een competitief salaris', '35,5 vakantiedagen', '8% vakantietoeslag en 3% eindejaarsuitkering', 'MSD Incentive Plan', 'Een uitstekend pensioen', 'In-house sportfaciliteiten', 'Reiskostenvergoeding-Verschillende trainingsmodules', 'Over MSD', 'MSD is een wereldleider op het gebied van geneesmiddelen en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze vaccins, biologische therapieën en geneesmiddelen bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We richten ons op aandoeningen die mensen ernstig belemmeren in hun functioneren of zelfs levensbedreigend zijn en die vragen om nieuwe geneesmiddelen. MSD is tevens pionier in biologische research & development voor diergezondheid.', 'Bij MSD geloven we in de kracht van verschillen van teams van getalenteerde medewerkers op alle niveaus. Uiteenlopende vaardigheden, ervaringen, achtergronden en culturele perspectieven helpen ons om beter inzicht te krijgen in de behoeften van diverse klanten, zorgverleners en patiënten. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 5300 medewerkers op drie verschillende locaties.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 5 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'The Solution Engineering group of the MSD IT Hub in Prague focuses on optimizing scientific data workflows and improving the information infrastructure for data-driven drug discovery. We design and implement solutions for data acquisition, enhancement, integration, search, analytics, and other applications that tame the variety and volumes of data and allow deeper insights and better decision making. People in the group provide their combined expertise in programming and science and collaborate closely with product management and software engineering groups in this and other organizations.', 'We are looking for a NLP Engineer who is passionate about solving problems in the intersection of information technology and life sciences. You will extend the NLP Capability team taking on challenges concerning unstructured data and natural language processing aka NLP, and will help address the increased demand across the company to search and process documents as well as extract and verify information of all kinds.', 'Are you ready to extend your expertise, help shape the vision of the team and become a thought leader on Natural Language Processing in a global company? Are you keen on designing and building elegant solutions, learning, experimenting, and sharing outcomes with others? You can work in an encouraging and inspiring environment, explore cutting-edge technology and apply it to problems that matter. You can contribute to the success of MSD and the MSD IT Hubs over the world.', 'The primary activities include but are not limited to:', '• Define, design, and implement solutions involving unstructured data using in-house, open source and commercial tools, solving problems like document processing, advanced search, information extraction, knowledge discovery, and language modeling', '• Contribute to the development of an NLP Platform including NER, OCR, Machine Translation and Graph technologies.', '• Collaborate with scientists to understand their business needs, jointly develop projects in an Agile environment.', '• Develop, implement and operate workflows to gather, assemble, harmonize and transform disparate data sets to align it to ontologies and vocabularies to enable metadata-based searching and access.', '• Manage assigned projects from initiation to completion, including completion of deliverables in a timely and cost-effective way.', '• Maintain and document code and algorithms in appropriate repositories.', '• Provide leadership for the best practices and consulting in the area of expertise.', 'Qualifications', 'Education:', '•', 'University degree in a scientific or engineering discipline with considerable experience in natural language processing and software development', 'Skills', 'Required:', '• Experience in hands-on implementation of NLP solutions', '• Experience with data science and machine learning frameworks, passion for exploring new ones', '• Fluency in a couple of languages, including but not limited to Python and English', '• Self-driven personality, passionate about solving problems in these domains, keen on designing and building elegant solutions, learning, experimenting, and sharing outcomes', '• Ability to work and lead in international and intercultural teams', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD é uma empresa global líder no segmento farmacêutico com um portfólio diversificado de remédios de prescrição, vacinas e produtos para saúde humana e animal. O sucesso da MSD é respaldado por integridade ética, impulso imediato e uma missão inspiradora para alcançar novos marcos na assistência médica global. MSD é uma empresa preocupada com a diversidade e considera profissionais portadores de necessidades especiais para todas as suas posições.', 'Objetivo da posição:', 'Assegurar que as operações relacionadas à área de boas práticas de laboratório sejam conduzidas em conformidade com as Boas Práticas de Fabricação, visando a qualidade e segurança dos produtos no mercado nacional e internacional, de acordo com especificações, procedimentos, políticas e normas regulamentadoras específicas.', 'Responsabilidades:', 'Atuar no processo de revisão de documentação regulatória', 'Atuar como revisora de procedimentos operacionais e formulários utilizados no laboratório de controle de qualidade', 'Ter conhecimento em SAP', 'Ter conhecimento de análises químicas e microbiológicas', 'Revisar documentação de processos de validação analítica e de qualificação de equipamentos de laboratório', 'Atuar em parceria com a área regulatória para implementação de novas legislações aplicáveis às atividades da planta', 'Qualifications', 'Formação', ': Superior completo preferencialmente em Farmácia.', 'Experiência', ': revisão', 'de documentação GMP, necessário conhecimento de processos produtivos na', 'indústria farmacêutica e das atividades analíticas.', 'Indispensável', 'experiência com documentação regulatória (RDC17, RDC73, RDC166)', 'Habilidades', ': bom', 'relacionamento interpessoal, boa comunicação oral e escrita, dinamismo, flexibilidade, criatividade,', 'capacidade analítica, orientação e percepção para detalhes, trabalho em', 'equipe, e pró-atividade', 'Idiomas', ':', 'Inglês Avançado', 'Sede', ': Campinas', '- SP', 'Nossos funcionários são a chave para o', 'sucesso da nossa empresa. Demonstramos nosso compromisso com nossos', 'funcionários, oferecendo um programa de remuneração competitivo e valioso. Os', 'benefícios da MSD são projetados para suportar a ampla gama de metas, necessidades', 'e estilos de vida de nossos funcionários e muitas das pessoas que mais importam', 'em suas vidas. A MSD é uma empregadora que oferece igualdade de oportunidades,', 'abraçando orgulhosamente a diversidade em todas as suas manifestações. Consideramos', 'candidatos com necessidades especiais para esta posição.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'No', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', '1st', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

Our facilities, along with our external contractors, suppliers, and partners, comprise an interdependent global manufacturing network that’s committed to delivering a compliant, reliable supply to customers and patients on time, every time, across the globe.', 'Our Vaccines start up in MSD Cork have several new vacancies for Process Technical Specialists. This is a great opportunity to join during a start up phase where you can develop that indepth knowledge that only a start up will afford you.', 'The role will involve providing technical & equipment support to the Vaccines Integrated Process Team (IPT). You will ensure on-going optimization of the process and manufacturing support to ensure the continued manufacture and supply of quality pharmaceutical products in meeting our Manufacturing Division Priorities of: Compliance, Supply, Strategy and Profit Plan.', 'As a Process Technical Specialist you will work with the IPT team to ensure the effective and efficient on-time delivery of batch production within the IPT area. This requires the delivery of process excellence and reliability across all areas of the IPT', 'Primary activities/responsibilities:', '• Lead and participate in problem solving teams across all areas of the IPT (e.g. reliability, Safety, Quality (e.g.CAPA/DN/MDNs etc).', '• Lead and close process related deviations and reports.', '• Support Operations team to consistently deliver on specific area Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), e.g. EHS metrics, Production Plan, OEE, compliance and team training.', '• Provides frontline technical EHS support & coaching to the operational team and be first point of contact for safety related concerns (e.g. Entropy actions/MOC/Permits/Risk assessments).', '• Protocol/report authoring/execution/oversight/approval as appropriate', '• Ensure highest Quality, Compliance and Safety standards.', '• Participate and comply with the MSD Manufacturing Division Quality Management Systems (QMS) requirements, including ownership, as relevant.', '• Provide ongoing coaching and support to cross functional team members, to share process, engineering and maintenance best practices.', '• Provide coaching and development to all technicians within the IPT.', '• Tactical Implementation & Support for reliability equipment initiatives.', '• Ensure supply of high quality product through ensuring equipment availability; maximize team member performance through continuous process improvement initiatives.', '• Provide technical, process and engineering expertise within a wide range of projects within the IPT, such as the introduction of new equipment and process’s.', '• Author/approve Change controls and MIDAS documents as appropriate', 'Qualifications', 'Level 8 honours degree in a science or engineering discipline.', '5 years Engineering/Technical experience within a GMP Environment preferred.', '5 years experience in a highly regulated manufacturing environment in a technical or manufacturing support role.', 'Knowledge of and experience in applying Lean Six Sigma and Lean methodologies, with an understanding of regulatory and validation requirements.', 'Lean Six Sigma Green Belt desirable.', 'Demonstrated successes in a team environment, such as project teams, Lean Six Sigma team, etc.', 'Demonstrated problem solving capabilities', 'Ability to interact with multiple stakeholders.', 'This role may require you to work shift.', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. description: ['De afdeling', 'MSD Animal Health produceert virale levende vaccins volgens strikte GMP-normen. Binnen het Integrated Proces Team (IPT) De Bilt zijn er naast productie ook andere ondersteunende activiteiten zoals Logistiek, Warehouse, Planning, Maintenance & Reliability en Improvement.', 'Drie DSP teams van ca. 6 operators zijn verantwoordelijk voor de verwerking van levende vaccins voor pluimvee. Dit zijn aseptisch afgevulde glazen ampullen welke worden gevuld in een cleanroom volgens strenge normen. Binnen IPT De Bilt werken ongeveer 40 operators waarvan 20 bij het aseptisch produceren van antigeen en 20 in het DSP team. Samen produceren we meer dan 6 miljard doseringen per jaar. Onze afdeling wordt gekenmerkt door de prettige werksfeer. Je krijgt een gedegen inwerktraject en er zijn volop doorgroemogelijkheden.', 'De positive', "Je hoofdtaak bestaat uit het zelfstandig voorbereiden en uitvoeren van werkzaamheden ten behoeve van de verwerking van aseptisch geproduceerde bulk aan de hand van de planning en voorschriften (BMI’s, SOP's etc.). Dit omvat het:", 'Registreren en opvolgen van afwijkingen ten opzichte van voorschriften, procedures en/of SOP’s', 'Melding van storingen of afwijkingen in de te gebruiken apparatuur en behulpzaam zijn bij het oplossen van die storingen', 'Uitvoeren van ondersteunende werkzaamheden (opbouwen apparatuur, schoonmaakprocedures, cleanroom voorbereiding etc)', 'Naleven van de GMP-eisen en voorschriften met betrekking tot veiligheid, hygiëne en milieu', 'Begeleiden en training van operators zodra de inwerkperiode is afgerond', 'Het schrijven en testen van werkinstructies en optimaliseren van werkmethodes', 'Doen van verbeter-/oplossingsvoorstellen en daartoe eventueel overleg voeren met andere afdelingen', 'Deelnemen in verbeterinitiatieven zoals Kaizens en Root Cause Analyses', 'Deelnemen in (afdelings) projecten', 'Actief deelnemen in dagelijkse Tier bijeenkomsten', 'Bij alle werkzaamheden de voorschriften voor veiligheid, hygiëne en GMP in acht nemen', 'Qualifications', 'Een afgeronde opleiding op MBO niveau (bij voorkeur met een technische achtergrond zoals MTS of VAPRO)', 'Ongeveer 3 jaar werkervaring als operator binnen een productieomgeving (bijvoorbeeld: chemie, farmacie, voeding, semi-conductor of high tech)', 'Gevoel voor hygiënisch en aseptisch werken', 'Kritische kijk op de gevoerde processen', 'Open mind voor verbeteringen', 'Omgaan met en bedienen van fijngevoelige en kwetsbare apparatuur', 'Nauwkeurigheid bij het volgen van voorschriften en het vastleggen van productiegegevens', 'Bereidheid tot het volgen van opleidingen', 'Bereidheid tot werken in diensten', 'Zowel zelfstandig als in teamverband kunnen werken', 'Goede communicatieve vaardigheden zowel mondeling als schriftelijk in de Nederlandse taal', 'Voldoe je nog niet (helemaal) aan deze functie-eisen maar denk je dat je toch een goede kandidaat bent? Ook dan zien we je sollicitatie graag tegemoet.', 'Benieuwd naar een visueel beeld van deze baan? Bekijk hier een agenda, praktijkvoorbeeld en je toekomstige collega\'s."', 'https://www.spielwork.com/msd/operator-5/', 'I', 'nformatie', 'Voor meer informatie betreffende deze vacature neem je contact op met Coen Veer (Operational Coach): 06-11144886. Voor vragen over de sollicitatieprocedure neem je contact op met onze recruiter Ragna Post: 06-18846194.', 'Over MSD', 'Het MSD van vandaag is wereldleider op het gebied van gezondheidszorg en werkt mee aan een gezonde wereld. Met onze geneesmiddelen, vaccins, biologische therapieën en ondersteunende diensten bieden we innovatieve behandelingen voor een betere gezondheid van mensen en dieren in meer dan 140 landen. We zijn actief betrokken bij een betere toegang tot de gezondheidszorg. Dat doen we met uitgebreid beleid, programma’s en samenwerkingsverbanden. Bij MSD in Nederland werken ongeveer 4500 medewerkers op drie verschillende hoofdlocaties.', 'Solliciteren', 'Als je interesse hebt in deze interessante rol nodigen we je van harte uit om online te solliciteren door middel van het indienen van je CV en motivatiebrief. Indien je vragen hebt over het sollicitatieproces kun je contact opnemen met onze recruiter Ragna Post op 06-18846194.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['The Opportunity', 'The IT Business Analyst is the leading role in the realization of value through understanding of applicable business processes and global priorities, followed by identification, implementation of IT capabilities for the markets in Asia Pacific.  The priority focus is on digital and data capabilities that drive MSD Oncology and Vaccines Business Units in Asia Pacific. The IT Business Analyst will act as a bridge between business challenges and technology capabilities and will work across divisions and maintain a close relationship with a network of global platform and divisional leads. Additionally, the IT Business Analyst will assure full and continuous compliance with regulatory and company requirements.', 'The IT Business Analyst will be part of the global MSD IT team based in Singapore.', 'Key Responsibilities, Result Areas & Tasks', '•', 'Drives continuous improvement and innovation, develops an outside-in view based on cross industry networking', '•', 'Assures, and demonstrates full compliance of functional area IT systems and processes, and this towards both company requirement as well as applicable regulatory requirements.', '•', 'Continuously collaborate with both local market, regional and global IT and business partners to understand current and desired business processes/requirements, as well as corresponding business goals', '•', 'Support and/or performs the formulation, definition and documentation of business cases with associated drivers (return on investment), key performance indicators and other appropriate measures/metrics for value realization.', '•', 'Documents and verifies business process flows and business requirements. He/she is effective in business process', 'engineering and has an innovation / continuous process improvement focus with basic Six Sigma experience.', '•', 'Must be a good relationship builder with exceptional interpersonal flexibility and ability to work independently on tasks that are not well defined. Demonstrated ability to interact and communicate with all levels of business leadership and operational teams.', '•', 'Has demonstrated excellent presentation oral, written, and graphical communications skills, as well as ability to present and explain technical information in a way that establishes rapport, persuades others and gains understanding.', '•', 'Excellent facilitation, consultation, and influencing skills including experience with outsourced service providers', '•', 'Must be able to work independently and enable/facilitate productive and business-like meetings as well as to work with individuals at all levels and demonstrate a level of professionalism that', 'instils confidence and inspires trust.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

description: ['MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its', 'legacy for over a century', ".MSD's success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare", '.', 'MSD is a global, research-driven pharmaceutical company dedicated to putting patients first.', 'Our culture is one of strong ethics & integrity, diverse experiences, and a resounding passion for improving human health.', 'Global Research IT is a global, multidisciplinary team of IT professionals, informaticists and information scientists who work at the intersection of technology, science and data in partnership with our research division’s Discovery, Preclinical and Early Development (DPED) organization. We believe that we are in an era of unprecedented opportunity to translate breakthough biomedical research into meaningful patient therapies and that the research IT landscape must transform in order to accelerate scientific innovation realize that opportunity. We are seeking a leader with a passion for driving this kind of transformation, within our research division and across the life sciences industry, to join us in our journey.', "The Client Services Director, Discovery Research IT and Informatics is accountable for IT and informatics capabilities to drive MSD's Discovery Research efforts, spanning discovery chemistry, protein sciences, pharamacology and discovery biology functional areas. The successful candidate will be a member of the Discovery Research leadership team and partner to define and realize the strategic goals of Discovery Research, partnering with engineering, data science and scientific support functions to implement and operationalize necessary programs, informatics capabilities and site-based support across our research division discovery sites in Boston, London, San Francisco and West Point, PA.", 'Specific role responsibilities include:', 'As a member Discovery Research leadership team, contribute to the strategic and tactical planning and execution oversight of business objectives across Discovery Research, bringing the perspective of technology and information sciences, and helping to drive modality-agnostic, cross functional capabilities.', 'Building and managing an investment roadmap and IT and informatics portfolio designed to drive business outcomes, working to establish a culture of joint accountability for business outcomes across research and IT colleagues', 'Partnering with Global Research IT leadership team and our research division IT Engineering to drive the creation and use of enterprise assets to provide value across our research division while enabling the broader Discovery Research strategy, driving toward the future state research IT ecosystem needed for transformation.', 'Partner with scientific support functions to ensure that business experimental and analytical workflows are enabled, working to establish meaningful metrics for outcomes.', 'Foster the identification and exploration of opportunities to use computational and data science capabilities to gain new scientific insights and/or efficiencies.', 'Coordinate across the network of our research division Discovery Sites to ensure that functional capabilities are aligned and tuned to address site-specific needs, balancing standardization of business process with business needs', 'Serve as the primary point of contact in Discovery Research for all IT initiatives to understand implications for the Discovery Research area, driving awareness and/or mitigation activities as needed', 'Manage and develop a team of 6+ direct reports, as well as coaching and developing colleagues across Global Research IT and collaborating functions to help build a rich talent pool of IT and informatics colleagues to drive the scientific mission of Discovery, Preclinical and Early Development.', 'Qualifications', 'Education Minimum Requirement:', 'Bachelor’s Degree in an information sciences or quantitative biomedical field, MS or Ph.D or equivalent experience. strongly preferred', '10+ years of experience in healthcare or life sciences IT or informatics, preferably in research.', 'Required Experience and Skills:', 'Deep understanding of pharmaceutical discovery and translational workflows and the information types and technology systems that enable them.', 'Demonstrated ability to partner with business stakeholders and navigate across conflicting priorities to balance critical tactical and strategic needs.', 'Highly responsive and detail-oriented, with a focus on user experience and accountability for outcomes.', 'Strong relationship building abilities and partnership skills; Ability to work effectively through influence across all levels of the organization, achieving results with a largely virtual and distributed team.', 'Outstanding written and verbal communication skills, including the ability to quickly synthesize data and develop recommendations for senior leader.', 'Strategic thinker, with demonstrated ability to develop and execute on a multi-year plan to drive business outcomes, with resiliency to organizational evolution.', 'Proven ability as a self-starter and problem solver; comfort with ambiguity and able to effectively take the conceptual to the pragmatic, addressing business and technical obstacles as they emerge', 'Sound judgment, planning, forecasting and project management skills', 'Solid track record of recruiting, coaching and developing talent, particularly talent with skills in both science and IT/informatics.', 'Experience in establishing and managing strategic vendor relationships.', 'Preferred Experience and Skills:', 'Experience with information models, workflows and informatics methodologies for diverse modalities, in particular non-small molecule modalities, is highly desired.', 'Strong change management and execution skills. Experience in driving cultural changes essential to achieving business outcomes.', 'Direct people management of 5+ direct reports', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Search Firm Representatives Please Read Carefully:', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', 'MSD is an equal opportunity employer, Minority/Female/Disability/Veteran – proudly embracing diversity in all of it’s manifestations.']

description: ['Equipment Systems Specialist', 'MSD Carlow', 'Are you ready to Invent, Impact, Inspire?', 'Join MSD and shape the future of healthcare in Ireland', 'MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. The difference between potential and achievement lies in the spark that fuels innovation and inventiveness; this is the space where MSD has codified its 125-year legacy. MSD’s success is backed by ethical integrity, forward momentum, and an inspiring mission to achieve new milestones in global healthcare.', 'INTRODUCTION', 'At MSD Ireland, we are committed to ‘Inventing for Life’ in all that we do. We keep the patient at the very heart of all that we do and strive to find solutions and treatments for some of the world’s most challenging healthcare needs.', 'THE COMPANY', 'MSD Ireland is one of the country’s leading healthcare companies, having first established here over 50 years ago.', 'We currently employ over 1,700 employees, across four sites in Ballydine, Co Tipperary, Brinny, Co Cork, Carlow and Dublin and, in addition, operate substantial Human Health and Animal Health businesses.', 'In total to date, we have invested $2.5 billion in our Irish operations and our annual turnover ranks us as one of Ireland’s top 20 companies. Currently, our Irish sites manufacture approximately half of MSD’s top twenty products, saving and enhancing lives in over sixty countries around the world.', 'With almost 70,000 employees operating in more than 140 countries, you will be joining one of the world’s largest pharmaceutical companies.', 'MSD CARLOW', 'MSD in Carlow is a world-class manufacturing facility, and the company’s first stand-alone vaccine and biologics facility outside the US. Carlow employs over 350 highly skilled employees and is an important element of MSD’s network of sites, playing a pivotal role in the manufacture of our immuno-oncology treatment.', 'MSD Carlow is a state-of-the-art, 200,000 sq ft vaccines and biologics facility focused on formulating and filling vaccine and biologic products that improve and transform the lives of people across the world.', 'MSD’s sustained investment in Ireland empowers Carlow to offer its team the opportunity to continuously grow, learn, invent and thrive. We are growing our highly-skilled team and building our presence in Carlow so that we can continue to lead scientific breakthroughs in the treatment of some of the world’s most harmful diseases.', 'Responsibility for SAP build for IPT maintenance equipment, including the associated planning and scheduling of maintenance activities and resources. This includes scheduling IPT maintenance technicians, attending the site planning meetings and management of the IPT maintenance department budgets. This position is a core function of the IPT maintenance group and requires an understanding of all aspects of the day-to-day running of a maintenance department and reporting monthly metrics to senior management.', 'POSITION RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Responsible for the safe accomplishment of activities whilst following all statutory, environmental, regulatory (cGMP), corporate and departmental policies and procedures.', 'Management of scheduling and planning of the IPT Maintenace program.', 'Responsible for equipment asset builds on SAP.', 'Represent the Maintenance Team at the weekly site schedule meeting.', 'Management of MRO and expense projects against budget and monthly metric reporting.', 'Vendor management for IPT maintenance activities.', 'Responsible for progressing the build of Bill of Materials (BOMs) on Critical Equipment within production.', 'Analysis of work requests to determination the actual work required, tasks, task sequence and methodology plus the identification of resources including skills, labour, crew size, parts and materials, special tools and equipment.', 'Required to comply with MSD Global Policies, Procedures and Guidelines, regulatory requirements and execute current Good manufacturing Practices (cGMP) in the performance of day to day activities and all applicable job functions.', 'Work collaboratively to drive a safe and compliant culture in Carlow.', 'May be required to perform other duties as assigned.', 'REPORTING STRUCTURE', 'Reports to Associate Director of Maintenance & Engineering', 'Qualifications', 'QUALIFICATIONS & EXPERIENCE - KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS REQUIREMENTS', 'General', 'Prior experience working within an Engineering or Maintenance Department required, preferably in a pharmaceutical, medical or equivalent GMP environment.', 'Technical', 'Knowledge of cGMP and GDP preferred.', 'SAP knowledge with experience in similar role preferred.', 'Proficiency in Microsoft Office and job-related computer applications required', 'Lean Six Sigma Methodology experience desired', 'Report, standards, policy writing skills required.', 'Knowledge of maintenance systems, processing equipment and maintenance systems.', 'People', 'Effective communication and interpersonal skills to interface effectively with all levels of colleagues in a team environment, and with external customers', 'Track record of implementing change initiatives', 'Self-motivated', 'Flexible approach', 'Proven organizational skills', 'Data analysis', 'Demonstrable analytical and systematic problem solving skills', 'Training skills', 'Education', 'Bachelors Degree or equivalent qualification; ideally in a related Engineering discipline', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'So, if you are ready to:', 'INVENT solutions to meet unmet healthcare needs', 'IMPACT the future by joining MSD, one of the world’s leading healthcare companies', 'INSPIRE your team to reach their full potential and push the boundaries of science and technology', 'MSD is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms / recruitment agencies for this employment opportunity.  Please, no phone calls or emails.  All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at MSD via email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of MSD.  No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by MSD as a result of the referral or through other means.', '*engineering', '*hjcarlow', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 10 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']

regional or client area for the creation of close and intensive connection to identified key accounts.', 'The position shall for this purpose support and utilize a use of structured customer database of the organization as well as implement Key Account Management practices’ strategy for a development of Key Accounts (KA) tactical plans and also in daily operative contacts with KA.', 'Key Account Manager (KAM) is responsible for an efficient allocation of the organizational resources by individual KA in order to increase the commercial performance (Share of wallet) of the organization by KA business and if & where possible by creation mutual KA & the organization connection directly into livestock’s production.', 'The position shall monitor an efficiency of the work by a frequent and manufacturing division evaluation of established Key performance indicators (KPI’s).', 'Roles and responsibilities:', '• Identification and following active work with and support of KA (veterinarians, key opinion leaders i.e. KOL, organizations, producers, farms) according to the organization driven rules', '• Keeping records and stimulating the organization on the keeping records on the market’s customer audience in the organization’s supported Customer relationship management system (CRM) its periodical evaluation and the strategic identification of the targeted KA', '• Creation, implementation, updating and evaluation of the tactical KA individual marketing and action plans including regular evaluation of their KPIs', '• Keeping overview on the most actual network of stakeholders acting in the livestock production value chain  where KAM acts', '• Daily contact with KA, KOL or other stakeholders from different area (e.g. Universities, breeding organizations or associations, livestock trading subjects) which act on livestock production market', '• Organization of the round tables meetings, workshops, presentations, regional symposia and meetings including strategies and tactical plans in areas of marketing, sales', '• Ongoing constructive and harmonized cooperation with co-acting departments of the organization namely product management, technical services and sales', '• Regular analyze (external & competitive & stakeholders environment) on the market segment KA acts including presentation of market tendencies and the organization’s market performance in presentable format e.g. Power point presentation', '• Continuous cooperation in region (CERG) with TM (Technical Manager) Swine and MKT Manager Swine in area of responsibility', 'Qualifications', 'Requirements on candidate:', 'Professional Competence:', '• Degree preferentially university degree in-vet medicine, agriculture, life-sciences or BA with a practice in livestock production area', '• Knowledge in livestock production (species specific)', '• High degree of analytical and tactical thinking', '• High level of diplomacy, negotiating skills but constructive assertiveness in dealing with internal and external stakeholders', '• High level of presentation abilities, communications and team-cooperation', '• Excellent organizational and planning skills and be flexible to successfully handle conflicting time pressures and a large volume of work including a preparedness for frequent travel', '• Competence to work in MS-Office (Word, Excel, Power Point, Outlook) and in IT technology in general', '• High motivation and work engagement', '• English in excellent written and verbal command', 'Your role at MSD is integral to helping the world meet new breakthroughs that affect generations to come, and we’re counting on your skills and inventiveness to help make meaningful contributions to global medical advancement. At MSD, we’re inventing for life.', 'Other Locations:', 'Employee Status:', 'Regular', 'Travel:', 'Yes, 50 % of the Time', 'Number of Openings:', '1', 'Shift (if applicable):', 'Hazardous Materials:', 'Company Trade Name:', 'MSD']
